GSP28mimsvtku:4682: na ceyam aniyatanimittā, śabdanimittatvāt tadanantaram utpatteḥ. katham ananyagocare kāryātmani vyutpattiḥ. tadabhāve vā śabdāt pratipattiḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4684: yadaviditasama(?yā/yā a)pi svārthaṃ gamayanti. athavā sarvasyākumāramāsthaviraṃ ca kāryāvagatiḥ pravṛttihetur iti
GSP28mimsvtku:4686_0: upalabhyākalayati nūnam itaḥ sakāśād asya kāryasaṃvidāsīt katham aparathā pravartata
GSP28mimsvtku:4686_1: iti. nanv evaṃ kriyām eva kāryatayā ajñāsīd iti parasyāpi tadgocarām eva kāryadhiyam
GSP28mimsvtku:4688_0: pravṛttāvahetutvāt. etad eva phale 'pi darśayitavyam. ato nirmuktākhilaphalādivikalpam
GSP28mimsvtku:4688_2: vyutpadyamāno jānāti. na hi kāryāvagatir bhavati pravṛttiś ca neti sambhavati. ataḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4689: kāryavidhir ity ācāryāḥ pratipedire. nanu ca preṣaṇādayo liṅarthāḥ. na,
GSP28mimsvtku:4690: svasantāne pravṛttihetutvena teṣām anupalabdheḥ. vede ca vyabhicārāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:4691: (nanu tar)hīṣṭābhyupāyatā liṅādīnām artho bhaviṣyati. sarvo hi samīhitopāyam ākalayya tatra tatra pravartata iti param api ceṣṭamānam
GSP28mimsvtku:4692: upalabhya jānāti nūnam iṣṭo .......mavyāpāraḥ śabdaśravaṇānantaraṃ cāyaṃ ceṣṭata iti śabdeneṣṭābhyupāyatā pratipāditā bhavati. sa eva vidhiḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4693: pravartanārūpo hi saḥ. pravṛttihetuṃ dharmaṃ ca pravadanti ...... . ataḥ preṣaṇādhyeṣaṇābhyanujñātiriktam
GSP28mimsvtku:4694_1: artho vidhir iti yuktam. hi ........tya jaimininoktam upadeśa iti. bhāṣyakāreṇa ca
GSP28mimsvtku:4694_2: upadeśa iti viśiṣṭasya śabdasyoccāraṇam iti vivṛtam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4695: puruṣārthopāyaṃ kilānavagatam avagamayan śabdāntare dūram utkrṣṭo liṅādiśabdo 'viśiṣṭa ity uktam. ato lokavedatantrāntarānugato 'yam eva siddhānta iti kaiś cid unnītam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4696: tad idam anupapannam. tathā hi -- saṃvid eva tāvat
GSP28mimsvtku:4697_0: paripanthinī. na hi liṅādiśravaṇasamanantaram iṣṭābhyupāyo 'yaṃ vyāpāra iti bhavati
GSP28mimsvtku:4697_1: matiḥ. api tarhi, pravartanāvagatiḥ. nanu ceṣṭābhyupāyataiva pravartanā pravṛttihetutvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:4697_2: tan na. evaṃ sati yasya parṇamayī juhūr bhavati ity atrāpi vidhitvaprasaṅgaḥ. tarati
GSP28mimsvtku:4697_3: mṛtyum ity atrāpi. bhavati hi tatrāpi parṇamayatā apāpaślokaśravaṇasya aśvamedho
GSP28mimsvtku:4698: sādhanam iti pratipattiḥ. yadi matam -- asyedaṃ bhavatīty anvayamātram
GSP28mimsvtku:4699: atrāvagamyate na vyatirekaḥ, na ca tam antareṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:4701_0: yajetety atrāpi svargayāgayoḥ sādhyasādhanasaṃvit. na hi tatrāpi sati yoge svargo
GSP28mimsvtku:4701_1: bhavati asati neti matiḥ. yāgeneti hi tṛtīyā sādhanabhāvam avagamayatīti ced, na.
GSP28mimsvtku:4702_0: 'pi yajiḥ karaṇatayā nirdiśyate. sa ced anyo nābhyupagamyate kathaṃ svabhāvasādhyo
GSP28mimsvtku:4702_1: yajiḥ karaṇatayā nirdiśyate. api ca yatra spaṣṭam iṣṭābhyupāyatvam avagamyate yāgasya
GSP28mimsvtku:4702_2: yatheṣṭābhyupāyo 'yaṃ yāgaḥ yāgena svargaḥ sidhyatīti vā, tatrāpi vidhitvaprasaṅgaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4703: tatkāri cāyam evaṃ bruvāṇo dṛśyate. tathā hi pratibhā vidhir iti nirasyataitad uktaṃ -
GSP28mimsvtku:4706_0: iti. tad idaṃ tavāpi samānam iti varṇitam. api ca evaṃvādinā sādhu samarthitaṃ vidhāv
GSP28mimsvtku:4706_1: anāśrite iti. atra hi vidhyadhīnā yāgāder iṣṭābhyupāyatā na tu saiva vidhir iti darśayati.
GSP28mimsvtku:4706_2: tasmād atikuśalair upadeśāpadeśayor aviśeṣa evopapādita iti nirmuktākhilopādhividhitattvam
GSP28mimsvtku:4708: sādhyasādhanasambandhasiddhiḥ. niyogo hi tadā sādhyaḥ. na ca sādhyadvayam
GSP28mimsvtku:4709: ekatra samavaiti, samatvād asambandhāt. nanu niyogasiddhināntarīyakī svargasiddhiḥ. ata eva sādhyavivṛddhir iyaṃ na tu svargo 'pi svatantratayā
GSP28mimsvtku:4710: sādhyaḥ. nirapekṣaṃ ca sādhyadvayam ekatra virudhyate, nānuguṇam. yathāha
GSP28mimsvtku:4711_0: -- niyogasiddhau sarvaṃ tadanuguṇam iti. kena neṣyate. tasmād avirodha iti. tad asat.
GSP28mimsvtku:4711_1: kiṃ hi svargasiddhim antareṇa niyogasya na sidhyati. na hi nityādhikāreṣu niyogaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4711_2: sādhyāntaram ākāṅkṣati. kāmādhikārāḥ kāmyaparyantā iti cet, ko hetuḥ. kamisādhyatvāgavatiḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4711_3: tathā hi svargakāmo yajeteti sādhyasvargaviśiṣṭādhikārisādhyo niyogo 'vagamyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:4712: svarge sidhyet. ataḥ svargasiddhir avagamyata iti naḥ sādhyasvargaviśiṣṭo
GSP28mimsvtku:4714: puruṣo niyogaṃ sādhayiṣyati. anyadicchato 'nyatra kriyā nopapadyata iti
GSP28mimsvtku:4715: ced, na. niyogasāmarthyād upapatteḥ. niyogo hi pradhānabhūtaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4716: sādhyatayāvagataḥ svargam api kāmayamānam ātmany ākarṣatīti kim
GSP28mimsvtku:4717: anupapannam. api ca sidhyann api svargo yāgāt sidhyatīti na naḥ pramāṇam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4718: svargayāgau hi yugapadaruṇaikahāyanīvadekapradhānakāryānvayinau nānyonyānvayam anubhavataḥ. na cāruṇimna iva dravyāvachedaśaktir yajer api
GSP28mimsvtku:4719: svargasādhanaśaktir avadhṛtā pramāṇāntareṇa. nanu kim atra pramāṇāntareṇa.
GSP28mimsvtku:4720: svarge yāga eva pramāṇam. sa hi svargakāmaṃ yāge niyuṅkte. na cākāmopāye kāmī niyoktuṃ śakyate. uktottaram idam. kiṃ hi bhagavato
GSP28mimsvtku:4722: pravartayati. tasya hy anupāye kāminaṃ niyuñjānasya kim iva hīyeta. yāge niyogo niyuṅkte iti vadatā nūnam idam avadhīritam. ārambhe hi puruṣo
GSP28mimsvtku:4723: niyujyate na karmaṇīti. tasmān na svargayāgayoḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4724: sādhyasādhanasambandhasiddhiḥ. yad api ca kriyādikārye vyabhicārād anupādhike vyutpattir ity uktaṃ, tadayuktam. pratītaviṣayatvād vyutpatteḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4725: na hi kriyādivyabhicārāt śaśaviṣāṇaṃ liṅādyartha iti śakyate vaktum. yad api manyate kriyākārya eva loke vyutpannaḥ phalasamabhivyāhārād vede
GSP28mimsvtku:4726: 'nyadavināśi kāryaṃ liṅādyartha iti pratyeṣyate. loke tu saṃmugdhenāpi
GSP28mimsvtku:4727: vyavahārasiddher na śabdārthatattvanirūpaṇam. bahava eva gauṇalākṣaṇikaśabdanibandhanā loke vyavahārā dṛśyante. vede tu svargakāmo
GSP28mimsvtku:4728_0: yajeteti kriyātmanaḥ kāryasya bhaṅguratvād āmuṣmikasvargādiphalasādhanāśakteḥ kālāntarasthāyikriyāto
GSP28mimsvtku:4728_1: bhinnaṃ kāryam upeyate. vākyaśeṣāc caikatra samunnītaḥ śabdārtho yavavarāhādyarthavadanyatrāsaty
GSP28mimsvtku:4728_2: api vākyaśeṣe 'vagamyate. nityādhikāreṣv asaty api phalapadasamabhivyāhāre tathāvidham
GSP28mimsvtku:4729: bhaviṣyatīti. tad idam anyad evābhyastam anyac copanipatitam. kriyākārye
GSP28mimsvtku:4730_0: (viṣpanna?) sthāyikāryaṃ pratipadyate. na ca kriyāyāḥ phalasādhanatāśakter aśabdārthaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4730_1: san yuktaḥ kalpayitum. kāmaṃ karmaṇa evāphalaniṣpatteḥ samasti rūpam iti kalpayitum
GSP28mimsvtku:4730_2: ucitam. na ca pūrvāvagataśabdārthānyathākaraṇam. na hi karmaṇy anuśiṣṭā dvitīyā saktuṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:4731: abhidhatta iti yuktam abhidhātum. sarvaśabdeṣv anāśvāsapraṅgāt. ata
GSP28mimsvtku:4732_0: eva{2,13}tatra tatra yathāśrutārthasamanvayānupapatteḥ kvacid guṇavādaḥ kvacillakṣaṇā
GSP28mimsvtku:4732_1: kvacid viniyogabhaṅga iti tantre vyavahāraḥ. na tu viniyogabhaṅgād abhidhānam eva
GSP28mimsvtku:4732_2: śabdānām anyathā nīyate. api ca śrutakarmaphalasambandhānupapatter anavagatapūrvam
GSP28mimsvtku:4732_3: apūrvaṃ kāryaṃ liṅartham upayatā sādhu śrutam upapāditam. kiṃ hi liṅāparāddhaṃ yat
GSP28mimsvtku:4732_4: tasyālaukikam artham atikramya karmaphalasambandha upapādyate. nanu nādyāpi liṅartho
GSP28mimsvtku:4732_5: niścīyate. ayam eva hi nirṇayasamayaḥ. atra ca śrutaphalapadāntarasamabhivyāhāropapattaye
GSP28mimsvtku:4733: niścīyate. ato na kiñcid virotsyata iti. kim idānīṃ svargakāmo yajeteti śruter apratītir eva, liṅarthe saṃśayo vā. apratītau kriyātmanaḥ kāryasya
GSP28mimsvtku:4734_0: phalasambandhānupapattir ity etad eva durbhaṇam. saṃśayas tu pakṣadvayāvalambī. na
GSP28mimsvtku:4734_1: cālaukike kriyātirekiṇi kārye liṅādayo nirūpitaprayogāḥ. na cātyantāparidṛṣṭāpūrvārthagocaraḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4735_0: yavādiṣu tv āryamlecchaprayoganibandhano dṛṣṭapūrvārthagocaraḥ saṃśayo yukta eva.
GSP28mimsvtku:4735_1: ata evātra na vākyaśeṣān nirṇayaḥ. sandigdhe hi sa varṇitaḥ. na ca liṅarthe saṃśayaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4735_2: kin tu loke vyutpattyanusāreṇa kriyātmany eva kārye
GSP28mimsvtku:4736: niścayaḥ. yad apy ucyate karmaphalasambandhopapattaye 'nyat kāryam upalabhyata iti. kena vā karmaphalasambandho darśitaḥ. na hy ayaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4737: vainiyogikaḥ. niyoga evātra pramāṇam. sa cet tadadhīnasiddhiḥ duruttaram
GSP28mimsvtku:4738: itaretarāśrayam, siddho hi niyogo viṣayībhūtasya bhāvārthasya karaṇatām
GSP28mimsvtku:4739: āha. tatsiddhyā ca niyogātmalābha ity alam anenāpi.
GSP28mimsvtku:4741: bhāvārthādhikaraṇe uktaṃ liṅādiśabdānāṃ puruṣaṃ prati prayojakavyāpāro
GSP28mimsvtku:4742_0: 'bhidhātmikā bhāvanā vidhir iti. dve kila bhāvane mīmāṃsakāḥ saṅgirante śabdātmikām
GSP28mimsvtku:4742_1: arthātmikāṃ ca. tatrārthātmikā sarvākhyātasādhāraṇī svargādiphaladharmikā yāgādidhātvarthakaraṇikā
GSP28mimsvtku:4742_3: tatra tatra sidhyati. śabdātmikā tu liṅādiśabdānāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4743_1: kartavyatāvatīti vivecanīyam. kathaṃ punarabhidhā śabdātmikā. śabdavyāpāro hi saḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4743_2: na. vyāpāratadvator anatibhedād upapatteḥ. dravyam{2,14}eva hi pūrvāvasthātaḥ pracyutaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4744: vyāpāraśabdavācyam. kathaṃ liṅādīnām abhidhā puruṣakarmikā. na hi te
GSP28mimsvtku:4745_0: puruṣam abhidadhati bhāvanāvacanatvāt. satyam. bhāvanaiva tair abhidhīyamānā na svarūpamātreṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:4745_1: vartamānāpadeśavad abhidhīyate. kin tu kuryād (iti) pravṛttiviṣayatayā. na ca śabdaśaktayo
GSP28mimsvtku:4746: tathā hi -- liṅādiśravaṇānantaraṃ prayojyavṛddhaṃ ceṣṭamānam upalabhya tataḥ pravṛttihetupratyayaḥ prayojyasyāvagamyata iti tāvat
GSP28mimsvtku:4747_0: sarvavādisiddham avivādam. pravṛttihetusvarūpe tu bahudhā vivādaḥ. tatra kriyāphalādīnāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4747_1: vyabhicārād apravṛttihetutvāt, pramāṇāntarāgocare tu pravṛttihetau vyutpattyasambhavāt,
GSP28mimsvtku:4747_3: liṅādīnām abhidhānam eva pravṛttihetur iti sāmpratam. sā ca pravartaneti sthitam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4747_4: sā ca pravartyakarmikā. pravartyaś ca puruṣa iti yuktaṃ puruṣakarmatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:4749: puruṣaṃ ca pravartayan pravartaneti gīyate. na ca sarvābhidhāsu prasaṅgaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4750_0: śabdaśaktivaicitryād ity uktam. śaktir hi kāryadarśanasamadhigamyā. tad yataḥ pravṛttidarśanaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4750_1: tadvyāpāraḥ pravartanā, pravṛttihetutvāt. na ca śabdāntarebhyaḥ pravṛttir upalabhyata
GSP28mimsvtku:4751: tathātvaprasaṅgaḥ. yaś cābhidhāyā anabhidhāne doṣaḥ uktaḥ, so
GSP28mimsvtku:4753_0: anabhidhānatvam uktaṃ tad apy ayuktam. kiṃ hi kāryam anupapadyamānaṃ pravartanām
GSP28mimsvtku:4753_1: avagamayati. na tāvad bhāvanāvagatiḥ, vartamānāpadeśeṣv api prasaṅgāt. ato 'nanyapramāṇatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:4753_2: upapannam abhidheyatvam abhidhāyāḥ. yat tu ananyapramāṇake vyutpattyasambhava ity
GSP28mimsvtku:4755: abhidhāyā rūpam unnīyate. na ca tāvanmātraṃ pravartanā laḍādibhyo 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:4756: pravṛttisaṃvedanaprasaṅgāt. asādhāraṇas tu ko 'pi viśeṣo liṅpravṛtteḥ pramāṇāntarāgocara eveti duṣpariharo vyutpattivirahaḥ. maivam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4757_0: pravṛttihetutvenārthāpattitas tadavagamāt. tathā hi -- yatra tāvat liṅādibhyaḥ pravṛttir
GSP28mimsvtku:4757_1: upalabhyate, tatra mayā pravartitavyam ity antaḥsaṅkalpamūlātmā liṅpravṛttiviśeṣa
GSP28mimsvtku:4757_2: unnīyate. apravartamānā api pravartasveti māmayamāheti liṅśrāviṇo vaktāraṃ nirdiśanti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4757_3: tad avasīyate pravṛttihetur abhihito liṅā. sa ca narte vāpārāt sidhyatīty uktam eva.
GSP28mimsvtku:4757_4: na ca kim ātmako liṅvyāpāra{2,15}iti vācyam. antaḥsaṅkalpamūlātmā hy asāv iti
GSP28mimsvtku:4758: vakṣyati. nāsāv udāsīnaḥ kadācid avagamyate. pravṛttijanana eva hi
GSP28mimsvtku:4759: bhāvabhede vyutpattir āsīd iti svayam api pravartitavyam iti pratipadyamāna eva hi liṅarthaṃ pratipadyate. nodāsīnam ākhyātāntaravat.
GSP28mimsvtku:4760_0: no hi phalādayaḥ svarūpeṇāvagatāḥ pravartayanti. asya tvayam evātmā yat pravṛttidhiyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4761: svapratipattikāle na śabdādṛte tam arthaṃ budhyata ity
GSP28mimsvtku:4762: ananyapramāṇakatvam. na tu pravartanāsvarūpam evānyato nāvagataṃ, yena matāntaravad vyutpattivirahaś codyeta. samprati tu na jāter iva vyaktim
GSP28mimsvtku:4763: anyataḥ pravartanāṃ pratipadyāmaha iti śābdīm abhidadhmahe. na cābhidhā nābhidhīyata iti vācyam. abhidhāśabdavadupapatteḥ. yad eva hi
GSP28mimsvtku:4765: tathā ca liṅādīnām abhidhānam iti kiṃ nābhidhīyate. uktaṃ hi liṅādibhyaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4766: pravṛttiheturupalabhyata iti. na ca liṅādīnām abhidhātmano vyāpārād anyaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4767: pravṛttihetuḥ śakyate nirūpayitum iti. ata eva nānavasthā. na hi pravartanāvat tadabhidhānam api śabdād avagamyate, yat tadgocaram aparam
GSP28mimsvtku:4768: abhidhānam upeyate. na ca liṅādisvarūpābhidhānaprasaktiḥ, svayam eva tadvyāpāravailakṣaṇyāt. liṅupaśleṣe hi viśeṣake viśeṣaṇābhidhānam
GSP28mimsvtku:4769: āpāditam. svagate tu viśeṣe tadanavakāśam eva. sarve śabdavyāpārāḥ khalv
GSP28mimsvtku:4770: api svarūpeṇaiva vyatibhidyante. ata eva vilakṣaṇābhidheyapratyayahetubhāvabhājaḥ ekasyā api vidhivibhakteḥ kriyākālādivannābhidhābhidhānam anupapannam. ato liṅādīnām abhidhā
GSP28mimsvtku:4772: abhidhāṃ bhāvanām āhur anyām eva liṅādayaḥ |
GSP28mimsvtku:4773_0: iti. tad anenaivamātmanā vidhinā sambaddhā bhāvanā pravṛttiviṣayatayāvagatā phalavattayā
GSP28mimsvtku:4773_1: niścīyate, svasantāne phalavataḥ pravṛttiviṣayatayāvagateḥ. tathā cāvagatānuṣṭhīyata
GSP28mimsvtku:4773_2: iti vidhiśaktim upakrāntām avasīdantīm uttabhnāti phalavattā, na tu saiva vidhir
GSP28mimsvtku:4773_3: iti. ata evāpuruṣārtheṣu sāgaraṃ tared ity evamādiṣu vidhyavagatiḥ. tathā tatra na
GSP28mimsvtku:4774: syād itarathā tatra na syāt apuruṣārthatvāt(?). liṅvyāpāras tu tatrāpy
GSP28mimsvtku:4775: aviśiṣṭaḥ, nirvāhikāyās tu phalavattāyāḥ pramāṇābhāvād na{2,16}nirvahati.
GSP28mimsvtku:4776: tadabhāvaś cānāptavākyatvāt. vede tv apauruṣeyatvān na puruṣadoṣāśaṅkāpīty upapāditam. vidhau tu tam atikramyeti prapañcitaś ca vidhir api manāg ity uparamyate iti || 15 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4778_0: svapratyayeti. anāptavākye hi dṛṣṭavyabhicāritvāt tajjanitāt pratyayāt pratyayāntaraṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4778_1: svīyam arthāvadhāraṇāyāpekṣate. na ca tatrāpy anāptavacaḥ pramāṇam anuvādatvāt. āptoktīnāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4778_2: tu pramāṇaviṣayagocarāṇāṃ prāmāṇyāt tasyaivāptasya narasyāpekṣā kim ayam artho 'nena
GSP28mimsvtku:4778_3: pramāṇenopalabdho na veti. na ceyam ubhayy apy apekṣā codanāṃsu sambhavati, apauruṣeyatvasya
GSP28mimsvtku:4778_4: vedādhikaraṇe vakṣyamāṇatvāt. tata upapannaṃ codanāyāḥ prāmāṇyam iti || 16
GSP28mimsvtku:4779: atrānantaraṃ vṛttikāramatārambhabhāṣyaṃ - vṛttiāras tv anyathemaṃ granthaṃ varṇayāñ cakāra tasya nimittaparīṣṭiḥ ityevamādim iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4780: tatrādiśabde tāvad dvaividhye sādhvasādhuvivekārtham āha -- ādiśabda iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4781: makārānto 'yamādiśabdaḥ na luṅanta iti. kāraṇam āha -- likīti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4782: sāmānyavivakṣāyāṃ tu napuṃsakaliṅgatā. atra ca prathamam eva granthātmake viśeṣe 'vagate na sāmānyavivakṣā yukteti. bhittvā tu vākyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4783: sāmānyavivakṣāyāṃ kleśo bhavatīti. aparam api vṛttikāramatena
GSP28mimsvtku:4784: parīṣṭisūtravyākhyānārthaṃ bhāṣyaṃ na parīkṣitavyaṃ nimittam iti. tad
GSP28mimsvtku:4785: ayuktam. sūtre naño 'śrutatvāt, ata āha -- nañ iti. idaṃ hi sūtraṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4787: prasiddhasyadharmanimittasya parīkṣāvidher ayogyatvād iti vyākhyāte tu nañadhyāhāreṇa parīṣṭisūtre pratyakṣasūtram avatārayituṃ bhāṣyakṛtoktaṃ -
GSP28mimsvtku:4788_0: nanu vyabhicārāt parīkṣitavyaṃ nimittaṃ śuktikā hi rajatavat prakāśate yataḥ iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4788_1: evaṃ hy atra{2,17}paricoditaṃ - na prasiddhatvaṃ nimittāparīkṣāyāṃ hetuḥ, prasiddhatarasya
GSP28mimsvtku:4789: vyabhicārād iti. tad ayuktaṃ, na hi pratyakṣaṃ vyabhicarati api tarhi
GSP28mimsvtku:4790_0: tadābhāsam. na cābhāsavyabhicāre pramāṇavyabhicāraparicodanā yujyate. ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:4790_1: saṅkarād iti. pratyakṣatadābhāsayor akṣajatvena sādṛśyān mohād ābhāsavyabhicāre 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:4793: codayati. etat paricodanottaratayā pratyakṣasūtram upavarṇitaṃ naitad evam. yat pratyakṣaṃ na tad vyabhicarati. yad vyabhicarati na tat
GSP28mimsvtku:4794_0: pratyakṣam. kiṃ tarhi pratyakṣam. tatsamprayoge puruṣasyendriyāṇāṃ buddhijanma satpratyakṣam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4794_1: yadviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ tenendriyāṇāṃ puruṣasya samprayoge yad buddhijanma tat satpratyakṣam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4795: 'sti. tad idaṃ vārttikakāro darśayati -- naitad iti. parīṣṭisūtreṇāparīkṣā pratijñātā pratyakṣasūtreṇopapādyopasaṃhṛteti kathaṃ punar evaṃlakṣaṇake 'parīkṣā sidhyatīty ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:4796: tatreti. tatra hi pratyakṣalakṣaṇe. yad anevaṃlakṣaṇakaṃ tad ayathārtham.
GSP28mimsvtku:4797: pratyakṣaṃ tu yathārtham eva. ayathārthāśaṅkā tu parīkṣāyāṃ hetur iti yuktam aparīkṣyatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:4798_0: kiṃ punar ayathārthajñānam. śuktau rajatam iti. sā khalu doṣavaśād anyākāreṇāvabhāsata
GSP28mimsvtku:4798_1: iti bhavati tadgocarajñānam ayathārtham. tad idam ayuktam. na hi śuktī rajatam iti
GSP28mimsvtku:4798_2: bhāsate. kiṃ tarhi idam iti śuktirajatasādharaṇātmanā purovarti dravyaṃ gṛhyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:4798_4: doṣavaśāl luptatadavamarśā rajatam iti smṛtir udeti. tad ete dve eva grahaṇasmaraṇātmake
GSP28mimsvtku:4799_0: bhedakadharmānavadhāraṇam. bhedāgrahaṇād eva vibhramavyavahāraḥ, na punar anyasyānyathābhāsanāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:4799_1: idam iha bhāsata iti pratītisākṣikam. ataḥ kathaṃ rajatarūparūpitasya śuktir ālambanam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4800: yadātmākārajñānajananam.{2,18}ato nātadākārasya tadālambanam iti jñānam eva sākāram iti balād āpatitam. na khalu rajatam iti śukter ākāraḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4801: rajataṃ tu nāsannihitam akṣajajñānālambanam iti yuktam. ato bāhyarahitaṃ nirālambanam eva jñānam iti balād āpannam. evañ ca mudhaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:4803: doṣāś ca svakārye śaktivighātahetavaḥ. ato yuktaṃ tadvaśena
GSP28mimsvtku:4804: bhedakadharmānavadhāraṇaṃ, na punar anyasyānyathā bhānam. api ca evam ayaṃ viparītakhyātivādī vaktavyaḥ rajatadhiyaḥ śuktigocarāyāḥ kiṃ nibandhanam
GSP28mimsvtku:4805: iti. na tāvad indriyaṃ prāpyakāritvād, asannihitarajataprāptyasambhavāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:4807_0: anupanyasanīyam. ato grahaṇakāraṇābhāvāt smṛtir iyam iti niścīyate. asti hi smṛteḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4807_1: kāraṇaṃ pūrvānubhavaprabhāvitobhayavādisiddhā bhāvanā. nanv asati tatparāmarśe smaraṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:4807_2: api nopapannam. na nopapannam. anubhūtaviṣayaṃ hi jñānaṃ smṛtiḥ. na tad iti parāmarśaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4807_3: tasmād idaṃ rajatam iti grahaṇasmaraṇayor ubhayor api yathārthatvād yathārthāyathārthajñānavibhāgo
GSP28mimsvtku:4809: atra vadāmaḥ -- yadi dve apy ete yathārthe, na tarhi bhrāntiḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4810: ayathārthajñānaṃ bhrāntir iti laukikā manyante. smarāmīty agraho bhrāntir
GSP28mimsvtku:4811_0: iti cet. tan na. bhāṣyakāro hi sa evāsamīcīnaḥ pratyaya iti pratyayam asamīcīnaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4811_1: darśayati. api ca ko 'yam agrahaḥ. grahaṇābhāva iti cet. abhāvo nāma na kaścid āyuṣmatāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4811_2: yo bhrāntir ity ucyate. nanu smaraṇam eva
GSP28mimsvtku:4812: smarāmīty ullekhaśūnyam agrahaṇam ācakṣmahe na tattvāntaram. evaṃ tarhi rajatam iti smṛtir bhrāntiḥ. na ca tad yuktam. mithyā bhrāntir iti
GSP28mimsvtku:4814: pūrvānubhūtadeśakālāgraho bhrāntir iti cet. na. anyānavabhāso
GSP28mimsvtku:4816: bhāsamāne sarvaṃ bhāsate. ato yady api rajatasya deśakālau na smaryete,
GSP28mimsvtku:4817_0: rajataṃ tu yathāvasthitaṃ smṛtyā viṣayīkṛtam iti na bhrāntiḥ. atha sāpekṣatvāt smṛter
GSP28mimsvtku:4817_1: aprāmāṇyam, ato bhrāntir iti cet. yady evaṃ sarvasmṛtīnāṃ bhrāntitvāpātaḥ, aviśeṣāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:4818: atha mataṃ - gṛhyamāṇasmaryamāṇayor vivekāgraho bhrāntir iti, uktam asmābhiḥ nāgraho nāma kaścidṛte grahaṇasmaraṇābhyām. tayoś ca na grahaṇaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4819: bhramaḥ, pramāṇatvāt. na ca{2,19}smṛtiḥ. vyabhicārād atiprasaṅgāc ca.
GSP28mimsvtku:4820: vivekāgrahe ca vibhrame sarvasaṃvidāṃ bhrāntitvaprasaṅgaḥ. avaśyaṃ hi yena
GSP28mimsvtku:4821: kenacid viveko na gṛhyate. syān mataṃ - vyavahāravisaṃvādo mithyātvam iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:4822_0: tan na. taddhetor abhāvāt. yadi khalv idam iti grahaṇaṃ rajatam iti deśakālānavacchinnaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4822_1: rajatasmaraṇaṃ, ko vyavahārahetuḥ. no khalu rajatapadād anadhiṣṭhānaṃ rajataṃ smaran
GSP28mimsvtku:4822_2: rajatam iti vyavaharaty atredam iti tadvidvān. yo yadarthī sa tadupāditsayā ceṣṭate.
GSP28mimsvtku:4822_3: anadhiṣṭhānaṃ tu rajataṃ jānato na vyavahārahetum upalabhāmahe. api ca ko 'yaṃ niyamaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4822_4: smṛtarajatas tadarthī śuktāv eva pravartata iti. yadi hy ayaṃ tām eva rajataṃ jānīyāt,
GSP28mimsvtku:4822_5: tatas tatra pravartata iti yuktam. itarathā loṣṭādāv api
GSP28mimsvtku:4823_0: pravarteta. na hy ayaṃ śukter iva rajataṃ tato 'pi vivinakti. avaśyaṃ sthūlo 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:4823_1: viveko jighṛ(?kṣi /kṣa)to nānubhūyate. athocyeta -- jñānadvayam apy etad vivekāgrahaṇāt
GSP28mimsvtku:4823_2: satyarajatasaṃvido bhinnam iti nāvabhāsate. sā ca vyavahārahetutayāvagatā. tato 'trāpi
GSP28mimsvtku:4824: ūhitam. idaṃ tu brūmaḥ -- kim iha satyarajatasaṃvido viveko nāvabhāsate,
GSP28mimsvtku:4825: tadabhedo vā bhāsate iti. pūrvasmin kalpe pūrvavat pravṛttyabhāvaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4826_0: uttarasmin viparītakhyātivādaḥ. saṃvittī bhinne abhinne bhāsete vastunī ceti na viśeṣaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4826_1: atha satyarajatabodhatulyatāṃ manyate na tattvaṃ, na tarhi tadvadbhāve tadvyavahāraḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4826_2: na hi gavā sadṛśaṃ gavayaṃ jānan gaur ayam iti vyavaharati. vyavahāravisaṃvāde ca
GSP28mimsvtku:4826_3: bhrāntihetāv atadarthino vyavahārābhāvād bhrāntyabhāvaḥ. tasyāpi śabdaprayogo 'stīti
GSP28mimsvtku:4827: nirvikalpakabhrāntau tadadarśanāt. svatantrasmṛtaṃ ca rajatam aprasaktaṃ kathaṃ śuktau niṣidhyate nedam iti. prāptipūrvako hi pratiṣedho bhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:4828_0: sa katham asatyāṃ prāptāvātmānaṃ labhate. nanu nātra kiñcid bādhyate. kin tv anavagato
GSP28mimsvtku:4828_1: viveko 'vagamyate nedaṃ rajatam iti. ko 'rthaḥ. śukter viviktaṃ rajatam iti. aho
GSP28mimsvtku:4829: anyathā vyavasthitā anyathā vyākhyāyante. rajatavyavahāro bādhyata iti
GSP28mimsvtku:4830: ced, na. tasyāpy aprasakter uktatvāt. aprasaktavyavahārasya
GSP28mimsvtku:4831: bādhavirahaprasaṅgāt. vyavahārabādho 'pi na rājājñayā. api tarhi,
GSP28mimsvtku:4832: prasaktatādrūpyanivāraṇena. ato 'nyad anyākāreṇa prasaktaṃ bādhyata iti
GSP28mimsvtku:4833: sāmpratam. api ca spaṣṭīkṛtā tādrūpyaprasaktir idaṃ rajatam iti. nanv anālambanatā prāpnotīty uktam. satyam. yad anyathāsantam anyathā
GSP28mimsvtku:4834: pratipadyate tannirālambanaṃ jñānam{2,20}iṣyate. kim ihādbhutaṃ bāhyānālambanatā hi yatnato naḥ pratiṣedhyā, sarvatra
GSP28mimsvtku:4836: utpādayatīti cet. kim ayaṃ pratyakṣadharmaḥ sarvajñāneṣv āropyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:4837: pratyakṣaṃ hi sannihitavartamānagocaraṃ, na jñānāntarāṇi. na cedaṃ pratyakṣam ābhāsatvāt. yad apy uktaṃ - katham anyasamprayuktam indriyam
GSP28mimsvtku:4838_0: anyākārasya jñānasya hetur iti. uktam atra bhāṣye -- doṣo mithyājñānasya kāraṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:4838_1: iti. tadbhāve hi mithyājñānaṃ bhavati. asati tasmin samyagjñānadarśanāt. nanu doṣāḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4838_2: kāryaṃ vighnanti, na kāryāntaraṃ janayanti. na. svapne manodoṣād avartamānasyāpi
GSP28mimsvtku:4839: kāraṇādhīnātmalābhaṃ hi kāryaṃ taddoṣe duṣyatīti nānupapannam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4840_0: eṣa ca jñānasya doṣo yady anyagocarasyānyākāratvam. ataḥ sannihitam asannihitarajatākāreṇāvalambate
GSP28mimsvtku:4840_1: duṣṭakāraṇajaṃ jñānam ity ubhayālambanasya jñānālambanatvam. ātmendriyamanorthasannikarṣo
GSP28mimsvtku:4841_0: 'satsu doṣeṣu samyagjñānahetuḥ, satsu tu viparītajñānahetur iti sūkto yathārthāyathārthajñānavibhāga
GSP28mimsvtku:4841_1: iti. kiṃ punaḥ pratyakṣasya lakṣaṇaṃ yena tad yathārtham ata āha -- yadābhāsam iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4842: samprayoge yat puruṣasya buddhijanma tat pratyakṣam iṣyate. kathaṃ tadayathārthaṃ bhaviṣyatīti nanu lakṣaṇaparatve sūtrasyātiprasaktir uktā. na cāpy etena
GSP28mimsvtku:4843_0: sūtreṇa pratyakṣaṃ lakṣyata iti vadatā katham idānīṃ lakṣaṇaparatayā sūtraṃ varṇyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:4843_1: ata āha -- sampūrṇeti. yathāvasthitaṃ sūtram ābhāsasaṅkarād alakṣaṇam. vṛttikāramate
GSP28mimsvtku:4843_2: tu vyatyastaṃ śaknoti lakṣaṇaṃ lakṣayitum iti, kathaṃ punaḥ sampūrṇam ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:4843_3: tatsator iti. yathāśrute hi sūtre indriyasamprayogajatvamātraṃ pratyakṣalakṣaṇam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4844_0: aviśiṣṭam ity atiprasajyate. vyatyastena tu tadā buddhyākāraparāmarśanād bhāsamānākārendriyasamprayoge
GSP28mimsvtku:4844_1: yā buddhiḥ sā pratyakṣam ity upaskāre śuktirajatajñāne bhāsamānendriyasamprayogābhāvān
GSP28mimsvtku:4844_2: na pratyakṣam atiprasajyata iti. utkṛṣṭasya sacchabdasyārtham āha -- śobhanārtha
GSP28mimsvtku:4846_0: vyākhyātaḥ. katham idānīṃ śobhanārtha ity ucyate. yuktaṃ ca samprayogaviśeṣaṇam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4846_1: aviśiṣṭe hi tasminn anāgatādisamprayogajaṃ yogipratyakṣam anirākṛtaṃ syād iti prāg
GSP28mimsvtku:4846_2: evoktam. tadvṛttenāpi vyavahitapraṭhitena samāso duṣpratipādataraḥ. punar api cedṛśaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4846_3: yat tatsamyakpratyakṣam iti tadapekṣā vidyata eveti vyatyaye 'parituṣyan
GSP28mimsvtku:4847_0: prakārāntaram āha -- yadveti. dvayor api tatsator atrādhyāhāraḥ. tatra bhāsamānākāraparāmarśārtho
GSP28mimsvtku:4847_1: 'dhyāhṛtas tacchabdaḥ. paras tu pratyakṣarūpaparāmarśārthaḥ. sacchabdas tu samprayogasannidhipaṭhitas
GSP28mimsvtku:4848: tadviśeṣārtha eva. adhyāhṛtas tu śobhanārtha iti vivecanīyam iti || 20 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4849: nanu ca ābhāsalakṣaṇākathanān na pratyakṣatadābhāsaviveko darśayituṃ śakyate, ata āha - arthāpattyeti. īdṛśaṃ pratyakṣam ityukte
GSP28mimsvtku:4850: arthād anīdṛśam ābhāsaṃ bhavatīti. atra bhāṣyakāreṇa kathaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4851: tadatadyogajatvaviveko 'vagamyata ity āśaṅkyoktaṃ bādhakaṃ hi yatra jñānam
GSP28mimsvtku:4852: utpadyate naitad evam iti tadanyasamprayoge. viparītas tatsamprayoge iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4853_0: tad ayuktam. kiṃ hi kāraṇaṃ yaduttareṇa pūrvaṃ bādhyate, pūrveṇaiva jaghanyam uttaraṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4853_1: bādhyata iti yuktam ata āha -- bādhaketi. tad dhi bādhakaṃ yadanyābādhakam ātmānam
GSP28mimsvtku:4853_2: eva na labhate. tathācottaram. atas tat pūrvaṃ bādhata iti yuktam. jaghanyam api
GSP28mimsvtku:4854: vakṣyate. yatra pūrvāpekṣam uttaraṃ, tatra pūrvaṃ balavad iti tṛtīya uktam
GSP28mimsvtku:4856: kiṃ punaruttareṇa mithyā sataḥ pūrvasya bādhaḥ pramāṇasya vā.
GSP28mimsvtku:4857: pramāṇasya bādhe 'tiprasaṅgaḥ. mithyātvaṃ tu narte bādhāt sidhyati,
GSP28mimsvtku:4858_0: tadadhīno bādha iti itaretarāśrayam ata āha -- sa ceti. na khalu pūrvamithyātvāvadhāraṇād
GSP28mimsvtku:4858_1: uttarasya janma, api tarhi. tannirapekṣam uttaraṃ svakāraṇād evotpannam. ato notpattāv
GSP28mimsvtku:4860: ato nānyonyāśrayatvam iti. yadi tarhi pūrvānapekṣam uttaram iti tad
GSP28mimsvtku:4861_0: bādhakaṃ, pūrvaṃ vā kim uttaram apekṣate yena bādhyate.{2,22}tad api hi nirapekṣam
GSP28mimsvtku:4861_1: eva, ata āha -- na ceti. yady api taduttarānapekṣaṃ, tathāpy anāgatottarabādhakātmakatvenānavabhāsān
GSP28mimsvtku:4862_0: yatra tarhi naitad evam iti na bādhakodayaḥ, api tarhi nimittedāṣajñānaṃ, tatretaretarāśrayam
GSP28mimsvtku:4862_1: aparihāryam. nimittadoṣeṇa tatrotthāpyo bādhaḥ. sa ca pūrvāpramāṇatve śakyata utthāpayituṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4863: tadutthāpanāc ca tadapramāṇam iti nāvakalpate, ata āha -- nimitteti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4864: prāyeṇa hi śaṅkhādiṣu pītādivibhramāḥ pittādidoṣebhyaḥ samutpannāḥ paścād
GSP28mimsvtku:4865_0: bādhyante. nedaṃ pītaṃ śuklo 'yam iti hi sampratipattiḥ sambhavati. ato na tatra
GSP28mimsvtku:4865_1: nimittadoṣabodhamātrān mithyātvam. yatra tu jñāte 'pi nimittadoṣe tadrūpapratyayānuvṛtteḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4865_2: paścād abādhanam eva, yathā diṅmūḍhasya jānato 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:4866: nimittadoṣād diṅmoho na nivartate. tatrāpi narāntaraviparyayād anyataḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4868_0: yatra tarhi na narāntarādiṣu viparyayaḥ tatra kathaṃ yathā jātyādivijñāne. na ca
GSP28mimsvtku:4868_1: tat satyaṃ, teṣāṃ vyatirekāvyatirekavikalpākṣamatvād ata āha -- sarveṣām iti. yad
GSP28mimsvtku:4869_0: samyag eveti. nanu tatrāpy anupapatter bādhikā dhīr utpādyā, kathaṃ samyaktvam ata
GSP28mimsvtku:4869_1: āha -- na hīti. pratyakṣo hy avikalakaraṇasya piṇḍāt piṇḍāntareṣu pūrvarūpāvamarśaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4870_0: yasya hy avyutpadyamānasya balavatā mukhaṃ nirudhyate na tadātmānaṃ labhate. uktaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4870_1: ca svayūthyair api -- na pratyakṣaviruddhakāraṇaviṣayam anumānam ātmānaṃ labhate
GSP28mimsvtku:4871: ayam asāv itaretarāśrayasya vyakto viṣaya ity āha -- jātyādiṣv
GSP28mimsvtku:4872: iti. atra hi jātyādijñānamithyātvād bādhakabuddhyudayaḥ. tadudaye
GSP28mimsvtku:4873: tanmithyātvam. na ca vyaktoditā śuktirajatajñānādiṣv iva bādhikā dhīr
GSP28mimsvtku:4874: astīti.{2,23} yadi tarhi bādhakajñānam antareṇa na kāraṇadoṣamātrān
GSP28mimsvtku:4875_0: mithyātvam avagamyate, katham ucyate yasya ca duṣṭaṃ karaṇaṃ yatra ca mithyeti pratyaya
GSP28mimsvtku:4875_1: iti bhedena. tadā hi mithyātvapratyaya evāsamīcīnatāyāṃ hetur uktaḥ syāt. tasmād
GSP28mimsvtku:4875_2: vaktavyo viṣayaḥ. sa ucyate -- yena tarhi prāg
GSP28mimsvtku:4876: ekaś candro 'vadhāritaḥ sampratyaṅgulīnipīḍitalocano dvau paśyati. tasya prācīnajñānānusāreṇa jātavicikitsasyādhunā ca vyaktaṃ kāraṇadoṣam
GSP28mimsvtku:4877: avagatavato bhavati nirṇayaḥ. yathā pūrvajñānam aduṣṭakāraṇajam. idaṃ ca vyaktāvagatakāraṇadoṣaprabhavam. kāraṇadoṣaniyataś ca kāryadoṣaḥ. tasmād
GSP28mimsvtku:4878_0: asamīcīnam. tad iha pūrvānubhavo vicikitsodayahetuḥ. kāraṇadoṣāvadhāraṇād eva mithyātvāvadhāraṇam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4878_1: evaṃ bāhyāgamānām api kāraṇadoṣāvadhāraṇād eva mithyātvāvadhāraṇam. na hi tadarthāḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4878_2: sākṣād bādhyante. pauruṣeyatvāt kāraṇadoṣāśaṅkayaiva mithyātvaṃ bhavatīti yuktam
GSP28mimsvtku:4878_3: eva dvaividhyam nanu mā bādhi jātyādijñānam. pramāṇatvaṃ tu tasya kathaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4879: pramāṇatadābhāsasādhāraṇaṃ hi jñānatvam. ato vyabhicāradarśanāt saṃśayo
GSP28mimsvtku:4880_0: yuktaḥ. vṛttyādivikalpāś cāprāmāṇyam anāpādayanto 'pi tadvat prāmāṇyaṃ vighnanti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4880_1: ata āha -- svata iti. yadi jñānatvānubandhinī pramāṇatvāpramāṇatve dve api syātāṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:4881_0: ity upapāditam. ato jātyādyastitvabodhād anapodito nirṇayo yuktaḥ. sa cāyaṃ bodho
GSP28mimsvtku:4881_1: na param asmākam eva. ye 'pi tu jātyādīn apalapanti, teṣām apy asti. te 'pi hi na
GSP28mimsvtku:4883_0: {2,24} atra bhāṣyakāreṇa nanu sarva eva nirālambanaḥ svapnavat pratyayaḥ ityākṣepapurassaraṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4883_1: jāgrato hi buddhiḥ supariniścitā kathaṃ viparyasiṣyatīti bāhyārthasadbhāvaḥ pratipāditaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4883_2: tasya prakṛtavedārthavicāropayogaṃ darśayati -- pramāṇatveti caturbhiḥ. sarvo hy
GSP28mimsvtku:4883_3: ayaṃ mīmāṃsāprapañco bāhyārthāśraya eva. yathā tāvaccodanaiva dharme
GSP28mimsvtku:4885: tadasati bāhye codanāpadārthe duḥsthitam eva. pramāṇatvopanyāsenaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:4887_1: tathā yad api codanāsūtra eva śrutyārthena ca puṇyapāpāparanāmnor dharmādharmayoḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4888: bāhye 'rthe śakyaṃ darśayitum. tatra hi vidhiniṣedhātmakacodanāpramāṇakaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4889_0: puṇyapāpayoḥ svarūpam iti varṇitam. ādiśabdena puṇyapāpobhayarūparahitam aśubhebhyo
GSP28mimsvtku:4889_1: nivartanam upādatte. yadarthasādhanaṃ vastu tadviparītaṃ vā tat puṇyapāpapadayor
GSP28mimsvtku:4889_2: aspadam. aśubhebhyo nivartanaṃ tu na sukhāya na
GSP28mimsvtku:4891: pratipāditam. tatphalam iti ca trividhasya puṇyapāpodāsīnātmano vedaprameyasyeṣṭāniṣṭātmakaṃ phalam upādatte. etad api svarūpapratijñāntargatam eva. na hy anāśritaphalasambandhaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4892: dharmādisvarūpam anubhavituṃ śakyam iti. tad evaṃ{2,25}tāvad
GSP28mimsvtku:4893: bāhyārthasiddher asti prathamapādoktasamastopayogaḥ. tathā vakṣyamāṇopayogo 'pi. na hi vidhyarthavādamantrāṇāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4894_1: vinā sidhyanti. audumbarādhikaraṇe hi audumbaro yūpo bhavaty ūrjoparudhyā ity atra
GSP28mimsvtku:4894_2: vidhyabhāvān na phalapadasmbandhaḥ sidhyaty audumbaratvasyeti vakṣyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:4895: tathārthavādādhikaraṇe 'rthavādānāṃ stutyupayogo darśitaḥ. evaṃ hi tatroktam āmnāyasya kriyārthatvādānarthakyam atadarthānām (1.2.1) iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4896: asyārthaḥ -- yāni hi kriyāṃ kriyāsambaddhaṃ vā kiñcidarthaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4897: pratipādayanti, tāni santu pramāṇam. yāni tv akriyārthāni so 'rodīd
GSP28mimsvtku:4898_0: yadarodīd ityādīni tāni na kañciddharmaṃ pramimate iti pūrvapakṣite uktaṃ vidhinā
GSP28mimsvtku:4898_1: tv ekavākyatvāt stutyarthena vidhīnāṃ syuḥ (1.2.7) iti. asyāyam arthaḥ -- vidheyānāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4898_2: stutirūpeṇārthenārthavādāḥ pramāṇaṃ syur iti. kathaṃ punaḥ stutyarthatā. na hy anapekṣitā
GSP28mimsvtku:4899_0: arhati. na. apekṣitatvāt. apekṣyate khalv api śabdabhāvanāparanāmadheyena vidhinā
GSP28mimsvtku:4899_1: stutiḥ. sa hi puruṣaṃ pravartayan pravṛttiviṣayaprāśastyajñānam apekṣate. arthavādāś
GSP28mimsvtku:4900_0: tadbalenaivāprayojanasampado na paryavasyanti. tatraiva kiṃ kartavyam ity apekṣite
GSP28mimsvtku:4900_1: tacchaktinirūpaṇāyām akṣaragrahaṇādikrameṇa kathañcit prarocanāyāṃ buddhāv utpannāyāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4901: vidhir hi prarocanām apekṣate, te ca tāṃ śaknuvanti kathañcidutpādayitum ity ananyaprayojanatayā manasi viparivartamānāsta eva tatprayojanatayā
GSP28mimsvtku:4902: niścīyante. tad eṣa śāstrārtho bhavaty arthavādair eva prarocitaṃ karmābhyudayāya ghaṭata iti. vidhisvarūpaṃ ca prāg evoktam iti neha
GSP28mimsvtku:4903_0: pratanyate. mantrārtho 'pi mantrādhikaraṇe vakṣyate. tatra barhirdevasadanaṃ dāmītyādimantrānudāhṛtya
GSP28mimsvtku:4903_1: vicāritaṃ - kim amī uccāraṇamātrādevādṛṣṭārthāḥ, utārthaprakāśanārthā iti. tatra
GSP28mimsvtku:4904: yam eva hy arthaṃ mantraḥ prakāśayati tatraivāyaṃ brāhmaṇena viniyujyamāno
GSP28mimsvtku:4905: dṛśyate. yathā prathamamantraḥ uru prathasveti puroḍāśaṃ prathayatīti.
GSP28mimsvtku:4906: yadi cāyam arthaparaḥ, liṅgenaiva tatra viniyoge siddhe
GSP28mimsvtku:4908: abhihitam -- aviśiṣṭas tu{2,26}vākyārthaḥ (1.2.40) iti. yathā hi brāhmaṇavākyānām arthaḥ pratīyamāno nāvivakṣito bhavati tathā mantrāṇām
GSP28mimsvtku:4909: api. te 'pi hy anuṣṭhānaupayikam arthaṃ prakāśayantaḥ kim avivakṣitavacanā
GSP28mimsvtku:4912_1: kiṃsvid asmābhiḥ kartavyam ity apekṣamāṇā vilambante. tatrāśaktike viniyogāsambhavāt
GSP28mimsvtku:4916: iti. yat tu viniyogānarthakyam uktaṃ, tan na. arthavādārthatvād vākyasya.
GSP28mimsvtku:4917: prathanaṃ hi tatra śrūyate. īdṛśam idaṃ prathanaṃ praśastaṃ yat kriyamāṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:4918: anena mantreṇa kriyata iti. so 'yaṃ vidhyarthavādamantrāṇām artho nāsati
GSP28mimsvtku:4919: bāhye 'rthe sidhyati. tathā udbhidā yajeta paśukāmaḥ ity udāhṛtya
GSP28mimsvtku:4920: vicāritaṃ kim ayaṃ guṇavidhiḥ uta karmanām adheyam iti saṃśayya,
GSP28mimsvtku:4921: pravṛttiviśeṣakaratayā guṇavidhir iti pūrvapakṣitam. guṇaṃ hi vidadhatāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4922: pravṛttiviśeṣakaratvam. itarathā nāmamātram anarthakam. śaknuvanti codbhedanakriyāyogavaśena kiñcit khanitrādyartham abhidhātum iti
GSP28mimsvtku:4923_0: guṇavidhaya iti prāpte uktaṃ - na guṇavidhayaḥ. karmasamānādhikaraṇā hy ete, tṛtīyānirdeśāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:4923_1: karma khalv iha udbhidā yajeta paśukāmaḥ iti paśubhāvanākaraṇatvenābhihitaṃ yajeta
GSP28mimsvtku:4923_2: paśukāma iti. kim uktaṃ, yāgena paśūn bhāvayed iti. ata udbhidā yāgeneti vyaktam
GSP28mimsvtku:4924: guṇavidhau tu yāgasyodbhittvābhāvād udbhidvatā yāgeneti matvarthalakṣaṇayā sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ syāt. tatra ca lakṣaṇaiva doṣaḥ. nanv evaṃ vrīhibhir
GSP28mimsvtku:4925: yajetety evamādāv api bhāvanākaraṇena yajinā samabhivyāhṛtā vrīhyādiśabdāḥ karmanām adheyatāṃ pratipadyeran. na. teṣāṃ nirūḍhārthatvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:4926: ajñātasandigdhārthasya hi padasya prasiddhasāmānādhikaraṇyād evārtho niścīyate. nirūḍhaṃ tu svārthān na pracyāvayituṃ śakyate. āha ca --
GSP28mimsvtku:4928: nirṇīyate nirūḍhaṃ tu na svārthād apanīyate ||
GSP28mimsvtku:4929_0: {2,27}iti. ataḥ paśūnām udbhedanaṃ prakāśanam anena karmaṇā kriyate iti yogād udbhicchabdena
GSP28mimsvtku:4930_0: adheyatayaivañjātīyakānāṃ kriyopayoga iti. citrādiśabdānāṃ nāmadheyatvahetavo vistarabhayān
GSP28mimsvtku:4930_1: nānukramyante. kvacit karmaṇaḥ prāpakaśabdāntarābhāvād guṇavidhitvam eva. yathā āgneyo
GSP28mimsvtku:4930_2: 'ṣṭākapāla ity āgneya iti saguṇakarmavidhāyinaḥ śabdasya. na hi tatra
GSP28mimsvtku:4931_0: dravyadevatāsambandhavidhānāt prāk karmaṇo rūpam avagamyate yasyāgneyaśabdo nāmadheyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4931_1: bhaved ityevamādi nāmadheyapādoktam ādiśabdenānukrāntaṃ veditavyam adhyāyāntam. yāvatsmṛtipādoktārtho
GSP28mimsvtku:4935: aśrūyamāṇavedānaṣṭakādīn udāhṛtya teṣāṃ dharmādharmatvasaṃśaye, dharmasya śabdamūlatvādaśabdam anapekṣyaṃ syāt (1.3.1.) iti pakṣaṃ parigṛhya
GSP28mimsvtku:4936: vedamūlatayā siddhāntitaṃ - sarvāḥ smṛtayo hi nāsati pūrvajñāne ātmānaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4937: labhante. pūrvajñānaṃ ca mūlabhūtaṃ vibhramo vā syāt, pratyakṣānubhavo vā,
GSP28mimsvtku:4938_0: pauruṣeyāgamajanyaṃ vā, vipralambho vā, codanājanitaṃ vā. tatra tāvad bhrāmyatām
GSP28mimsvtku:4938_1: āptānāṃ manvādīnāṃ smṛtinibandhanapraṇayanam ayuktam. te hi tāvad ṛṣayo bhrāmyantīty
GSP28mimsvtku:4938_2: etad eva durbhaṇam. bhrāmyatāṃ tu yanmahāprabandharacanaṃ tat smṛtibhyaś cādyayāvadāryaiḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4938_3: paśyadbhiḥ pari(?graha /gṛhyate) iti naitad utprekṣitum api śakyam. anubhavaś cātīndriyagocaraḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4938_4: pratyakṣasūtre nirākṛtaḥ. puruṣavākyam apy asambhavanmūlam apramāṇam eva. vipralambho
GSP28mimsvtku:4939: codanā tu sambhavadvedasaṃyogināṃ traivarṇikānāṃ smṛtimūlaṃ bhavatīti tatkalpanaiva laghīyasīti. nanv evam agnihotrādicodanāvadaṣṭakādicodanā
GSP28mimsvtku:4940_0: api kiṃ nopalabhyante. nedam anupapannam. viprakīrṇānekaśākhāśrayā hi śrutayaḥ kratupuruṣārthopadeśasaṅkīrṇāḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4940_1: pramādyadbhir adyatanair na vivicyopalabhyanta iti kiṃ nopapadyante. ato yad aśrūyamāṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:4940_2: apy aṣṭakādidharmasya nimittaṃ codaneti siddham aṣṭakādayo dharmā iti. tad evaṃ pratyakṣaśrutyaviruddhābhyaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4940_3: śrutyanumānam. pratyakṣaśrutivirodhe tu na śrutir anumātuṃ śakyata iti virodhādhikaraṇe{2,28}uktam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4940_4: upariṣṭāc cācāraprāmāṇyaṃ smṛtyā ca saha balābalaparīkṣetyādi darśayitavyam. sarveṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:4940_5: ca bhedādilakṣaṇeṣu svapramāṇagaṇaiḥ śabdāntarādibhiḥ siddhāntasthiti(?ḥ /r) sati
GSP28mimsvtku:4940_6: bāhye 'rthe na sambhavati. somena yajeta dākṣiṇāni juhoti hiraṇyamātreyāya dadātīti
GSP28mimsvtku:4940_7: yāgahomadānabhāvanānāṃ śabdabhedād eva bhedo vakṣyate. tathā ca samidho yajatītyevamādīnāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4940_8: pañcānāṃ prayājānām asaty api śabdabhede 'bhyāsānarthakyaprasaṅgād bhedo
GSP28mimsvtku:4941: darśitaḥ. tisra āhutīr juhotīti pṛthaktvaniveśitvāt saṃkhyāyā āhutīnāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4942: bhedo darśitaḥ. athaiṣa jyotir etena yajeteti jyotiṣṭomāj jyotir iti saṃjñāntareṇa karmabhedaḥ. vaiśvadevyām ikṣā vājibhyo vājinam iti ca
GSP28mimsvtku:4943: utpattiśiṣṭaśrautām ikṣāvirodhād vājinaṃ vaiśvadeve karmaṇi niveśam alabhamānaṃ svāśrayaṃ yāgāntaram upakalpayati. so 'yaṃ vājinaguṇād bhedaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4944: kuṇḍapāyināmayane māsam agnihotraṃ juhotīti naiyamikāgnihotrāt prakaraṇāntareṇa kauṇḍapāyinahomasya bhedaḥ. tad evaṃ ṣoḍhā karmabhedo
GSP28mimsvtku:4946: tṛtīye tu pārārthyalakṣaṇasya śeṣatvasya ṣoḍhaiva viniyogasiddhir uktā. yathā tāvadaruṇimnaḥ tṛtīyāśrutyā kriyāṅgabhāve sāmānyato 'vagate aruṇayā krīṇātīti kriyāviśeṣalābho vākyāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:4947: liṅgaviniyogas tu -- yathāprakaraṇāmnānasāmarthyāvadhṛtasāmānyāṅgabhāvasya bahirmantrasya sāmarthyāparanāmno liṅgād barhirlavane viniyogaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4948: prakaraṇaviniyogas tu -- iṣṭiprakaraṇāmnātānāṃ prayājādīnāṃ sādhyākāṅkṣiṇām upakārākāṅkṣiṇyā tayā saha sambandhaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4949: ubhayākāṅkṣālakṣaṇam eva hi prakaraṇam ācakṣmahe. kramaviniyogas tu --
GSP28mimsvtku:4950: prākṛtopakāranirākāṅkṣāyāṃ vikṛtau sannidhisamāmnātānām aṅgānām. na hi tatra prakaraṇaviniyogaḥ sambhavati. ubhayagāminī hy ākāṅkṣā prakaraṇam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4951_1: tv aṅgānāṃ sannihitasamāmnānam anarthakaṃ mā bhūd iti tatsannidhipāṭhād eva teṣāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4951_2: tatra viniyogo niścīyate. samākhyāviniyogas tu -- ādhvaryavasamākhyāteṣu padārtheṣv
GSP28mimsvtku:4952_0: caturthe 'pi śrutyādibhir evāvadhṛtāṅgāṅgibhāvānāṃ dadhyānayanām ikṣādīnāṃ prayojyaprayojakatve
GSP28mimsvtku:4952_1: vakṣyete. yad dhi śrutyādibhir yaccheṣatayāvagamyate tat tena{2,29}prayujyata iti
GSP28mimsvtku:4953: tad iha prayuktilakṣaṇe 'pi śrutyādir eva pramāṇagaṇaḥ, śeṣalakṣaṇe 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:4954: śeṣiṇāṃ śeṣāṇām ubhayeṣāṃ vā kramaniyamaḥ kiñcinmātraviśeṣabhinnaśrutyādibhir eva kriyate. yathā tāvad adhvaryur
GSP28mimsvtku:4955: gṛhapatiṃ dīkṣayitvā brahmāṇaṃ dīkṣayati iti ktvāśrutyā kramaniyamaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4956: agnihotraṃ juhoti yavāgūṃ pacati iti pāṭhād anyādṛśe 'pi krame
GSP28mimsvtku:4958_0: kriyamāṇo 'narthakaḥ syāt. homo 'pi nāsati haviṣi saṃ(pra)vartata ity arthāt pākottarakālam
GSP28mimsvtku:4958_1: eva niścīyate. tad idaṃ liṅgam evārtha iti nāmamātrabhinnaṃ, sāmarthyam eva hi bhāvānāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4958_2: liṅgam iti niścīyate. ihāpi dravyakriyayoḥ śaktinirīkṣaṇād eva kramaniyamāvadhāraṇam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4958_3: pañcānāṃ tu prayājādīnāṃ samidho yajatītyevamādīnāṃ pāṭhāt kramaniyamaḥ. bahūnāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4958_4: hi padārthānāṃ yugapadekena kartrānuṣṭhātum aśakter avaśyambhāvini krame
GSP28mimsvtku:4959: 'vagamādhīnatvād anuṣṭhānasya krameṇa tūcyamāneṣu tathaivāvagamād anuṣṭhāne kramāpekṣāyāṃ sa eva kramo niścīyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:4961_0: sthānenaiva kramaniyamaḥ. sthānāt kramaniyamo yathā -- sādyaske karmaṇi saha paśūnālabhate
GSP28mimsvtku:4961_1: ity agnīṣomīyasavanīyānubandhyānāṃ savanīyasthāne sahopalambhe codite kaḥ prathamaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4961_2: prayujyatām ity apekṣāyāṃ sthānāt savanīyo buddho bhavan prathamaṃ niyamyate. tasya
GSP28mimsvtku:4966: iti. pravṛttyā ca kramaniyamo yathā -- saptadaśa prājāpatyān paśūnālabhate
GSP28mimsvtku:4967_0: iti coditeṣu paśuṣu codakaprāptānāṃ prokṣaṇādīnāṃ yatrakvacid ekasminn ekasyānuṣṭhāne
GSP28mimsvtku:4967_1: dvitīyādiṣu kiṃ prathamapravṛttyaiva athāniyama iti saṃśaye niyamakāraṇābhāvāt prathamapravṛtteś
GSP28mimsvtku:4967_2: cāniyamātmakatvād aniyamaḥ iti pakṣaṃ parigṛhya prathamapravṛttyaiva niyamo darśitaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4967_3: prayogavacanabalena hi paśūnāṃ yaugapadyam avadhāritam. tac cāvarjanīyād vilambanān
GSP28mimsvtku:4967_4: na vyavadhānāntaram aṅgānām anujānīte. sāṅgeṣu hi paśuṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:4970: bhavati. tatra ca vaiṣamyakāraṇābhāvāt sarveṣāṃ sadṛśam evāṅgavyavadhānam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4971_2: paśvantareṣv anuṣṭhānaṃ sa paśuḥ pratīkṣate. tadante ca dvitīyapadārthānuṣṭhānāya
GSP28mimsvtku:4972: evaṃ saptadaśānāṃ paśūnāṃ ṣoḍaśabhir ekaikasya vyavadhānaṃ vidhyanumatam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4973_0: vyavadhānaviśeṣas tu viśeṣāgrahaṇān nāśrayituṃ śakyam. ato dvitīyādīnām apy anuṣṭhānaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4973_1: tata evārabhyeti siddhāntāt kramaniyamaḥ. ayaṃ ca prakaraṇāntargata evākāṅkṣaikapramāṇakatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:4973_2: ekaiko 'pi paśur avyavadhānena padārthānuṣṭhānam ākṣipati. padārthaś ca tatsannidhāvātmano
GSP28mimsvtku:4974: ata ubhayākāṅkṣayā kramaniyamo jāyamānaḥ prākaraṇiko bhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:4975: mukhyakrameṇa cāṃśānāṃ kramaniyamo yathā -- sārasvatau bhavata iti
GSP28mimsvtku:4977: 'ṅgeṣu kramāpekṣāyāṃ mukhyakrameṇaiva kramo niyamyate. na hy aṅgānāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4978: pradhānakālād bahirbhāvo 'sti. sāṅgaṃ pradhānam aikaśabdyād iti vakṣyati.
GSP28mimsvtku:4979: so 'yaṃ vākyenaiva kramaniyamaḥ. sāṅgaṃ hi pradhānam ekavākyacoditam ekopakramāvasānam iti pradhānakrameṇaivāṅgānāṃ kramaniyamo jāyate. atrāpi śrutyādir eva pramāṇagaṇaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4980: evamadhikāravicārādāv api śeṣaśeṣiprapañcārthatvāt śeṣalakṣaṇoktāny eva śrutyādīni siddhāntasthitihetutayā
GSP28mimsvtku:4981_0: yathā tāvadādya eva svargakāmo yajeteti yāgasvargayoḥ kaḥ śeṣaḥ ko vā śeṣīti cintāyāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4981_1: dravyāṇāṃ karmasaṃyoge guṇatvenābhisambandhaḥ (6.1.1) iti svargasya yāgaśeṣatayā
GSP28mimsvtku:4981_2: liṅgabalena pūrvapakṣaḥ parigṛhītaḥ. tad dhi bhūtasya dravyasya sāmarthyaṃ yad bhāvyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4981_3: karma niṣpādayati. dravyaṃ ca svarhaḥ, srakcandanavāsassu tatprayogāt sūkṣmāṇi vāsāṃsi
GSP28mimsvtku:4982: ato dravyam eva karmārthaṃ, kāmapadasambandhaś ca sādhanaviṣayatayā
GSP28mimsvtku:4983_0: darśayitavyaḥ. yo hi yadarthī sa tatsādhanam api kāmayata eveti liṅgabalena pūrvapakṣite
GSP28mimsvtku:4983_1: vidhiśrutibalāt siddhāntitam. vidhir hi cetanapravartanātmakaḥ. na cānarthe puruṣaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:4984: yāgārthe svarge karmāsādhakam āpadyate. yathoktam asādhakaṃ tu tādarthyāt
GSP28mimsvtku:4985: (6.1.2) iti. ato vidheḥ pravartanāśaktir mā vyāghānīti karmaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:4987: prītivacanatvāvagamāt. tad eva hi dravyam aprītikaraṃ na
GSP28mimsvtku:4988_1: tadvacanam iti niścīyate. na ca sarvasyeṣṭatamā prītir anyaniṣpattaye bhavatīti sāmpratam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4988_2: ato yad eva kiñcit prītyā samabhivyāhṛtaṃ tat tadartham eveti liṅgam api viparītam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4988_3: ataḥ siddhaṃ yāgaḥ svargārtha iti siddhaś cādhikāra iti. parastād api śeṣabhūtasyaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:4991: uttaraṣaṭke tu śeṣā eva kiṃ sarvatropadeśenaiva sambadhyante,
GSP28mimsvtku:4992: atha yathā prakṛti vyavatiṣṭhanta iti śrutyādibalenaiva nirṇeṣyante.
GSP28mimsvtku:4993: aupadeśike hi dharmasambandhe nātideśaḥ sidhyati, pāriplavā hi tadā dharmā
GSP28mimsvtku:4994_0: bhaveyuḥ. tad ihātideśopoddhātenaiva saptamādye yajyapūrvaprayuktatvaṃ vicāritaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4994_1: yajyuddeśena dharmavidhānāt yajeś ca sāmānyavacanatvāt sarvatreti prāptam, na ca
GSP28mimsvtku:4994_2: darśapūrṇamāsapadaṃ niyāmakaṃ, parisaṃkhyānād viśiṣṭoddeśena viśiṣṭānuvādād iti prāpte
GSP28mimsvtku:4994_3: nirūpitaṃ - nātra darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeteti yāgoddeśenāṅgāni vidhīyante,
GSP28mimsvtku:4995: tarhi, sāṅgapradhānaviśiṣṭāpūrvabhāvanaiva codyate. paścāt tv ekabhāvanāparigṛhītānām aṅgānāṃ pradhānānāṃ cāruṇaikahāyanīvat
GSP28mimsvtku:4996_0: parasparānvayasiddhiḥ. bhidhyante ca śabdāntarādibhiḥ pratiprakaraṇam apūrvabhāvaneti
GSP28mimsvtku:4996_1: kuto dharmasaṅkaraḥ. seyaṃ śrutyādipramāṇakaviniyogaparāmarśād eva vyavasthā sidhyati.
GSP28mimsvtku:4996_2: yadā hy apūrvabhāvanānvayagarbho viniyogo dharmāṇāṃ na yāgasāmānyoddeśeneti siddhaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4996_3: bhavati, tadā vyavasthā sidhyati. tatsiddhyā cāśrutetikartavyatākeṣu sauryādiṣu vidhyantāpekṣāyāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:4997_0: viśeṣātideśasiddhiḥ. yatheṣṭau samānam itarat śyeneneti śyenavaiśeṣikāṇāṃ vācaniko
GSP28mimsvtku:4997_1: 'tideśaḥ. māsam agnihotraṃ juhotīti kuṇḍapāyināmayane homanāmnā nityāgnihotradharmātideśaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:4997_2: ekāhāhīnasatrāṇām avyaktacodanācoditatvena somasādṛśyāt taddharmātideśaḥ ityādi darśayitavyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:4998: śrutyā viniyogānusāreṇaiva śeṣāṇāṃ sidhyatīti tatpramāṇagaṇakārita eva.
GSP28mimsvtku:4999: ūho 'pi ṣoḍhā vibhaktaḥ. prākṛtopadeśānusāreṇaiva mantrādīnāṃ sidhyatīti
GSP28mimsvtku:5000: so 'pi śrutyādipramāṇaka eva. so 'pi hy apūrvārtho dharmaviniyoga iti siddhe setsyati. ata{2,32}evāpūrvaprayuktir ādye sādhitā. bādho 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:5002: pūrvapakṣite upakārapradhānatvād atideśasya tadabhāve 'nyato vā tallābhe pratiṣedhena vā bādho vakṣyate. yathā kṛṣṇalacarāv avaghātasya,
GSP28mimsvtku:5003: khalevālīśarābhyāṃ yūpabarhiṣor ityādi darśayitavyam. etad api prakṛtāv
GSP28mimsvtku:5004: evopakāraparyantaśrutyādiviniyoga iti nirṇīyate. (?sidhyati) etāvāṃs tu viśeṣaḥ -- prakṛtau padārthaparigrahapurassaryupakārakalpanā, prāk
GSP28mimsvtku:5006: tatparigrahapurassaraṃ padārthaparigrahaḥ. sa eva hi vidhināpekṣyte. sa tu prakṛtāvasiddho ('pi) kalpayitvā gṛhyate. vikṛtau ca prakṛtisiddha
GSP28mimsvtku:5007_0: evopādīyata iti. ata eva śāstrapadārthayor anatideśaḥ, tayor vidhyanapekṣitatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:5007_1: iti. tantrāvāpalakṣaṇe 'pi viśeṣā eva pradhānānāṃ kiṃ tantreṇopakārakā utāvṛttyeti
GSP28mimsvtku:5008: tatpramāṇagaṇānusārī nirṇayo darśayitavyaḥ. tatra hi deśakālaphalādīnāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5009: tantrasambandha āgneyādīn prati prayājādīnāṃ tantrānuṣṭhāne hetur
GSP28mimsvtku:5010: bhaviṣyati. sa ca śrutyādipramāṇaka eveti tatrāpi sa eva pramāṇagaṇaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:5011: prasaṅgalakṣaṇe 'pi paśvarthānuṣṭhitānāṃ prayājādiśeṣāṇāṃ paśutantramadhyapātipuroḍāśopakārakatvaṃ deśāditantranibandhanam eveti
GSP28mimsvtku:5012: pūrvavat pramāṇagaṇaḥ. ata eva bhāṣyakāreṇa prathamasūtre daśādhyāya eva
GSP28mimsvtku:5013_1: yathā svargakāmo yajeteti svargakāmo yāgaṃ kuryād iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ yāgena svargaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5014: nārthaśūnyāsu buddhiṣu sidhyati. karmabhyaś ca darśapūrṇamāsakārīryādibhyaḥ paraloke ihaloke
GSP28mimsvtku:5015: bhavatsvargavṛṣṭyādiphalasambandho bāhyāśraya eva, asati tasmin dvaividhyānupapatteḥ. ataḥ sarvam idaṃ bāhyārthasiddhāv asatyām ayuktam
GSP28mimsvtku:5016_0: āpadyeteti tadupapādanāya dharmārthibhir mīmāṃsakair lokaprasiddhaiḥ pratyakṣādibhiḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5016_1: pramāṇaiḥ pūrvottarapakṣavibhāgenārthasya sadasadbhāvayor yatnaḥ kāryaḥ. pūrvapakṣaviśuddhā
GSP28mimsvtku:5019: tatsiddhyartham iti yāvat. anyathā sarvārthakriyāṇām ucchedo bhavet. ataḥ prayojanavad bāhyārthapratipādanam. akriyāṅgasya tu pratipāditasyāpy
GSP28mimsvtku:5020: anartha(tva)m eveti kriyāṃ pratīti yuktam eveti || 4 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5021: atra codayati -- yadeti. jñānamātrapakṣe hi bauddhānām iva sarvo 'yaṃ pramāṇādivyavahāraḥ sidhyaty eva. te hi vadanti --
GSP28mimsvtku:5023: loke saṃvṛtisatyaṃ ca satyaṃ ca paramārthataḥ ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5024: iti. atas tadvad eva vyavahārasiddhau kiṃ pāramārthikārthapratipādanavyasaneneti || 5 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5025_0: atra dūṣaṇam āha -- saṃvṛter iti. satyam. saṃvṛtisatyena sarvam idaṃ bauddhair āśrīyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:5025_1: na tv etad yuktam. satyabhedānupapatteḥ. yaḥ khalv ayaṃ satyabhedo bauddhair āśritaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5025_2: saṃvṛtisatyaṃ paramārthasatyam iti, nāyam upapadyate. saṃvṛteḥ satyatvābhāvāt. mithyāparyāyo
GSP28mimsvtku:5025_3: hi saṃvṛtiśabdaḥ. kathaṃ tasya satyaśabdasamabhivyāhāraḥ. na hy ayam
GSP28mimsvtku:5026: akṣaśabda iva vibhītakādīnāṃ saṃvṛtiparamārthayoḥ sādhāraṇaḥ satyaśabdaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:5027: ataḥ satyabhedānupapattir iti. virodham eva vyanakti -- satyaṃ ced iti ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5028: virodhād eva ca mṛṣārthaparamārthayoḥ sāmānyam api satyatvaṃ nābhyupagantuṃ śakyam. samānānāṃ bhāvaḥ sāmānyam. kutas tasya virodhinor
GSP28mimsvtku:5029_0: avakāśaḥ. na hi bhavati dharmādharmayor dharmatvam adharmatvaṃ vā sāmānyam ity āha
GSP28mimsvtku:5029_1: -- satyatvam iti virodhādantena. anyamātrayor api tatparāmarśābhāvād durupagamaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5029_2: sāmānyaṃ vṛkṣasiṃhayor iva vṛkṣatvam. kiṃ punarvirodhinos tat syād ity āha -{2,34}na
GSP28mimsvtku:5029_3: hīti. atra cākṣādivat sādhāraṇaśabdatā pūrvaṃ satyaśabdasya nirākṛtā iha gavādivat
GSP28mimsvtku:5031: ato lokaṃ vañcayituṃ mithyāparyāyo 'pi saṃvṛtiśabdo bauddhavidagdhair anudvegakaratayā mithyātva eva vivakṣite
GSP28mimsvtku:5032: svanāstikyaparijihīrṣayā prayukto lālāyām iva vaktrāsavaśabda ity āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:5033: tulyārthatva iti saṃvṛtirantena. vakṣyamāṇenetikaraṇena sambandha iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:5034: kalpanāvācoyuktir api svanāstikyaparihārārtham eva tair āśritety āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:5035: kalpaneti ceti. kalpanāmātrakalpitena bāhyena sarvalaukikavyavahāra ity api nirvastuke jagaty abhinnasya cinmātrasya kalpanāyā bhettum aśakyatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:5036: durbhaṇam. kvacid dhi bhinnam eva kiñcid rūpāntaraṃ kalpanās padaṃ bhavati
GSP28mimsvtku:5037: śuktāv iva rajatarūpam. yasya tu na kiñcid bhinnam asti, tat kena rūpeṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:5039: nanu tridhaiva tattvaṃ vibhajāmahe satyam asatyam saṃvṛtisatyaṃ ceti. saṃvṛtaṃ hi nātyantam asad bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:5040_0: vyavahārāvisaṃvādāt. nāpi sad eva, pramāṇāntaravirodhāj jātyādivat. ato na saṃvṛtiḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5040_1: pramāṇaṃ nāpramāṇam iti vidhāntaram evedam iti yuktas tadāśrayatayā vyavahāra ity
GSP28mimsvtku:5040_2: ata āha -- tasmād iti. yataḥ khalu saṃvṛtir
GSP28mimsvtku:5041_0: mithyājñānaṃ na vastukḷptyai prabhavati, tasmād yat paramārthato nāstīti nirūpyate
GSP28mimsvtku:5041_1: na tat saṃvṛtyā tadrūpaṃ bhavitum arhati. nāsty eva tat. yat tu tāvad vyavahārāvisaṃvādi
GSP28mimsvtku:5041_2: tad asty eva, na hy asataḥ sarvadā vyavahārahetubhāvaḥ sambhavati. yad evārthakriyākāri
GSP28mimsvtku:5041_3: tad eva ca paramārthasad iti vaḥ siddhāntaḥ. ataḥ katham arthakriyākāritve saty api
GSP28mimsvtku:5041_4: jātyādīnām asatyatvam. tasmād yadi vyavahārāṅgatayā bāhyam asti, tat tarhi paramārthata
GSP28mimsvtku:5041_5: evāsti.{2,35}tad eva satyam ity ucyate. anyat tu saṃvṛtir
GSP28mimsvtku:5042: mithyeti. na tu satyadvayakalpanātmānaṃ labhate. tantreṇa tadvṛttasya pūrvāparābhyāṃ sambandhaḥ. paramārthata iti ca nāstīti pūrveṇa sambadhyata
GSP28mimsvtku:5044: api ca svapnāvagatā apy arthāḥ kecicchokaharṣādivyavahārahetavo dṛśyante. atas te 'pi sāṃvṛtā eva. tadvac ca bāhyārthābhyupagame svapnādibhogatulya eva śubhāśubhakarmaphalopabhogo
GSP28mimsvtku:5045: bhavet. atas tannivṛttyartham api paramārthasatye bāhye prayasyate ity āha -- svapnādīti kaḥ punaḥ svapnatulyatve doṣaḥ, ata āha -- na hīti. kim iti na
GSP28mimsvtku:5046: pravartate ata āha -- yādṛcchikatvād iti. na hi svapnasukhaṃ me bhavatīti vidvāṃsaḥ prayasyanti. yādṛcchikaṃ hi svapnasukham
GSP28mimsvtku:5047: agaṇitasāmparāyikaihikanimittaṃ, na tat prayasyato bhavatīti buddhvā vidvadbhis tūṣṇīm udāsīnair evāsyeta, na kvacit prayatnaḥ kriyetety arthaḥ || 12 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5048: ato 'vaśyaṃ pāramārthikīṃ phalaprāptim icchadbhir upapattyā bāhyavastuviṣayā pratipattir vidhātavyety asti vicārasya prayojanam ity upasaṃharati -- paramārtheti || 13 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5049_0: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa bāhyārthasadbhāva eva pūrvapakṣapurassaraṃ pratipāditaḥ, na tu
GSP28mimsvtku:5049_1: jñānasadbhāvaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ. asti hi tatsadbhāvavipratipattir api. mādhyamikā
GSP28mimsvtku:5049_2: hi jñānam apy apalapanti. atas tannirākaraṇam api yuktam. yat{2,36}punastadupekṣyaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:5050: nirākriyate, tatra kāraṇaṃ vaktavyam ata āha -- tatreti trayeṇa. asyārthaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5051_0: -- yogācārā hi jñānamātram arthaśūnyaṃ pāramārthikaṃ manyante. mādhyamikās tu jñeyābhāvād
GSP28mimsvtku:5051_1: akarmakajñānānutpatter jñānasyāpy abhāvam icchanti. tatra dvayor api vādinos tāvad
GSP28mimsvtku:5052: arthanivṛttyadhīnatvāt jñānanivṛtteḥ. ato dvayor api sādhāraṇo bāhyārthāpalāpa iti sa eva nirākriyate. api ca tanmūlo jñānāpahnavaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:5053_0: tatas tasmin nirākṛte nirākṛta eveti bāhyārthasadbhāve pūrvottarapakṣavibhāgena bhāṣyakṛtā
GSP28mimsvtku:5053_1: prayatnaḥ kṛtaḥ. ādyas tatraśabdo vākyopanyāsārthaḥ. dvitīyas tu pūrvoktadarśanabhedaparāmarśārthaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:5054: nanu bāhyārthāpahnavo dvidhaiva bauddhair āśritaḥ pramāṇataḥ prameyataś ca. tathā hi -- evaṃ tair uktaṃ - na tāvadaṇavo 'tīndriyāḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5055: pramāṇaviṣayāḥ. na tatsamūhaḥ, tasya tadatirekiṇo 'bhāvāt. nāvayavī.
GSP28mimsvtku:5056_0: tasyāvayavavyatirekeṇānupalambhāt. avyatireke ca tanmātrāpātāt. evam āntyāvayavebhyo
GSP28mimsvtku:5056_1: vikalpya avayavī nirākāryaḥ. te tv atīndriyā eva. ato na kiñcana grāhyam avatiṣṭhate
GSP28mimsvtku:5056_2: iti. tad etat parityāge kiṃ kāraṇaṃ, yat pramāṇata eva bāhyāpahnava upanyasyate nirasyate
GSP28mimsvtku:5056_3: ceti. ata āha bāhyārtheti sārdhena. ayam arthaḥ -- yady api dvedhā bāhyārthāpahnavo
GSP28mimsvtku:5056_4: bauddhair āśritaḥ, tathāpi pramāṇāśrita eva mūlabhūtatvād iha vicāryate.
GSP28mimsvtku:5057: pramāṇamūlā hi prameyasthitiḥ. tad yadi pramāṇam anuguṇaṃ, kiṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5058: vastuvikalpaiḥ. na tadbalena tadanupapattiṃ parihṛtyārtho vyavasthāpyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:5059: atha tu{2,37}pramāṇam evārthaṃ pratyācaṣṭe, kiṃ prameyavikalpaiḥ kṛtakarair iti. iha śābare tantre. idānīm asminn avasare. pramāṇastha eva bāhyāpahnavo vicāryata iti || 17 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5060_0: nanu yadi pramāṇastho vicārayitavyaḥ, tataḥ pratyakṣasya mukhyatvāt tadanusāreṇaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:5060_1: vicāro yuktaḥ. bauddhair api pratyakṣasāmarthyād evaikaṃ tattvam āśritam. naikasminn
GSP28mimsvtku:5061: dvaitam ātmānaṃ labhate iti hi manyante. anumānaṃ tu bhrāmyataḥ pratyuktam iti kiṃ tatpurassarīkriyate ata āha -- prastuta iti. evaṃ hi manyate --
GSP28mimsvtku:5062: yady api pratyakṣaśaktinirūpaṇam eva bāhyārthasadasadbhāvayoḥ pradhānaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:5063: tathāpi parair anumānam api bāhyāpahnave darśitam iti tad api nirākāryam.
GSP28mimsvtku:5064_0: anirākṛte hi tasmiṃs tatraiva kecid āsthāṃ pratibadhnīyuḥ. atra cāyam evopanyāsakramo
GSP28mimsvtku:5064_1: yuktaḥ yat prathamam anumānam upanyasyate, tatas tasya pratyakṣeṇa bādham upanyasya
GSP28mimsvtku:5065: pūrvottarapakṣāvā(?dāv e/da e)va pratyakṣaśaktinirūpaṇena nirṇaye kṛte
GSP28mimsvtku:5068: -- tatreti ityantena. saṅgatim āha -- asyeti durlabha ityantena. ayam arthaḥ -- yat sūtrakāreṇa tatsaṃyogajaṃ pratyakṣam uktaṃ tadākṣepeṇaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:5069: saṅgacchate. kālpaniko hy ayam indriyārthasamprayogaḥ, indriyāder abhāvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:5070: kālpanikaś ca sakalamithyājñānasādhāraṇa iti tadatadyogajatvavibhāgo na yukta iti sūtroktākṣepa iti || 21 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5071_0: {2,38} svoktākṣepeṇa vā saṅgatir ity āha -- mithyātvam iti. yad etadvṛttikāragranthānta
GSP28mimsvtku:5071_1: uktaṃ - yasya ca duṣṭaṃ karaṇaṃ yatra ca mithyeti pratyayaḥ sa evāsamīcīnapratyayaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5074: stambhādīti. stambhādipratyaya iti dharminirdeśaḥ. mithyeti dharmavacanaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:5075: pratyayatvād iti hetuḥ. tathāhīti dṛṣṭāntavacanam iti || 23 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5076: atra bhāṣyaṃ sarva eva nirālambanaḥ svapnavat pratyayaḥ iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:5077_0: tad yathāśrutaṃ sarveṣām anālambanatvaṃ sādhayati. tatra cāṃśe siddhasādhanatā syāt,
GSP28mimsvtku:5077_1: vibhramāṇām anālambanatvāt. yadvijñānam anyathā santam anyathā budhyate 'rthaṃ tannirālambanam
GSP28mimsvtku:5077_2: iṣyata eva. tathā sarvasmin pakṣīkṛte svapnajñānasyāpi tadantarbhāvād dṛṣṭāntābhāvaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:5077_3: sarva eveti caivaśabdānupapattiś ca. sa hi vibhaktapratiṣedhe dṛṣṭaḥ. yathedaṃ devebhya
GSP28mimsvtku:5077_4: idaṃ brāhmaṇebhya iti vibhakte bhavati vacanaṃ sarvam evedaṃ brāhmaṇebhya iti. tatra
GSP28mimsvtku:5077_5: vibhāgapratiṣedhapara evakāro dṛśyate. sarvasmiṃs tu pakṣe sarva ity ācakṣīta, naivakāraṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5077_6: prayuñjīta. ato jāgradbuddhivivakṣayaiva bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātavyam ity āha -- siddhasādhaneti
GSP28mimsvtku:5079: svāṃśālambanatvaṃ jñānānāṃ bauddhair iṣyata evāta āha -- svāṃśeti. ata eva kāraṇād bāhyaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭam anālambanatvaṃ sādhanīyam ity arthaḥ || 25
GSP28mimsvtku:5080: {2,39} aparam api bhāṣyaṃ pratyayasya hi nirālambanatāsvabhāva
GSP28mimsvtku:5081: upalakṣitaḥ svapne. jāgrato 'pi stambha iti vā kuḍya iti vā pratyaya eva bhavati, tasmāt so 'pi nirālambanaḥ iti. tasyārtham āha -- pratyayasyeti.
GSP28mimsvtku:5082_0: pratyayasya hi nirālambanatāsvabhāva upalakṣitaḥ svapne ity etāvatā bhāgena tāvat
GSP28mimsvtku:5082_1: sādhyena nirālambanatvena vyāptaṃ pratyayatvaṃ hetur nirdiśyate. dṛṣṭāntavacanam
GSP28mimsvtku:5082_2: iti yāvad iti. nanu na pratyayatvād iti hetur upāttaḥ, kasya vyāptir nirdiśyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:5082_3: ata āha -- hetuś ceti. yady api pratyayatvasya na vyaktaṃ pañcamyā hetutvam upāttaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:5082_4: tathāpi upanayanākhyena sādhanavākyāvayavena jāgrato 'pītyādinā hetuḥ pradarśita
GSP28mimsvtku:5082_5: eva. yadaiva hi sādhyānvitaṃ pradarśitaṃ pratyayatvaṃ punaḥ pratijñārtha
GSP28mimsvtku:5083: upanīyate, tadaiva tad atra hetur iti pradarśitaṃ bhavaty eva.
GSP28mimsvtku:5084: sādhyānvitasyaiva pakṣasthasya hetutvād iti. kaḥ punar ayam upanayaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:5085_0: sādhanavākyāvayavaviśeṣaḥ. pañcāvayavaṃ hi sādhanavākyaṃ pratijñā hetur udāharaṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:5085_1: upanayo nigamanaṃ ceti. tatra sādhyanirdeśaḥ pratijñā. yathā anityaḥ śabda iti. utpattidharmakatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:5085_2: iti hetuḥ. utpattidharmakaṃ sthālyādi dravyam anityaṃ dṛṣṭam ity udāharaṇam. tathā
GSP28mimsvtku:5085_3: cotpattidharmakaḥ śabda ity upanayaḥ. sa hy udāharaṇāpekṣaṃs tathety upasaṃhāro na
GSP28mimsvtku:5085_4: tatheti vā sādhyasyopanaya iti varṇitam. kim uktaṃ bhavati. dvedhā hi hetuḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5086_0: sādhyaṃ sādhayati udāharaṇasādharmyād vaidharmyād vā. tatra sādharmyaṃ pradarśitam.
GSP28mimsvtku:5086_1: vaidharmyaṃ tu yathā -- tasyām eva pratijñāyāṃ tasminn evotpattidharmakatvād iti
GSP28mimsvtku:5086_2: hetau anutpattidharmakam ātmādi dravyaṃ nityaṃ dṛṣṭam. na ca tathā śabdo 'nutpattidharmaka
GSP28mimsvtku:5087: dvividhodāharaṇāpekṣaḥ sādharmyodāhṛte tatheti vaidharmyodāhṛte na tatheti sādhyasya śabdasya
GSP28mimsvtku:5088: upanayaḥ, sa codāharaṇāpekṣa eva. udāharaṇadvaitād eva tadupasaṃhāradvaitaṃ bhavati. vaidharmyodāharaṇena ca viruddhanivṛttyā
GSP28mimsvtku:5089: sādhyasambandhitvena hetor upasaṃhāraḥ. yathātmādi dravyaṃ nityam
GSP28mimsvtku:5090_0: anutpattidharmakam, na ca tathā śabdaḥ ity anutpattidharmakatvapratiṣedhenotpattidharmakatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:5090_1: upasaṃhriyate. prakṛte tu sādharmyodāharaṇe{2,40}tathaiveti hetor upasaṃhāra upanayo
GSP28mimsvtku:5091: nigamanaṃ tu hetvapadeśāt pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanam. tasmād utpattidharmakatvād anityaḥ śabda iti. nigamyante 'nena
GSP28mimsvtku:5092_0: pratijñāhetūdāharaṇopanayā ekatrārtha iti nigamanam. samarthyante sambadhyante iti
GSP28mimsvtku:5092_1: yāvat. asati hi tasminn anabhivyaktasambandhānām arthapratipādakatvaṃ na syāt. sati
GSP28mimsvtku:5092_2: tu tasmin sarveṣām avayavānāṃ tātparyadarśanāt parasparasambandhaḥ sphuṭo bhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:5092_3: nigamanaṃ saṅgamanaṃ sambandhanam iti yāvad iti || 26 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5093: nanu nāvyāvṛtto vipakṣād dhetur bhavatīti vaidharmyadarśanena hetor vyatireko darśayitavyaḥ. na cātra tathā darśitaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:5094: sādharmyamātravacanāt. ata āha -- vipakṣeti. nirālambanatve hi sādhyamāne
GSP28mimsvtku:5095: sālambanatvaṃ vipakṣaḥ. na ca sarvānālambanatvavādinas tad astīti kiṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5096: tadvyatirekapradarśaneneti. nanu pratyaye pakṣīkṛte tasminn eva hetau
GSP28mimsvtku:5097: pratijñārthaikadeśo hetur ata āha -- sāmānyasyeti. sāmānyaviśeṣātmakā hi pratyayāḥ. tatra viśeṣe pakṣīkṛte sāmānyaṃ hetur iti na pratijñārthaikadeśateti || 27 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5098: atra siddhāntabhāṣyaṃ jāgrato hi buddhiḥ supariniścitā kathaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5099: viparyasiṣyatīti. anena kila supariniścitatvena jāgraddhiyāṃ sālambanatvaṃ sādhyate. na ca supariniścitatvaṃ bāhyālambanasambaddhaṃ parān prati
GSP28mimsvtku:5101_0: sapratisādhanaṃ vā bhavati. tasyobhayaprasiddhāvayavatvāt. asya ca tadviparītatvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:5101_1: ato{2,41}jātyuttaram evedaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa dattam ity ākṣipati -- jāgrajjñāna iti dvayena.
GSP28mimsvtku:5103_1: tathā sādharmye vādinā prayukte nirālambanānāṃ svapnajñānānām asupariniścitatvadarśanāt
GSP28mimsvtku:5104: vaidharmyasamatā. prapañcas tu paścād bhaviṣyatīty uktam iti || 28 --29 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5105: evam ākṣiptaṃ bhāṣyam ekena[704]matena samādadhāti -- duṣṭatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:5106: iti. evaṃ hi manyante -- duṣṭasādhanaprayoge duṣṭam evottaraṃ deyam iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:5107: evaṃ hi tadā vādī pratibodhito bhavati yathā bhavān madīyaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ duṣṭaṃ manyate tathāham api[705]tvatsādhanam, ato 'sau svasādhanān nivartate iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:5109_1: santaṃ doṣam anuktvānyam asantaṃ jalpati. na caivaṃvādinaḥ svasādhanadūṣaṇāvagamo
GSP28mimsvtku:5111: varjanīyam ity anyathā samādhānam āha -- pratijñeti. nānenānumānam
GSP28mimsvtku:5112: upanyasyate. kin tu paroktānumānasya pratyakṣavirodho varṇyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:5114_0: jāgradbuddhibhir niścitasadbhāvasya bāhyasya pratyākhyānānumānaṃ pratyakṣeṇa mukhanirodhān
GSP28mimsvtku:5114_1: na jāyata evāgnāv iva śaityānumānam. yadi paraṃ bāhyasya prayogamātraparyavasitam
GSP28mimsvtku:5114_2: eva sādhanavacanam, anumimānasyāpi sphuto bahirviṣayabo(?dhe /dho) jāyata eva. tathāvidhasyāpi
GSP28mimsvtku:5115: samāśvāsaḥ. nanv evam anumānam anāśvāsanīyam eva, na. tadabhāvāt, uktam etat pratyakṣe paripanthini na tatpratipakṣam anumānam ātmānaṃ labheta
GSP28mimsvtku:5116: śrauta iva viniyoge laiṅgikaḥ. sādhanavākye tv ayogyānvayapadasannikarṣād
GSP28mimsvtku:5117: vandhyāsutavākyavat saṃsargajñānaṃ bhrāntir eva. na tu kasyacid laiṅgikaṃ stambhādiṣv abhāvajñānam utpadyate. nanu vyāptaṃ pratyayatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:5118_0: anālambanatvena. vyāpyāc ca jñātasambandhasya vyāpakajñānaṃ notpadyata iti{2,42}haṭha
GSP28mimsvtku:5118_1: evāyam. na. vyāptibhaṅgāt. saṃvidann eva hi vyāptim abādhitena pratyakṣeṇa sarvadeśakālādibhāvinā
GSP28mimsvtku:5119: mithyātvam, api tu pūrvoktahetudvayaprayuktam iti niścinoti. tad idam uktam -- anyatas tu svapnapratyayasya mithyābhāvo visaṃvādād avagamyate
GSP28mimsvtku:5123: kathaṃ punar atra pratyakṣabādhaḥ. pratyakṣaṃ hi grāhyam
GSP28mimsvtku:5124: antareṇātmānam alabhamānaṃ tanmātram avasthāpayati na bāhyam. kiṃ hi tasya
GSP28mimsvtku:5125: bāhyena vinā na sidhyati. grāhyaś ca svāṃśo bauddhair abhyupagata eva. ato na bāhyāpahnave pratyakṣatvādivirodhaḥ. ata āha -- śakṣyāma iti dvayena.
GSP28mimsvtku:5126: ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- śūnyavāde hi pratyakṣasya svāṃśagocaratvaṃ nirākariṣyāma eva. tannirākaraṇe ca bāhyaviśeṣaṇopādānam anarthakam eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:5127: tadvyatiriktagrāhyāntarāsambhavāt. ato 'nālambanapakṣo grāhyamātranivāraṇa eva bhavati. pratyakṣādeḥ svāṃśanirākara(ṇā)d bāhya eva viṣayo 'vaśiṣyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:5128: ato bāhyaviśeṣaṇena vinā grāhyamātrāpahnave bhavati pratyakṣādibhiḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5129: pakṣabādhaḥ. saty api kathañcid bāhyaviśeṣaṇe pratyakṣāder api
GSP28mimsvtku:5130_0: bāhyaviṣayāvaśeṣāt tanniṣedhaṃ kurvāṇasya vādinas taiḥ pratyakṣādibhiḥ pakṣabādhanaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5130_1: bhavet. pūrvaṃ tu pratyakṣagrahaṇam upalakṣaṇārthaṃ sarvapratyakṣādivirodha eva tv
GSP28mimsvtku:5131_0: yat tu supariniścayena bāhyālambanasambandhaḥ prasiddhaḥ. kiṃ tadupanyāsenety uktam,
GSP28mimsvtku:5131_1: ata āha -- suniścayeneti. uktam idam asmābhir nāyam anumānaprayoga iti, kin tv anumānena
GSP28mimsvtku:5133: naiṣu paripanthiṣv anumānam ātmānaṃ labhate. etasmād anumānād ity arthaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5134: etad eva prapañcayati -- duṣṭajñāneti. duṣṭenāsupariniścitena gṛhīto 'rthaḥ pratiṣedham arhati netara iti. gṛhītamātrabādhe tu bahavaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5135: sādhanadoṣā bhāṣyakāreṇāntarṇītāḥ. tān pratipādayiṣyan pakṣābhāvaṃ tāvad āha -- gṛhīteti. yadi gṛhītamātraṃ mithyety ucyate, tadā yo 'yaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5136: nirālambanāḥ pratyayā iti svapakṣaḥ so 'pi gṛhītatvān mithyā syāt. ataḥ śakyaṃ vaktuṃ pakṣa evāsmin bhavatsādhane nāstīti || 34 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5137_0: api ca, nirālambanatvena viśiṣṭāḥ pratyayāḥ sādhyante. tad iha viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhedāvagrahasyāpi
GSP28mimsvtku:5137_1: mithyātvān na viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayor vivekaḥ sidhyati, tadabhāvāc ca vaktuṃ śakyam aprasiddhaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5138: 'prasiddhānyataro veti. tad etad āha -- agrāhyatvāc ceti. anyatarasya vā asiddhir vaktavyety
GSP28mimsvtku:5139: dūṣaṇāntaram āha -- vaktṛśrotror iti. pañcadhā svavāgvirodhaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:5141_0: svavāgvirodhaḥ. dvayor api viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayor nirālambanatvapratyayayor yad vaktuḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5141_1: śrotuś ca jñānaṃ jāyate, tad api pratyayatvād anālambanam iti pakṣo na sidhyatīti,
GSP28mimsvtku:5141_2: tatsālambanatve cānaikāntikatvān na pratyayānām anālambanatvaṃ bhavet. so 'yam ubhayoktyā
GSP28mimsvtku:5141_3: svavāgvirodha iti {2,44} dūṣaṇāntaram āha -- sambhavo na ceti. evaṃ hi vikalpanīyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:5141_4: kiṃ nirālambanatvaṃ dharmiṇo bhinnam abhinnaṃ vā. na tāvad abhinnaṃ viśeṣaṇam arhati.
GSP28mimsvtku:5141_5: na ca bhedagrāhiṇo jñānasya mithyātvād bhettum
GSP28mimsvtku:5143: bauddhānāṃ pratyavasthānam āha -- nirālambanateti. evaṃ hi manyante -- vastuni vyatirekādivikalpo yuktaḥ nāvastuni. yathāhuḥ --
GSP28mimsvtku:5144: vastuny eṣa vikalpaḥ syād iti. na cālambanapratiṣedho vastunaḥ kiṃ tadvyatirekādipraśneneti dūṣaṇā[706]ntaram āha -- yadīti tvamantena. yadi tāvad avastu,
GSP28mimsvtku:5145: kathaṃ tad asmān pratibodhayitum icchā bhavataḥ. svayaṃ vā tadviṣayā
GSP28mimsvtku:5146: buddhiḥ. na hy avastu buddhiviṣayo bhavati. tadviṣayatve ca vastutvāpātāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:5147: arthakriyālakṣaṇatvāc ca sattvasya. tallakṣaṇatvāc ca vastutvasyeti. yadi tūcyate - yady api nirālambanatvaṃ nāma na kiñcit paramārthato 'sti.
GSP28mimsvtku:5148: tathāpi tatsattvaṃ kalpayitvānumānavyavahāraḥ kriyate pratimāyām iva devatātvam ārādhanādivyavahāra iti. tad ayuktam. asataḥ kalpanāyogāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:5149: anyatra prasiddhasadbhāvā hi viṣṇvādyā devatā yuktaṃ[707]yad anyatra
GSP28mimsvtku:5150: kalpyante. atyantāprasiddhasadbhāvaṃ tv anālambanatvaṃ na gaganakusumādivat kalpanām arthati. tad etad āśaṅkayā sahāha -- kalpiteti
GSP28mimsvtku:5153: {2,45} api ca keyaṃ kalpanā. yadi jñānaṃ, kiṃ tena jñāyate. yadi
GSP28mimsvtku:5154: nirālambanatvam, tat tarhi kalpanā jñānotpattau vyāpriyamāṇā katham avastu
GSP28mimsvtku:5155: bhaviṣyati. arthakriyākāritvam eva hi vastutvaṃ, jñānotpādanam api cārthakriyetyabhiprāyeṇāha -- kḷptāv iti. atra codayati -- katham iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:5156: yady avastu na sādhyaṃ, kathaṃ tarhi bhavatām api meghābhāvena vṛṣṭyabhāvaḥ sādhyata iti. pariharati -- vastv iti. bhaved evaṃ yady
GSP28mimsvtku:5157: abhāvo na vastu syāt. sa vastv ity abhāvaparicchede vakṣyate. yady api cābhāvo na vastuśabdavācyaḥ lokavirodhāt, tathāpi nāsau nissvabhāvaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:5158: prakhyāyate hy asau svasaṃvedyena bhāvātirekiṇā rūpeṇa. ato 'rthakriyāyā
GSP28mimsvtku:5159: eva ghaṭiṣyata iti na kiñcid anupapannam iti || 40 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5160: kiñ cedam api cātra vikalpanīyaṃ - yo 'yaṃ dharmiṇo nirdeśakaḥ pratyayaśabdaḥ sa kiṃ bhāve kartari karaṇe vā vyutpadyate, karmaṇi vā.
GSP28mimsvtku:5161: pūrvokteṣu tāvat kalpeṣu virodhaḥ, akarmakapratyayāsambhavāt. na hi pratītir asti pratyetavyaṃ nāstīti sambhavati. tadanavaṣṭabdhasya
GSP28mimsvtku:5162: (?kṛ/ta)drūpasyāprakāśāt. evam eva kartṛkaraṇayor api vācyam. yadi jñānam evārthaprakāśe tajjanmani vā kartṛtvenopacaryate karaṇatvena vā
GSP28mimsvtku:5163: vivakṣādhīnatvāt kārakāṇāṃ, tathāpi tayoḥ pratyāyyena karmakārakeṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:5164: vinānupapattiḥ. so 'yaṃ svavāgvirodhaḥ. pratyaya ity uktamātra eva tatsvabhāvaparāmarśāt pratyetavyābhāvaḥ pratiṣidhyate mātā me
GSP28mimsvtku:5165: vandhyetivanmātṛtvena vandhyātvam. ato na pratyaye pakṣīkṛte nirālambanatvaṃ sādhayituṃ śakyam. karmavyutpattau siddhasādhanam eva. tad etat sarvam āha -- tatheti ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5166: siddhasādhanaṃ vivṛṇoti -- pratyāyyasyeti. na khalu jaḍo
GSP28mimsvtku:5168: {2,46} kartṛkaraṇapakṣe tv ayam aparo doṣaḥ yaddharmadharmivacanayoḥ śabdayor api nirālambanatvaṃ pratijñāyeta.
GSP28mimsvtku:5169: pratīte hi kartā karaṇaṃ vā pratyayaḥ. yathā ca kartṛkaraṇatve
GSP28mimsvtku:5170: vivakṣāvaśād jñāne bhavataḥ, tathā śabda iti. ata eva vakṣyati --
GSP28mimsvtku:5171: śabdānāṃ karaṇatvaṃ vā kartṛtvaṃ vā nirūpitam |
GSP28mimsvtku:5172: iti. kiñ cedaṃ śabdayor anālambanatvam anyad ato 'bhidheyābhāvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:5173: tadabhāve ca pakṣābhāvaḥ prasajyata ity āha -- kartṛtva iti || 43 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5174: bhāvādiṣu virodhaḥ syād iti yad uktaṃ tad vivṛṇoti --
GSP28mimsvtku:5175: pratyāyyena ceti. kartrādibhāvo hi na pratyāyyabhedam antareṇa sambhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:5176: atas tatpravṛttinimitte pratyayaśabde svavacanavirodhaḥ. sa cāyam asmābhiḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5178: yadi tv avibhaktāvayavo rūḍhirūpeṇa pratyayaśabda upādīyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:5179: tadarthaś ca pakṣīkriyate, tathāpi vastv antaragrāhakasyaiva vastuto
GSP28mimsvtku:5180: 'smākaṃ pratyayatvena prasiddheḥ svavacanavirodha eva bhavet, tad etad āha
GSP28mimsvtku:5181: -- athāpīti. tathāpīti. tathāpi svavacanavirodha iti pūrveṇa sambandha iti. kathaṃ svavacanavirodhaḥ. ata āha -- grāhakam iti || 45 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5182: vastvantarasyaiva hi grāhyasya grāhakam ātmadharmākhyaṃ vastv eva pratyaya iti naḥ prasiddham. ataḥ kathaṃ tasyāsati grāhye siddhir iti
GSP28mimsvtku:5183: dūṣaṇāntaram āha -- tam abhyupetyeti. evam ayam asādhanavādī vaktavyaḥ kiṃ yādrśo 'smābhiḥ pratyaya{2,47}iṣyate sa tathāvidha evābhyupetya bhavatā
GSP28mimsvtku:5184_0: pakṣīkriyate, na vā. tatrābhyupagame tāvadabhyupetavirodha iti. api caivaṃ sati cāprasiddhaviśeṣyaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5184_1: pakṣo bhavati, tvanmate bāhyārthagrāhipratyayānabhyupagamād ity āha -- viśeṣyasyeti.
GSP28mimsvtku:5184_2: atādṛśe tu svābhimate pakṣe 'smākam aprasiddhaviśeṣyaḥ pakṣa ity āha -- asmākam iti ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5185: kiñ ca yādṛgātmadharmaḥ pratyayo 'smākam abhimataḥ, sa pakṣo bhavadabhimato 'thavā svatantraḥ. pūrvasmin kalpe bhavato
GSP28mimsvtku:5186: 'prasiddhaviśeṣyatā. uttarasminn asmākam iti pūrvavad eva darśayitavyam
GSP28mimsvtku:5187: ity āha -- ātmadharmeti. yadi tv anirdhāritaviśeṣaṃ pratyayamātraṃ pakṣīkriyata ity ucyate, tan na. tathāvidhasyānirūpaṇād ity āha -- na ceti || 47 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5188: nanu śakyam idam anyeṣv api pakṣīkṛteṣu vaktuṃ yathā -- kim ākāśaguṇaḥ śabdaḥ svatantraṃ vā dravyaṃ paudgalākhyaṃ vā nityatayā
GSP28mimsvtku:5190_0: rūpaṃ pakṣa ity ucyate, tad ihāpi samānam ity ata āha -- śabdeti. yathā śabdārthasāmānyarūpeṇānyeṣāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5190_1: pakṣāṇāṃ nirūpaṇaṃ bhavati, naivam iha bhavataḥ sambhavati. asādhāraṇarūpātirekiṇaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5192_0: evaṃ tāvad dharmī vikalpya dūṣitaḥ. dharmam idānīṃ nirālambanatvaṃ vikalpya dūṣayati
GSP28mimsvtku:5192_1: -- nirālambanateti. sarvathā nirālambanatve sādhye 'prasiddhaviśeṣaṇaḥ pakṣo bhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:5195: dṛṣṭāntatayoktaḥ, so 'pi na sarvathā nirālambanaḥ. sarvatra yathākathañcidālambanasiddher vakṣyamāṇatvāt. ato dṛṣṭāntābhāvo 'py evaṃ satyāpadyeteti || 49 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5196_0: yadi tu na sarvathā nirālambanatvaṃ sādhyate. kin tu sālambanasyaiva kenāpi prakāreṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:5196_1: nirālambanatvam apīty ucyate, tadā rasādijñānānāṃ rūpādyālambanaśūnyatayā siddhasādhanam
GSP28mimsvtku:5197_0: nanu yadākārā buddhis tan nālambate iti sādhayiṣyāmaḥ na siddhasādhanaṃ bhaviṣyatīti,
GSP28mimsvtku:5197_1: tad etadāśaṅkate -- atheti. etad api nirākaroti -- svākārasyeti. abhyupagato hi bhavadbhiḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5197_2: svākāro buddher ālambanaṃ yadābhāsaṃ[708]prameyaṃ tad iti vadadbhiḥ. atas tadālambanābhāvo
GSP28mimsvtku:5200: nanu kim āpādya dūṣaṇodbhāvanam. bāhyānālambanatvaṃ hi naḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5201: pakṣaḥ. tathā ca bhāṣyopaskāre varṇitam eva. ato nābhyupetabādha ity ata āha -- bāhyeti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- vikalpanīyam idaṃ bāhyānālambanatvam.
GSP28mimsvtku:5202: kiṃ bāhyam ity anena rūpeṇa nālambata ity evaṃ sādhyate, vastuto vā bāhyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5203: nālambata iti. pūrvasmin pakṣe siddhasādhanam. parasmin doṣo vakṣyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:5204: stambhādidhiyo hi stambhādyākāratayaiva svaviṣayam ālambante na bāhyatayeti || 52 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5205: {2,49} yadi tu stambhānālambanatvam eva sādhyate, tatas tadrūpasaṃvedanasya dṛṣṭatvāt saṃvidvirodha evety āha -- tatheti || 53 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5206: atra codayati -- dvicandrādiṣv iti. evaṃ hi manyante -- samāno
GSP28mimsvtku:5207_0: 'yam anālambanatvābhimateṣu dvicandrādibodheṣu saṃvidvirodhaḥ. tatrāpi dvāv eva candrau
GSP28mimsvtku:5207_1: bhāsete. tadapahnave sphuṭa eva saṃvidvirodhaḥ. ataḥ kena prakāreṇa teṣām anālambanatvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5208: ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- yadi vayaṃ pratibhāsaviparyāsād anyathātvaṃ brūmaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:5209_0: tata evam upālabhyemahi. na tv evam. yad eva vijñānam indriyāprāptam arthaṃ prakāśayati
GSP28mimsvtku:5209_1: tadanālambanam iti naḥ siddhāntaḥ. tathā ca dvicandrādijñānam. tato 'nālambanam ity
GSP28mimsvtku:5212: nanv evaṃ saṃvedanānapahnave yathāvabhāsam arthasya sattvāt sadasadviveko na syād ata āha -- sarvatreti. asyārthaḥ -- idaṃ sad grāhyam
GSP28mimsvtku:5213: idam asad grāhyam iti nāyam artha idam arthaṃ prakāśayati idaṃ neti. kin
GSP28mimsvtku:5215: indriyārthasaṃyogasadasattvato 'yaṃ vibhāgaḥ. yad indriyasamprayuktam arthaṃ prakāśayati tat sad grāhyam. viparītam anyat. na ca yathāvabhāsam
GSP28mimsvtku:5216_0: arthasya sattvam. bādhakadarśanāt. ato yad deśāntarastham indriyāprāptam arthaṃ gṛhṇāti
GSP28mimsvtku:5216_1: tad asad grāhyam. tasyārtho nāstīty ucyate. kvacid dhi kiñcit pratiṣidhyate. na svarūpeṇaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:5217: arthaḥ{2,50} rajataṃ nāstīti. asti hi tad deśāntarādiṣu. kin tu iha
GSP28mimsvtku:5218: nāstīti yatrendriyeṇa na prāpyate, idam astīty api yad eva yatrendriyeṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:5219: prāpyate tad ucyate. iha ghaṭo 'stīti pratītiḥ na punar ghaṭo 'stīti || 55
GSP28mimsvtku:5220: na caiṣa vibhāgo bauddhasya sambhavatīty āha -- bhavata iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:5221: na ca bauddhasyendriyādīni santi yat prāptyaprāptinibandhanaṃ bhāvālambanālambanapratiṣedhau yujyete iti || 56 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5222_0: dūṣaṇāntaram āha -- bahirbhāveti sādhyatentena. na hy anālambanajñānavādināṃ bahirbhāvo
GSP28mimsvtku:5222_1: nāma kaścit siddhaḥ, yena viśiṣṭam anālambanatvaṃ buddheḥ sādhyata iti. kim iti na
GSP28mimsvtku:5223: iti. pakṣaprajñāpanārthaṃ hi sādhanavacanaṃ, nacāprasiddhapadārthaviśiṣṭaḥ pakṣo jñāpayituṃ śakyata iti || 57 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5224: kiṃ punaḥ pakṣo na jñāyate. ajñāte viśeṣaṇaviśeṣye ca viśiṣṭo na jñāyate. tac cobhayam api prasiddham eveti kiṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5225: viśeṣaṇaviśeṣaṇāprasiddhyā, ata āha -- yatheti. viśeṣaṇāprasiddhāv eva kim. na tāvat pakṣasiddhiḥ, tathāvidham anyo bodhayituṃ na śakyata iti
GSP28mimsvtku:5226: cet, samānam idaṃ tadviśeṣaṇāprasiddhāv apīti tadviśeṣaṇāprasiddhau pakṣo
GSP28mimsvtku:5228: etad eva prapañcayati -- nāprasiddha iti. pratijñāvākyārtho
GSP28mimsvtku:5229: hi{2,51}pakṣaḥ, sa ca padārthapūrvakaḥ. ato bāhyādipadārthāsiddhau pakṣo
GSP28mimsvtku:5232: pratyayaḥ, (vyatiriktaṃ nālambate) iti hi dvāv arthau sambhavataḥ paryudāsapratiṣedhābhyām. paryudāse hi nāmayogānnaño 'vyatiriktālambanaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5233_0: pratyaya ity artho bhavati. niṣedhe tu ākhyātayo(gād) vyatiriktaṃ nālambata iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:5233_1: ubhayathā hi siddhasādhanam. prameyatvādinā hi jagato na bhedam ātiṣṭhāmahe. ataḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5234: bhavati. ata evābhedād vyatiriktaṃ ca na bhavatīti siddhasādhanam iti ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5235: kiñ ca, idam api cātra vikalpanīyaṃ kim atyantabhinnena
GSP28mimsvtku:5236: stambhādinā nirālambanatvaṃ sādhyate, kathañcid bhinnena vā. pūrvasmin kalpe tāvat siddhasādhanam evety āha -- yadīti. siddhasādhanam ity atītena
GSP28mimsvtku:5237: sambandha iti. kathañcid bhinnena tu nirālambanatve sādhyamāne prāk
GSP28mimsvtku:5238: kalpitena pakṣavirodhaḥ. iṣyate hi kathañcit kalpanāmātrakalpitaṃ bhavadbhir api bāhyālambanam. atas tanniṣedhe bhavati prākkalpitena
GSP28mimsvtku:5239: pakṣabādhaḥ. tad etad āha -- kathañcid iti || 61 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5240_0: anyathā siddhasādhanaṃ darśayati -- vastv iti. buddhir hi vastvādyākāreṇa jaḍarūpā
GSP28mimsvtku:5240_1: na kiñcidālambata iti siddham eva. asādhāraṇena tu prakāśātmanā{2,52}bāhyam ālambate.
GSP28mimsvtku:5240_2: tatrāviśeṣitopādāne śakyaṃ siddhasādhanaṃ darśayitum iti. nanu grāhakād grāhyam abhinnam
GSP28mimsvtku:5241: naḥ sādhyaṃ, tatra kiṃ nānāvikalpaiḥ. ata āha -- grāhakād iti. na tāvannirālambanāḥ pratyayā ity ayam arthaḥ grāhakād grāhyam abhinnam iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:5242_0: evaṃ saty api yad dviśaktikatvaṃ jñānasyeṣṭaṃ grāhyagrāhakaśaktikaṃ jñānam iti tad
GSP28mimsvtku:5242_1: virudhyate, grāhyāpalāpāt. yady api na bauddhair āśrayātirekiṇī śaktir iṣyate, tathāpi
GSP28mimsvtku:5242_2: śaktibhedadvāreṇa dvyātmakatvam eva darśayatīti draṣṭavyam iti || 62 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5243: yadi tu sarvaprakārāsambhavān nirālambanabuddhyutpattimātram eva prasādhyate, tatrāpi ca siddhasādhanam eva. utpadyate hi nirālambanāḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:5244: pratyayā ity ukte nirālambanatvabuddhiḥ. na tv iyam arthakriyāyai
GSP28mimsvtku:5246_0: nacānarthakatvam evāsyā na siddham iti vācyam. tatsatyatve hetor anaikāntikatvaprasaṅgāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:5246_1: ato mṛgatṛṣṇādijñānavad evātmāṃśaparyavasāyinī buddhir iyam abhyupagantavyā. asmākam
GSP28mimsvtku:5246_2: api sarvamithyātvagrāhipratyayamithyātvaṃ siddham evety āvayor avivādāt siddham anālambanabuddher
GSP28mimsvtku:5247_0: evaṃ cotpannāyām apy arthaśūnyāyām ātmāṃśaparyavasāyinyāmanālambanabuddhau caitrādipratyayānāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5247_1: pakṣīkṛtānāṃ dharmatayā nirālambanatā na gṛhītā sādhanotthitayā dhiyeti, nānāviṣayatvāt
GSP28mimsvtku:5247_2: pratiyoginā caitrādisvarūpaparyālocanayālambanaprāptiḥ kena vārayituṃ śakyā. sa mānaviṣayopanipātinor
GSP28mimsvtku:5247_3: hi viruddhārthagocarayoḥ pratyayayor bādhyabādhakabhāvo bhavati, yathedaṃ rajataṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:5247_4: nedaṃ rajatam iti cānayoḥ. na ceha tathā. caitrādipratyayā hi svaviṣayaṃ sthāpayanti.
GSP28mimsvtku:5247_5: na ca tannirālambanabuddhiḥ pratikṣipati, arthābhāvāt. svāṃśagocarā hi sā. ato
GSP28mimsvtku:5248: 'syāḥ svāṃśo viṣayaḥ. caitrādipratyayānāṃ ca caitrādaya iti spaṣṭo viṣayabheda iti kiṃ kena bādhyata ity ucyate. tad etad āha -- caitrādīti dvayena || 65 -- 66 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:5249_0: kiñca yat tat pūrvam uktaṃ kartṛtve karaṇatve vā pratyayatve śabdo 'pi pratyayaśabdavācya
GSP28mimsvtku:5249_1: iti, tad yadi tathaiva pratyayaśabdo 'py atra pratītikartṛkaraṇatvātmanā pratyayatvenopādīyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:5250: bhavantīti. tatas tasyācetanatvena tatsaṃvittyālambanatvaṃ caitrādīnāṃ nāsti aṃśe siddhasādhanam evety āha -- yadīti || 67 ||
