GSP28mimsvtku:7012: aśravaṇāt. na hi samāse ṣaṣṭhī śrūyate. na cāśrūyamāṇā svārtham
GSP28mimsvtku:7013: abhidhatte. kin tu niṣādasthapativallakṣaṇayā tadartho 'vagamyate. śrutyā tu dṛśyāvacchinnaṃ darśanam eva pradhānatayāvagamyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7014_0: uttarapadārthapradhānānuśāsanam apy ata eva. samāsāt tathaivāvagateḥ. na ca vāstavaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7014_1: prādhānyam upasarjanasya padāntarasambandhe sāpekṣasamāse vā hetuḥ. kasya gurukulam
GSP28mimsvtku:7015: doṣaḥ na hy anantarbhāvya pratisambandhinaṃ gurvartho 'vagamyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7016: sambandhiśabdatvāt tasya. ato 'pekṣitārthāntara evāsau vṛttāv anupraviśatīti na doṣaḥ. na tv evam ekadeśaśabda iti vaiṣamyam. ato duradhigamo jñātasambandhasamāsārthaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7017: ata āha -- pramāteti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- satyam. ekadeśo
GSP28mimsvtku:7018_0: nānyapadārthaḥ. kin tu pramātaiva buddhisambandhopasthāpito jñātasambandha iti nirdiśyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7018_1: gamyamānam api cāvyabhicāriṇā cihnenopasthāpitaṃ viśeṣyata eva. na hi namaḥ pinākapāṇaya
GSP28mimsvtku:7018_2: ity anyapadārthānupādānaṃ doṣāya. api ca aindravāyavaṃ gṛhṇātīti bahuvrīhisamāsārtho
GSP28mimsvtku:7018_3: devatātaddhitaḥ katham āhṛtyānupātte somarase vartate. atha somaṃ krīṇāti abhiṣuṇoti
GSP28mimsvtku:7021: nānupapannam. pūrvapakṣasthitena vārtikakṛtā gamyamānaṃ na viśeṣyata iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7022: yad uktaṃ tad eva durlabhalabdham iva manvānaiḥ kaiścid valgitam ity upekṣaṇīyam eva. siddhānte hi gamyamānāyā eva vyakter gāvau śuklo gaur iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7023: ca vibhaktyā śabdāntareṇa ca viśeṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati. mañcāḥ krośantīti ca.
GSP28mimsvtku:7025: jāter astitvanāstitve na hi kaścid vivakṣati |
GSP28mimsvtku:7026: nityatvāl lakṣyamāṇāyā vyaktes te hi viśeṣaṇe ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7027: iti. dhūmo 'yaṃ jvalatīti na bhavati. anabhidhānāt. na hi lokaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7028: paryanuyoktum arhati. yas tu vaiyātyād dhūmaśabdenāgniṃ lakṣayitvā tathā
GSP28mimsvtku:7029: prayuyuṅkṣati na taṃ nivārayāmaḥ. nanv evaṃ pramātari jñātasambandhe sati naikadeśo viśeṣita iti vyāpakaikadeśadṛśo vyāpyasmṛtir anumānam āpadyeta.
GSP28mimsvtku:7030: na tv etad iṣṭam. vyāpyād dhi vyāpakajñānam anumānam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7032: tatra hi jñātasambandhasyeti ṣaṣṭhyā vyāpya eva sambandhī pratipādyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7033: sarvatra hi vyāpya eva hi ṣaṣṭhī dṛṣṭā. ucyate. uktam asmābhir nedam
GSP28mimsvtku:7034: alaukikaṃ kiñcit pramāṇānāṃ svarūpam upavarṇyate. lokaprasiddham eva tv
GSP28mimsvtku:7035: aparīkṣāpratipādanārthaṃ svarūpam anūdyate, loke hi niyāmyaikadeśadarśana
GSP28mimsvtku:7036: eva niyāmakaikadeśajñānam anumānam iti prasiddham iti. asty api hi
GSP28mimsvtku:7037: viśeṣaṇe viśiṣṭaikadeśo labhyate. api cāsannikṛṣṭe 'rtha iti vadati. na ca vyāpakadṛśas sāhacaryamātrāt vyāpyasmṛtir asannikṛṣṭaviṣayā.
GSP28mimsvtku:7039_0: anubhūtapūrvaniyamād vyāpakaviśiṣṭaḥ parvatādir avagamyate. ata upapanno viśiṣṭaikadeśalābha
GSP28mimsvtku:7039_1: iti. yat tu jñātasambandhasyaikadeśasyety atra ṣaṣṭhyā viśeṣapratipādanam uktam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7039_2: tad ayuktaṃ vyāpakād api ṣaṣṭhyutpatteḥ. bhavati hi kṛtakatvam anityatāyā hetur iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7039_3: vyavahāraḥ. vyāpikā cānityatā kṛtakatvasya. tasmād aviśeṣitopādāne 'pi vyākhyānatas
GSP28mimsvtku:7040: viśeṣapratipattir na tu sandehād alakṣaṇam iti sūktaṃ pramātā jñātasambandha iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7041: {3,5} vyākhyānāntaram āha -- ekadeśīti. ekadeśau hi naikadeśinam antareṇa syātām iti ākṣiptasyaikadeśino yuktam
GSP28mimsvtku:7043_0: nanv evaṃ jñātasambandhasyaikadeśino ya ekadeśas tasyaikadeśasya darśanād ity ucyamāne
GSP28mimsvtku:7043_1: sa eva darśanopasarjanatvād ekadeśasyaikadeśinaḥ sambandhas sambandhiviśeṣāpekṣasya
GSP28mimsvtku:7044: prasajyate. bhaved etad evam. yady ekadeśavyatirekajanitā ṣaṣṭhī syāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:7045: iyaṃ tv ekadeśadarśanavyatirekajanitā ṣaṣṭhī tad api paramparayā vājapeyasya yūpa itivadekadeśino bhavaty eva. kaḥ punar atraikadeśī
GSP28mimsvtku:7046: jñātasambandhaḥ pakṣas sapakṣo vā. na tāvat pakṣaḥ jñāyamānasambandhatvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:7047: na ca sapakṣaḥ siddhatvenānanumeyatvāt. naiṣa doṣaḥ. vyāptir hi na
GSP28mimsvtku:7049_1: na punar atrāyam idānīṃ vā dhūmavān agnimān iti. ataḥ pakṣaikadeśino 'pi sāmānyato
GSP28mimsvtku:7050_1: anupapannam iti na prameyābhāvaḥ. ekadeśyaikadeśau cāśrayāśrayiṇāv abhimatau. na
GSP28mimsvtku:7051: karmadhārayasamāso vāyam ity āha -- karmadhārayeti. ayam arthaḥ -- jñātaś cāsau saṃbandhaś ceti karmadhārayo 'yam. atra ca pakṣe
GSP28mimsvtku:7052: saṃbandhini gamye gamake caikadeśatā. kathaṃ sambandhyādhārasya sambandhasya sambandhināv ekadeśau. na hi bhūdharādhārasya dhūmasyaikadeśo
GSP28mimsvtku:7053: giriḥ. ādheyam eva tu dhūmas tadekadeśatayā manyate. ucyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7054: bhavatyādhārāṃśe 'py ekadeśavācoyuktiḥ. yathā avayavyādhāreṣv avayaveṣu ca samūhiṣv iti niravadyam dvayaṃ vānyapadārtha ity āha -- dvayaṃ veti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7055: sambandhagarahaṇakāle parasparasambandham upalabdhaṃ vyāpyavyāpakadvayaṃ jñātasambandham ucyate, tasya ca sa mudāyināv ekadeśau. yathā caitad evaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7056_0: tathā prāg evoktam iti. kiṃ{3,6}punaḥ karmadhārayapakṣe dvayānyapadārthatve vā prameyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7056_1: na tāvat sambandhasamudāyāv eva. tayoḥ pūrvam evāvagatatvāt. adhunā ca dharmadharmivibhāgenānavagamāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:7056_2: na cānya ekadeśī. tasyānupādānāt. na caikadeśābhyām ākṣepaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7058: svatantraikadeśāntare jñānam anumānaṃ, siddhatvāt. vakṣyati hi na
GSP28mimsvtku:7059: dharmamātraṃ, siddhatvād iti. atrābhidhīyate -- ayam atrārtho jñātasya
GSP28mimsvtku:7060: sambandhasya jñātasambandhasya vā dvayasya kvacid ekadeśadarśanāt tatraivaikadeśāntare buddhir anumānam iti. kuta etat. asannikṛṣṭagrahaṇāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:7061: na hi svatantraikadeśo 'sannikṛṣṭaḥ. kvacid eva parvatādāv ekadeśo
GSP28mimsvtku:7062: 'sannikṛṣṭo bhavati. tatrānavagatapūrvatvād iti kim anupapannam iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7063: kaḥ punar atra sambandho 'numānāṅgam iṣyate. avinābhāvas tādātmyatadutpattinimittaka iti kecit. evaṃ hi tair uktam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7066: iti. na hi vipakṣasapakṣayor adarśanād darśanād vāvinābhāvasiddhiḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7067: tenāniyatasyāpi tatra vṛtteḥ sambhavāt. kiñcidvipakṣavyāvṛttyā ca sarvavipakṣavyāvṛttyasiddheḥ. sarvavipakṣāṇāṃ ca yugapad grahītum aśakteḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7068_0: kin tu agnyādau sati dhūmāder bhāvād asati cābhāvāt tadāyattasvabhāvo dhūmādir iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7068_1: vidite tadavinābhāvas siddhyati. tatkāryasya tam antareṇātmalābhābhāvāt. tad atrāgnau
GSP28mimsvtku:7068_2: darśanam itaratrādarśanaṃ tadutpattau hetuḥ. tato 'vinābhāvasiddhiḥ. tādātmye 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:7070: nanv evaṃvidhānvayavirahiṇo gandhān na rūparasādayo 'numīyeran. na ca khalu tasya rūpam ātmā. na ca kāraṇam iti kathaṃ tatas
GSP28mimsvtku:7071: tatsiddhiḥ. śrūyatāṃ yathā siddhyati. rasād eva hi svahetāv agnāv iva
GSP28mimsvtku:7076: {3,7}iti. nanu yuktendhanavikāre tasya dhūmasya caikāgnikāraṇatvād avagatiḥ. na tu rūparasāv ekakāraṇakau. kāraṇarasā hi kārye rasam
GSP28mimsvtku:7077: ārabhante. kāraṇarūpāṇi ca kārye rūpam. tat kutas samānakāraṇatā.
GSP28mimsvtku:7078: naikakāraṇatayaikasāmagryadhīnatvam. kin tu rasād rasahetur anumīyamānaḥ pravṛttirūpajananaśaktirūpopādānakāraṇasahakṛto
GSP28mimsvtku:7079: tathāvidhasyaiva kāraṇatvāt pravṛttiśaktinā ca kāraṇena rūpaṃ janyata iti rūpasiddhiḥ. tad idam anupapannam yat tāvat kāryaṃ kāraṇena vinā na
GSP28mimsvtku:7080_0: bhavatīti tatas tajjñānam uktam. tad ayuktam. kathaṃ hi kāraṇena vinā kāryam eva
GSP28mimsvtku:7080_1: na bhavati ity etad evāvaseyam. tad vinā bhavato nityaṃ sattvam asattvaṃ vā syāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:7080_2: tataś ca kāryataiva hīyeta. uktaṃ hi taiḥ --
GSP28mimsvtku:7081: nityaṃ sattvam asattvaṃ vā hetor anyānapekṣaṇāt |
GSP28mimsvtku:7083: iti. apekṣātaḥ kādācitkatvam anapekṣaṃ tu sadasad vā syāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:7084: gaganaśaśaviṣāṇavad iti cet. yady evam anyo 'yaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvāt svabhāvaniyamaḥ yadanapekṣaṃ tannityaṃ sadasad vā bhavatīti. yac ca rasād
GSP28mimsvtku:7085_0: rūpāvagatir ekasāmagryadhīnatvād ity uktam. tad apy ayuktam. yady api pravṛttiśaktirūpopādānakāraṇasahakṛto
GSP28mimsvtku:7085_1: rasahetur avagataḥ svakāryād, rūpaṃ tu kuto 'avagamyate. pravṛttisāmarthyāt kāraṇād
GSP28mimsvtku:7086: kāryaṃ nātmeti kathaṃ tadavagame hetuḥ. pravṛttiśakteḥ kāraṇasya kāryāvyabhicārād iti cet. na. tarhi kāryatadātmanor evāvinābhāvaḥ kāraṇe
GSP28mimsvtku:7087: 'pi (?bhāvād/bhavet). bhavatv iti cet. na. agner api dhūmānumānaprasaṅgāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:7088_0: astv iti cet. atantraṃ tarhi kāryatvam anumāne. syān matam. na pravṛttisāmarthyāt
GSP28mimsvtku:7088_1: kāraṇād rūpānumānam. api tarhi rūpavadrūpakāraṇasahakāriṇā rasakāraṇena raso janyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7088_2: sahakārikāraṇam api saviśeṣaṇaṃ kāraṇam eveti rasād itaretarānugṛhītaṃ kāraṇacakram
GSP28mimsvtku:7089: anubhāsyata iti. tan na. kāryakāraṇayor ayaugapadyād rūpakāraṇasya
GSP28mimsvtku:7090: tadvattānupapattiḥ. pāriśeṣyād (?dūṣyād) rūpam eva sahakārīti vācyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7091: tatra ca vṛthā tatkāraṇānumānapariśramaḥ. rūpaṃ sahakārīty api
GSP28mimsvtku:7092: nānirṇītarūparasāvinābhāvo 'nubhavitum utsahate. prāg eva tu tannirṇaye vṛthārūpataddhetvos sahakāritvakalpanā.{3,8}api cānubhavaviruddham evedam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7093: na khalu rasam upalabhya taddhetvanumānamukhena rūpāvagatir laukikānām.
GSP28mimsvtku:7094: api tarhi rūparasayos sāhityaniyamāt sahasaiva rasād rūpam anumīyate. api ca kāryakāraṇabhūtayor eva bahulam anumānavyavahāro dṛśyate ity anādṛtyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7095: kāryatvam avyabhicāre. tādātmyam api meyābhāvaprasaṅgād dheyam eva. kiṃ hi vṛkṣātmani śiṃśapātve vidite meyam avaśiṣyate. nirbhāgatvāt. aikātmye 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:7096_0: vastunaḥ kālpaniko bheda iti cet, na tāvannirbhāgaṃ vastu, bhāgāvagrahāṇāṃ deśādibhede
GSP28mimsvtku:7096_1: 'py abādhitānāṃ samyaktvāt. kālpanikabhedāśrayatvāc cānumānasya vāstavam aikātmyam
GSP28mimsvtku:7096_2: anaṅgam. vṛkṣavyavahāro 'numīyata iti ced katham anātmavyavahāraś śiṃśapātvād anumīyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7097: vṛkṣavadananumānaprasaṅgāt. vyavahārayogyatāyām apy evam eveti yat kiñcid
GSP28mimsvtku:7098: etat. evam eva vaiśeṣikādisamayasiddhā api kāryakāraṇabhāvādayas sambandhaprakārāḥ pratyuktā veditavyāḥ. te 'pi hy
GSP28mimsvtku:7099: aniyatānanumānotpattikāraṇam. astu tarhi niyamo vānumānāṅgam. na.
GSP28mimsvtku:7100: pramāṇābhāvād anavagateḥ. na tāvadāpātajaṃ pratyakṣam asyāvadhāraṇakṣamam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7101: īkṣate khalv ayaṃ visphāritākṣas sahasā mahānase dhūmam agninā sahitam. na tu jānāti niyato 'yam aneneti. duradhigamo hi sarvabhāvānāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7102: svabhāvaniyamaḥ. na tam unnetum utsahante jhaṭ iti mahānto 'pi. na hi nirvikalpakāgocare vikalpaḥ pramāṇam. tatpurassaratvāt tasya. syād etat.
GSP28mimsvtku:7103: deśādibhedeṣv avyabhicārāt svabhāvaniyamo 'vadhāryata iti. kenāvadhāryate sarvadarśanānām anvayamātre vyāpārāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:7104: atha pūrvapūrvajñānajanitabhāvanāsacivam antimam anenāyaṃ niyata iti bhavaty ālocanājñānam. tato vikalpāḥ pravartiṣyanta iti. naitad
GSP28mimsvtku:7105: evam. indriyavyāpārasāpekṣaṃ hi pratyakṣam. na ca sahabhāvadarśanād
GSP28mimsvtku:7106: anyatra bahir indriyavyāpāraḥ. na ca bahir viṣayavedane tannirapekṣam antaḥkaraṇaṃ pravartate. api ca nirūpitarūpā api bhāvā deśādibhedeṣv
GSP28mimsvtku:7107: anyathābhavanto 'nubhūyanta iti na svabhāvaniyamaṃ pratyāśrayitum ucitaṃ prāmāṇikānām. tadāhuḥ --
GSP28mimsvtku:7110: {3,9}iti tasmād vaktavyo 'numānāṅgabhūtas sambandhaḥ. ata āha -- sambandha
GSP28mimsvtku:7111: iti. vyāptir hi sāhityaniyamam apadiśati. taddarśino hy ekadeśadarśanād
GSP28mimsvtku:7112: ekadeśāntare buddhir utpadyate, atas sāmānyavacano 'pi sambandhaśabda uparitanasamabhivyāhārād atrānumānalakṣaṇagranthe viśeṣaparo bhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:7114: yadi jñātasambandhasyānumānaṃ sa tarhi sambandho dvyāśraya ity ubhayānumāne liṅgaṃ syād ata āha -- vyāpyeti || 4 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7115: atra kāraṇam āha -- yo yasyeti dvayena. saḥ --
GSP28mimsvtku:7116: samanyūnadeśakālo hi vyāpyo bhavati. pūrvaṃ tāvad yatrobhayor api dharmayor vyāpyavyāpakatvaṃ. yathā parastād udāhariṣyate. uttaras tu yathā
GSP28mimsvtku:7117: dhūmādiḥ, sa hi prāyeṇāgnideśakālavarttī bhavati. saty api cāgnāvabhavaṃs
GSP28mimsvtku:7118: tato deśakālābhyāṃ nyūno bhavati. yāvantāv agner deśakālau tāvantau nāsyeti nyūnatvaṃ. ata eva cāsāv agner vyāpako na bhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:7119: sakalatadīyadeśakālāvyāpteḥ. vyāpakas tu samādhikadeśakālaḥ. atrāpi pūrvokta eva pūrvaḥ. uttaras tu yathāgner eva dhūmasya. sa hi tasya
GSP28mimsvtku:7120: deśakālau tāvad vyāpnoty eva. asaty api dhūme bhavan deśakālābhyām adhiko
GSP28mimsvtku:7121: 'py abhidhīyate. yataś cānayor īdṛśaṃ svarūpaṃ nānyathā vyāpyavyāpakatātmakatā, tena kāraṇena vyāpya eva gṛhīte vyāpakasya
GSP28mimsvtku:7122: grahaṇaṃ bhavati yad asau taṃ vināpi na bhavaty eva. na hy asāv agnir iva dhūmasyāgner deśakālāv atikramyāpi bhavati. yena taṃ vināpi bhavas taṃ na
GSP28mimsvtku:7123_0: gamayet. agnis tv anevaṃvidha iti nāsau dhūmasya gamako bhavati. nanu cāyaṃ viśeṣo{3,10}
GSP28mimsvtku:7123_1: jñātasambandhaśabdān nāvagamyate. sa hi sambandhajñānamātram aṅgatayā darśayati,
GSP28mimsvtku:7125: idaṃ bhāṣyam. loke ca vyāpyaikadeśadarśina eva vyāpakajñānam anumānam iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7126_0: siddham. na hy anyatheti cāpakṛṣya pūrveṇa yojayitvā teneti tadupajīvanena vyākhyeyam
GSP28mimsvtku:7126_1: iti nanu vyāpakād api vyāpyasaṃvittir dṛṣṭā. anityatvād iva kṛtakatvasya. bhavati
GSP28mimsvtku:7126_2: hi bhāvānām anityatvāt kṛtakatvānumānam. vyāpakaṃ cānityatvaṃ kṛtakatvasya. ato vyāpakaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7127_0: avyāpakam ata āha -- vyāpakatveti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ. satyaṃ vyāpakasya gamakatvam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7127_1: na tu vyāpakatvagṛhītasya. tena hi rūpeṇa gṛhīto 'sau vyāpyād deśakālādhikye 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:7127_2: na virudhyate. na cādhikadeśakālaḥ pratipādako bhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:7128: taṃ vināpi bhāvād ity uktam eva. nanu vyāpyatāpi tasyāsti. astu nāma,
GSP28mimsvtku:7129: vastutas tat tu rūpaṃ na gṛhītam iti kathaṃ gamakatvam. avagate tu tādrūpye tenaiva gamakatvaṃ na vyāpakatayā. ato vyāpyataivānumānāṅgaṃ na
GSP28mimsvtku:7131_0: vyāpyatvam aṅgaṃ na vyāpakatvam ity etad evāsaṅkīrṇodāharaṇena darśayati -- vispaṣṭeti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7131_1: yatra vyāpyavyāpakabhāvo na saṅkīryate, tatra vispaṣṭam evaitad upalakṣitam. yathā
GSP28mimsvtku:7132_0: goviṣāṇitvayor hi vyāpyaṃ gotvaṃ vyāpakaṃ viṣaṇitvam anumāpayati na tu viṣāṇitā gotvam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7132_1: vyāpikā hi sā. mitau -- anumāne. goviṣāṇitvayor ayaṃ gamyagamakaviveko dṛṣṭa ity
GSP28mimsvtku:7133: {3,11} evam asaṅkare gamyagamakavivekād yatrāpi vyāptisaṅkaro bhavati
GSP28mimsvtku:7134: tatrāpi vyāpyatvam eva gamakatve kāraṇam iti niṣkṛṣyata ity āha -- teneti
GSP28mimsvtku:7135: nanu vyāptir anumānāṅgam ity uktam. kasya punar iyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7136: saṃyoginas samavāyinas sambandhisambandhino vā. na hy atra vyavasthām
GSP28mimsvtku:7137: upalabhāmahe. sarveṣām apy anumāpakatvāt. tad yadi saṃyogī vyāpyaḥ. rasād rūpānumānaṃ na syāt. atha samavāyī dhūmād agnyanumānam,
GSP28mimsvtku:7138_0: sambandhisambandhinaś ca pitror brāhmaṇatvāt putrasya brāhmaṇatvānumānam ityādi darśayitavyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7138_1: api ca vyāptir ity anvayo 'bhidhīyate. upaśleṣa iti yāvat. na cāsau bhūmau pratiṣṭhitenāgninā
GSP28mimsvtku:7139: sambhavati. na ca bhūmiṣṭhāṃ śaṅkucchāyāṃ divi vartamānaḥ ṛkṣodayo 'nveti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7140: vyāptiś ca kasyacit kenacid bhavantī deśato vā syāt kālato vā. pūrvasmin kalpe bhāvinas savitur udayasyādyatanārkasyaivodayāt aṣṭau
GSP28mimsvtku:7141: yāmānatikramyānumānaṃ na syāt. parasmin dhūmād agnyanumānam ityādi
GSP28mimsvtku:7142: paryanuyoktavyam. ata āha -- teneti dvayena. yena khalv api
GSP28mimsvtku:7143_0: vivakṣitāvāntaravibhāgaṃ vyāpyatāmātram anumānāṅgam tena kāraṇena yasyaiva saṃyogādīnām
GSP28mimsvtku:7143_1: anyatamasya, yenaiva teṣām anyatamena, yādṛśī upaśleṣṭenetareṇa vā vyāpyatā prāgavagatā,
GSP28mimsvtku:7143_2: saivānumāne kāraṇaṃ bhavati. na hy upaśleṣo vyāptiḥ. uktaṃ hi -- sambandhaniyamo
GSP28mimsvtku:7143_3: 'sāv iti. sa cānupaśliṣṭenāpi bhavati. yo hi yasmin sati bhavati, asati ca na bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:7144: tena niyamyata ity ucyate. kim atropaśleṣeṇa. na cātra deśādīnām
GSP28mimsvtku:7145_0: anyatamavivakṣā. yāvati hi deśe kāle vā vartamānasya yasya vyāpyatā nirūpitapūrvā,
GSP28mimsvtku:7145_1: yāvaddeśakālabhāvinā vyāpakena tasya vyāpakāṃśasya tāvaty eva deśādau vartamānasya
GSP28mimsvtku:7146: gaganādivarttidharmyantare dṛṣṭāntadharmyapekṣayā sādhyadharmiṇi dṛṣṭas san pratipādako bhavati.{3,12} niyamo hy anumānāṅgam. sa ca sarveṣām
GSP28mimsvtku:7147: aviśiṣṭa eva kim avāntaravibhāgena. deśe yāvatīty anatidūram adhirūḍhasya dhūmāder dūrataravarttino 'pi nadīpūrasya vyāptiṃ darśayati.
GSP28mimsvtku:7148: śaṅkucchāyāyāś ca nitānta(dūra)vartinā ṛkṣodayena. yāvati kāla iti ca bhāvinas savitur udayānumānādāv api vyāptiṃ darśayatīti || 11 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7149: nanv asyāṃ vyāptau na kiñcit pramāṇam astīty uktam ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:7150: bhūyodarśaneti. kathaṃ punarbhūyodarśanagamyā vyāptiḥ. kiṃ hi tatra
GSP28mimsvtku:7151_0: pratyekam eva bhūyāṃsi darśanāni pramāṇam āhosvid darśanasaṅghātaḥ pūrvatanadarśanāhitasaṃskārasacivam
GSP28mimsvtku:7151_1: antimaṃ pramāntaraṃ vā bhūyodarśanaprabhavam. tatra na tāvat pratyekasandarśanasamadhigamyā

GSP28mimsvtku:7232: unnīyate, sthiram iva rūpaṃ kuḍyādīnām. asti hi teṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:7233_1: iti tadrūpam apratyakṣaṃ bhavati. apratyakṣe hi tasmin nedaṃ rajatam iti pūrvānubhūtarajatabādho
GSP28mimsvtku:7233_2: na syād, bhinnaviṣayatvāt. svakāle hi pūrvavijñānena rajataṃ viṣayīkṛtaṃ na bhaviṣyadbādhakajñānakṣaṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:7234: kathaṃ tatrāprasaktaṃ bādhyate. kālāntarasambandho 'pi tena rūpeṇa pūrvajñānāvadhāritaṃ bhaviṣyajjñānakālam api vyāpnotīti bhavati samānaviṣayatām āsādya bādhaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7235: nanu yad vastuno rūpaṃ tatparānapekṣam avagamyate, agner
GSP28mimsvtku:7236: ivoṣṇatvam. na ca dhūmasyāgṛhītapratisambandhinā tadrūpam avagamyata iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7237: kathaṃ vasturūpatvam. maivam. sambandho hy asau, katham anavagate pratisambandhiny avasīyate. yathāha --
GSP28mimsvtku:7240: iti. ato yad etad agninā dhūmasya niyatatvaṃ bhāvātmakam idaṃ tatpratyakṣeṇāvagamyata iti kim anupapannam. yathā cānagninivṛttir na
GSP28mimsvtku:7241_0: niyamaḥ tathā varṇitam eva. vipakṣavyāvṛttyā tu vidhirūpa eva niyamaḥ parīkṣakair
GSP28mimsvtku:7241_1: vyākhyāya parebhyaḥ pratipādyate.{3,19}nanu niyamyatvam api karmakārakatvaṃ, tac
GSP28mimsvtku:7242: kārakāntarapratyakṣavad upapatteḥ. kārakāntaraśaktayo 'pi hi na pratyakṣāḥ, ato 'saty eva śaktipratyakṣatve kārakaṃ pratyakṣam eṣitavyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7243_0: evam ihāpi niyamyaḥ pratyakṣo bhaviṣyatīti kim anupapannam. atas siddhaṃ tāvat pratyakṣatvam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7243_1: āgamikeṣu cārtheṣu tasya tasya phalasya tena tena vedavedyena karmaṇā samanvayāt,
GSP28mimsvtku:7244: karmaṇedaṃ phalaṃ vyāptam iti śāstrād avagamyate. niyatasādhyatvāvagamāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:7245: meghābhāvavṛṣṭyabhāvayoś ca svatantrābhāvapratītyasambhavād bhāvayor eva kathañcid vyāptisaṃvedanam. meghābhāvo nāma nabhasa evāvasthāviśeṣaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7246_1: vṛṣṭyabhāva iti ca pṛthivyā eva nibiḍakaṭhorapāṇḍurādibhāvaḥ. tac ca rūpam ubhayasyāpi
GSP28mimsvtku:7246_2: pratyakṣasamadhigamyam eveti tad eva tatra vyāptipramāṇam. evam anyatrāpi darśayitavyam
GSP28mimsvtku:7246_3: iti. bhavatu tāvad anyad vyākhyāsyāma iti samadhigataṃ tāvad vyāptes svarūpaṃ pramāṇaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7246_4: ca. idaṃ tu cintanīyam. kasya kena vyāptir iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7247: na hy ekatra viditāv agnidhūmaviśeṣau pradeśāntare dṛśyete. yat tayor ekasyaikenānvayavyatirekasamadhigamyā vyāptir bhavet, ato vācyaṃ vyāpter
GSP28mimsvtku:7248: adhikaraṇam. ata āha -- sāmānyeti. satyaṃ na viśeṣayor vyāptiḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7249: sāmānyātmanor eva tu kasyacid dharmiṇo dharmayos tattadbhedaparityāgena vyāptir avagamyate dhūmākṛtir agnyākṛtyā niyateti. ato na kaścid doṣa iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7250: idaṃ tu prāyikam, sthāyinos tu viśeṣayor api kvacid vyāptir bhavaty evety āha -- kvacid iti || 12 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7251: atraivodāharaṇam āha -- kṛttikodayam iti. yatra hi kṛttikodayaṃ dṛṣṭvā rohiṇyāsattiḥ kathyate -- anantaram udeṣyati rohiṇīti,
GSP28mimsvtku:7252: tasminn anumāne viśeṣasyaiva viśeṣeṇa vyāptiḥ. na hi tayos sāmānyam asti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7253: vyaktibhede pramāṇābhāvāt. pratyabhijñāyate hi saiveyaṃ kṛttikā, saiveyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7254: rohiṇīti. katham anyā bhaviṣyati. atas siddhaṃ viśeṣayor evātra vyāptir iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7255: yadi tarhi vyāptir anumānāṅgam, asti khalv asau
GSP28mimsvtku:7256_0: hiṃsātvasyādharmatvena bāhyahiṃsāsv ity ataḥ kratāv api hiṃsātvād adharmatvam anumīyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7256_1: tatra{3,20}daikṣapaśuhiṃsādīnām adharmatvaṃ prasajyetety ata āha -- vyāpteś ceti
GSP28mimsvtku:7256_2: dvayena. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- satyam āpātād bhavati bhramaḥ, yathā kila hiṃsātvamātrānubandhyadharmatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:7257_0: na tv etad evam. nirjñātena hy adharmatvena hiṃsātvaṃ vyāpyate. na ca śāstrādṛte
GSP28mimsvtku:7257_1: tajjñānopāyas sambhavati. na ca hiṃsātvamātram anarthasādhanam iti śāstram asti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7257_2: viśeṣahiṃsāyā vihitatvāt. vidhyavaruddhaviṣaye ca pratiṣedhānavakāśāt. pratiṣedham
GSP28mimsvtku:7258_0: 'bhiniviśata iti hiṃsāntarāṇi na hiṃsyād iti pratiṣedho 'valambate. evaṃ ca yady
GSP28mimsvtku:7258_1: api bāhyahiṃsāsu hiṃsātvādharmatvayos sāhityam avagataṃ, tathāpi na hiṃsātvam adharmatvaprayojakam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7258_2: kin tu niṣiddhatvam. asaty api hiṃsātve
GSP28mimsvtku:7259: niṣiddhatvamātreṇa surāpānādāv adharmatvasiddheḥ. ato ya evāsmin saty evāsya bhavituṃ śaktir asti ity anena rūpeṇa nirūpyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7260: vyāpyatayāvagamyata iti yāvat. sa eva dharmaḥ prayojaka ity ucyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7261: paraprayuktavyāptyupajīvinas tu hiṃsātvādayaḥ, na tair adharmatvādivyāpakāṃśo 'vadhārayituṃ śakyate. na hi bāhyahiṃsā hiṃsety
GSP28mimsvtku:7262_0: evādharmaḥ, kin tu niṣiddheti. ato na kvacid vihitānāṃ daikṣapaśvādihiṃsānām adharmatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:7262_1: iti ye tv evaṃjātīyakān apy aprayojakān hetūn prayuñjate, te sulabhaiḥ pratihetvādidoṣaiś
GSP28mimsvtku:7263: darśayituṃ, daikṣapaśuhiṃsā dharmaḥ vihitatvād agnihotrādivad iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7264: prayojake hi hetāv evaṃjātīyakā doṣā nāspadaṃ labhante. aprayojake tu sulabhā eva. tad etad āha -- ye tv iti. visrabdham iti kriyāviśeṣaṇam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7265: yathā viśvāso bhavati tathā prayuñjata ity arthaḥ || 15 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7266: {3,21} pratihetvādidoṣair bhrāmyantīty uktam tān eva doṣānupanyasyati -- teṣv iti. pratihetus tāvad asmābhir ukta eva.
GSP28mimsvtku:7268: dharmādharmayoḥ. kvacid iṣṭavighātaḥ kvacid alaukikavivāda iti || 16 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7269: āgamavirodhodāharaṇaṃ tāvad āha -- niṣiddhatveneti. idaṃ cānāgatāvekṣaṇanyāyena prāg evāsmābhir vyākhyātam iti || 17 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7270: iṣṭavirodhodāharaṇam āha -- hetudvayeti. bādhakāraṇadoṣādhīnaṃ hi sarvatra mithyābuddhīnāṃ mithyātvam, na ca jñānatvenotpattimattvena vā
GSP28mimsvtku:7271: prayujyate, satyamithyātvasādhāraṇatvād anayoḥ. jñānatvād eva tanmithyātvaṃ sādhayato bauddhasyeṣṭavighātakārī
GSP28mimsvtku:7274: darśayitavyaḥ, na hi sarvavijñānāni mithyety evaṃvidhaṃ vivādaṃ laukikās
GSP28mimsvtku:7275: sahante. sahasaiva hy evaṃvidhavivādaśrāviṇām udvego jāyate. yathā --
GSP28mimsvtku:7276: acandraś śaśītyādau. ato 'yam alaukiko vivādaḥ. tathā coktam --
GSP28mimsvtku:7281: santi khalu svargakāmo yajetety evaṃ vihitāni somādīni karmāṇi. teṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:7282_0: kiṃ{3,22}caturṇāṃ varṇānām adhikāraḥ, utāpaśūdrāṇāṃ trayāṇām iti saṃśaye caturṇām
GSP28mimsvtku:7282_1: iti prāptam, catvāro 'pi hi varṇāḥ svargaṃ kāmayanta iti svargakāmapadenābhidhīyante.
GSP28mimsvtku:7282_2: svargakāmaś cātrādhikāritayā jñāyata iti prāpte uktam -- apaśūdrāṇām adhikāra iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7283: anagnir avidvāṃś cāntimo varṇaḥ. katham asau vaitānike karmaṇy
GSP28mimsvtku:7284_0: adhikriyate. nanu śrutyarthāvagatādhikārasāmarthyād eva śūdrasyāpy agnividyayor ākṣepo
GSP28mimsvtku:7284_1: bhaviṣyati. na. avidhānāt. traivarṇikasyaiva aṣṭavarṣaṃ brāhmaṇam upanayīta vasante
GSP28mimsvtku:7284_2: brāhmaṇo 'grīnād adhīta ity evamādibhir agnividye vihite. na cāniyamenaiva te śūdrasyāpi
GSP28mimsvtku:7284_3: bhaviṣyata iti śakyate vaktum. ko hi pratilabdhavidyāgnisambandhas
GSP28mimsvtku:7285_1: vā jadhanyavarṇasyopakalpayitum utsahate. atas traivarṇikatvaprayuktam eva yāgādīnāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7285_2: svargahetutvam. na manuṣyatvamātreṇa śūdrasamavāyinā prayujyate. tad yadi kaścid
GSP28mimsvtku:7285_3: anumānakuśalaḥ prayuṅkte śūdrakṛto yāgaḥ svargahetuḥ manuṣyakṛtatvāt traivarṇikācaritayāgavad
GSP28mimsvtku:7286: tasyāgamavirodhaḥ. nanv āgamavirodha udāhṛta eva, kiṃ punas tadudāharaṇena. ucyate. pūrvam adharmatvānumānasya vaidikahiṃsāviṣayasya
GSP28mimsvtku:7287: sākṣādāgamavirodho varṇitaḥ, vyaktam eva daikṣapaśuhiṃsā vidhīyamānatvād arthasādhanam ity etad avagamyate, katham asāv adharmo bhaviṣyatīti,
GSP28mimsvtku:7288: codanālakṣaṇasyārthasya dharmatvāt. iha tu śūdrakṛtasya yāgādeḥ svargahetutā na sākṣādāgamena pratikṣipyate. kin tu traivarṇikādhikāralābhād arthād itaranirāsa iti viśeṣaḥ || 19 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7289_2: śabdagocarais tasya vināśitā na prayujyate. kṛtakatvādiprayuktā hy asau. na ca kṛtakatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:7289_3: eva prayatnānantaradarśanena sādhayituṃ śakyam. ākāśādibhir vyabhicārāt. yadi tarhi
GSP28mimsvtku:7290: bhuvanasanniveśāś ca mahīmahīdharodadhiprabhṛtayaḥ. satyam. sarvam eva sāvayavaṃ vināśadharmakam, mahīmahīdharādayo 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:7291: samāsāditasvāvayavasaṃyogavibhāgaviśeṣā bhāgaśo naśyanty eva. niranvayam tu vināśaṃ na kasyacid abhyupagacchāmaḥ. evaṃ mahābhūmer apy
GSP28mimsvtku:7292_0: āvāpodvāpabhedān nāśo darśayitavyaḥ. tathā yad api vaiśeṣikair jātimattvād aindriyakatvāc
GSP28mimsvtku:7292_1: ca śabdānityatvam anumitaṃ, tad apy ayuktam. etad dhi jātimattvādi vastusanmātranibandhanam
GSP28mimsvtku:7293: nānenānityatā sādhyate. kim idaṃ vastusanmātranibandhanam iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:7294: paramārthasannibandhanam ity uktaṃ bhavati. paramārthasanta eva ghaṭākāśātmādaya indriyaviṣayā jātimantaś ca, na bhrāntisaṃviditāḥ śaśaviṣāṇādaya iveti || 21 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7296_0: iti. ayam arthaḥ -- ya eva niṣiddhatvādir artho yasyādharmatvādes sādhanaśaktiyuktatvenāvagataḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7296_1: asmin saty amunā bhavitavyam itīdṛśyā śaktyāvadhāryata iti yāvat. niyamyaśaktir eva
GSP28mimsvtku:7296_2: hi sādhanaśaktir ity ākhyāyate, niyatāvagato hi niyāmakaṃ śaknoti (gamayituṃ) nānya
GSP28mimsvtku:7297_0: niyamya eva gamako na prasaṅgānvito hiṃsātvādhiḥ. niṣiddhatvenānvetum abhipravṛttenādharmatvena
GSP28mimsvtku:7297_1: prasaṅgād dhi hiṃsātvam apy anvitam iti prasaṅgānvitaṃ hiṃsātvaṃ nādharmatvasya gamakaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7299: vyākhyātaḥ. idānīm ekadeśadarśanād ekadeśāntare buddhir iti vyākhyeyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7300: tatra caitad eva tāvad vaktavyam. svatantraikadeśadarśanāt tathāvidhaikadeśāntare jñānam anumānam ity āpadyeta. tac cāyuktam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7301: smaraṇaṃ hi tat, katham anumānaṃ bhavet.{3,24}athaikadeśadarśanād
GSP28mimsvtku:7302: ekadeśāntaraviśiṣṭa ekadeśyanumānasya viṣaya iṣyate. tan na. anupāttatvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:7303: na hy atraikadeśī kenacicchabdenopāttaḥ. atas tadanupādānān nyūnaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7304: lakṣaṇam ity āśaṅkyāha -- upātta iti. yady api svaśabdena naikadeśyupāttas tathāpy ekadeśaśabdābhyām evārthād ākṣipyata iti na nyūnatvadoṣa iti || 23
GSP28mimsvtku:7305_0: arthākṣepe kāraṇam āha -- aparārtha iti. na hi dhūmādisvarūpamātram aparārthībhūtam
GSP28mimsvtku:7305_1: ekadeśapadāspadaṃ bhavati. na ca parasparāpekṣayaikadeśavācoyuktir upapadyate. na
GSP28mimsvtku:7305_2: hy agnyaikadeśo dhūma iti kasyacit pratipattir asti. na cāgṛhīte 'gnau tadekadeśatayā
GSP28mimsvtku:7305_3: dhūmo 'vagantuṃ śakyate. gṛhīte ca tasminn anumeyābhāvaḥ. ata ekadeśatvānupapattyaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:7305_4: tadāśrayaḥ kaścid ekadeśy avagamyata iti siddham iti || 23 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7306: nanv ākṣipyatām ekadeśaśabdābhyām ekadeśī. tad ekatvaṃ tu kuto
GSP28mimsvtku:7307: vagamyate. ataḥ kvacid eva dhūmaṃ dṛṣṭvā kvacid ekadeśyantare 'numānaṃ na
GSP28mimsvtku:7308: syāt. aikādhikaraṇyaṃ tv ekadeśayor na sidhyati, anupādānād ity ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:7309_0: sa eveti. pūrvaprakṛtam ekadeśavān iti vivakṣitaikasaṅkhyam ekadeśinaṃ pratyavamṛśati
GSP28mimsvtku:7309_1: sa eveti. sa khalv eka evaikadeśī gamyagamakarūpaḥ ubhayātmakatvāt. tasya hi tau
GSP28mimsvtku:7310: arhati. nanv ekatvaṃ naikadeśino 'nupāttaṃ labhyata ity uktam. na.
GSP28mimsvtku:7311: jñātasambandhasyety ekavacanenaivopādānāt. ekadeśini hy anyapadā(?rthaikasyai/rthe e)katvam ekavacanenopāttaṃ, pramātṛpakṣe 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:7312_1: sa eva buddhau viparivartamānas tadāśrayatvenāvagamyate nānyaḥ. tatparityāge kāraṇābhāvāt,
GSP28mimsvtku:7312_2: tathā vyutpattidarśanāc ca. yathā devadattasyaikatra kare kaṅkaṇam aṅgulīyakaṃ karāntara
GSP28mimsvtku:7312_3: iti na bhinnaḥ karāśrayo 'vagamyate. api tarhi devadatta eka
GSP28mimsvtku:7313: eva. atas siddham eka evaikadeśī gamyagamakarūpa iti || 24 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7314: {3,25} ubhayātmā san gamyagamaka ity uktam. tāv evobhayātmānau darśayati -- asiddheneti. yadi hy asāv ekadeśyasiddha eva syāt siddho vā,
GSP28mimsvtku:7315_0: tadā na dvirūpatāṃ labhate. sa tu dhūmavadādinā rūpeṇa pratyakṣasiddho 'gnimadādinā
GSP28mimsvtku:7315_1: cāsiddha iti dvyātmakatvād ubhayopapattir iti. āha -- astv arthād upātta ekadeśī.
GSP28mimsvtku:7315_2: sa caiko gamyo gamaka iti. sa tu kathaṃ pramātṛbhir upādātavya iti. na ca tadupādānaprakāraḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7315_3: kaścid bhāṣyakāreṇopāttaḥ. ataḥ punar api nyūnatvam ity ata āha -- ātta iti. tatra
GSP28mimsvtku:7316: āśrīyate, yatra viśeṣavivakṣā. na tv iha viśeṣo vivakṣitaḥ. sa hy ekadeśī
GSP28mimsvtku:7319: tam evobhayathā vyavahāraṃ darśayati -- anitya iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7321: ekadeśī gamyo gamako bhedābhedābhyām upātta iti darśitam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7322: kiyati punar anumānasya vyāpāra iti bhavati saṃśayaḥ. bhavati hi viśiṣṭārthapratītāv api viśeṣaṇamātraparyavasāyi pramāṇam. yathā śabdaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7323: sa khalv ākṛtiviśiṣṭāyāṃ vyaktau dhiyam ādadhāti, atha cānvayavyatirekābhyām ākṛtimātraparyavasāyīti niścīyate. tad ihāpi yadi
GSP28mimsvtku:7324: tadvad eva viśeṣaṇamātraparyavasāyi pramāṇam iṣyate, tatas
GSP28mimsvtku:7327_0: gocarayatītīṣyate. tatra sambandhagrahaṇābhāvād a(na)numeyatvam. na hy agnimadviśeṣeṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:7327_1: parvatādinānvito dhūmo dṛṣṭaḥ. na ca samastāgnimatsādhāraṇaṃ{3,26}sāmānyaṃ kiñcit
GSP28mimsvtku:7327_2: samasti. tadbhāve 'pi punar api siddhasādhyataiva. ata evāhuḥ --
GSP28mimsvtku:7330: ity ata āha -- ekadeśeti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- daṇḍyādiśabdavad viśiṣṭaviṣayam evānumānam. na ca sambandhagrahaṇābhāvaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7331: sakalopādhiparityāgena dhūmavanmātrasyāgnimattayā sambandhāvagamād ity uktam asmābhiḥ. asaty api sāmānye kenacid ekenopādhinānantānām api
GSP28mimsvtku:7332: bhāvānāṃ sambandho gṛhyata eva. yady api dhūmavān agnimān iti sāmānyato
GSP28mimsvtku:7333: 'vagatam, tathāpy ayam asāv iti viśeṣarūpeṇa pratyabhijñānāt
GSP28mimsvtku:7334: pramāṇaviṣayatvam apy upapannam ity uktam eveti. kasmāt punarviśeṣaṇamātraparyavasāyy eva pramāṇaṃ neṣyate, ata āha -- na hīti ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7335_0: asambhavam eva darśayati -- na dharmeti. dharmamātraṃ hi sambandhagrahaṇakāle siddham
GSP28mimsvtku:7335_1: iti bhavataivoktam iti. evam eva dharmimātrānumāne svatantrobhayānumāne vā siddhasādhyatā
GSP28mimsvtku:7336: dharmadharmyubhayeṣv evānumeyeṣu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ dūṣaṇāntarāṇy āha -- ekadeśasyeti || 29 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7337: {3,27} etad eva vivṛṇoti -- anityatvādaya iti. pakṣaikadeśo hi liṅgaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7338: bahvati. na cānityatvākhyasya dharmasya svatantrapakṣīkṛtasya kṛtakatvaṃ dharma iti katham apakṣadharmo liṅgaṃ bhaviṣyati. evaṃ dhvanimātre 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:7339: svatantre pakṣīkṛte na kṛtakatvasya tenānugamaś śakyo darśayitum. na hi yatra yatra kṛtakatvaṃ tatra tatra dhvanir iti niyamas sambhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:7340_1: ity anāgataṃ sambandhaśabdaṃ pūrvāparābhyāṃ sambandhya tantreṇa vyākhyā kartavyeti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7342_0: atha kasmād dharmadharmisambandha eva sādhyo na bhavatīty ata āha -- sambandha iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7342_1: mitāv iti sādhanavākyam apadiśati. na khalu parīkṣakas sādhanavākye sambandhavācinā
GSP28mimsvtku:7342_2: kenacin nāmnā ṣaṣṭhyā vā sambandha upādīyate. na hy evaṃ prayujyate, agniparvatayor
GSP28mimsvtku:7343: dhūmavattvād iti. nāpi parvatasyāgnir iti. deśam eva tv agnyādinā viśiṣṭam anumimānā dṛśyante. yad evaṃ prayuñjate, agnimān parvata iti. sambandho
GSP28mimsvtku:7344: 'pi nānumīyata ity atītena sambandha iti. na paraṃ pratijñāyāṃ nopādīyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:7345: udāharaṇe 'pi na tenānugamo liṅgasya nirdiśyate. na hi bhavati darśanaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7346_0: yatra yatra dhūmas tatra tatrāgnisambandha iti. bhavati tu yo yo dhūmavān sa so gnimān
GSP28mimsvtku:7346_1: iti deśa eva nidarśanaṃ, tad etad āha -- na cāpīti. iheti mitiṃ pratyavamṛśati. etad
GSP28mimsvtku:7347: sādhyatayopādīyate nāpi dṛṣṭāntatayā nirdiśyate na cāyathāpratibhāsaṃ parīkṣakāṇāṃ vaktum ucitam iti || 31 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7348: {3,28} api cāyaṃ sambandhas sādhyamānas sanmātratayā vā sādhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:7349: kenacid vā dharmeṇa viśiṣṭaḥ. na tāvad vastusattāmātram anumānasya
GSP28mimsvtku:7350: viṣayaḥ. na ca parvatādivat siddhasādhyarūpam ākāradvayaṃ sambandho
GSP28mimsvtku:7351: vahati, yenānumānasya viṣayo bhavet. tasmān na kathañcit sambandhas sādhya ity āha -- na ceti. nanv asati sambandhe viśiṣṭa eva sādhayituṃ na
GSP28mimsvtku:7352: śakyate. nāsti nāma sa prakāraḥ, yadasambandhyamāna evāgninā parvatas
GSP28mimsvtku:7353: tadviśiṣṭo bhavatīty ata āha -- tasmād iti vyāntena. na(nu) satyam asati sambandhe viśiṣṭo na bhavati, na tv etāvatā sambandhasādhyatā sidhyati,
GSP28mimsvtku:7354: viśiṣṭasādhyatvānyathānupapattyaiva tv arthagṛhītā matubarthasya sambandhasya sādhyatā na punaḥ svatantrasyeti. atraiva dṛṣṭāntam āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:7355: yatheti. daṇḍyādiśabdā hi daṇḍādiviśiṣṭam evābhidadhānās sambandham apy
GSP28mimsvtku:7356_0: arthād upādadate, na tv abhidadhati. tadvad ihāpi parvato 'gnimān iti sādhyamāne
GSP28mimsvtku:7356_1: 'rthagṛhīto 'gnisambandhaḥ, na punas sa eva sādhyate. yathā daṇḍyādiśabdato viśiṣṭārthapratītau
GSP28mimsvtku:7357: evam atrāpi viśiṣṭe sādhyamāne nuniṣpādī bhavatīty arthaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7358: idaṃ tu cintanīyam. kathaṃ daṇḍyādiśabdā viśiṣṭavacanā iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7359: matvarthīyapratyayāntā hi te. sa cāsyāsmin nāstīti sambandhe smaryate,
GSP28mimsvtku:7360: atas sambandha evātra pratyayārthaḥ. sa ca pradhānaḥ. prakṛtipratyayau pratyayārthaṃ saha brūtaḥ prādhānyena iti smṛteḥ. idaṃ hi bhedenaivobhayor
GSP28mimsvtku:7361: abhidhāne prādhānyapratipādanārthaṃ vacanam. pradhānaṃ ca śabdārthaḥ. atas sambandhavacanā eva daṇḍyādiśabdā iti yuktam. api ca nāgṛhītaviśeṣaṇā
GSP28mimsvtku:7362_0: viśeṣyate buddhir utpadyata iti viśiṣṭābhidhitsāyām avaśyam bhāvi prathamataraṃ viśeṣaṇābhidhānam
GSP28mimsvtku:7362_1: āpatati tata eva viśiṣṭāvagāhasiddher na tadyāvacchabdasyābhidhānaśaktir upakalpayituṃ{3,29}śakyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7362_2: ata evākṛtiviśiṣṭavyaktyabhidhānam ākṛtyadhikaraṇe nirākariṣyate. kiñ ca --
GSP28mimsvtku:7363: kṛttaddhitasamāseṣu sambandhābhidhānaṃ tvatalbhyām iti smarati. kathaṃ ca tābhyāṃ taddhitavṛttau sambandho 'bhidhīyate. yadi taddhitābhidheyo na
GSP28mimsvtku:7364: syāt. abhidheyaniṣkarṣe hi tayoḥ smaraṇaṃ, yasya guṇasya hi bhāvād dravye śabdaniveśaḥ, tadabhidhāne tvatalāv iti. tad yadi daṇḍapuruṣasambandho
GSP28mimsvtku:7365_0: daṇḍiśabdasyābhidheyaḥ, tathā sati tanniṣkarṣe daṇḍitvaṃ daṇḍiteti tvatalor anuśāsanam
GSP28mimsvtku:7365_1: upapadyate. yathā gośabdābhidheyaṃ sāmānyaṃ gotvam iti tv apratyayena niṣkṛṣyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7365_2: atas sambandha eva daṇḍyādiśabdānām abhidheya iti sāmprataṃ katham ucyate nāntarīyakas
GSP28mimsvtku:7366: atrābhidhīyate -- na tāvat smṛtyanusāreṇa sambandhavācyatvam adhyavasātuṃ śakyate. śabdānuśāsanamātraṃ hi tad asyāsty asminn (5.2.94)
GSP28mimsvtku:7367: iti, na punararthānuśāsanam. api ca vṛttivigrahayor anyathānyathā guṇapradhānabhāvo dṛśyate. yathā citragur iti citrābhir gobhir viśiṣṭo
GSP28mimsvtku:7368: devadattādir eva vṛttau pradhānatayāvagamyate. vigrahe tu citrā gāvo yasyeti gavām eva devadattādir viśeṣaṇatayā guṇabhūtaḥ. tāś ca pradhānam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7369: vede 'pi rathantarasāmā soma iti. tad yady api smṛtikāreṇa ta(d a)syeti
GSP28mimsvtku:7370: vigrahe sambandhaḥ pradhānatayā ṣaṣṭhyā nirdiṣṭaḥ, tathāpi gomadāditaddhitavṛttau tadvān eva pradhānaṃ bhavati, tathā pratīteḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7371: gomacchabdo hi puruṣapradhāno bhāsate na sambandhapradhānaḥ. pāṇiner api bhagavatas sambandhābhidhānadvāreṇa viśiṣṭavācyataiva pratipādayitum
GSP28mimsvtku:7372_0: abhimatā. vṛttau vigṛhyamāṇāyām avarjanīya eva ṣaṣṭhīprayogaḥ. tāvatā ca tadarthaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7372_1: pradhānatayā vācyatvena nirdiṣṭa iti bhrāntir upajāyate. ato na tāvat smṛtyanusāreṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:7373_0: yat tu prathamataraṃ viśeṣaṇam abhidheyam iti. satyam. na tv iha sambandho viśeṣaṇam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7373_1: daṇḍo hi daṇḍino viśeṣaṇaṃ na sambandhaḥ. sa ca prakṛtyā prathamam abhihita eva.
GSP28mimsvtku:7374: nirbhāgaśabdeṣu hi gavādiṣu viśiṣṭapratītāv api viśeṣaṇamātram abhidhīyata iti yuktam. tatra hy ekasyaivobhayābhidhānaśaktikalpanādoṣo bhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:7375: daṇḍyādiśabdās tu bhāgavantaḥ. teṣu bhinnābhyāṃ prakṛtipratyayābhyāṃbhinnau{3,30}viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyāv abhidhīyete iti kim
GSP28mimsvtku:7377: daṇḍiśabdenābhidhīyate. nanv asati sambandhe daṇḍo viśeṣṭum eva naraṃ na śaknoti. satyam. na tv etāvatā sambandho vācyo bhavati. na hi pṛthivyām
GSP28mimsvtku:7378: anavasthitā gāvo na tadvantaṃ viśiṃṣantīti pṛthivy apy abhidhīyata iti yuktam abhidhātum. yata eva tv asati sambandhe viśiṣṭāvagatir anupapannā,
GSP28mimsvtku:7379: ata eva sambandho 'py arthād antarbhāvyate. na tv abhidhīyate. yat tu sambandhābhidhāne tvatalor anuśāsanam asati sambandhavācyatve 'nupapannam
GSP28mimsvtku:7380: iti, tad ayuktam. na hy abhidheyaniṣkarṣe gomadādiṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:7381: bhāvapratyayānuśāsanam, api tarhi abhidheyaniṣkarṣe hi yasya guṇasya hi bhāvād iti tv abhidheyaniṣkarṣārtham eva smaraṇam. itarathā tv anenaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:7382_0: gatārthatvāt kṛttaddhitasamāseṣv ity avacanīyam āpadyeta. ataḥ prāk pratīte ekanimittasambandhiviśiṣṭe
GSP28mimsvtku:7382_2: sarvayaugikānām api caiṣaiva dig darśayitavyā. āha ca --
GSP28mimsvtku:7385: iti. ato 'numeyāntarāsambhavād viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhūtau dharmadharmiṇāv evānumānasamadhigamyāv iti || 32 -- 33 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7386_0: upasaṃharati -- viśeṣaṇeti gamyāv ityantena. sa cāyam aṅgāṅgibhāvaḥ kaiścid vikalpenāśritaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7386_1: evaṃ hi manyante. sarvathā hi dharmamātre dharmiṇi vā svatantre pramīyamāṇe siddhasādhyatādidoṣo
GSP28mimsvtku:7386_2: bhavati na viśiṣṭapramāyām. viśiṣṭatā tu kadācit kasyacid yathābhiprāyaṃ bhavatu
GSP28mimsvtku:7387: nāma, na kiñcid duṣyati. sarvathā tāvat dharmiṇa eva parvatāder agnyādidharmas taddharmeṇaiva dhūmādināvagantavyaḥ. sa tu dharmo
GSP28mimsvtku:7388: viśeṣaṇabhūto viśeṣyabhūto{3,31} vāvagantavya iti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7389: ubhayathāpi svatantrānumānābhāvād ity āha -- aṅgety avadhāryate 'ntena ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7390: atra dūṣaṇam āha -- atreti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- laukikāni hi pramāṇāni lakṣaṇakārair api yathālokam evānugantavyāni. na tu viparītam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7391: na hy agniḥ parvataviśiṣṭa iti loko budhyate. api tu parvato 'gnimān iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7392_0: tathā svayam anumānena pratipannam arthaṃ tenaiva paraṃ pratipādayanto laukikā dharmiṇā
GSP28mimsvtku:7392_1: viśiṣṭam eva hetuṃ prayuñjānā dṛśyante, yathāgnyanumāna eva dhūmavattvād agnimān
GSP28mimsvtku:7392_2: iti. tac cedam agnau deśena viśiṣṭe numīyamāne
GSP28mimsvtku:7393: nopapadyate. viśeṣaṇatayā hi parvataviśiṣṭo 'gnir iti dharmiṇy upātte
GSP28mimsvtku:7394: dhūmavattvād iti hetudharmeṇa tasya sambandho na sphuṭaṃ prakāśate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7395: dharmadharmitayāvagatasya hetutvam. na ca guṇabhāvopātto dharmī hetudharmasambandham arhati, guṇānāṃ parasparāsambandhāt. ato 'smāt
GSP28mimsvtku:7396: parārthahetuprayogaviśeṣād eva laukikānām īdṛśī pratipattir unnīyate. yat svayam api dharmaviśiṣṭam eva dharmiṇaṃ budhyate na viparītam iti || 36 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7397_0: yadi tarhi dharmiṇo hetudharmeṇa sambandho na sphuṭaḥ kena tarhi prasajyata ity ata
GSP28mimsvtku:7397_1: āha -- pradhānatvād iti. dhvaniviśiṣṭam anityatvaṃ kṛtakatvād ity ucyamāne 'nityatvākhyena
GSP28mimsvtku:7397_2: dharmeṇaiva sādhyatayā pradhānabhūtena kṛtakatvādihetus sambadhyeta na dhvaninā guṇabhūtena.
GSP28mimsvtku:7398_0: sarvasya hy ekavākyagatasya pradhānānvaya eva yuktaḥ. pradhānasambandhe ca hetor
GSP28mimsvtku:7398_1: apakṣadharmatvam. na hi kṛtakatvam{3,32}anityatvasya dharmaḥ, kiṃ tarhi dhvaneḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7398_2: ato dharmy eva dharmaviśiṣṭaḥ svayaṃ pramātṛbhir
GSP28mimsvtku:7399: avagamyate. tathaiva parasmai pratipādyata iti yuktam iti. yadi tūcyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:7400: satyaṃ pradhānatayā dharmeṇa hetos sambandho vākyād avagamyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:7401: liṅgabalīyastvena tu vākyaṃ bādhitvā dharmiṇaiva sambandhaḥ kalpayiṣyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7402: hetudharmasya hi dharmiṇaiva sambandhayogyatā na dharmeṇa, ato dharmasambandhābhāvād dharmiṇaiva sambandho bhaviṣyatīty ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:7403: tatreti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- satyam evaṃ dharmiṇā sambandhaḥ sidhyati. kiṃ tvayam eva kleśo yadvākyasvarasabhaṅgo nāma. ata evāha -- kalpyo 'sāv iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7405: dhvaneḥ kṛtakatvād iti vā punardharmyupādānena hetur
GSP28mimsvtku:7406: viśeṣaṇīyaḥ, na caivaṃ prayoktāraḥ prayuñjānā dṛśyanta ity abhiprāyeṇāha
GSP28mimsvtku:7407: -- dhvaner iti. yas tu vadati dharmiṇy api viśiṣṭe sādhye
GSP28mimsvtku:7408: 'nvayopadarśanavelāyāṃ yatra yatra kṛtakatvam ity ukte dhvanir eva pradhānatayā sambadhyeta nānityatvaṃ guṇabhūtatvād iti taṃ pratyāha --
GSP28mimsvtku:7409: anvayasyeti. anvayopadarśanakāle hi bhedenaiva dharmam upādadate. yatra yatra kṛtakatvaṃ tatra tatrānityatvam iti na tatra pradhānasambandhāśaṅkā.
GSP28mimsvtku:7410: ataḥ pratijñāvasthāyāṃ dharmaviśiṣṭe dharmiṇi sādhyamāne yo guṇabhāva
GSP28mimsvtku:7411: āsīt. nāsau dṛṣṭāntavākye duṣyati. hetus tv aviśiṣṭa eva tārkikaiḥ prayujyata ity uktam. tatrāviśeṣita eva prayukte bhavati
GSP28mimsvtku:7412_0: pradhānabhūtadharmasambandhāśaṅketi. yas tu vadati ṣaṣṭhyantena dhvaninānityatvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7412_1: viśeṣyate dhvaner anityatvam iti. evaṃ ca kṛtakatvād ity asyāvipariṇatavibhaktikena
GSP28mimsvtku:7413: dharmasambandha eva yathāvad vibhaktivipariṇāmena syāt. sa cānyāyya iti sa
GSP28mimsvtku:7415: sambandho 'py anupādānān nāmnā ṣaṣṭhy api vā mitau
GSP28mimsvtku:7416: iti. ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśe hi sambandha eva sādhyo bhavet. tasya ca sādhyatā
GSP28mimsvtku:7420: api ca agner deśaviśiṣṭatve sādhyamāne vakṣyamāṇasamastapakṣaprakārāṇām asambhavo 'pīty āha -- agner iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7421: dūṣaṇāntarasamuccaye cakāraḥ. etad iti vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇapratinirdeśa iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7422: tān eva pakṣaprakārān vaktuṃ saṃkṣipya pratijānīte -- viśiṣṭeti || 39 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7423: idānīṃ vibhajya tān eva darśayati -- yo 'gnir itītyantena.
GSP28mimsvtku:7424: nigadavyākhyāto granthaḥ. vivekas tu pakṣāṇāṃ praṇihitair avagamyata iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7425: ihacādyayor dvayoḥ pakṣayos siddhasādhyatā doṣaḥ. siddho hi kvacid agniḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7426: dṛṣṭapūrvo 'pi pūrvadeśādhikaraṇas siddha eva kiṃ tat pra(sā)dhānena.
GSP28mimsvtku:7427: pareṣu tu pañcasu pakṣeṣu pramāṇāntaravirodha ity āha -- iha tv iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7429: virodhaṃ prapañcayati -- vyāptir iti. yat tāvat yo 'gniḥ so
GSP28mimsvtku:7430: 'nena yukta ity uktaṃ tad ayuktam. na hy anena deśena sarvāgnayo vyāpyante
GSP28mimsvtku:7431: deśasyāvaibhavāt sarvāgnīnāṃ cātrāsannidhānāt, tadbhāvo hy atrābhāvena
GSP28mimsvtku:7433: {3,34} yo dṛṣṭo 'nena so 'thaveti yad uktaṃ tad dūṣayati -- nāpi
GSP28mimsvtku:7434: pūrvasyeti. dṛṣṭasyāpy agner anena deśena vyāptir na vidyata ity arthaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7435: yo 'yaṃ sa deśamātreṇety atra dūṣaṇam āha -- nāpīti deśairantena. na hy eṣa puraḥsthito vahniḥ sarvair deśair viśeṣyate sarvatra tasyābhāvād iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7436: pūrveṇa vāpy ayam ity atra virodham āha -- pūrveṇeti. pūrveṇa deśenāsyāgner viśeṣyatā nāsty eva, pūrvadeśasyātrābhāvāt, asya ca tatra.
GSP28mimsvtku:7437: pūrvānubhūtasya tv agner deśamātreṇa sambandhaḥ puraḥsthitavahneḥ sarvadeśasambandhanirākaraṇenaiva tulyanyāyatayā nirākṛta iti na pṛthagupanyasya dūṣita iti || 43 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7438_0: evaṃ saptasu pakṣeṣu nirākṛteṣv aṣṭamaḥ pakṣo 'vaśiṣyate etad deśaviśiṣṭo vā yo 'yam
GSP28mimsvtku:7438_1: agnir iti tannirākaroti -- etad iti. ayaṃ puraḥsthito 'gnir anena deśena viśiṣṭa
GSP28mimsvtku:7438_2: iti naitat sādhayituṃ śakyam. na hy apratyakṣadeśo vahnir ayam iti nirdeṣṭuṃ śakyaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7438_3: nitarāṃ viśiṣṭatayā sādhayitum. yas tu vadati smṛta eva vahnir anena viśiṣṭaḥ sādhyata
GSP28mimsvtku:7439: vaktavyaḥ. svadeśakālavartty eva smaraṇena viṣayīkṛtaḥ katham asāv anena deśena viśeṣṭuṃ śakyaḥ. tad evaṃvādinā nāpi pūrvasyety api nālocitam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7440_0: anavacchinnasmṛtāv api ca dharmo dharmiṇo viśeṣaṇam iti nedaṃ yuktisādhyam. dharmāṇāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7440_1: dharmiviśeṣaṇatayaiva sarvadāvagater ity alam aneneti. deśa eva tu pūrvāvagato viśeṣyatām
GSP28mimsvtku:7441_0: yadi cāgnir viśeṣyo bhavet tatas tasyaivāyam ādyo jñānakālo bhavet, prasiddhasyāprasiddhena
GSP28mimsvtku:7441_1: viśeṣaṇāt. iha tv ādau parvata eva jñāyate. katham asau paścāt pratyeṣyamāṇasyāgner
GSP28mimsvtku:7442: -- tajjñāneti. tadvṛttenāgniṃ nirdiśati. agner jñānakāle hi sa eva deśo
GSP28mimsvtku:7443_0: buddhaḥ, nāgniḥ, ataḥ kasya{3,35}deśo viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati. pramitaṃ hi vastvapramitena
GSP28mimsvtku:7443_1: dharmeṇa pramitsitaṃ bhavati kīdṛgdharmo 'yam iti. tathā ca deśa iti sa eva pramitsyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:7443_2: pramīyate ca, na punaragnir iti. nanu deśo 'pi pratyakṣāvagata eveti katham asāv
GSP28mimsvtku:7443_3: anumānasya viṣayo bhaviṣyatīty ata āha -- deśasyeti. svarūpamātram eva hi deśasya
GSP28mimsvtku:7444: anumānena tu pāvakādiviśiṣṭatā tasyānumīyata iti na gṛhītagrāhitvam iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7445: ato dharmy eva dharmaviśiṣṭaḥ prameyaḥ na dharmo dharmi viśiṣṭa ity āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:7447: evaṃ ca deśa evāgniviśiṣṭaḥ prameyo 'vatiṣṭhate. sa hi dharmī,
GSP28mimsvtku:7448: tadāśrayatvād agneḥ. na tv agniḥ, atadāśrayatvād deśasyety āha -- sā
GSP28mimsvtku:7449: deśasyeti. anye tu pūrvāvagatadhūmam apy agniviśiṣṭam anumānasya prameyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7450: manyante. tad api sādhv evety abhiprāyeṇāha -- dhūmasyānyaiś ca kalpiteti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7451: sā prameyateti sambandhaḥ. atra codayati -- nanv iti. viśiṣṭo 'numānasya
GSP28mimsvtku:7452: viṣaya ity uktam. nāgṛhītaviśeṣaṇanyāyena liṅgam api śabdavad viśeṣaṇamātraparyavasāyy eva yuktam. śabdo hi viśeṣaṇamātra eva vartata ity ākṛtyadhikaraṇe vakṣyata iti || 48 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7453: pariharati -- naivam iti. kāraṇam āha -- na hīti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7456: tad yāvataiva pratibaddham avagataṃ tāvaty eva pratibandhake dhiyam ādadhāti. sarvopādhiparityāgenāgnimanmātreṇa dhūmavattvaṃ pratibaddham
GSP28mimsvtku:7457: avagatam ity agnimattvam evānumāpayatīti na kaścit doṣa iti. na ca viśeṣaṇamātram anumeyaṃ siddhasādhyatvād ity uktam ity abhiprāyeṇāha
GSP28mimsvtku:7458: -{3,36}na ceti. viśeṣyo 'pi parvatādisvarūpeṇāvadhāritaḥ so 'pi nānumeya ity āha -- viśeṣya iti || 49 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7459: ato viśiṣṭatvenaiva rūpeṇājñānāt tasyaivānumeyatvam ity āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:7460: viśiṣṭatveneti. atra codayati -- nanv iti. dhūmo 'py agniviśiṣṭo 'numīyata
GSP28mimsvtku:7461: ity uktaṃ, tad ayuktam. pratijñārthaikadeśatvād iti || 50 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7462: pariharati -- naitad iti. sāmānyaviśeṣyātmā hi dhūmaḥ, tatra viśeṣātmanā pakṣīkṛtasya sāmānyātmanā hetutvam iti na pakṣaikadeśateti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7463_0: samadhigataṃ tāvadanumānasya viśiṣṭo viṣaya iti, svarūpam eva kim asyeti na jñāyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7463_1: tad yadi dhūmatajjñānādīnām anumānatvam iṣyate, tataḥ pramāṇaphalayor viṣayabhedaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7463_2: sa cāyuktaḥ. ata eva bhikṣuṇā ekam eva jñānaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7464: pramāṇaphalarūpam iti pratyakṣam uktvā tad evānumāne 'py atidiṣṭaṃ pūrvavat phalam asyeti. yadi tv anumeyajñānam eva pramāṇam iṣyate tato 'py
GSP28mimsvtku:7465: atiriktaphalābhāvaḥ. ato vaktavyam anumānasya svarūpam ity ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:7466: dhūmatajjñāneti. yat tāvat bhikṣuṇā pramāṇa(?phala)m eva phalam ity
GSP28mimsvtku:7467_0: ekaviṣayatvalābhād āśritaṃ, tat pratyakṣavad ihāpi pratiṣeddhavyam. na hi sādhyasādhanayor
GSP28mimsvtku:7467_1: abhedaṃ laukikā manyante. ko hi vṛkṣacchidayā sārdhaṃ paraśor ekatvam ātiṣṭhate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7468_0: anusandhātavyaḥ. yathā hīndriyādipramāṇapakṣe yatra phalaṃ niṣpadyate tadviṣayavyāpārāt
GSP28mimsvtku:7468_1: samānaviṣayatvam upapāditam. evam ihāpi dhūmādipramāṇapakṣe tadvyāpārād eva puroditaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7469: ato dhūmas tajjñānaṃ vā sambandhas tatsmaraṇaṃ vā pramāṇam astu,
GSP28mimsvtku:7470_0: vivakṣādhīnatvāt pramāṇaphalabhāvasyeti. yat tu buddheḥ{3,37}pramāṇa(?phala)tve phalābhāva
GSP28mimsvtku:7470_1: ity uktam. bhāṣyakāro hi buddhir eva pramāṇam iti darśayati yat kāraṇam asannikṛṣṭe
GSP28mimsvtku:7470_2: 'rthe buddhir iti vadati. na ca phalābhāvaḥ, hānāder eva phalatvāt. na ca sajātīyam
GSP28mimsvtku:7470_3: eva phalam iti rājājñā. upayogād dhi sajātīyam asajātīyaṃ vā phalaṃ bhavaty
GSP28mimsvtku:7471: eva. astu vā sajātīyam eva phalaṃ hānādibuddhiḥ phalaṃ bhaviṣyati.
GSP28mimsvtku:7473_0: yadi bhāṣyakāraḥ prameyadhiyaḥ prāmāṇyaṃ manyate, kathaṃ tarhi dhūmādipramāṇatvābhyupagamaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7473_1: ata āha -- pratyakṣeti. uktam asmābhir vivakṣādhīnaṃ pramāṇatvam iti. tad yadā dhūmādīnām
GSP28mimsvtku:7473_2: eva prakṛṣṭasādhanatvam avagamyate, tadā tad eva pramāṇam. bhāṣyakāreṇāpi buddhir
GSP28mimsvtku:7473_3: vā janma vetyādinā pratyakṣāniyamaṃ darśayatā sarvatraivāniyamas tulyayā darśita
GSP28mimsvtku:7474: eva. ato na dhūmādiprāmāṇyābhyupagame bhāṣyavirodha iti || 52 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7475: tac cedam anumānaṃ dvedhā bauddhā vibhajante svārthaṃ parārthaṃ ceti. yadāhuḥ --
GSP28mimsvtku:7478: iti. tad idaṃ dvaividhyam anupapannam ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- anumāneti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7479_1: tenaivānumānena pratipādanaṃ vāñchatā yathā pūrvam asmābhiḥ pratipāditaḥ pakṣo viśiṣṭo
GSP28mimsvtku:7480: idam atrākūtam. svayam anumānena gṛhītam arthaṃ paraṃ pratipādayituṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7481: sādhanavākyam eva prayujyate. paras tu tato vākyāt trirūpaṃ liṅgam
GSP28mimsvtku:7482: anusandhāya svayam eva sādhyaṃ vastu{3,38}budhyate, tad asya svārtham
GSP28mimsvtku:7483: evānumānam. vaktur api svayam arthaṃ pratipannavataḥ svārthānumānam eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:7484: katarad atra parārthānumānam iti na vidmaḥ. vacanaṃ parārtham iti cet. na.
GSP28mimsvtku:7485: ananumānatvāt. vacanaṃ parārtham iti tu mṛṣyāmahe. yad vadati darśanasya
GSP28mimsvtku:7486: parārthatvād iti, na tu tadanumānam, atrirūpaliṅgajanitatvād anarthadṛk ca. trirūpāl liṅgato 'rthadṛganumānam iti vas siddhāntaḥ, ataḥ kathaṃ vacanam anumānam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7487_1: upacaryate, tataḥ pratyakṣapratipannam apy arthaṃ bodhayad vacaḥ parārtham iti pratyakṣam
GSP28mimsvtku:7487_2: api parārtham āpadyeta. yadi tu svalakṣaṇaviṣayatvāt pratyakṣasya tasya cāśabdagocaratvān
GSP28mimsvtku:7488: parārtham ity ucyate. tad ayuktam. evaṃ hi pratyakṣagṛhītārthaviparītābhidhāyināṃ tadvirodhodbhāvanavacanaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7489: yujyate. yo hi pratyakṣaviruddham arthaṃ pratijānīte nāgnir uṣṇa iti, sa vacanena taṃ pratyakṣaviṣayam arthaṃ pratipādya nirākriyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7490: pratyakṣaviṣaye tu śabdāgocare tannopapadyeta, ataḥ pratyakṣaviṣayam api
GSP28mimsvtku:7491: śabdo vadatīty abhyupagantavyam. evaṃ ca pratyakṣaviṣayavacanaparārthatayā
GSP28mimsvtku:7492: kaḥ pratyakṣaparārthatāṃ vārayatīti dvaividhyānupapattiḥ. ato yathoditaḥ pakṣa eva vācya ity uktavān.
GSP28mimsvtku:7493: idaṃ tu vaktavyam -- ko 'yaṃ pakṣo nāma, tad ucyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:7494: pratijñārthaḥ pakṣaḥ. kā pratijñā. sādhyasamarpakaṃ vacanam. yadāhuḥ --
GSP28mimsvtku:7495_0: sādhyanirdeśaḥ pratijñeti. ataḥ sādhyaḥ pakṣa ity ācakṣmaha iti vācyaḥ pakṣa ity
GSP28mimsvtku:7495_1: uktam. tadvacanam idānīm upanyasyati -- tatreti. tatra pakṣe dharmiṇaṃ prathamam
GSP28mimsvtku:7496: parvataḥ so 'gnimān ity uktaṃ bhavati. idaṃ tu pakṣavacanaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7497: pratijñāparanāmānam eke nānumanyante. vadanti ca kim anenānarthakena,
GSP28mimsvtku:7498: antareṇāpi pakṣavacanam apekṣitaṃ sidhyaty eva. hetur hi sādhyasādhakaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7499: na pakṣasya vacanam. na hy ayam āgamiko 'rthaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7501: hetvabhidhānam anarthakaṃ syāt. vaktṛguṇadoṣāvadhāraṇapravaṇa eva prativādī bhavet. hetvadhīne tu nirṇaye tacchaktir eva nirūpayitum ucitā,
GSP28mimsvtku:7502: kiṃ pratijñāvacanena. hetoś ca sāmarthyaṃ sādhyānvayapradarśanenaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:7503: siddham. ato yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityaṃ śabdaś ca kṛtaka ity
GSP28mimsvtku:7504: udāharaṇopanayamātrād eva sādhyasiddher anarthikā pratijñā. hetor eva tu
GSP28mimsvtku:7505: trairūpyaṃ darśayitavyam. tac ca dṛṣṭāntadvayenopanayena ca kathyata iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7507: {3,39} yadi tu vivādam āvedayituṃ pratijñāvacanam ity ucyate. tan na.
GSP28mimsvtku:7508_0: avyāpakatvāt. yo hi manyate -- yadā khalv ayaṃ śabdo nitya iti pratijānīte tadetaro
GSP28mimsvtku:7508_1: 'nityavādī vyutthito bhavati tato jalpaḥ pravartata iti. tac ca naivam, avyāpakatvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:7509_0: asambhavāt. śiṣyaviṣayo hi saḥ. sa ca tattvam eva bodhayitavyaḥ, ato hetuśaktim eva
GSP28mimsvtku:7509_1: pratipādya tattvaṃ bodhyata iti yuktam, kiṃ vivāda ādriyate, na hi tena saha vivaditavyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7510_0: anyathāsiddheḥ. tatraitat syāt -- jalpe khalu vivādam ājihīrṣuḥ pratijñāṃ praṇayatīti,
GSP28mimsvtku:7510_1: tac ca naivam. anyathāsiddheḥ, asaty api hi pakṣavacane lakṣyata eva yathā dhvanim
GSP28mimsvtku:7510_2: anityam anuminotīti, yat kāraṇaṃ, yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityaṃ yathā ghaṭa ity uktvā kṛtakatvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7510_3: dhvaner upanayati śabdaś ca kṛtaka iti. tato jalpaḥ pravartiṣyata eva. vitaṇḍā tu
GSP28mimsvtku:7510_4: yathā tathā vāde darśite pravartata eva. na hi vaitaṇḍikasya kiñcit paranigrahād
GSP28mimsvtku:7511: sādhyam asti. yad asau pratijñāvacanena kvacid arthe sādhyamāne
GSP28mimsvtku:7512: svaviparītasiddhiṃ manvāno jātodvego vivadet. ataḥ pratijñāvacanaṃ kathātraye 'py anupayujyamānam upekṣaṇīyam ity ākṣipanti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7514: iti bhavadbhir evoktam. svayaṃ ca kutaścid dhetuviśeṣāt kiñcit kenacid
GSP28mimsvtku:7515: dharmeṇa viśiṣṭam avagatam iti parasmā api tathaiva kathyata iti yuktam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7516: asatyāṃ tu pratijñāyām anāśrayahetvādaya ākāśapatitā iva bhaveyuḥ. nanu nāyaṃ pakṣavacanapurassaram ajñāsīt sādhyam iti kathaṃ parasmai tathā
GSP28mimsvtku:7517: kathayati. maivam. yady api śabdo 'nitya iti svapratipattau noccāritaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7518_0: tathāpi savikalpakatvād asyā buddher asty evātra pramātur viśiṣṭo vikalpaḥ, uccāraṇaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7518_1: tu parārtham iti tanmātraṃ svapratipattau nāsīt. paras tu nānuccāritena śabdena pratipādayituṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7519: iti śabdoccāraṇamātram adhikam. yat tu vāde 'nupayoga ity uktam, tan na,
GSP28mimsvtku:7520: sutarām upayogāt. jalpavitaṇḍe hi vijigīṣamāṇayor dvayoḥ pravartata iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7521: paraṃ bhrāmayituṃ pratijñāvacanaṃ na prayujyeta. avivāde tu śiṣyo na vyāmohanīya iti viśadataram eva{3,40}pratijñāvacanena sādhyata iti yuktam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7522_0: na hi na śabdadāridryaṃ, yad enaṃ tattvaṃ bubhutsamānam upasannam aviśadavacanena
GSP28mimsvtku:7522_1: parikleśayāma. na caiva jalpe 'nupayoga iti. uktam idam asati hi pratijñāvacane 'nāśrayā
GSP28mimsvtku:7522_2: hetvādayo na pravarterann iti. guṇabhūtā hi te pradhānabhūtasādhyāpekṣāyāṃ sambadhyante.
GSP28mimsvtku:7523: sādhyanirdeśa upapadyate. nirdiṣṭe hi sādhye kuta ity apekṣāyāṃ hetuḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7524: sambadhyate. tataḥ katham ayam avyāpto 'sya sādhaka ity apekṣite
GSP28mimsvtku:7525: vyāptivacanam. itarathā tv aikārthyābhāvād ekavākyataiva na saṃvarteta.
GSP28mimsvtku:7526_0: tathā hi -- yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityam ity ukte kṛtakatvam anityatayā sambaddham ity
GSP28mimsvtku:7526_1: anūditam. punaś ca śabdaḥ kṛtaka iti śabdasya kṛtakatayā sambandho 'nūditaḥ. parasparasambandhe
GSP28mimsvtku:7526_2: tu na pramāṇam. asambaddham idaṃ vākyadvayam ity āśaṅkyeta, kṛtakaṃ tāvad anityaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7526_3: śabdo 'pi kṛtaka iti svarūpānuvādamātram ubhayor iti śaṅkā jāyeta, arthāntaraṃ vāpadyeta.
GSP28mimsvtku:7526_4: yathā cānityatvadharmā kṛtakas tathā śabdātmako 'pīti, tad atra sarve kṛtakāś śabdātmāna
GSP28mimsvtku:7526_5: iti sādhusampāditam āpadyeta. ataḥ pradhānavākyāvayavapratijñā yad apahnūyate tan
GSP28mimsvtku:7526_6: nāstikānām eva sarvāpalāpavādināṃ śobhate netareṣām. sā hi sarvavyavahārāṇāṃ sāraḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7528: taddhānau hīyate vādī taraṃs tām uttaro bhavet ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7529: iti sūkto vādivacanaprakāro dharmiṇam uddiśya sādhyadharmo vidhīyata iti || 53 --54 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7530: nanv evaṃ sādhyaviśiṣṭe dharmiṇi vidhīyamāne kevalasādhyānvayāvagamād dharmāntaravyudāso bhavet. tataś cānityaś śabda
GSP28mimsvtku:7531: ity ukte 'nitya evety avadhāraṇād ambaraguṇatvādayo 'pi taddharmā na bhaveyuḥ. evaṃ ca hetor api pratikṣepāt sādhyasiddhir api durlabhaiva.
GSP28mimsvtku:7532: asaty avadhāraṇe nityo 'pi syād iti neṣṭasiddhaḥ. atha katham eko nityo
GSP28mimsvtku:7533: 'nityaś cety arthāt pratipakṣapratikṣepaḥ. satyam, ata eva tannivṛttyartham avadhāraṇe kriyamāṇe itaranivṛttir api bhaved ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:7535_1: eva nirākṛtaṃ bhavati, na punaḥ dharmāntaram. yathā śuklaḥ paṭa ity ukte tadvirodhinas
GSP28mimsvtku:7536: nāvirodhināṃ sūkṣmatvādidharmāṇām iti. atra cāsannikṛṣṭe 'rtha ity ucyate tasya ko 'rthaḥ. yady anavagatapūrvam evārtham anumānaṃ gocarayatīti, tan
GSP28mimsvtku:7538: eva. anyathā niyama evāvadhārito na syāt. na cātra deśakālasambandho
GSP28mimsvtku:7539: 'dhika iti vaktavyam. dhūmasya hi deśādisambandho bhāsate nāgneḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7540: dhūmopalakṣitāśeṣadeśasambandhasya sambandhasamadhigama evāvasāyāt. ata eva kaiścit smaraṇābhimānanirāsārtham asannikṛṣṭapadaṃ vyākhyātam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7541: smaraṇaṃ hi sannikṛṣṭāvamarśollikhitam eva prāyaśo bhavati, sa iti hi tat
GSP28mimsvtku:7542: pravartate. na caivam anumānam. ato nedaṃ smaraṇam. nanv asaty api
GSP28mimsvtku:7543: tadullekhe smaraṇam utpadyata eva. yathā pramoṣe. maivam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7544: grahaṇakāraṇābhāṣād dhi tatrānubhavākārapravṛttam api jñānaṃ smṛtir ity
GSP28mimsvtku:7545_0: āsthitam. na hy asannihitarajatādyavabhāsakāraṇatvam indriyāṇāṃ prāpyakāriṇāṃ sambhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:7545_1: smṛtihetus tu prācīnānubhavaprabhāvitā bhāvanā samastīti smṛtir eva pramuṣitatadavamarśā
GSP28mimsvtku:7545_2: sety āśritam. idaṃ tu pratyutpannaliṅgādikāraṇabalād utpadyamānaṃ laiṅgikajñānam
GSP28mimsvtku:7546: anubhavākārapravṛttaṃ na tadbhāvād uttārayituṃ śakyam. anubhūtiś ca naḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7547: pramāṇam. ataḥ pramāṇam anumānam ity ākhyāyate. yady evam astu tarhīdam evāsannikṛṣṭapadasya prayojanam. na. phalābhāvenāprāmāṇyaprasaṅgāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:7548: adhikaparicchedaphalaṃ pramāṇaṃ bhavati. paricchedamātrasya tu phalatve
GSP28mimsvtku:7549_0: smṛtāv api prasaṅgaḥ. sāpi hi svagocaraparicchedātmikaiva jāyate. syān matam -- anapekṣaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7549_1: hi naḥ pramāṇam. apekṣate ca smaraṇaṃ grahaṇam. ato na pramāṇam iti. tan na. laiṅgike
GSP28mimsvtku:7550: ekadeśadarśanādisāpekṣam eva. svaviṣayagrahaṇāpekṣaṃ smaraṇaṃ nedam iti cen na. ihāpi tadapekṣaṇāt. laiṅgikam api hi prācīnāgnijñānasāpekṣam eva.
GSP28mimsvtku:7551: na hy anavagatāgner aviditasambandhasyāgnir atreti matirāvir asti. na ca grahaṇaṃ pramāṇam eveti rājājñā. bhrāntāv api prasaṅgāt. viparītāvagraho
GSP28mimsvtku:7552: 'pi grahaṇam eva. na ca pramāṇam. na cāsau nāstīti
GSP28mimsvtku:7553: yathārthāyathārthajñānavibhāgaṃ vyācakṣāṇair asmābhir uktam eva. api ca arthe 'nupalabdha iti sūtrayatā sūtrakāreṇa{3,42}sarvam
GSP28mimsvtku:7554: anupalabdhārthaviṣayam eva pramāṇam iti sūtritam. etad api tadvyākhyānāvasare varṇitam eva. ato vyākhyeyam asannikṛṣṭārthagrahaṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:7555_0: ata āha -- asannikṛṣṭeti. asyārthaḥ -- dvedhā hi sannikṛṣṭaṃ bhavati tadrūpapramitaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7555_1: viparītanirūpitaṃ vā. tadubhayajihāsayeyam asannikṛṣṭavāg iti. kiṃ punas tannirākaraṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:7555_2: ata āha -- pramitasyeti. vyavahārārthaṃ hy apramitaparicchedāya pramāṇam apekṣyate
GSP28mimsvtku:7555_3: na vyasanena. sa ca sakṛtpramāṇavyāpārād eva siddha iti na pramāṇāntarāpekṣeti ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7556: kiṃ punaḥ pramitasya pramāṇāntarāpekṣā na jāyeta. ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:7557: tādrūpyeṇeti. varṇitam idaṃ - dvedhā hi pramitaṃ bhavati tādrūpyeṇa vaiparītyeneti. tatra tāvat tādrūpyaparicchede na paraṃ pramāṇaṃ phalavat.
GSP28mimsvtku:7558_0: pūrvaparicchedād eva tadarthasiddheḥ. vaiparītyaparicchede tu pramāṇāntaram anavakāśam
GSP28mimsvtku:7558_1: eveti tadubhayanirākaraṇārtham asannikṛṣṭagrahaṇam arthavat. nanv evam apramāṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:7558_2: evānumānaṃ sannikṛṣṭaviṣayatvād ity uktam eva. na. adhikāraviṣayatvāt. yady api pūrvāvagato
GSP28mimsvtku:7558_3: dharmaḥ smṛtiviṣayaḥ. dharmī ca girir anubhavasiddhaḥ, tathāpi viśiṣṭam anumānena
GSP28mimsvtku:7558_4: viṣayīkriyata iti varṇitam asakṛt. nanv agniviśiṣṭo 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:7559: sambandhasamaya eva saṃviditaḥ. evaṃ hy anena vyāptigrahaṇakāle 'vagataṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7560: dhūmavanmātram agnimad iti. tad asya dhūmavanmātra evāpekṣā. vidite tu tasminn agnimattā pramitapūrvaivānubhūyate. satyam. kin tu dhūmavān
GSP28mimsvtku:7562_0: pratyabhijñānaṃ cedaṃ pramāṇam eva pratyakṣapratyabhijñānavat. pūrvaṃ hi dhūmavattvopalakṣitena
GSP28mimsvtku:7562_1: rūpeṇāgnimattayā deśo nirjñātaḥ. sampratyayam asāv agnimān iti viśeṣato 'numānena
GSP28mimsvtku:7563_0: avaśyaṃ caivam abhyupagantavyam, anyathā katham agnimān iti viditvā vyavahārāya ghaṭate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7563_1: eṣa hi paktukāmo 'gnimattām anumāyāgnaye dhāvatīti paśyāmaḥ.{3,43}tat kasya hetoḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7564_0: avāgamat khalv ayaṃ dhūmavān agnimān iti, na cāgnaye dhāvatīti. katham anāśrayapratipanne
GSP28mimsvtku:7564_1: 'gnau vyavaharatīti cet. na. prāg api dhūmavadāśrayatvenāvagamāt. parvatamadhunā
GSP28mimsvtku:7566_0: tad ayam agnimattayā bodha eva pūrvabodhād vilakṣaṇo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ. yat kṛto vyavahāraviśeṣa
GSP28mimsvtku:7566_1: ity agṛhītaviṣayatvād anumānaṃ pramāṇam iti vaktavyam. tad idam asannikṛṣṭagrahaṇenoktam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7567: asya prayojanam āhuḥ, teṣāṃ bādhitaviṣayam apy anumānam āpadyeta. na hi tannirākaraṇam avayavāntareṇa lakṣaṇagranthe kṛtam upalabhyate. ato
GSP28mimsvtku:7570_0: vaiparītyaparicchinne param anavakāśam ity uktam. tatra kāraṇam āha -- mūla iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7570_1: vyāptismaraṇādi hy anumānasya mūlam, tad yāvad uttaraṃ tattadvyāpāravyagratayā vilambate
GSP28mimsvtku:7570_2: tāvacchīghrabhāvinā pūrveṇa viṣayāpahārād viprakṛṣṭasādhanasyotpattir eva nirudhyata
GSP28mimsvtku:7570_3: ity anantaram eva vakṣyata iti. kathaṃ punar anumānaṃ bādhyate. tad api hi pramāṇaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7570_4: kathaṃ pramāṇāntareṇa bādhituṃ śakyate. bādhe vā na kvacid āśvāso bhavet. ābhāso
GSP28mimsvtku:7570_5: bādhyata iti cet, katham ābhāsatvam. yadi bādhād evetarāśrayaṃ tarhy astu vā jyeṣṭhapramāṇena
GSP28mimsvtku:7570_6: pratyakṣeṇānumānabādhaḥ. na tu tato 'pi jaghanyair aparair bādhyate, tat kasya hetoḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7571_0: ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- na pramāṇaṃ nāma kvacit bādhyate. avadhāraṇātmakaṃ hy evaitad
GSP28mimsvtku:7571_1: iti jñānaṃ pramāṇam. tad yatra kasyacid arthasya kenacid ātmanāvadhāraṇaṃ bhavati
GSP28mimsvtku:7572: bādho 'bhidhīyeta. taddvividho hi bādhaḥ prāptabādhaś cāprāptabādhaś ceti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7573: prāptabādho hi yathā -- śuktikārajatajñāne. tatra hi pūrvopamardanenaivottaram{3,44}ātmānaṃ labhata iti tat tasya bādhakam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7574: uttaraṃ ca deśādibhede 'py abādhitaṃ svabhāvataś ca pramāṇaṃ pūrvam ābhāsīkaroti. tad evaṃ prāptabādhe tāvad yenottareṇārtho 'vadhāritaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7575: trividham apy aprāmāṇyam avadhāritapadena vyudasyati. na hy ajñātas
GSP28mimsvtku:7576: sandigdho viparyasto vārtho 'vadhārito bhavatīti trividham apy aprāmāṇyaṃ yasya nāstīty uktaṃ bhavati. tad evamātmanā jñānena pūrvam ābhāsīkṛtam iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7577: tatrābhāsa eva bādhyata iti nātiprasaṅgaḥ. aprāptabādhe tu yāvat
GSP28mimsvtku:7578_0: kliṣṭasādhanam anumānaṃ svagocare sāmānyaśāstraṃ vā kvacid viśeṣaviṣaye pravartitum
GSP28mimsvtku:7578_1: ārabhate tāvat pratyakṣeṇānumānena vā siddhasarvāṅgakenāgamena vā viśeṣaviṣayeṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:7579: śīghrabhāvinā pramāṇena niruddhamukham utpattum arhati. tad evamaprāptabādhe param anutpannam eva prāptisambhāvanayā tu bādhyata ity
GSP28mimsvtku:7580: ucyate śruty eva liṅgam iti na kvacit pramāṇabādhaḥ. yat tu jaghanyena
GSP28mimsvtku:7581: mukhyabādho na yukta iti. tan na. na hi pratyakṣādīnāṃ viniyogapramāṇānām iva pāradaurbalyaniyamaḥ. yad eva tu śīghrabhāvi pūrvopamardena vātmānaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7582: labhate tad eva bādhakam abhidadhmahe. itarac ca bādhyam ata eva tenaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:7583_0: tasya bādhaṃ brūmaḥ. prāptabādha iva pratyakṣasya tenaivānumānena ca siddhāṅgakena
GSP28mimsvtku:7583_1: sādhyāṅgakasya viśeṣaśāstreṇa sāmānyaśāstrasya. atas sarvapramāṇāviruddham eva pakṣam
GSP28mimsvtku:7585_0: tad idam avadhāritapadenoktam iti. nanu ca balavatāpi nāvaśyaṃ durbalaṃ bādhyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7585_1: asati hi sambhave bādhas sambhavati. ato viṣayavyavasthāyā vikalpena samuccayena
GSP28mimsvtku:7586: ata āha -- vikalpāder iti. nātroktā vikalpādayas sambhavanti. na tāvatparasparaviruddhaṃ rūpadvayam ekatra samuccīyate. na hi śrāvaṇo
GSP28mimsvtku:7587: 'śrāvaṇaś ca nityo 'nityaś ceti sambhavati. na ca vikalpaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7588_0: vidhiniṣedhaviṣayatvāt tasya siddhe vastuny asambhavāt. na ca viṣayavyavasthā, varṇātmanām
GSP28mimsvtku:7588_1: eva nityānityatvasādhanāt. ato 'sambhavād eva bādham abhidadhmaha iti. evam upapādito
GSP28mimsvtku:7589: tatra pratyakṣabādham eva tāvad darśayati agrāhyateti. imaṃ tu pratyakṣabādhaṃ na budhyāmahe. svagocaraviparītārthaṃ hi pramāṇaṃ{3,45}
GSP28mimsvtku:7590: pratyakṣeṇa bādhyata iti yuktam. na ca grāhyatā pratyakṣaviṣayā grāhyagrahaṇasambandhaviṣayatvāt talaḥ. tasya ca pratyakṣāgocaratvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:7591: śabdo hi pratyakṣaḥ na grāhyatā. ata eva hy aśrāvaṇatāpakṣo 'pi na pratyakṣeṇa virudhyata iti vakṣyate. atrocyate. satyam, nendriyaviṣayo
GSP28mimsvtku:7592: grāhyatā, grāhyas tu tadviṣayaḥ. tad iha grāhyāpalāpasyaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:7593: pratyakṣavirodho darśitaḥ. nirālambanānumānasyeti yāvat. pratyayas tv agrāhyapadād upapannas tasyaivābhāvam abhidhatte. kaś ca grāhyasya bhāvo
GSP28mimsvtku:7594: 'nyad ato bhāvāt. iyaṃ hi śaśaviṣāṇasyāgrāhyatā yan na bhavati. tadabhāvād eva tatrāgrāhyatābhidhānapratyayau. tad anena prakāreṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:7595: śabdābhāvapakṣasyaiva pratyakṣavirodha upadiṣṭa iti na kiñcid anupapannam iti || 58 -- 59
GSP28mimsvtku:7596: anumānavirodhodāharaṇam āha -- teṣām iti. teṣām eva śabdādīnām
GSP28mimsvtku:7597_0: aśrāvaṇatvādyanumānaviruddhaṃ yo hy aśrāvaṇam anityaṃ vā śabdaṃ pakṣam icchati tasyāsau
GSP28mimsvtku:7597_1: śīghrabhāvinā viparyayānumānena bādhyata iti. idaṃ tu pratyakṣavirodham anye manyante.
GSP28mimsvtku:7597_2: tān nirākaroti -- na hīti. śabdo hi pratyakṣaḥ na tacchrāvaṇatā grāhyagrāhakasambandho
GSP28mimsvtku:7597_3: hi śabdasya śrāvaṇasya ca tvatalbhyām ucyate. kṛttaddhitasamāseṣu sambandhābhidhānaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7598: iti smṛteḥ. sa ca na pratyakṣeṇa samadhigamyaḥ. api ca atīndriyaṃ śrotraṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7599: kathaṃ tatsambandhaś śabdasya pratyakṣo bhaviṣyati. na hy aindriyānaindriyādhāras sambandhaḥ pratyakṣo bhavati vāyuvanaspatyor iva.
GSP28mimsvtku:7601_0: kiṃpramāṇikā tarhi śrāvaṇatā. ata āha -- seti. abadhirādiṣu śabdopalabdher badhirādiṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:7601_1: cānupalabdher anvayavyatirekau dṛśyete. tathā hi śrotropaghātamātreṇa cakṣurādimato
GSP28mimsvtku:7602: śrotre ca dṛḍhe cakṣurādiṣv asambhave 'pi śabdagrahaṇaṃ dṛṣṭam, ata ābhyām anvayavyatirekābhyām idaṃ śrāvaṇatvaṃ gamyata iti. nanv evaṃ katham
GSP28mimsvtku:7603: anumānavirodhaḥ, na hy{3,46}anvayavyatirekāv anumānam, tatprabhavas tu mānasaḥśrāvaṇatvavikalpaḥ, ato mānasapratyakṣa evāyam iti kaścit bhrāmyati
GSP28mimsvtku:7604: sa vaktavyaḥ. na bahirviṣayabodhe manaḥ svatantram iti varṇitam asakṛt.
GSP28mimsvtku:7605: yad yadīyanvayavyatirekāv anuvidhatte tattatkāraṇakam iti sarvakāryeṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:7606: samadhigatam, anuvidhatte ca śabdajñānaṃ śravaṇam iti tattatkāraṇakam iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7607_0: idam eva ca śabdasya śrāvaṇatvam. yat tu jñānasya śravaṇajanyatvam ato 'numānam evedam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7607_1: nanv anyatrāpy anvayavyatirekānuvidhāyinaḥ kathaṃ tatkāraṇakatvam avagantavyam, yan
GSP28mimsvtku:7608_0: śrūyatām. paśyāmo hi vayaṃ kumbhakāravyāpārānantaraṃ kumbhasambhavam udīkṣamāṇāḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7608_1: kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ cakṣuṣaiva. idaṃ hi kumbhasya tatkāryatvaṃ yā tadanantarasambhūtiḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7608_2: sa ca kumbhas tatsambhavaś cobhayaṃ cākṣuṣam
GSP28mimsvtku:7609: eveti kim atra manasā. ato yad yasmin sati bhavati, asati ca na bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:7610: tattatkāraṇakam iti pratyakṣato viditavyāpter anumānam upapannam eva. evaṃ ca prayogaḥ -- śravaṇapramāṇaprakāśyaś śabdaḥ tasmin saty
GSP28mimsvtku:7611: evopalabhyamānatvāt. yad evaṃ tattatprakāśyaṃ santamasa iva ghaṭaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7612: pradīpaprakāśya iti. idaṃ ca pratyakṣapūrvakārthāpattipūrvakam anumānaṃ tayā śrāvaṇatvasiddheḥ. idaṃ ca siddhasarvāṃgatvād aśrāvaṇatvānumānād
GSP28mimsvtku:7613: balavat. yāvad dhi guṇatvasyāśrāvaṇatvena vyāptir grahītum iṣyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:7614_1: eva nirudhyate. evam evānityatvānumānam api. yat kṛtakatvādihetukaṃ tad apy asiddhivyabhicārādidoṣān
GSP28mimsvtku:7614_2: na śīghram upajāyata iti siddhāvayavaiś śīghrajanmabhir nityatvānumānair bādhyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7614_3: yathā deśakālādibhinnā gośabdabuddhayas samānaviṣayāḥ gaur ity utpadyamānatvāt sampratyutpannagośabdabuddhivad
GSP28mimsvtku:7617: pratijñāvirodhādayo hi śabdavirodhatayā prasiddhā iti te tathābhidhīyante.
GSP28mimsvtku:7618: na tv ete śabdavirodhāḥ. yatra hi kvacid arthe pratiṣṭhitena śabdena
GSP28mimsvtku:7619: pratijñāntaraṃ bādhyate, tatra śabdavirodho bhavati. na ca svavāgvirodhe
GSP28mimsvtku:7620: śabdasya kvacid arthe pratiṣṭhāsti vyāhatābhidhānāt. pūrvasañjalpavirodhe
GSP28mimsvtku:7621: 'pi pūrvāparanyāyabalābalānusāry eva nirṇaya{3,47} iti na śabdavirodhaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7622: na hi tatra śabdapramāṇato 'rthaḥ nyāyagamyatvāt. loka prasiddhis tu na śabdo na pramāṇāntaram. api atu pratyakṣādyantargataiveti
GSP28mimsvtku:7624_0: 'ntarbhāvayitum ucitā. na hy acandraś śaśīti pakṣaś śabdena virudhyate. na hi candraśabdaś
GSP28mimsvtku:7624_1: śāṅkayos sambandhaṃ śabdo vadati yenātadvācyapakṣasya śabdavirodho bhavati sambandhavācyatve
GSP28mimsvtku:7624_2: hītaretarāśrayaṃ bhavet. abhidhānāt sambandhaḥ sambandhāc cābhidhānam iti. tasmān
GSP28mimsvtku:7625_1: prasiddhā iti tantrāntaraprasiddhivibhāgas tridhā śabdavirodha ity ucyate. paramārthena
GSP28mimsvtku:7625_2: tu vedārthavacanaviparītārthapratijñaiva śabdena virudhyate. tatra hi pratiṣṭhitaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7625_3: śabdasya prāmāṇyaṃ śaknoti viparītapratijño vārayitum. tac cānantaram ihaiva vakṣyāma
GSP28mimsvtku:7626: tān eva trīn prakārān darśayati -- pratijñeti. tatra pratijñāvirodha evaikas tridhā bhidyata ity āha -- yāvad iti sārdhena.
GSP28mimsvtku:7627: ayam arthaḥ -- pratijñāvirodho hi svavāgvirodhaḥ. sa ca tredhā bhidyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7628: uccāraṇadharmadharmibhedāt. yāvajjīvam ahaṃ maunīti pakṣaḥ pratijñayaiva bādhyate. na hy anuktā satī pratijñā bhavati. uktimātreṇa ca maunaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7629: bādhyate. ataḥ pratijñāśarīrāntargatenoktimātreṇa bādhād bhavati pratijñayā bādhaḥ. sarvavākyamṛṣātvapakṣas tu dharmoktyā bādhyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7630: sarvamṛṣātve hi pratijñāvacanam api mṛṣeti netaranmṛṣā bhavet. tadamṛṣātve vā na sarvamithyātvam. tad iha pratijñāntargatadharmasaṃsargāsambhavaparāmarśāt pakṣabādha iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7631_0: dharmoktivirodhābhidhānam. pūrvatra tv aviśiṣṭamuktimātram eva maunaṃ bādhate ity
GSP28mimsvtku:7631_1: uktimātreṇety uktam. ātmabādhanam iti. dharmabādhanam ity arthaḥ. dharma evāyukta
GSP28mimsvtku:7631_2: ātmānaṃ bādhata iti yāvat. vandhyā me jananīti
GSP28mimsvtku:7632: pakṣo dharmyuktyā bādhyate. jananītve hy uddiṣṭamātre na{3,48}vandhyātvam
GSP28mimsvtku:7633: āspadaṃ labhate. na ca gauṇo jananīśabda ity api vaktavyam. ahaṃ yato jāta
GSP28mimsvtku:7634: iti viśeṣaṇāt. evaṃ viśeṣite pakṣe dharmyuktivirodha ity uktaṃ bhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:7635: etac cābhyupagamavādenoktam. na tu śrutismṛtyatirekīṇi jalpākavacanāni gauṇatvādibhis samīkartuṃ śakyante. sarvadūṣaṇocchedaprasaṅgāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:7636: pramādājñānajāny eva hi dūṣaṇāni bhavanti. teṣu kathañcit samādhīyamāneṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:7637: na kiñcid dūṣaṇaṃ nāma bhaved iti || 62 -- 63 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7638_0: pūrvasañjalpavirodham udāharati bauddhasyeti. anityaś śabda iti bauddhenokte kathaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7638_1: kṣaṇikād agṛhītasambandhād arthapratyaya ity anuyuktena tenaiva yadā punar ucyate
GSP28mimsvtku:7640_0: bādhyabādhakabhāvaḥ, tathāpy evaṃvidhā pūrvāparaviruddhā pratijñaivātmānaṃ na labhata
GSP28mimsvtku:7640_1: iti na nyāyāvatāram apekṣate. sambhāvito hi pratijñāyām artho nyāyena sādhyate. asambhāvite
GSP28mimsvtku:7641: ataś śabdavirodha evainam antarbhāvayati. śabdasandarbha eva hi tādṛśaḥ pūrvāparaviruddhaḥ pakṣaṃ vināśayatīti teṣām abhiprāya iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7642_1: śabdasaṃsargaḥ svarasād eva bhajyate na pramāṇaṃ yāvadapekṣata iti śabdabādha udāhṛta
GSP28mimsvtku:7643: upamānavirodhodāharaṇam āha -- jñāteti. yena hi nagare
GSP28mimsvtku:7644_0: gavākāro dṛṣṭaḥ samprati cāraṇye gavayākāraḥ, taṃ prati gaur gavayasadṛśo na bhavatīti
GSP28mimsvtku:7644_1: pakṣa upamānena virudhyata iti.{3,49}parokṣe gavi sādṛśyam upameyam. pratyakṣe tu
GSP28mimsvtku:7644_2: pratyakṣam eva. ata eva jñātagogavayākāram iti kramo vivakṣita iti || 65 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7645: arthāpattivirodham idānīṃ vivakṣan bhāṣyakārānusāreṇābhāvapūrvikāyās tāvadudāharaṇam āha -- geheti || 66 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7646: pratyakṣapūrvikām udāharati -- agnāv iti. adāhaka iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7647_0: atacchaktiyukta ity arthaḥ. anumānapūrvikām udāharati -- śabde cānabhidhāyaka iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7647_1: śabdaśravaṇānantaram arthapratītiṃ ceṣṭayānumāya tatra śabdaḥ kāraṇam ity unnīyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7648: abhidhābhidhāno vyāpāraḥ, tadanupapattyā cārthāpattyā tacchaktisiddhir iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7649_0: tathendriyāpalāpapakṣo 'pi pratyakṣapūrvikayārthāpattyā virudhyata ity āha -- śrotreti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7650: punastadvirodho 'bhihitaḥ. atraivādiśabdenopamānapūrvikayā virodho darśayitavyaḥ -- yathā gavayopamitāyā gos tajjñānagrāhyaśaktyapahnava iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7652: arthābhidhānānyathānupapattyā hi vācakaśaktim arthāpattyā pramāya punastadanupapattyārthāpattyantareṇa śabdanityatvam avagamyata iti || 67
GSP28mimsvtku:7654_0: iti. kiṃ punar arthāpattiḥ prapañcenodāhriyate, tadvirodhapratipādanaṃ hi yayākayācid
GSP28mimsvtku:7654_1: ekayāpi sidhyaty eva. tathā ca pramāṇāntaravirodheṣu prapañco na darśitaḥ. arthāpattivad
GSP28mimsvtku:7655: satyam. ṣoḍhā bhinnair eva ṣaḍbhir atra virodho vārtikakārasya vivakṣitaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7656_0: tatpradarśanārtham eva ṣaṭpramāṇaprasūtārthāpattir udāhṛtā. tenaiva tu mārgeṇa pramāṇāntareṣv
GSP28mimsvtku:7656_1: api prapañco darśayitavyaḥ.{3,50}yathā tāvat pratyakṣabādha evānubhūtismṛtyanumānādibhiḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7657_0: svedyamānasya vādino 'nuṣṇo vahnir iti pratijñā anubhavasthenaiva pratyakṣeṇa virudhyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7657_1: anāsannāgnes tu saiva pratijñā smṛtisthena pratyakṣeṇa virudhyate, yadā khalv ayaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7657_2: vādakāle 'nuṣṇo vahnir iti pratijānāti tadainam itaraḥ smārayati kiṃ na smarasi pūrvānubhūtam
GSP28mimsvtku:7658: uṣṇatvaṃ yad evam āttheti, sa tat smṛtvā tataḥ pratyakṣānnivartata iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7660: anumitapratyakṣabādhas tu yatrāptamukhe ceṣṭāviśeṣādarśanena tadavagatatiktādir asanivāraṇaṃ pratijñāyate, mukhavairūpyeṇa hi tasya
GSP28mimsvtku:7662_0: śrutapratyakṣabādhas tu yatra kenacid arthe kasmiṃścid apahnute sākṣibhir dṛṣṭo 'yam
GSP28mimsvtku:7662_1: artha iti sākṣipratyakṣeṇa bādho 'bhidhīyate. na caiṣa śabdabādhaḥ. na hy atra tair
GSP28mimsvtku:7663: atas taddarśanānusāry eva nirṇayaḥ. darśanaṃ tu taiḥ svaśabdena pratyāyyata iti śabdāvagatapratyakṣavirodha
GSP28mimsvtku:7664: upamānaṃ tu pramāṇāntaraprasiddhavastusādṛśyamātraviṣayam ity anyatas siddhasya sādṛśyaṃ gocarayati. yathā dātrādipratyabhijñāyāṃ yādṛśī
GSP28mimsvtku:7665: svātmani ceṣṭā dṛṣṭā tāṃ paratrāpi dṛṣṭvopaminoti mamevāsyāpi dātrādipratyabhijñā pratyakṣam utpannā, katham anyathā pūrvedyur
GSP28mimsvtku:7666_0: ardhakṛtakarmasamāpane paredyuḥ pravartate. iha ca ceṣṭayā tadanurūpaṃ paragocaram
GSP28mimsvtku:7666_1: anumāya svajñānasādṛśyaṃ tatropamīyate. yady api cātrānumānāvagatapratyakṣabādha
GSP28mimsvtku:7666_2: eva śakyo darśayitum, tathāpi svajñānasādṛśyaparicchede śakyaṃ darśayitum iti tadavagatapratyakṣabādho
GSP28mimsvtku:7668: arthāpattyavagatapratyakṣabādhas tv evaṃ darśayitavyaḥ. yadā hi bahuṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:7669: gacchatsu toyārthiṣu taṭākam ekas tadāharaṇāya prasthito vilambate tadā tadvilambanānyathānupapattyā tadīyaṃ toyapratyakṣam arthāpattyā pramīyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7671: bādhyate. abhāvena tu bhāvarūpaṃ pratyakṣaṃ nāvagamyata iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7673: tadviparītapakṣo 'numitānumānena bādhyate. yatra tu devasya tveti
GSP28mimsvtku:7674: nirvapati{3,51}iti pratītaviniyogān mantraśeṣe 'numite tadviparītaḥ pakṣo gṛhyate, tatrāgamānumānabādhaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7675: nitye tu karmaṇi pravṛtte vrīhīṇām apacāre tatsadṛśeṣu nīvāreṣūpamiteṣu vrīhibhir yajeteti codanā nīvāraviṣayatvenānumīyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7676: vrīhyavayavā hi tadviṣayatayā jñātasambandhāstām anumāpayanti. na hi tasyāḥ svarūpeṇa vrīhayo viṣayabhūtāḥ, tadavayavās tu cūrṇībhūtā
GSP28mimsvtku:7677: vrīhiśāstrārthaḥ. te ca nīvāreṣv api santīti vrīhyavayavasāmānyopamitanīvāragāminī vrīhicodanānumīyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7682: pratyakṣaśabdabādhas tu tridhā darśita eva. anyo 'pi śrutismṛtibhyāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7684_0: kartṛsāmānyānumitaśabdaviruddhaḥ smṛtyadhikaraṇe darśitaḥ. śakyaṃ hy aṣṭakādayaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7684_1: śabdamūlāḥ śāstrasthāryāvartanivāsikartṛkatvād agnihotrādivad ity anumātum. āgamikaśabdabādhas
GSP28mimsvtku:7684_2: tu yatra śākhāntaragataśrutiviṣayavivāde smṛtinibandhanakārāṇāṃ vacanena śrutisadbhāvo
GSP28mimsvtku:7684_3: niścīyate, tatra hy āptāgamāvagatanityāgamavirodho viparītapakṣasya sambhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:7685: upamitaśabdavirodhas tu manvādismṛtibhyo 'rthāpattyā vaidikaṃ kim api
GSP28mimsvtku:7686_0: mūlam astīti kalpite smārtavākyasadṛśa eva mūla upamite rthavādamūlatvapakṣa upamitaśabdena
GSP28mimsvtku:7686_2: tu śabdabhāvo 'vagantuṃ na śakyata iti śabdeyat tāvadhāraṇe tasya vyāpāraḥ tatrābhāvāvadhāritavidhikārtsyne
GSP28mimsvtku:7687: bādhyate. yathā vakṣyati -- kṛtsnavidhānād apūrvas soma iti. vrīhyabhāve tu nīvārāṇām agrāhyatāpakṣaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7688_0: anumānapūrvakopamānabādhas tu yadā hy ādityasya deśāntaraprāptyā gatim anumāya saṃvatsarādimadhyānteṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:7688_1: tasyās sādṛśyam upamīyate. yādṛśy ekatra saṃvatsarādau tanmadhye vānte vā sūryagatiḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7690: iti tu pakṣaś śabdapūrvakopamānaviruddhaḥ. sāmapūtīkayor hi sādṛśyaṃ na
GSP28mimsvtku:7691_0: pratyakṣam. na{3,52}cānumeyam. śabdenaiva tu somāṃśujātatvaṃ pūtīkānāṃ pratipādayatā
GSP28mimsvtku:7691_1: kāryakāraṇayor aucityena sārūpyaṃ pratipāditam iti śabdāvagatakāryakāraṇaprabhavatvāt
GSP28mimsvtku:7692: satrāhīneṣu na bhavantīti pakṣa upamānopamānena bādhyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7693_0: jyotiṣṭomopamānena hi te dvādaśāhaṃ gacchanti dvādaśāhopamānena ca satrāhīnāv iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7693_1: yadā tv ātmendriyasādṛśyaviśiṣṭāni parendriyāṇy upamīyante tatra tanniṣedho 'rthāpattyupamānena
GSP28mimsvtku:7693_2: bādhyate. vedakāranāstitā śaśaśṛṅgādyabhāvasadṛśī na bhavatīti pakṣo 'bhāvapūrvakopamānena
GSP28mimsvtku:7694: dvayor apy abhāvenābhāve 'vagate sādṛśyam upamīyate. arthāpattivirodhas tu ṣaḍvidho varṇita eva. abhāvavirodhaṃ tv anantaram eva vakṣyāmaḥ || 68 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7695: abhāvavirodham idānīm udāharati -- śaśaśṛṅgādīti. ayaṃ ca pratyakṣābhāvavirodhaḥ. yadā tv amuṃ rāśiṃ sūryo gato na veti cintyamāne
GSP28mimsvtku:7696: gaṇitakuśalena gaṇitānumānābhāvān na gata ity avagate bhrānto gata iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7697: vadati. tatrānumānābhāvavirodhaḥ. caityavandanādidharmatvapakṣas tu śrutyādyāgamābhāvaviruddhaḥ. pūrvavanto darvīhomā iti tūpamānābhāvena
GSP28mimsvtku:7698: virudhyate, na hi teṣāṃ kenacit karmaṇā sādṛśyaṃ kathañcid avagamyata iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7699_0: palālakūṭakuñjarayos tu sādṛśyāstitāpakṣa upamānābhāvena virudhyate. tathā śabde
GSP28mimsvtku:7699_1: śrotradeśam anāgacchati śrotre ca śabdadeśaṃ dhvanyāgamanamātreṇaiva śabdaśravaṇopapatter
