GSP28mimsvtku:7699_2: yo 'rthāpatyā śabdaś śabdāntaram ārabhate tataḥ krameṇāntyaḥ śrotreṇa gṛhyate ity
GSP28mimsvtku:7699_3: anyathānupapattyā pratijānāti tatpratijñā arthāpattyabhāvena bādhyate. abhāvābhāvas
GSP28mimsvtku:7700: darśayitavyaḥ -- yadā hi kartrabhāvena vedānāṃ doṣābhāvo vagato bhavati tadā doṣavatpakṣasyābhāvābhāvena bādha iti || 69 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7702_2: iti sārdhena. śrutyarthākṣiptayor iti. svarūpaṃ tāvat sarvatra śrutyartha eva. tadviśeṣo
GSP28mimsvtku:7702_3: 'py arthākṣiptaḥ. dharmadharmiṇor hi svarūpaṃ yena viśeṣeṇa vyāptaṃ tam ākṣipati.
GSP28mimsvtku:7703: vakṣyata iti. śrutyarthaś cākṣiptaś ceti vigraha iti || 70 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7704: tatra dharmasvarūpabādho varṇita eveti tam akṛtvaiva tadviśeṣaṇabādham udāharati -- tṛṇādīti. yo hi tṛṇādivikāradarśanād
GSP28mimsvtku:7705: agnimaddhimaṃ sādhayati tasyābhāvena tāvaddharmasvarūpabādho bhavaty eva.
GSP28mimsvtku:7706: tadviśeṣaṇam apy uṣṇatvam arthākṣiptaṃ pratyakṣāvagatena śaityena
GSP28mimsvtku:7707_0: bādhyate. na ca vācyam anuṣṇo 'pi vahniḥ prabhāsu dṛṣṭa iti katham arthākṣipto viśeṣa
GSP28mimsvtku:7707_1: iti. prabhāsv apy evaṃ vahnir uṣṇa eva, abhibhūtatvāt tu sparśo na gṛhyate, na punaruṣṇatāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7707_2: jātu jahāti, svābhāvikī hi sā tasya.
GSP28mimsvtku:7708: na ca hime 'py abhibhūtatvād agrahaṇam iti vācyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7711: dharmiṇas tu dviprakāro 'pi bādho 'nukta eveti ubhayathā tadbādhodāharaṇam āha -- adharma iti sārdhena. hiṃsā kilādharma iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7712: sāmānyato 'vagatam. tad yadā vihito 'dharmo daikṣapaśuhiṃsādir yad duḥkhaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7713_0: karotīty anūdya tadalpam iti sādhyate, tadāpi vihitatvenādharmataiva bādhyate tadviśeṣo
GSP28mimsvtku:7713_1: 'pi duḥkhanimittatvaṃ yadarthākṣiptaṃ tad api tenaiva bādhyate. na hi vihitaṃ nāma
GSP28mimsvtku:7715: dharmisvarūpasvaviśeṣabādhaḥ. na cātra śrutyupātta eva svaviśeṣa iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7717: ubhayasyobhayavirodham udāharati -- ayathārtheti. yadā hi sarvajñānāni mithyeti sādhyate tadā dharmadharmigrāhiṇor api jñānayor mithyātvāt tadviśeṣaṇagrāhiṇoś ca mithyātvād bhavaty
GSP28mimsvtku:7718: ubhayasyaivobhayabādha iti. ayaṃ ca dharmoktyobhayabādha iti śabdabādha eva niveśanīya iti samadhigataṃ tāvad ubhayoḥ svarūpabādha iti || 74 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7719: kau punas tadviśeṣāv arthākṣiptau bādhyete. ata āha -- kṣaṇiketi.
GSP28mimsvtku:7720: bādhyete iti vipariṇamya sambandho darśayitavya iti. tatra caikadeśadarśanād ity ucyate. tatra ca darśanagrahaṇam atiricyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7721_0: ekadeśād ity eva vaktavyam. tad dhi liṅgaṃ na punardarśanam ato vyākhyeyam ekadeśadarśanād
GSP28mimsvtku:7721_1: ity ata āha -- darśanād iti. ayam arthaḥ. naikadeśas sattāmātreṇa liṅgam. kin tu
GSP28mimsvtku:7722_0: jñāpitaḥ. tad idam ubhayam upādātuṃ darśanagrahaṇam. śaknoti cobhayam upādātum, ṇijbhāvābhāvayor
GSP28mimsvtku:7722_1: api nirdeśasādhāraṇyāt. svapratipattau tāvad ekadeśe dṛṣṭe buddhir anumānam ity arthaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7722_2: parārthaprayoge tu ṇijantadarśanapadam ekadeśaṃ darśayitvā yā buddhir jāyate sānumānam
GSP28mimsvtku:7722_3: ity uktaṃ bhavati. tad idaṃ tatroccaritadarśanapadam arthadvaye vyākhyeyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7723: anena ca yatraikadeśe vādiprativādinor akasyobhayor vā saṃśayo
GSP28mimsvtku:7724: 'dhīrviparyayo vā bhavati so 'siddhābhidhāno hetvābhāso vyudasyate. na hy asau tādṛśaḥ parasmai darśayituṃ śakyate.{3,55}svayaṃ vā dṛṣṭo bhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:7725: adhīrajñānam ity arthaḥ. tatra dvayaviparyastodāharaṇam āha -- śaityād
GSP28mimsvtku:7726: iti. vahniśabdayor dvayor api śaityacākṣuṣatve vādiprativādinor viparyād
GSP28mimsvtku:7728: anyatarāsiddhodāharaṇam āha -- kṛtakatveti. yadā vaiśeṣiko yājñikaṃ prati śabdo 'nityaḥ kṛtakatvāt guṇatvād veti hetuṃ prayuṅkte,
GSP28mimsvtku:7729_0: tadāsau svarūpeṇa tasyāsiddho bhavati. yadā tu svayam evaṃprakāraṃ hetuṃ paraṃ prati
GSP28mimsvtku:7729_1: vadati tadā tasyāsiddhiḥ. yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ dravyatvād ākāśavad iti. na hi vaiśeṣikāś
GSP28mimsvtku:7730: guṇatvābhyupagamāt. evaṃprakāra iti. parāsiddhaprakāra ity arthaḥ || 77 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7731_0: sandigdhāsiddham udāharati -- bāṣpādīti syādantena. yadā hi dhūmo bāṣpādibhāvena
GSP28mimsvtku:7731_1: sandihyate dvābhyām ekena vā kiṃsvid ayaṃ rajasāmudgamo bāṣpo vā dhūmo veti tadā
GSP28mimsvtku:7731_2: dvayor apy anyatarasa vā sandigdhāsiddho bhavati. evaṃ tāvat sandehaviparyayābhyām
GSP28mimsvtku:7733: vādiprativādyubhayais trayaḥ prakārā iti. evaṃ tāvat svarūpato hetur asiddho bhavatīty uktam ity āha -- evam iti || 78 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7734: āśrayāsiddhatāpy etair eva jñānādibhir vādiprativādyubhayāpekṣais tridhā bhidyata ity āha -- eta eveti || 79 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7735: nanu svarūpāsiddhyā hetur duṣyet āśrayāsiddhyā tu kas tasya doṣaḥ ata āha -- jñāte 'pīti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- na svarūpeṇa hetur
GSP28mimsvtku:7736_0: gamakaḥ, api tu{3,56}pakṣadharmatayā jñātaḥ. na cāprasiddhāśrayas taddharmatayā jñātuṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7736_1: śakyate. śaityacākṣuṣatvayor api pakṣadharmatvāsiddhyaivāhetutvam. siddhaṃ hi svarūpeṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:7736_2: jale śaityaṃ rūparūpirūpaikārthasamavāyiṣu ca cākṣuṣatvam. śabdā(dau) hi pakṣadharmatayā
GSP28mimsvtku:7737: svarūpāsiddhavacanam. ata āśrayāsiddhāv api pakṣadharmatvāsiddher ahetutvaṃ yuktam eveti || tām idānīm āśrayāsiddhim udāharati -- sarvatreti asiddhāntena.
GSP28mimsvtku:7738: yadā hi bauddhaṃ prati sarvatra kāryopalambhād ātmanas sarvagatatvaṃ mīmāṃsakās sādhayanti, tadānyatarāsiddhāśrayo hetur bhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:7739: bauddhasyātmano 'siddher iti. yas tu pramāṇagatim ajānāno laukikaḥ kaścid
GSP28mimsvtku:7740: ātmani saṃśete, tasminn eva hetāv ucyamāne sandigdhāśrayo hetur ity āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:7741: laukikāder iti. ātmani saṃśaya ity arthaḥ. ādiśabdena satīrthikānām api
GSP28mimsvtku:7742: yeṣām ātmani saṃśayaḥ ta upādriyante. evaṃ saṃśayaviparyayābhyām āśrayāsiddhir uktā. ajñānenāpy āśrayāsiddhir aprasiddhapadaprayoge
GSP28mimsvtku:7743: darśayitavyā. yasya hi pakṣavacanaś śabdo na prasiddhas taṃ pratyevaṃjātīyake hetāv ucyamāne 'jñānenāśrayāsiddhir iti || 80 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7744: nanu yady anyatarāsiddhyā hetur duṣyati, evaṃ tarhy amūrtatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:7745: ātmā niṣkriya ityevamāder api hetutvaṃ na syāt digambarāṇām ātmano
GSP28mimsvtku:7746: 'mūrtatvāsiddheḥ. mūrtaṃ hi te śarīrapariṇāmam ātmānaṃ manyante.
GSP28mimsvtku:7747: akartṛkatvān nityo veda iti ca bauddhānāṃ tadasiddher ahetuḥ. śabdo
GSP28mimsvtku:7748: 'nityaḥ kṛtakatvād iti mīmāṃsakānām asiddheḥ. tad eva hetur nāma na kaścit
GSP28mimsvtku:7749_0: vyavatiṣṭhate. ata āha -- vāṅmātreti. ayam arthaḥ -- nāsiddho mameti vāṅmātrād dhetur
GSP28mimsvtku:7749_1: asiddho bhavati. tathā sati na kaścid anumānavyavahāraḥ prakalpeta. dvābhyāṃ tu vādiprativādibhyām
GSP28mimsvtku:7750: asattvenāvadhārito{3,57}siddhobhavati, tasyaiva tathāvidhasyāsiddhatāvacanaṃ vādino dūṣaṇaṃ bhavati nāsiddha iti vākpravṛttimātrād iti || 81 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7751: nanu kim idaṃ dvayor asiddho 'siddha iti, na hi vivadamānayor
GSP28mimsvtku:7752: ekatrārthe sampratipattir bhavati, na hi janmasahasreṇāpi bauddho vedānām akartṛkatvaṃ manyate, mīmāṃsako vāpi kaṇṭhagataprāṇo 'pi kṛtakatāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7753: śabdasya. tad evamādāv ubhayasampratipater abhāvān na hetubhāvo
GSP28mimsvtku:7754_0: 'vatiṣṭhate. ata āha -- itarad iti, ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- na dvayor asaṃpratipattir
GSP28mimsvtku:7754_1: ity etāvataiva sādhanadūṣaṇayor anavakḷptiḥ. yadi vādinā prayukte sādhane prativādinā
GSP28mimsvtku:7755: sādhyate, tato bhavati sādhanam. yadi tu paramārthopapattyabhidhānena
GSP28mimsvtku:7756_0: prativādinā nirākriyate tatas tasya dūṣaṇaṃ sidhyati. tatpramāṇatas siddhir evātropayujyate
GSP28mimsvtku:7756_1: nobhayābhyupagamaḥ. dvābhyāṃ yo 'sattvato jñāta ity api pramāṇasiddhyabhiprāyeṇoktam,
GSP28mimsvtku:7756_2: nābhyupagamamātrāpekṣayā. yad dhi pramāṇena sādhyate bādhyate vā tatra prāyeṇobhayasampratipattir
GSP28mimsvtku:7757_0: asattvato jñātāpekṣayetaracchabdaḥ. yad vādinā sattvena jñātaṃ bhavati prativādinā
GSP28mimsvtku:7757_1: ca vaiparītyena, tadvādinā sādhyamānaṃ sādhanaṃ bhavati. etac ca jalpanyāye sthitvoktam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7757_2: vāde tu dvayor api sampratipattir bhavaty
GSP28mimsvtku:7758: eveti. na caivam anyatarāsiddhir adūṣaṇam, yāvat tu yādī na sādhanaṃ sādhayati, tāvad anyatarāsiddhyā nigṛhyate, sādhite tu tasmin dūṣaṇaṃ parihṛtaṃ bhavatīti || 82 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7761: sandehaviparītahetvor hi na saṃbandho jñāto bhavati, na hi sādhāraṇas
GSP28mimsvtku:7762: saṃśayahetuḥ prameyatvaṃ nityatvena jñātasambandham iti śakyate vaktum,
GSP28mimsvtku:7763_0: dhaṭādiṣv anityatayāpi jñātasambandhatvāt nāpi kṛtakatvaṃ nityatayā, teṣv evānityatayā
GSP28mimsvtku:7763_1: sambandhasaṃvitteḥ. atas tajjātīyam ubhayaṃ na jñātasaṃbandham iti jñātasaṃbandhapadena
GSP28mimsvtku:7763_2: vyudasyati. atra cāsannikṛṣṭapadāt prabhuti prātilomyena vārtikakṛtā lakṣaṇagranthe
GSP28mimsvtku:7764: viśeṣaṇopādānaphalam uktam u,{3,58} tat kasya hetoḥ. pratītikramānusāreṇa.
GSP28mimsvtku:7765: prabhātā hi prathamaṃ pakṣaṃ pratyeti, tato hetum apekṣate, tato
GSP28mimsvtku:7766_0: dṛṣṭāntavacanam, ato 'satpakṣanirākaraṇārthaṃ prayuktam asannikṛṣṭapadam eva tāvad
GSP28mimsvtku:7766_1: upavarṇitam. tato hetupadam ekadeśadarśanād iti, tato jñātasambandhasyeti dṛṣṭāntavacanam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7767: ata eva dṛṣṭāntadoṣā api sādhyahetuvikalatvādayo 'nena nirākriyante.
GSP28mimsvtku:7768: tadvaikalye 'pi svayaṃ sambandho jñātuṃ parasmai pratipādayituṃ śakyata
GSP28mimsvtku:7769: iti. kiyantaḥ punas saṃśayahetavaḥ, ata āha -- traya iti || 83 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7770: tān eva trīn prakārān darśayati -- sann iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7771: sādhyatadabhāvayos san sādhāraṇo 'bhidhīyate. yathā prameyatvaṃ nityānityatvayoḥ. dvābhyāṃ sādhyatadabhāvābhyāṃ vyāvṛtto 'sādhāraṇaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7772: kṣiter eva gandhavattvam. vyāvṛttaṃ hi tat
GSP28mimsvtku:7773_1: yau viruddhāvyabhicārīti parair abhihitau, tau cānantaram evodāhāryāv iti neha vyākhyāyete
GSP28mimsvtku:7775: ete ca dharmās sādhyatadabhāvayos sādhāraṇā ity arthaḥ || 85 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7776: keṣu punassādhyeṣu teṣāṃ sādhāraṇyam ata āha -- nityeti
GSP28mimsvtku:7777: nityeṣvantena. kathaṃ punarvaiṣamye yathāsaṅkhyam ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:7778: dviranityateti. anityatā svasthāne dviḥ paṭhitavyā. ato
GSP28mimsvtku:7779_0: yathāsaṅkhyopapattiḥ. tad ayam arthaḥ -- yadā nityaś śabdaḥ prameyatvād iti prayujyate
GSP28mimsvtku:7779_1: tadā prameyatvaṃ sādhyatadabhāvayor dṛṣṭam iti sādhāraṇatvān naikāntāya prabhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:7779_2: ato naikāntikam ity ucyate. ata eva ca saṃśayahetuḥ. saṃśayo hi sāmānyapratyakṣād
GSP28mimsvtku:7779_3: viśeṣāpratyakṣād viśeṣasmṛteś ca bhavati. yathā sthāṇupuruṣayor ārohapariṇāhasāmānyadarśanād{3,59}bhedakadharmānavadhāraṇāś
GSP28mimsvtku:7779_4: ca viśeṣasmṛtyapekṣaḥ kiṃsvid ayaṃ sthāṇur āhosvit puruṣa ity anavadhāraṇajñānātmakas
GSP28mimsvtku:7779_5: saṃśayo jāyate. evaṃ prameyatvam api nityānityayos sāmānyaṃ viditavatastadviśeṣaṇasmaraṇāpekṣas
GSP28mimsvtku:7779_6: tayor evānirdhāraṇātmakaḥ pratyayas saṃśayāparanāmā jāyata iti prameyatvaṃ saṃśayahetuḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7779_7: ayaṃ ca kṛtsnobhayavyāpīsaṃśayahetuḥ. tathāyatnotthaś śabdaḥ anityatvād ity ayam
GSP28mimsvtku:7779_8: api sādhāraṇa eva. ayatnottheṣu keṣucid vidyudādiṣu gatatvād yatnottheṣu ca sarveṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:7780: sapakṣaikadeśagata iti veditavyam. tathā yatnotthaś śabdaḥ anityatvād iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:7781: yatnottheṣu sarveṣv evānityatā dṛṣṭā. tadabhāve 'pi kvacin meghādau dṛṣṭā,
GSP28mimsvtku:7782: na vyomādau iti, sakalasapakṣavyāpī vipakṣaikadeśavartī cāyaṃ sādhāraṇa ity avasātavyam. ubhayaikadeśagatas tu yathā nityaś śabdaḥ amūrtatvād iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7783_0: amūrtatā hi na sarvanityavyāpinī vyomādiṣu bhāvād aṇuṣu cābhāvād anityam api na sarvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7783_1: vyāpnoti ghaṭakuḍyādiṣv abhāvāt karmādiṣu bhāvāt. sarvatra cātra dvayavṛttitvam eva
GSP28mimsvtku:7783_2: hetos saṃśaye kāraṇam avṛttyaṃśas tu sann api na
GSP28mimsvtku:7784_0: kāraṇam ity atantram. ata eva sādhāraṇasya caturdhā vibhāgaṃ vadanti ye teṣām asāv
GSP28mimsvtku:7784_1: anupayogy eva sādhanadūṣaṇayor ity upekṣaṇīyam, na hi sādhanavacanakāle tathāvidhaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7785: avṛttyaṃśaḥ kvacid upayujyate. aṇvāpi hi mātrayā vipakṣe vartamāno hetur
GSP28mimsvtku:7786: atyājya eva. dūṣaṇavādino 'pi vipakṣavṛttimātraṃ vacanīyam iti kiṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7787: tadavāntaraviśeṣāśrayaṇena. vārttikakāreṇāpi sarvasādhāraṇeṣu dvayavṛttitvam eva saṃśayakāraṇam iti darśayitum udāharaṇaprapañco
GSP28mimsvtku:7788: darśitaḥ, na punaś cāturvidhyam abhipretya. yathāha --
GSP28mimsvtku:7790: tyajyate sādhane caivaṃ sādhāraṇyād viśeṣataḥ || iti || 85 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7792: udāharati -- nityā bhūr iti. gandho hi pṛthivyāḥ svāsādhāraṇo guṇaḥ, na tāṃ vihāya nityam anityaṃ vā bhāvāntaram āśrayatīty asādhāraṇa iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7793: gīyate.{3,60} āha -- astv asādhāraṇaṃ gandhavattvaṃ, kathaṃ tu saṃśayahetuḥ, yuktaṃ hi pakṣadvayāv alambī sādhāraṇo dvayor
GSP28mimsvtku:7794: anavasthādhiyam ādadhāno yatsaṃśayahetur iti, asādhāraṇas tu dvābhyāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7795: vyāvṛtto naikatrāpi dhiyam upajanayitum alam iti katham asya saṃśayahetubhāvaḥ, ata āha -- niścayeti. hetor hi niścayajanane
GSP28mimsvtku:7796: 'nyayavyatirekāv aṅgam anyatarāpīye 'pi na niścayāya hetuḥ paryāpto
GSP28mimsvtku:7797: bhavati. tad yathā sādhāraṇo 'nvayasanātho 'pi vinākṛto vyatirekeṇa na
GSP28mimsvtku:7798: niścayāya prabhavati, evam evāsādharaṇo 'pi niścayasyaikenānvayanāmnāṅgena vikalas tam akurvan saṃśayahetutāṃ pratipadyata iti || 86 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7799: nanūktaṃ sādhāraṇo dvayagāmī dvaye buddhiṃ janayan saṃśayae hetur iti. asādhāraṇas tu na kiñcid jñāpayatīti nāsāv
GSP28mimsvtku:7800_0: ekāṅgavikalatāmātreṇa saṃśayahetur iti yuktam ata āha -- sādhāraṇa iti dvayena. ayam
GSP28mimsvtku:7800_1: abhiprāyaḥ -- sādhāraṇo 'pi nobhayatra buddhijananāt saṃśayahetuḥ, kin tu viruddhobhayapratipādanamukhena,
GSP28mimsvtku:7800_2: viruddhe hy ubhayasmin pratipādite tayor ekatra samavāyāsambhavād vyāghātād eva saṃśayo
GSP28mimsvtku:7800_3: bhavati. tac cāsādhāraṇe 'py aviśiṣṭam, asādhāraṇo 'pi hy ubhayasmād vyāvṛttes tadabhāvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7800_4: gamayan dvayābhāvāsambhavād eva saṃśayaṃ janayati. na hi sambhavati nityam anityaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7801: dharmadvandvair eva hi nityānityatvādibhis sarvaṃ jagadavasthitam. ata ubhayābhāvo virudhyate. na cobhayabhāvaḥ, virodhād eva.
GSP28mimsvtku:7802_0: nacānyataraparigraho 'viśeṣāt. tam imaṃ saṅkaṭam āsādya prāmāṇikas saṃśete. ayaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7802_1: cātrāvayavārthaḥ -- yathā prameyatvādis sādhāraṇo dṛṣṭas san buddhidvayanimittakaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7803: bahuvrīhiḥ, nimittaśabdena ca buddhidvayasya nimittamātratāṃ kathayati.
GSP28mimsvtku:7804: sādhyatadabhāvaviṣayaṃ hi buddhidvayaṃ nimittīkṛtya viruddhaikānavāpter eva sādhāraṇena saṃśayo janyate. na hi parasparaviruddhābhyāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7806: viruddhadharmādhyāso dṛṣṭaḥ. yathā nityaṃ vyoma anityaṃ kāryadravyam iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7807: ato 'smāt pratīti???ātād eva sādhāraṇena saṃśayo janyate. sa cāyam asādhāraṇasyāpi samānaḥ. so 'pi hi yatra nitye 'nitye vā nāsti tadabhāvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7808_0: pratipādya tanmukhena dvayasattvavirodham āpādayan saṃśayakāraṇaṃ bhavatīti. idaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7808_1: cāsādhāraṇasya saṃśayahetutvaṃ nānumanyante. avyavasthayā hy ubhayasmin manasi viparivartamāne
GSP28mimsvtku:7808_2: saṃśayo bhavati. na cāsādhāraṇena kiñcid buddhāvādhīyate, tasya kenacid anvayābhāvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:7808_3: api ca parimiteṣv eva bhāveṣu saṃśayo dṛṣṭaḥ. nivṛttimukhena tu saṃśayajanane sarvato
GSP28mimsvtku:7808_4: nivṛttenāsādhāraṇena sarvatomukhas saṃśayo janyeta. na ca sarvaviṣayaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7809_0: saṃśayo dṛṣṭacaraḥ. tasya buddhāv anārohāt. na ca kvacin nivṛttimātreṇa sarvatrābhāvaś
GSP28mimsvtku:7809_1: śakyate 'vagantum, yanmukhena saṃśayo bhavet. na hy anuvṛttāv adṛṣṭāyāṃ vyāvṛttis
GSP28mimsvtku:7809_2: sidhyati. agnāv anuvartamāno hi dhūmo dṛṣṭavyatireko 'gniniyatasvabhāvatvenāvagato
GSP28mimsvtku:7810: 'nagnibhyo vyatiricyata ity avagamyate. yas tu na kenacid anvitas tasya
GSP28mimsvtku:7811_0: katham anupalabdhiyogyāt sarvato vyatirekaḥ pratīyeta. tato nānena prakāreṇāsādhāraṇasya
GSP28mimsvtku:7811_1: saṃśayahetutvam. yadi tv asādhāraṇadharmāṇo bhāvā nityānityabhāvabhājo dṛṣṭā iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7811_2: kṣitim api taddharmikām upalabhya nityā vā syād anityā veti saṃśayo bhavatīty ucyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7812: eva bahusādhāraṇāt saṃśayo nāsādhāraṇāt, anyo hy asādharaṇadharmaḥ anyathā ca bahusādhāraṇī tadvattā. tad yady asau saṃśayakāraṇaṃ jātā kiṃ jātam
GSP28mimsvtku:7813: asādhāraṇasya. hantaivaṃ sādhāraṇa eva saṃśayahetur abhyupagato bhavatīti
GSP28mimsvtku:7814: siddham. nāsādhāraṇasya saṃśayahetutvam. anyan matam -- anadhyavasāyahetur evāyam iti. asti kilānadhyavasāyo nāma jñānasya prakāraḥ. so 'nena
GSP28mimsvtku:7815_0: janyate. bhavati hi tādṛgdharmadṛśaḥ kimbhūtasyāsya dharmo 'yam ity anadhyavasitāv
GSP28mimsvtku:7815_1: abhāsapratyayaḥ. na caiva pramāṇam, aniścayātmakatvāt. na ca saṃśayaḥ pakṣadvayāsaṃsparśāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:7815_2: so 'yam evaṃvidhān adhyavasāyo 'sādhāraṇena janyata iti. na tv etad ghaṭate. na hy
GSP28mimsvtku:7815_3: anadhyavasāyo nāma kaścid jñānasya prakāraḥ, yam ayaṃ janayet. adhyavasāyābhāvo
GSP28mimsvtku:7816: 'nadhyavasāyaḥ. sa ca prāgabhāvarūpatvān na janyaḥ. athānyamātravacano nañ agrāhyaṇādivad iṣyate tato 'dhyavasāyād anyas saṃśaya{3,62}eva
GSP28mimsvtku:7817: tacchabdavācyo bhavet. na ca taddhetur asādhāraṇa iti phaṇitam eva.
GSP28mimsvtku:7818: athādharmādivad viparītavacano nañ, evaṃ sati viparyayavācyo
GSP28mimsvtku:7819: 'nadhyavasāyaśabdo bhavet, na ca viparītāvagraho 'sādhāraṇena janyata iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7820: yadi tu na me 'smin vastuny adhyavasāyo 'stīty adhyavasāyābhāvāvadhāraṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:7822: tatra hetor na vyāpāraḥ. ato jijñāsāmātrahetur asādhāraṇa iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7823: samarthanīyam. bhavati hi taddarśinaḥ kīdṛgdharmo 'yam ito dharmād bhāvo
GSP28mimsvtku:7824: bhaved iti jijñāsā. yady api cāsauśuddhadharmidarśanād api kadācid bhavaty
GSP28mimsvtku:7825: eva tathāpi dharmadvāreṇāpi tāvad bhavaty eveti na taddhetutvam anupapannam. āha ca --
GSP28mimsvtku:7827: sāmānyāt saṃśayo yuktas tathā sa pratisādhanāt || iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7828: yat tv ihāsādhāraṇasya saṃśayahetutvam uktaṃ tatparamatam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7829_0: jñātasambandhapadasya hi vyāvartanīyam atra darśayitum abhipretam, tat saṃśayahetutve
GSP28mimsvtku:7829_1: 'py asādhāraṇasya ghaṭata eva. bhavatu tāvad ayaṃ yasya kasyacid dhetuḥ. sarvathā
GSP28mimsvtku:7830: śākyās tu saṃśayahetum asādhāraṇaṃ manyante, udāharanti ca śabdānityatve
GSP28mimsvtku:7834: iti. idaṃ ca vārttikakṛtaiva pradeśāntare svayam upanyasya
GSP28mimsvtku:7836: kiṃ punarudāhṛtānāṃ svābhāvikam eva saṃśayahetutvaṃ nety āha
GSP28mimsvtku:7838: kāraṇam āha -- nirṇayasyeti labdhvāntena. kva drṣṭam ata āha
GSP28mimsvtku:7839_0: -- niṣkriyeti. amūrtatā hi nityatve sādhye nityānityavyomakarmasādhāraṇī saṃśayahetur
GSP28mimsvtku:7839_1: āsīt, saiva tu niṣkriyatve sādhye labdhvānvayavyatirekau hetutāṃ{3,63}pratipadyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7839_2: vyāptaṃ hy amūrtatvaṃ niṣkriyatvena. na hy amūrtaṃ gaganam ātmā vā parispandate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7839_3: na caivaṃ tadvatāṃ rathādīnām amūrtatvaṃ dṛṣṭam iti || 90 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7841: gandhaviśeṣadarśino hi viditavyāpteḥ kṣityekadeśasiddhatve bhavatyānumāniko nirṇaya iti || dvau viruddhārthasambandhāv ekatraikadeśini saṃśaye hetur ity
GSP28mimsvtku:7842: uktam. tatrodāharaṇam āha -- yatreti. yatra hi na sākṣātkārijñānaviṣayo vāyuḥ arūpatvād ity ekas sādhayati. aparo 'pi sparśāt tadviparyayam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7843: tatrāsau viruddhāvyabhicāritā bhavatīti śākyair abhihitam. tatra tulyabalobhayahetusannipātāt saṃśayaḥ. dvayor api sādhanayoḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7844: prasiddhāvayavatvāviśeṣāt. arūpaṃ hy arūpisamavetam apratyakṣam iti kāṇādā
GSP28mimsvtku:7845_0: manyante. tathā ca vāyuḥ. ato na pratyakṣaḥ. karmasvarūpam api rūpaikārthasamavāyāc
GSP28mimsvtku:7845_1: cākṣuṣam ācakṣate. evaṃ sparśo 'pi vāyoḥ prasiddha eva. prasiddhavyāptikaś cāparokṣatvena.
GSP28mimsvtku:7845_2: atas tulyabalatvam. tataś ca saṃśayaḥ, viruddhayor ekatropānapātāsambhavāt, samuccayānupapatteḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7845_3: siddhe ca vastuni vikalpāsambhavāt bādhyabādhakam āvasyāpi tulyakakṣyatvāt. ato
GSP28mimsvtku:7846: 'navasthayobhayasmin pariplavamāne bhavati saṃśayaḥ. tādātmyāt. tasya balābalaviśeṣe tv anumānavirodho varṇita eva. yathā sarvajño 'stīti
GSP28mimsvtku:7847: buddhavacanaṃ samyak taduktatvād kṣaṇabhaṅgādivākyavad ity ekenokte 'paraḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7848: prabravīti buddho 'sarvajña iti madvacanaṃ samyak maduktatvāt yathā jyotir
GSP28mimsvtku:7849: uṣṇa?āpo dravā iti. atra maduktatvam ubhayor api siddham. buddhoktatā tu na naḥ prasiddhā, ato 'prasiddhāṅgakatvāt pūrvaṃ sādhanaṃ balavatā
GSP28mimsvtku:7850_0: prasiddhāṅgakena bādhyate. yat tu viruddhāvyabhicārīti dvayor ekavacanāntam abhidhānaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7850_1: ta???????nyāmahe. viruddhāvyabhicārī saṃśaye hetur iti śākyā vadanti. na??kasya saṃśayahetutvam
GSP28mimsvtku:7850_2: anyataraparicchedāt. na ca samudāyābhiprāyam ekavacanam. tasya viruddhatvāvyabhicāripadānās
GSP28mimsvtku:7850_3: padatvāt. sa hy aṃśābhyāṃ vyabhicāry eva. dvau tu viruddhāvyabhicāriṇāv
GSP28mimsvtku:7851: iti vaktavyam. na tv ekavacanena. yadi pratihetu{3,64}viruddham artham ekaiko na vyabhicaratīti viruddhāvyabhicārīty ucyate. tad astu. na tv ekaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7852_0: saṃśaye hetur ity uktam. ata eva vārtikakāreṇa dvau viruddhārthasambandhau saṃśayahetū
GSP28mimsvtku:7852_1: iti dvivacanāntenaiva nāmnāṃ saṃśayahetubhāvo darśitaḥ. ihāpi viruddhāvyabhicāritety
GSP28mimsvtku:7853: saṃśayahetur iti. tad atra yogyatayānayor viruddhāvyabhicāriteti
GSP28mimsvtku:7854: vyākhyeyam. dvau viruddhāvyabhicāriṇāv iti yāvad iti || 91 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7855_0: imāṃ ca viruddhāvyabhicāritāṃ saṃśayahetuṃ sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇābhyāṃ jātyantaram eke
GSP28mimsvtku:7855_1: varṇayanti. apare punas samudāyasyāṃśābhyāṃ sādhāraṇapakṣanikṣepam. anye tu samastam
GSP28mimsvtku:7855_2: idaṃ militam ubhayaṃ naikatrāpy anugatam ity ananvayam asādhāraṇam evāsthiṣata ity
GSP28mimsvtku:7856: -- kecid iti. atra ca pradeśāntare vārtikakṛtā sādhāraṇya evāsthā darśitā.
GSP28mimsvtku:7858: sādhāraṇyān na naitasya bhedaḥ kaścana vidyate |
GSP28mimsvtku:7860: iti. na ca vācyaṃ dvayasyānanvayād asādhāraṇa evāyam iti. yadi hy ekena
GSP28mimsvtku:7861_0: dvayaṃ prayujyeta tato bhaved apy evaṃ, pratyekam anvitau dṛṣṭau dvābhyāṃ prayuktau
GSP28mimsvtku:7861_1: nānanvitāv iti śakyate vaktum. api cāsādhāraṇatve saṃśayahetubhāvo nopapadyetaṃ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7861_2: tasya nirākṛtapūrvatvāt. atas sādhāraṇa evāyam iti. vayaṃ tu jātyantaram eva sādhīyo
GSP28mimsvtku:7861_3: manyāmahe. yathā hi na dvayam ekena prayuktam iti nāsādhāraṇatvam. evaṃ sādhāraṇatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:7862: kiṃ khalv atra sādhāraṇam. ekaikasyaikaikena vyāptasyaikaikena prayogāt,
GSP28mimsvtku:7863_0: aṃśatas sādhāraṇasya ca samudāyasyāprayogāt. ata eva cātra sādhāraṇād bhedena pratihetu
GSP28mimsvtku:7863_1: viruddhayos saṃśayahetutvam uktam. itarathā tenaiva gatatvān na pṛthagupādīyeta.
GSP28mimsvtku:7864_0: sādhāraṇo hy ubhayadṛṣṭas tu pratītimādadhānas saṃśayahetur imau tv ekaikaśyenobhayam
GSP28mimsvtku:7864_1: upasthāpayantau saṃśayahetū iti vārtikakāreṇāpi sādhāraṇapade sthita ity uktam, na
GSP28mimsvtku:7864_2: sādhāraṇa eveti || 92 {3,65} kathaṃ punar evaṃjātīyake viṣaye nirṇayaḥ, ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:7865: pratijñeti nirṇayāntena. pakṣabādhoktaiḥ pratyakṣādibhiḥ pramāṇair yasya sādhanavākyāvayavapratijñā bādhyate tatparājayenetarasya nirṇayaḥ kāryaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7866: yathehaiva tāvat udāharaṇe tvagindriyavyāpāreṇa vāyāvaparokṣam anubhūyamāne tenaivānubhavena parokṣatāpakṣo bādhyate. na hi nas
GSP28mimsvtku:7867: tvagindriyabhuvastoyapratyakṣād vāyupratyakṣaṃ viśiṣyate. na hīhānadhiṣṭhānaṃ sparśamātram anubhūyate. api tu tadadhikaraṇaṃ dravyam
GSP28mimsvtku:7868: api. na hi prabalena marutābhihanyamānasya jalaṃ vā śliṣyatas saṃvid viśiṣyate. ato 'kṣasambandhaphalānusārāt pratyakṣo vāyur iti niścīyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:7869: kvacic cāgamena viṣayāpahāro bhavati. yathā śuci naraśiraḥkapālaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7871: sādhayati, prāṇyudbhūtatvād uccārādivad iti. tatra pūrvapratijñāyā āgamena
GSP28mimsvtku:7872: viṣayāpahārād uttareṇārthanirṇayo bhavati. śucītaraviveke hy āgama eva
GSP28mimsvtku:7873: śaraṇam. tasmin paripanthini na śucitvānumānam ātmānaṃ labhate. smaranti hi --
GSP28mimsvtku:7874: nāraṃ spṛṣṭvāsthi sasnehaṃ savāsā jalam āviśet |
GSP28mimsvtku:7875_0: iti. rudro hi mahāvrataṃ cacāra sa etacchavaśīrṣam upadadhāreti tv arthavādamātraṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7875_1: na śavaśirodhāraṇavidhiḥ. atra ca pratyakṣādīny eva yathāsvam arthaṃ sādhayantīti
GSP28mimsvtku:7875_2: sādhanapadenocyanta iti. kathaṃ punaḥ pratyakṣādīny eva pratijñābādhanāyotsahante.
GSP28mimsvtku:7875_3: teṣv api sāmānyato darśanena bādhasya śaṅkyamānatvād ata āha -- bādhavarjanād iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7876: dṛśyate, kadācid bādhasambhāvanā tu na teṣāṃ prāmāṇyam utsārayatīti || 93
GSP28mimsvtku:7877_0: atra bhikṣuṇā pakṣadharmas tadaṃśena vyāpto hetur ity ekavacanena vivakṣitaikasaṅkhya
GSP28mimsvtku:7877_1: eka eva hetur iti darśitam. ata eva viruddhāvyabhicāriṇor na hetutvam anekatvāt tayor
GSP28mimsvtku:7878_0: na hi pratihetu{3,66}viruddhayor anekatvaṃ saṃśayahetutve hetuḥ, api tarhi parasparaviruddhārthopaplāvakatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:7878_1: eva. viruddhau hi dvābhyāṃ dvāv arthāv ekatropaplāvitāv iti tatra saṃśerate, na tu
GSP28mimsvtku:7878_2: hetvanekatvāt. saṃśayahetvor api pratyekam avagatayor ubhayasamāveśād eva kvacin
GSP28mimsvtku:7879_0: ūrdhvatākākavattvayoḥ. kevalā hy ūrdhvatā sthāṇupuruṣasādhāraṇī nānyataranirṇayāya
GSP28mimsvtku:7879_1: prabhavati. kākanilayanasahakṛtā tu saiva sthāṇur ayam iti niścāyayati. tad atraikasyaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:7879_2: saṃśayahetutvaṃ dvābhyām eva tu nirṇaya ity aprayojakaṃ saṃśayahetutve dvitvaṃ, viruddhānekasādhyatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:7879_3: eva saṃśayahetuḥ. yathā khalv eka eva sādhāraṇas sapakṣavipakṣayor vartamānas saṃśayahetur
GSP28mimsvtku:7880: ubhayavṛttir eva saṃśaye kāraṇam iti na taddvitvena hetutvanirākaraṇaṃ yuktam ity āha -- kvacid iti. nanu yuktaṃ tāvadūrdhvatayā
GSP28mimsvtku:7881: sthāṇupuruṣasandeho bhavatīti, kākavattāmātreṇa na saṃśayo dṛṣṭapūrvaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7882: satyam. yas tu kākavattāmātreṇa sthāṇuṃ siṣādhayiṣati tasyāsau kevalā
GSP28mimsvtku:7883: saṃśayahetuḥ, ūrdhvatāsanāthā tu nirṇāyikety etāvad eva vivakṣitam ity adoṣa iti. api ca avirodhinoḥ pratyekaṃ saṃhatayor api kvacid arthe sādhye
GSP28mimsvtku:7884: hetubhāvo dṛśyate. yathaikasminn eva śābdasya jñānasyānumānatve
GSP28mimsvtku:7886_0: aikaikaśyena samastābhyāṃ cānumānatvaṃ sādhayitum. dvitve ca hetvābhāsatvakāraṇe
GSP28mimsvtku:7886_1: naikasmin sādhye 'nekahetavaḥ prayujyeran. prayoktāras tv ekam eva sādhyaṃ kiñcānyad
GSP28mimsvtku:7887_0: tasmād virodhanibandhana eva saṃśayaḥ, na tu nānātvanibandhana ity abhiprāyeṇāha
GSP28mimsvtku:7887_1: -- pratyekam iti. pūrvaṃ tu pratyekaṃ saṃśayahetvor eva militayor nirṇayahetutvam
GSP28mimsvtku:7887_2: uktam. atra tu pratyekaṃ gamakāv api saṃhatau ca gamakāv iti pratipāditam iti ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7888: tasmād viruddhārthāv eva bhinnau saṃśayahetutvena darśanīyau.
GSP28mimsvtku:7889: yathāsmābhir uktaṃ na tu bhinnatāmātreṇety āha -- tasmād iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7892_1: ity arthaḥ. anye tūbhayavirodhayoḥ pratyekapakṣānatirekāt cāturvidhyaṃ pratipannā
GSP28mimsvtku:7893: vayaṃ tu iṣṭavighātamātreṇaikam eva prakāraṃ saṅgirāmaha ity āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:7894: ekadhāpi veti. pūrvoktapakṣadvayanivṛttāv api vāśabdaḥ. api vā śeṣabhājāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7895: syād iti pakṣabādha eva viruddhatve kāraṇaṃ kim avāntarabhedopanyāseneti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7896: triṣv api ca prakāreṣu śrutyarthopāttasya pratijñātārthasya bādhāyāṃ viruddhatām āhur ity āha -- śrutyarthoktasyeti. dharmadharmyubhayasvarūpaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7897: śrutyuktaṃ, tadviśeṣās tu prāyeṇārthoktāḥ. te ca svarūpasvaviśeṣāḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7898: pratijñārthaśabdenopādīyante. sarve hi te vaktur abhipretāḥ. na tu dharmādiviśeṣās sākṣāt pratijñāyām antargatāḥ. tad asmin pratijñārthe
GSP28mimsvtku:7899: hetunā bādhyamāne hetor viruddhatā bhavatīti. tatpunar idaṃ vipratiṣiddham
GSP28mimsvtku:7900: iva manyāmahe. kathaṃ hi pratijñārthe hetunā bādhyamāne hetur viruddho
GSP28mimsvtku:7901: bhavati. sa hi pratijñārthaṃ viruṇaddhīti viroddheti vaktum ucitaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7902: bādhaka iti vā. na cāyam eva pratijñārthena bādhyate yadviruddho bhavet
GSP28mimsvtku:7903_0: prasiddhatvādasya. prasiddhaṃ hi ghaṭasya kṛtakatvaṃ, na tadaprasiddhayā nityatayā
GSP28mimsvtku:7903_1: bādhituṃ śakyam. ato bādhaka ity evāyaṃ vaktavyaḥ. vārtikakṛtā tu paraprasiddhimātreṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:7903_2: viruddha ity uktam iti veditavyam iti. tatra dharmasvarūpabādhena tāvad viruddhatām
GSP28mimsvtku:7904: dharmaviśeṣabādhas tv evaṃ prayukte bhavatīty āha -- bādha
GSP28mimsvtku:7905: iti. tam eva prayogaṃ darśayati -- arthavad iti pādatrayeṇa.
GSP28mimsvtku:7906: svarūpābhidhānavādino hy āhuḥ -- gaur ayam iti śabdākāraviśiṣṭo 'rtho
GSP28mimsvtku:7907_0: 'vagamyate. na ca viśeṣaṇam anabhidhāya viśiṣṭo 'bhidhātuṃ śakyata iti svarūpam eva
GSP28mimsvtku:7907_1: tāvad ādau śabdo{3,68}bhidhatte tato viśiṣṭam. api cārthaśabdo vyabhicarati, ajñātasambandhasya
GSP28mimsvtku:7908: kadācid vyabhicarati sambandhāvadhāraṇāt prāg api tadavagamāt, avyabhicārī ca śabdārtha iti yuktam. ataḥ svarūpaṃ tāvadavaśyābhidheyaṃ śabdānāṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7909_0: tadabhidhānottarakālaṃ tu viśiṣṭābhidhānam api bhavatu nāmeti. evaṃ prasādhyānte
GSP28mimsvtku:7909_1: prayogam āhuḥ -- śabdasvarūpaṃ sambandhāvadhāraṇāt prāgarthavad vibhaktisambandhāt,
GSP28mimsvtku:7909_2: agṛhītasambandho 'pi hi svādivibhaktiyuktān śabdānavagacchati. yadā ca vibhaktiyogaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7910_0: tadārthavattvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā sambandhagrahaṇāt paścād iti. kathaṃ punar evaṃ prayujyamāne
GSP28mimsvtku:7910_1: dharmaviśeṣabādho bhavaty ata āha -- svarūpeṇeti cāśrita iti. yadā hi svarūpeṇārthenārthavattvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7910_2: prathamam āśrityārthavattāmātraviśiṣṭaṃ sādhyate, tadārthād idam avagamyate --
GSP28mimsvtku:7911_0: svarūpārthavattvam asya siṣādhayiṣitam iti. evaṃ ca bhavaty arthākṣiptasya dharmaviśeṣasya
GSP28mimsvtku:7911_1: bādha iti. kathaṃ punas svarūpeṇeti cāśrite dharmaviśeṣo bādhyate. ata āha -- asvarūpeti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7912_0: sambandhagrahaṇāt paścād arthāntarasya darśanāt. ato vyāptibalena tad eva vibhaktimattayā
GSP28mimsvtku:7912_1: sādhyate. ato 'rthavattāyā viśeṣaṃ svasvarūpārthavattvaṃ hetur ayaṃ viruṇaddhīti
GSP28mimsvtku:7913: dharmisvarūpabādhodāharaṇam āha -- ihapratyayeti. yadā hi samavāyaṃ dharmiṇaṃ kṛtvā tasya dravyādivyatirekas sādhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:7914: ihapratyayahetutvaṃ ca hetur ucyate ihāyaṃ ghaṭa iti saṃyogo dṛṣṭāntaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:7916: {3,69} kathaṃ punar atrodāharaṇe dharmisvarūpabādhaḥ, ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:7917_0: atrāpīti. atrāpy udāharaṇe dharmisvarūpasya samavāyātmano vaiparītyāpādanād dhetor
GSP28mimsvtku:7917_1: viruddhatā bhāvati. ihapratyayahetutvaṃ hy asamavāyātmana eva dṛṣṭam iti tādrūpyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7918: asminn eva ca dharmiviśeṣabādho 'pi darśayitavya ity āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:7919: yac ceti. samavāyo hi sattāsāmānyavadekarūpa iti kāṇādā manyante. so 'py
GSP28mimsvtku:7920: asya viśeṣaḥ saṃyogavadbhedāpatter bādhyata iti bhavati dharmiviśeṣaviruddho hetur iti || ubhayasvarūpabādhāyām udāharaṇam āha -- nityam ātmāstiteti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7921: yadā kaścit sautrāntikaṃ pratyevaṃ sādhayati -- ātmā nityaḥ niravayatvāt
GSP28mimsvtku:7922: vyomavad iti, tadā dharmadharmidvayasya bādhanaṃ bhavati. sautrāntikasya hy avayavābhāvo vyomnyabhāvenaiva sambaddho 'bhimata ityātmano 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:7923: tadvadabhāvaṃ gamayet, āvaraṇābhāvamātraṃ hi nabhaḥ, na punas tattvāntaram
GSP28mimsvtku:7924: iti bauddhā manyante. ato 'navayavatvād ātmanaḥ svarūpasya taddharmasya ca nityatvasya bādhād ubhayabādha iti || 103 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7925: ubhayaviśeṣabādhas tv evaṃ sādhyamāne bhavatīty āha -- tadeti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7926: yadā hi parārthāś cakṣurādayas saṅghātatvāt śayanādivad iti sādhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:7927_0: tadobhayaviśeṣabādha ity arthaḥ. kathaṃ punar atrobhayaviśeṣabādhaḥ, ata āha -- śayana
GSP28mimsvtku:7927_1: iti. śayanīye{3,70}hi khaṭvādau mahābhūtasaṃhataśarīrapārārthyena saṅghātatvād iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7927_2: hetur vyāpto dṛṣṭa iti saṃhatapārārthyam eva sādhayet. ātmānaṃ ca prati pārārthyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7927_3: sādhayitum abhimatam, tan na sidhyet. so 'yaṃ tāvat pārārthyasya dharmasya yo viśeṣo
GSP28mimsvtku:7927_4: 'bhimata ātmapārārthyaṃ sa tāvad bādhyate. cakṣurāder api dharmiṇo yo viśeṣa āhaṅkārikatvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7928: saṃhatātmakatvaṃ hi śayanādāvanāhaṅkārikatvena vyāptaṃ dṛṣṭam, bhautikā hi te, atas tannidarśanena cakṣurādayo 'pi bhautikā bhaveyuḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7929_0: āhaṅkārikāṇīndriyāṇīti kāpilās saṅgirante, teṣāṃ cāyaṃ prayogaḥ. tad ayam arthaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7929_1: -- saṃhatapārārthyabhautikatvābhyāṃ vyāpto hetur yasmin śayane tatrātmapārārthyam
GSP28mimsvtku:7930_0: dharmiviśeṣabādho 'pi bhautikavyāptyā sūtrito 'nantaram eva vivariṣyata iti na kevalam
GSP28mimsvtku:7930_1: ātmapārārthyaṃ na sidhyati, asaṃhatarūpātmapārārthye ceṣṭe vyāptibalenātmano 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:7930_2: saṃhatatā prāpnotīty āha -- asaṃhateti. anena cāniṣṭāntarāpattir āpāditeti veditavyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7930_3: etad uktaṃ bhavati. nānena hetunāsaṃhatarūpātmārthatā sidhyati. pratyuta saṃhatataivātmano
GSP28mimsvtku:7934: prapañcitaḥ. idānīṃ tadvyāvartyā eva dṛṣṭāntābhāsā darśayitavyāḥ. tair hi nānumānāṅgasambandho jñāpayituṃ śakyate. atas te 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:7935: jñātasambandhapadenaiva vyāvartyante. idaṃ cāsmābhiḥ prāg evoktam.
GSP28mimsvtku:7940: {3,71}iti. atas tannirākaraṇārthaṃ dṛṣṭāntavacanam eva tāvad avatārayati
GSP28mimsvtku:7941: -- gamakasyeti. vyāptipradarśanāya dvividho dṛṣṭāntas tāvad sādhanavākye darśayitavyaḥ. sādhyaḥ pakṣaḥ tatsādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ yo dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa
GSP28mimsvtku:7946_0: iti. sādhyasya prajñāpanavacanam iti yāvat. tasya cārtho liṅgam eva. tac coddiśya
GSP28mimsvtku:7946_1: sādhyopādānaṃ sādharmyadṛṣṭānta iṣyate. yo yo dhūmavān sa so 'gnimān iti yāvad iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7946_2: kim evam upādīyamāne sidhyaty ata āha -- uddeśya
GSP28mimsvtku:7947: iti. uktaṃ vyāptipradarśanāya dṛṣṭāntavacanam iti. evaṃ copādīyamāna uddeśyo dhūmādir vyāpyatayā kathito bhavati. itaraś copādeyo 'gnyādir
GSP28mimsvtku:7948: vyāpakatayeti vyāptyānuguṇyāt saphalam evam upādānam ity uddeśyopādeyayor vyāpyavyāpakatvaṃ bhavatīty uktam || 108 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7949: kīdṛśaṃ tu tayos svarūpam ata āha -- yadvṛtteti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7950: yadvṛttatadvṛttābhyāṃ yattatpariniṣpannānāṃ yo ya ityādiśabdānām upādānam,
GSP28mimsvtku:7951: tad ayam artho bhavati. yadyad yadvṛttena saṃyuktaṃ prathamaṃ prayujyate pradhānaṃ ca taduddeśyaṃ, tattadvṛttayuktaṃ ca paścāt prayujyamānaṃ sa so
GSP28mimsvtku:7952: 'gnimāneveti caivakāreṇa yuktaṃ tadupādeyam. sarveṣv eva ca
GSP28mimsvtku:7953: grahavrīhyādisammārgāvaghātādiṣūddeśyopādeyeṣv ayam eva viveka iti veditavyam iti || 109 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7954_0: {3,72} kiṃ punar evaṃ prayoganiyame prayojanam, vivakṣāparatantrā hi śabdāḥ, te yathā
GSP28mimsvtku:7954_1: tathā vā prayuktā yathābhiprāyaṃ vartiṣyanta eva. ata āha -- vadatīti. na vaktrabhiprāyaparatantrāḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7955: kecid eva kvacid evārthe vartante, ato na vivakṣānusāreṇeṣṭasiddhir
GSP28mimsvtku:7957_0: yadi tarhi svatantrāś śabdāḥ atathāsthite 'py arthe śabdānusāriṇīṣṭasiddhir bhaved
GSP28mimsvtku:7957_1: ata āha -- sādhyahetutvam iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- nārthaśaktiś śabdaśaktim anurudhya
GSP28mimsvtku:7957_2: pravartate, na ca śabdaśaktir arthaśaktim, ato na yathā vaktrabhipretārthānusāriṇī
GSP28mimsvtku:7958: śabdaśaktiḥ, evaṃ na śabdānusāriṇyarthavyavastheti, arthādīnāṃ kṛtakatvānityatvādīnāṃ vyāptiśaktyanurodhād eva sādhyahetubhāvo bhavati na śabdānurodhād iti || 110 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7959: vaktranapekṣayā svaśaktyaiva śabde 'rtham ācakṣāṇe yattāvad āpadyate tad darśayati -- tatrājñānād iti sārdhadvayena. yadā hi dṛṣṭāntaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7960: vaktum anabhijño vaktā sādhyahetvos sahabhāvamātraṃ vivakṣati. yathā --
GSP28mimsvtku:7961: śabdo 'nityaḥ kṛtakatvād iti prayoge, yathā ghaṭe kṛtakatvanāśitves ta
GSP28mimsvtku:7962: iti. viparītāvagraheṇa vā na hetor vyāpyatāṃ vivakṣati. satyām api vivakṣāyāṃ kutaścid bhramanimittāt na vyāptiyogyaṃ śabdaṃ vadati.
GSP28mimsvtku:7963: sahabhāvamātram eva tu pūrvavad vadet, viparītaṃ vā bhrāntaḥ yathā nāśitā kṛtakatvena vyāpteti, tadā tāvan na kevalam iṣṭaṃ na sidhyati aniṣṭam eva
GSP28mimsvtku:7964: tu vyāptiviparyayād āpadyate. iṣṭasya{3,73}kṛtakatvasya hetutvaṃ na syāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:7965: aniṣṭasyaiva tu nāśitvasya bhaved ity evaṃjātīyakāniṣṭaprayoganivāraṇāya yukto dṛṣṭāntaprayoganiyama iti. etad evopasaṃharati -- tasmād iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7967: arthānāṃ śabdatantratve yad bhavati tad darśayati --
GSP28mimsvtku:7968_0: yadetipādarahitadvayena. asyārthaḥ -- yadā hi vyāptiśaktyanusāreṇaivārthānāṃ sādhyahetutvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7968_1: tadā yady api vaktrā na sahabhāvamātraṃ darśitaṃ, kin tu samyag eva dṛṣṭāntavacanam,
GSP28mimsvtku:7969_0: tadanurūpavyāpyavyāpakabhāvenāvasthitā iti dṛṣṭāntābhāsatā bhaved iti vakṣyamāṇena
GSP28mimsvtku:7969_1: sambandha iti. yathā -- nityo dhvanir amūrtatvād iti prayoge karmavat paramāṇuvad
GSP28mimsvtku:7969_2: ghaṭavad vyomavad iti dṛṣṭānteṣu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ paramārthatas sādhyahetūbhayavyāptiśūnyatayā.
GSP28mimsvtku:7969_3: karma khalv anityam iti tat sādhyabhūtayā nityatayā śūnyaṃ, hetus tv amūrtatvād iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7970: paramāṇavas tu mūrtā iti teṣu hetuśūnyatā, sādhyaṃ tu nityatvaṃ teṣu vidyata eva. ghaṭe tu na sādhyaṃ nityatvaṃ nāpy amūrtatvaṃ hetur ity
GSP28mimsvtku:7971: ubhayaśūnyatā. vyomni tu dṛṣṭānte vyāptiśūnyatām uttaratra svayam eva
GSP28mimsvtku:7972: vivariṣyati. atraiva ca vyomavad iti dṛṣṭānte tadasadvādinaṃ sautrāntikaṃ prati prayujyamāne dharmyasiddhyā dṛṣṭāntābhāsatā bhavatīty āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:7974_0: vyāptiśūnyatāṃ vivṛṇoti -- tatsadbhāve 'pīti. yady api ca{3,74}vyomnaḥ sadbhāvo bhavet,
GSP28mimsvtku:7974_1: tac ca hetusādhyadvayayuktaṃ nityatvād amūrtatvāc ca. tathāpi karmādiṣv amūrteṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:7975: vyāptir nāstīti īdṛśasyāpi dṛṣṭāntasya varjanam eva. ayam api na
GSP28mimsvtku:7978: vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntamataḥ paraṃ vyākhyāsyati. tatraitad eva tāvat prathamaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7979: vaktavyam. kiṃ sarvadaiva sādharmyavad vaidharmyavacanaṃ kāryaṃ na veti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7980: tatra tāvad vyatirekapradhānavādinas sarvadā vācyam iti ye vadanti. tān pratyāha -- vyāptyā sādharmya ukta iti. evaṃ hi manyate --
GSP28mimsvtku:7981: vyāptiprajñāpanāya hi dṛṣṭāntavacanam, sā cet sādharmyavacanena jñāpitā kiṃ vaidharmyavacanena. sādharmyaṃ cāvaśyam eva vacanīyam
GSP28mimsvtku:7982_0: anvayaprajñāpanāya, tatpradhānatvād anumānasya. vyatirekasyāpi tanmukhenaiva siddheḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:7982_1: itarathā duradhigamatvāt. ato yadi vyāptyā sahitaṃ sādharmyam uktaṃ, alaṃ vaidharmyavacaneneti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7982_2: kadā tarhi vaidharmyaṃ vācyam ata āha -- sahabhāvitvadṛṣṭyeti pādatrayeṇa. yadā hi
GSP28mimsvtku:7982_3: vaktrā samyag eva dṛṣṭānta ukte paraḥ śrotā jānāti -- yathā hetusādhyayos sāhityamātram
GSP28mimsvtku:7983_0: anenoktaṃ na vyāptir iti, tadā sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvaṃ jñāpayituṃ vaidharmyeṇeṣṭasādhanam
GSP28mimsvtku:7983_1: iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandha iti. yadā khalv abhyastavaidharmyas tam evāpekṣate na
GSP28mimsvtku:7983_2: sādharmyadṛṣṭāntaṃ tadā ca vaidharmyeṇeṣṭasādhanam ity āha -- taṃ vā nāpekṣate yadeti.
GSP28mimsvtku:7984_0: suśikṣitavaidharmyas sādharmyaṃ vaktum ajānānas tena sādharmyadṛṣṭāntena sahabhāvamātram
GSP28mimsvtku:7984_1: eva śuddhaṃ vyāptihīnaṃ kathayati, tadāpi paryanuyuktena tenaiva vaidharmyeṇeṣṭasādhanaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7985_0: yadā vā bhrānto viparītam anvayaṃ darśayati, tadāpi tatsamādhānecchayā pūrvaviparītajñānopamardanena
GSP28mimsvtku:7985_1: vaidharmyeṇeṣṭasādhanam ity āha --{3,75}viparītānvayam iti. nanv anvayavaiparītye
GSP28mimsvtku:7985_2: sa eva yathāvat pratipādyatāṃ kiṃ vaidharmyavacanena. satyam evam apīṣṭaṃ sidhyaty
GSP28mimsvtku:7986: kin tu bhrāntair idam asmābhir uktaṃ sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvo vivakṣita iti vaidharmyeṇāpi tāvad iṣṭasādhanaṃ bhavaty eveti. yat tu tatpūrvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:7987: sāhityamātram uktaṃ tadvaidharmya evopayujyate tasyaiveṣṭaṃ sādhayato
GSP28mimsvtku:7991: vaiparītye kāraṇam āha -- dhūmabhāva iti. yadā hi dhūmabhāvo
GSP28mimsvtku:7992_0: 'gnibhāvena vyāpto bhavati tadānagnir agnyabhāvas tato dhūmāt pracyutas sannadhūme
GSP28mimsvtku:7992_1: dhūmābhāva eva bhavatīty evaṃ tāvad vyāpto bhavati. yo hi yasmin sati bhavati asati
GSP28mimsvtku:7992_2: ca na bhavati sa tanniyatas tadvyāpta ity ucyate. yathā dhūmo 'gnāv eva bhavannagninā
GSP28mimsvtku:7994_0: yata eva cābhāvayor īdṛśo vyāpyavyāpakabhāvaḥ ata eva bhāvayor abhimatavyāptisiddhir
GSP28mimsvtku:7994_1: ity āha -- tathānagnāv iti. anagnāv agnyabhāve dhūmābhāvena vyāpte dhūmas tatra virodhivyāpter
GSP28mimsvtku:7994_2: alabdhāvakāśo 'gnāv eva bhavatīty evaṃ tadvyāpyatā tasya sidhyati. tatheti. yathā
GSP28mimsvtku:7995: arthaḥ. na caivam itaretarāśrayatā, bījāṅkuravadanāditayopapatter iti ||
GSP28mimsvtku:7996: {3,76} kiṃ punarabhāvayor vyāptiviparyayāśrayaṇe prayojanam ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:7997: vyāpakau tv iti. yadā hi ya eva bhāvo vyāpakas tadabhāva eva vyāpakatayā
GSP28mimsvtku:7998_0: vaidharmyadṛṣṭānta ucyate tadā tato vyāpyād dhūmāder naiva vipakṣasyānagnyādeḥ pracyutiḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:7998_1: kathitā bhavet. tatkathanārthaṃ ca vaidharmyavacanaṃ (sa) prayojanaṃ bhavet. na hi
GSP28mimsvtku:7998_2: yatra dhūmas tatrāgnir itivat yatra dhūmābhāvas tatrāgnyabhāva iti kathyamāne vyāpyād
GSP28mimsvtku:7998_3: dhūmād anagner vipakṣasya nivṛttir darśitā bhavatīti. ato dhūmenāgniṃ siṣādhayiṣatā
GSP28mimsvtku:7998_4: vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntenāgnidhūmābhāvayor vyāptiviparyayo vācya ity āha -- tasmād iti
GSP28mimsvtku:7998_5: vācyo 'ntena. yatrāgnir nāsti tatra dhūmo nāstīty evaṃ yadvṛttatadvṛttābhyām uddeśyopādeyabhāvo
GSP28mimsvtku:7998_6: darśayitavya ity arthaḥ. sa cānagnir adhūmena vyāpta ucyamāno nānyathā vācyaḥ, kin
GSP28mimsvtku:7998_7: tu sādharmyoktenaivoddeśyopādeyaprakāreṇety āha -- na cānyatheti. prakāraś cānantaram
GSP28mimsvtku:7999: anyathāvacane doṣam āha -- anagnyadhūmasāhitya iti. yathaiva sādharmyadṛṣṭānte svaśaktyā śabdo 'rthaṃ vadati nārthaśaktim anurudhyata
GSP28mimsvtku:8000_0: iti sāhityamātravacane vyāptiviparyaye vā neṣṭaṃ sidhyatīty uktam, evam ihāpi bhavatīti
GSP28mimsvtku:8000_1: bhāvaḥ evaṃ (?tadva /tāva)d ihāpy artho na śabdavaśavartīti yatrārtho dṛṣṭāntarūpo
GSP28mimsvtku:8000_2: dvābhyāṃ hetusādhyābhāvābhyām ekena vā tayoś śūnyo bhavati tatrāpi na prastutopakāro
GSP28mimsvtku:8000_3: bhavati anyadvāniṣṭaṃ prasajyata ity āha yatrāpīti. samyak prayukte 'pi vākye 'rthasyātadāyattatvānneṣṭasiddhir
GSP28mimsvtku:8001: bhāvaḥ. atrodāharaṇam āha -{3,77}yad iti. nityo dhvanir amūrtatvād ity atraiva prayoge yadaivaṃ vaidharmyam ucyate yannityaṃ na bhavati
GSP28mimsvtku:8002: tadamūrtam api na bhavati yathā paramāṇur iti tadā sādhyābhāvaśūnyo
GSP28mimsvtku:8003: dṛṣṭāntaḥ. paramāṇor nityatayā tadabhāvasya tatra darśayitum aśakyatvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:8004_0: buddhivad iti tu dṛṣṭānte hetvabhāvaśūnyatā. buddher amūrtatayā tadabhāvasya vaktum
GSP28mimsvtku:8004_1: aśakyatvāt. khavad iti tūbhayābhāvaśūnyatā, nityāmūrte tasminn ubhayābhāvo duradhigamo
GSP28mimsvtku:8005: darśayitavyā. tatsiddhyarthaṃ hi vipakṣād dhetor vyatirekaḥ kathyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:8006: yasya tu vipakṣaikadeśād api vyatireko nāsti, nāsau sādhyena vyāpto
GSP28mimsvtku:8007: bhavatīty asatyāṃ vyāptāv anarthakaṃ tādṛśasya vaidharmyasya vacanam ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- sādhyeneti || 128 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8008: yataś caivañjātīyako na sādhyena vyāpyate tena kvacid abhāvayos sāhitye dṛṣṭe 'pi na sarvatra gamyagamakabhāvo bhavatīty āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:8009_0: teneti. yady api yannityaṃ na bhavati tadamūrtam api na bhavati, yathā ghaṭaḥ kuḍyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:8009_1: veti, kvacid abhāvayos sāhityaṃ śakyate darśayitum. tathāpi na sarva(ḥ) śabdādi(ḥ)
GSP28mimsvtku:8009_2: nityatayā viśiṣṭo 'nena hetunā gamya iṣyate. kiñcid dhy amūrtaṃ nityam ākāśādi, kiñcid
GSP28mimsvtku:8009_3: anityaṃ karmādīti bhāvaḥ kim iti neṣyate ata āha -- sahadṛṣṭir iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:8010: vipakṣaikadeśanivṛttyā hi sahabhāvamātraṃ hetos sidhyati. na ca tanmātrasambandho 'numānāṅgam. kiṃ tarhi, vyāptiḥ. na cāsāv etāvatā
GSP28mimsvtku:8012: mūrtānityatvayukte 'pīti. idaṃ ca prāg eva vyākhyātam iti || 130 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8014: {3,78} vyāptyā sādharmya ukte ca na vaidharmyam
GSP28mimsvtku:8016_0: ity ucyate, na hi śatāṃśenāpi hetor vipakṣād vyatireke śaṅkyamāne gamakatvam astīty
GSP28mimsvtku:8016_1: aśeṣavipakṣo 'numātur vyatirekaṃ grahītum apekṣitaḥ. na cāsau duradhigamaḥ, ekadeśasthasyāpi
GSP28mimsvtku:8016_2: sarvādarśanasaukaryāt. darśanaṃ hi sarvavipakṣāṇāṃ duṣkaram, tadabhāvas tu saukaryaprāpta
GSP28mimsvtku:8016_3: eva. na cāyogyānupalambhān nedam adarśanaṃ hetor vyatirekāya prabhavatīti vācyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:8017: na hi no vipakṣādarśanād avinābhāvaniyamaḥ. kin tu tādātmyatadutpattinibandhanaḥ. vipakṣadarśane tu hetoḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:8018_0: paripanthinyavinābhāvo grahītum aśakyo bhavati. tac caikadeśasthasyāpi tāvannāsty
GSP28mimsvtku:8018_1: eveti paripanthini vṛttimātre darśanaṃ vyāpriyate. ato yadaivāgnikāryo dhūma ity
GSP28mimsvtku:8019: bhavatīti jñāyate. na cānvayajñānam eva vyatirekabuddhau nibandhanam,
GSP28mimsvtku:8021: agnidhūmasvalakṣaṇayos tatraiva niruddhayor anyatra darśanam asti,
GSP28mimsvtku:8022: yenānvayo 'nubhūyeta. tat kuto 'nvayaḥ kutastarāṃ ca tannibandhano
GSP28mimsvtku:8023: vyatirekaḥ. na ca viśeṣeṣu sāmānyaṃ nāma kiñcid anugataṃ svarūpam asti,
GSP28mimsvtku:8024: yanniyamyaniyāmakatayāvasīyeta, vikalpākāratvāt tasya. ato viśeṣā eva
GSP28mimsvtku:8025_0: kecit kayācid vyāvṛttyopalakṣitāḥ kañcid viśeṣaṃ vipakṣavyāvṛttimukhena gamayantīti
GSP28mimsvtku:8025_1: tatpradarśanārthaṃ vaidharmyavacanam eva nyāyyam iti. tān pratyāha -- aśeṣeti yuktirantena.
GSP28mimsvtku:8026: 'numānāṅgam. sa tu nādarśanamātrāt sidhyati. taddeśāgamanād api ca
GSP28mimsvtku:8027: tasyopapatteḥ. na ca kāryatvāvadhāraṇād asati kāraṇe 'bhāvaḥ, tasyaivāsati vyatireke duradhigamatvāt. yad dhi yasmin sati bhavati asati ca na bhavati
GSP28mimsvtku:8028_0: tattatkāryam. ato 'satyabhāvo{3,79}vagantavyaḥ. tataḥ kāryatā tadadhīne(ti) tu tasminn
GSP28mimsvtku:8028_1: itaretarāśrayatā. astu vādarśanamātrād vyatirekaḥ, tasya ca saukaryaṃ, naitāvatānumāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:8029: yuktir yogas sambandho 'nvaya ity anarthāntaram. nānvayo 'naṅgam iti
GSP28mimsvtku:8030: yāvat. tanmukhenaiva sarvapramātṝṇām anumānotpatteḥ. atas tatkathanārthaṃ sādharmyadṛṣṭānto 'pi vācya eva. nāsāv ekāntena pratyākhyātuṃ śakyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:8031: idaṃ cānvāruhya vacanam. yathokta eva siddhāntaḥ samyak sādharmyaprayoge na vaidharmyam apekṣaṇīyam iti. anvayasyaiva prādhānyāt tam antareṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:8032: vyatirekāsiddheḥ. avagate hi dhūmasyāgninā sambandhe 'rthād anagninivṛttis
GSP28mimsvtku:8033: sidhyati. atas sa tāvad vidhimukhena prathamaṃ darśayitavyaḥ, avasare tu vaidharmyam api kadācid ucyate. anaṅgatvam iti tu paṭhatām iyaṃ vyākhyā --
GSP28mimsvtku:8034: idaṃ hi liṅgasyānumāyām aṅgatvam yadanvayavyatirekau, tābhyāṃ hi tadaṅgaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:8035: bhavati. ato yathā vyatireko 'ṅgatvam, evam anvayāparanāmā yuktir apīti.
GSP28mimsvtku:8036_0: nanu liṅge 'pi śabdātmake pratīty uttarakālabhāvyanvayo 'naṅgam evāta āha -- śābde
GSP28mimsvtku:8036_1: 'bhidhāsyata iti. śābde hy anumānād bhinne pratīty uttarakālabhāvinī yuktir anaṅgam
GSP28mimsvtku:8038: iti. anumāne tu sarvatraivānvayaḥ pratīty aṅgam iti. ye tu tāvatā
GSP28mimsvtku:8039: nānaṅgatvam anvayasyety adhyāhṛtyātraivārthe śabde yuktir vakṣyate iti
GSP28mimsvtku:8040_0: vyācakṣate, teṣām aśrutānvayādhyāhāra eva tāvadupālambhaḥ. na cānvayasyānumānāṅgatve
GSP28mimsvtku:8040_1: śābde yuktir vakṣyate. atraiva jñātasambandhapadena tasyoktatvāt. ata evānvayādhīnatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:8042: yat tu bhedānām evānumāne gamyagamakatvaṃ teṣāṃ cānvayo na sambhavatīty uktam, tatrāha -- bodhaprasaṅga iti. na bhedānām anumānabodhe
GSP28mimsvtku:8044_0: niruddhatvāt. na cāpy{3,80}avinābhāvenāparasya tathāvidhasyaiva niyamaś śakyate 'nubhavitum.
GSP28mimsvtku:8044_1: na cāsati tasminnānumānāṅgaṃ sambhavatīti teṣām anvayābhāvo na doṣāyeti. yadi na
GSP28mimsvtku:8044_2: bhedānāṃ bodhaprasaṅgaḥ. kasya tarhi darśitam idaṃ, na bhedānugatam ekaṃ kim api
GSP28mimsvtku:8047_0: nipuṇato nirūpyamāṇasyāsambhavād vibhrama evāyam. yady evam asadrūpāropapravṛttam
GSP28mimsvtku:8047_1: anumānam apramāṇam eva. satyam. pratibandhabalena tu kiñcid eva svalakṣaṇaṃ kenāpi
GSP28mimsvtku:8047_2: vikalpākāreṇa sāmānyātmanā samadhigataṃ yad aparaṃ vikalpākārollikhitam eva svalakṣaṇaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:8048: ity ākhyāyate. avisaṃvādo hi naḥ prāmāṇye kāraṇam arthakriyāsthitiś
GSP28mimsvtku:8049: cāvisaṃvādaḥ. yadāhuḥ -- pramāṇam avisaṃvādi jñānam arthakriyāsthitiḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:8052: atasmiṃs tadgrahād bhrāntir avisaṃvādataḥ pramā iti |
GSP28mimsvtku:8053: ato bhedānām eva gamyagamakatvam. te ca na bhājanam anvayasyeti yuktam
GSP28mimsvtku:8054_0: evoktam ata āha -- astīti. asyārthaḥ. bhaved evaṃ yadi na bhedātiriktaṃ kiñcit sāmānyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:8054_1: vastu bhavet. asti tu tad ity ākṛtigranthe sakalaparoktadoṣaparihāreṇopapādayiṣyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:8054_2: tasya cānekadeśakālavyāpitā gamyata iti nābhājanam anvayasya. na cātasmiṃs tadgrahaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:8055: tasya. evaṃ ca yadanumānaprāmāṇyasiddhyarthaṃ paraiḥ kim api kāśaṃ kuśam avalambyate, tad api mandaprayojanam eveti || 133 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8056_0: anyan matam vyāptyāpi sādharmyadṛṣṭānta ukte vaidharmyam api vācyam iti, tattāvad
GSP28mimsvtku:8056_1: upanyasyati -- kecid iti pādatrayeṇa. kiṃ punas tadicchāyāṃ kāraṇam ata āha -- vyāvṛttiniyamecchayeti
GSP28mimsvtku:8056_2: etad eva vivṛṇoti -- hetāv iti. evaṃ hi manyante. yadā
GSP28mimsvtku:8057: hi{3,81}sādharmyadṛṣṭānte yatra dhūma ity uddiśya tatrāgnir eveti
GSP28mimsvtku:8058: saivakāram upādīyate, tadā hetau sādhyenaivāgnināvadhārite sarvato 'gner
GSP28mimsvtku:8059: anyamātrād vyāvṛttiḥ prāpnoti, na caitat sambhavati.
GSP28mimsvtku:8061: pakṣābhāvaprasaṅgāc ca. atas sādhyābhāva eva vyāvṛttiṃ niyantuṃ sarvadaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:8062: vaidharmyavacanam arthavat. sati hi tasminn agnyabhāve dhūmo na
GSP28mimsvtku:8064: etad api dūṣayati -- tat tu mandaphalam iti. tad idaṃ vaidharmyavacanam evaṃ kriyamāṇaṃ mandaphalam ity arthaḥ. kathaṃ mandaphalam ata āha -- yasmād iti. kiṃ nirūpitam ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:8065: vyāpakābhāvamātraṃ hīti. agnimān parvata iti pakṣavacane nirūpitam idam,
GSP28mimsvtku:8066: yathā niyamas tadvipakṣāc ca kalpyate nāvirodhina iti. atas sādharmyadṛṣṭānte 'pi vyāpyād dhūmāder vyāpakābhāvanivṛtti mātram eva darśayitavyam, nānyamātranivṛttir iti || 136 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8074: atra bhāṣyam -- tat tu dvividhaṃ pratyakṣato dṛṣṭasambandhaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭasambandhaṃ ca. tatra pratyakṣato dṛṣṭasambandhaṃ yathā --
GSP28mimsvtku:8077: gatismaraṇam iti. anena prameyadvaividhyād anumānadvaividhyam uktam iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:8078: atra kecin nītijñammanyā avadhṛtasvalakṣaṇam eva kvacid anumānena sāmānyato gṛhyata iti manyante. tadbhramāpanayāya bhāṣyakāreṇedam uktam --
GSP28mimsvtku:8079: tat tu dvividham, adṛṣṭasvalakṣaṇaviṣayam apy anumānam asti kriyādiṣv iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:8080: kathaṃ punar adṛṣṭasvalakṣaṇena sambandhadarśanam, utpattimataḥ phalasya darśanāt. yady apy anavadhṛtasvalakṣaṇena vastunā viśeṣatas sambandho
GSP28mimsvtku:8081_0: 'navagataḥ, sāmānyatas tu dṛśyate. sarvaṃ hi kādācitkaṃ phalaṃ kutaścid āgantukād
GSP28mimsvtku:8081_1: utpattimato jāyamānaṃ dṛṣṭam, tantusaṃyogebhya iva paṭaḥ. ato devadattasya bhūtapūrvapūrvottaradeśavibhāgasaṃyogau
GSP28mimsvtku:8081_2: kadācid upalabhyāgantukaḥ ko 'pi hetur anumīyate. tad idaṃ sāmānyato
GSP28mimsvtku:8084: svalakṣaṇāvadhāraṇāt prāk pratyakṣato dṛṣṭasambandham anumānam āhuḥ. na ca dravyam eva saṃyogavibhāgayoḥ kāraṇam iti vaktavyam. saty api tasminn
GSP28mimsvtku:8085: abhāvāt. na ca dravyāntarāgama eva śakyate kalpayituṃ, tasya pūrvadravyapratyabhijñayā bādhitatvāt. na ca sadṛśāparāparotpattivipralabdhā bhedaṃ na budhyanta iti sāmpratam,
GSP28mimsvtku:8086: deśādibhede 'pi tadbuddher aviparyayāt. uktaṃ ca vivaraṇakāreṇa --
GSP28mimsvtku:8087: kṣaṇabhaṅgas tu pratyabhijñānān nirākriyata eva. ato dṛṣṭakāraṇāsambhavād adṛṣṭaṃ kim api saṃyogavibhāgayoḥ kāraṇam anumīyate. tac ca karmety
GSP28mimsvtku:8088: ākhyāyate. ata eva pradeśāntareṣv api karmāpratyakṣam eveti. bhāṣyakāro darśayati -- yathā vakṣyati na hi te pratyakṣe iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:8089: apūrvasadbhāvapratipādanāvasare ca na karmaṇo rūpam upalabhāmaha iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:8090_0: yadāśrayaṃ deśāntaraṃ prāpayati tatkarmety ucyata iti ca. vyaktam eva deśāntaraprāptiphalonnīyamānatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:8090_1: eva karmaṇo darśayatīti siddhaṃ kriyādīnāṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭānumānaikaviṣayatvam. evaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:8091: anumānadvaividhyopapattir iti ye vadanti tān pratyāha -- dvaividhyaṃ nopapannam iti. idam uktaprakāraṃ dvaividhyam anupapannam iti bhāvaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:8092_0: katham anupapannam ata āha -- yathaiveti pādatrayeṇa. yathā khalv agnidhūmākṛtyoḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:8092_1: pratyakṣayoḥ pratyakṣadṛṣṭas sambandho, bhavati evaṃ gatiprāptyākṛtyoḥ, tayor api
GSP28mimsvtku:8093_0: deśāntaraṃ prāpnuvantaṃ devadattvaṃ gacchatīti manyāmahe. neyaṃ jātyādivikalpanābhyaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:8093_2: ca. nanu devadatte deśasaṃyogavibhāgātiriktam aparaṃ karmaṇaḥ kim api rūpam aparokṣam
GSP28mimsvtku:8094: īkṣāmahe. phaladarśanenaiva tadanumīyate. jāter vā vyaktito
GSP28mimsvtku:8095: vya(tiriktā)yāḥ kiṃ rūpam anubhūyate, yad asau pratyakṣaviṣayatayāvasīyate. rūpam eva sā vyakteḥ, kim asyā rūpāntareṇeti
GSP28mimsvtku:8096: cet, karma vā kim arūpam. idam api hi tato na bhidyata eva. āgantukaṃ tu kevalam. ato jātikalpanāvat karmakalpanām api pratyakṣapakṣa eva
GSP28mimsvtku:8097: nikṣipantaḥ pañcadhā savikalpakaṃ pratyakṣaṃ vibhajāmahe. āha ca --
GSP28mimsvtku:8098: na hi dṛṣṭipathaṃ prāptaṃ devadattaṃ nirūpayan |
GSP28mimsvtku:8099: paṭhan kāvyaṃ svasaṃjñoktaṃ parokṣam iva budhyate ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8100: iti. phalānumeye tu karmaṇyādityavad devadattavat pratītiprasaṅgaḥ. na caiṣa devadattam iva calantaṃ spandamānam ādityam api paśyatīti dṛśyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:8101: sthiraṃ hi sarvadā tanmaṇḍalam avalokyate. saṃyogavibhāgau tu tasyāpi
GSP28mimsvtku:8102: pratīyete eveti tulya(?va/tvā)t tābhyām ubhayatrāpy ānumānikaḥ pratyayo
GSP28mimsvtku:8103_0: bhavet. api ca vibhāgopakrame saṃyogāvasāne ca karmaṇi tata unnīyamāne gacchatīti
GSP28mimsvtku:8103_1: vartamānanirbhāsaḥ pratyayo na bhavet, atītaṃ hi tat, tadā kathaṃ vartamānākārabuddhigocaro
GSP28mimsvtku:8104: upajāyeta. sthāṇau ca śyenaviyukte śyena iva karmānumīyeta. tataś ca so
GSP28mimsvtku:8105: 'pi gacchatīti buddhiviṣayatām āpadyeta. yadi mataṃ na vibhāgamātrāt
GSP28mimsvtku:8106: karmānumānam, api tarhi vibhāgapūrvakāt saṃyogād iti. evaṃ tarhi yadaikaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:8107: śyenaviyuktaḥ sthāṇur anyena saṃyujyate tatra prasaṅgaḥ. calitvāvasthite ca devadatte. yadi tūcyate yo 'yam utpatataḥ śyenasya deśāntarasaṃyogaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:8108: tasya sthāṇusamavetena karmaṇā niṣpattyasambhavān na tatra karmānumānam
GSP28mimsvtku:8109: iti. kalpyatāṃ tarhi śyene 'pi karma, sthāṇau tu prasaṅgān ativṛttir eva.
GSP28mimsvtku:8111: asti ca sthāṇau kāraṇapratibaddhaphaladarśanam iti nānumānodayaś
GSP28mimsvtku:8112_0: śakyate{3,84}niroddhum. śyenasamavāyinaiva karmaṇā sthāṇāv api saṃyogavibhāgopapattau
GSP28mimsvtku:8112_1: na tadgatakarmānumānam iti cet tan na. na hi prayojanānusāriṇy anumānavyavasthā.
GSP28mimsvtku:8112_2: vyāptaṃ hi liṅgaṃ yatra yatra dṛśyate
GSP28mimsvtku:8113: tatra tatra vyāpakam upasthāpayati. arthāpattir hy anyathopapattyā
GSP28mimsvtku:8114: parihriyate nānumānam. yadi tv avicchinnotpattayas saṃyogavibhāgāḥ kriyānumāne kāraṇam, evaṃ tarhi na kācid gatir anumīyeta,
GSP28mimsvtku:8116: evāvagateḥ. atha svadeśasaṃyogavibhāgahetukaṃ kriyānumānam. na ca sthāṇoḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:8117: śyeno deśa ity ucyate. evam api matsyeṣu prasaṅgānativṛttir eva, teṣāṃ hi jalaṃ svadeśa eva. parokṣavyomavādināṃ ca vihaṅgame gacchatīti
GSP28mimsvtku:8120: pratyayaḥ, santamase 'pi bhāvāt. na ca tamo nāma kiñcid vastv asti
GSP28mimsvtku:8121_0: bhavatsiddhānte, bhāso 'bhāvamātratvāt tasya. atas tatsaṃyogavibhāgahetuko 'pi na
GSP28mimsvtku:8121_1: kriyāvasāyaś śakyate samādhātum iti na pratyakṣe karmaṇi dvaividhyopapattiḥ. yā tu
GSP28mimsvtku:8121_2: na hi te pratyakṣe ity apratyakṣatoktā, tāṃ tatraivānyathā vyākhyāsyāmaḥ. rūpaśabdāvibhāgam
GSP28mimsvtku:8121_3: iti ca vadatā sūtrakāreṇa pratyakṣam eva karmety āsthitam. apūrvādhikaraṇe ca na
GSP28mimsvtku:8123: eva. itarathā hy upalabdhimātrapratiṣedhe śaśaśṛṅgādivannityābhāva eva karmaṇo bhavet. na hi tatra pratyakṣopalabdhimātram eva pratiṣiddham.
GSP28mimsvtku:8124: yadāśrayaṃ deśāntaraṃ prāpayatīti ca na phalānumeyatvābhiprāyam. kiṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:8125: tarhi. āśrayasya deśāntaraprāpakatvarūpeṇa na svarūpataḥ karmāstīty apūrvātmanā karmaṇo 'vasthānaṃ darśayati. ihāpi devadattasya gatipūrvikāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:8126: deśāntaraprāptim upalabhyeti vadan devadatte pratyakṣatām eva gater
GSP28mimsvtku:8127: darśayati. anyathā tu devadattādityayor ubhayor api karmaṇo 'numeyatvāt
GSP28mimsvtku:8128: kena viśeṣeṇāditye gatyanumānaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭatayodāhriyate. devadatte
GSP28mimsvtku:8129: 'pi hi sāmānyato dṛṣṭād eva gatisiddhiḥ. ato naivaṃvidhaṃ granthato
GSP28mimsvtku:8130: yuktito vā ghaṭata iti sūktam anupapannam iti. pratiyoginor hi parasparam
GSP28mimsvtku:8131: asaṅkare dvaividhyaṃ bhavati. iha tu yat{3,85}pratyakṣadṛṣṭasambandhasya
GSP28mimsvtku:8132: pratiyogitayopāttaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭasambandhaṃ tatrāpi gatiprāptyākṛtyoḥ pratyakṣadṛṣṭa eva sambandha iti na pratiyoginor asaṅkara iti || 138 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8133: yadi tu dṛṣṭānte pratyakṣatāyām api pakṣīkṛtād ity agater apratyakṣatvāt na pratyakṣadṛṣṭas sambandha ity ucyate. tad etad āśaṅkate tāvat -- āditye
GSP28mimsvtku:8134: 'nupalabdhiś ced iti. idānīṃ dūṣayati -- neti. kāraṇam āha -- deśe 'py
GSP28mimsvtku:8135: adhunātana iti. deśe 'py adhunātane -- samprati pramīyamāṇe,
GSP28mimsvtku:8136_0: apratyakṣatopalabdhir evety arthaḥ. yadi tv agnidhūmākṛtyoḥ kvacin mahānasādau apratyakṣopalabdhir
GSP28mimsvtku:8136_1: iṣyate sā tarhi devadatte 'pi gateḥ pratyakṣatvād astīty āha -- kvacid iti || 139 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8137_0: evaṃ tāvat pratyakṣato dṛṣṭatā sāmānyato dṛṣṭatayā saṅkīryate ity uktam. idānīṃ sāmānyato
GSP28mimsvtku:8137_1: dṛṣṭatāpi pratyakṣato dṛṣṭābhimatāgnyākṛtyanumāne saṅkīryata ity āha -- yadīti pādatrayeṇa.
GSP28mimsvtku:8138_0: dṛṣṭateṣyate, sā tarhi mahānasādidharmyantarāpekṣayāgnidhūmayor api gamyagamakatvenāvasthitayoḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:8138_1: prāpnoty eva. sāmānyato hy avivakṣitadeśādibhedam idam avagataṃ dhūmavān agnimān
GSP28mimsvtku:8138_2: iti, yathā deśāntaraprāptyadhikaraṇaṃ gatyadhikaraṇam iti. ataḥ pratiyogitvarahitam
GSP28mimsvtku:8138_3: evedam ubhayam iti dvaividhyānupapattir ity ākṣepaḥ. evam ākṣioya samādadhāti --
GSP28mimsvtku:8138_4: tasmād evaṃ pracakṣata iti. yathoktadvaividhyāsambhavād evaṃ vakṣyamāṇaprakāreṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:8138_5: dvaividhyaṃ varṇanīyam iti bhāvaḥ tatra pratyakṣasambandhaṃ tāvad udāharati -- pratyakṣeti
GSP28mimsvtku:8138_6: yudhyate 'ntena. yadā hi yayor evāgnidhūmaviśeṣayoḥ, gomayendhano yam agniḥ --
GSP28mimsvtku:8139: gomayam indhanam asyeti{3,86}bahuvrīhiḥ, tajjanyo 'yaṃ dhūmaviśeṣa iti ca
GSP28mimsvtku:8140_0: prāk pratyakṣeṇa matiṃ kṛtvā punaś ca kiyatā vilambanenānyatra kvacid gatvā gatas
GSP28mimsvtku:8140_1: san taddeśasthena tenaiva dhūmaviśeṣeṇa tam evāgniviśeṣaṃ budhyate, tadā tatpratyakṣadṛṣṭasambandham
GSP28mimsvtku:8141: anena ca viśeṣadṛṣṭam eva pratyakṣadṛṣṭaśabdenocyata iti vyākhyātam.
GSP28mimsvtku:8142: pratyakṣaśabdena hi viśeṣo lakṣyate. pratyakṣeṇa hy ayam evaṃvidho
GSP28mimsvtku:8144: pramāṇāntareṇa. taddvāreṇa tv anumānasyāpi tādṛśo viśeṣo viṣayo bhavatīti yuktaiva pratyakṣaśabdena viśeṣalakṣaṇā. viśeṣadṛṣṭaṃ ca sāmānyato
GSP28mimsvtku:8145: dṛṣṭasya bhavati pratiyogīti dvaividhyopapattir iti bhāvaḥ. nanu viśeṣadṛṣṭaṃ nāma (na) pramāṇabhedaḥ. na cedaṃ pramāṇam, gṛhītaviṣayatvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:8146_0: taddeśasthitenaiva hi dhūmena tasminn eva deśe sa eva gomayendhanajanyāgnir anumīyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:8146_1: ato deśabhedābhāvād aprāmāṇyam eva, ata āha -- tasyeti pādatrayeṇa. tasyaivaṃvidhasya
GSP28mimsvtku:8146_2: pratyakṣadṛṣṭasya sandihyamānasadbhāvavastubodhāt pramāṇatā bhavati. yady api deśabhedo
GSP28mimsvtku:8147: nāsti. kālabhedāt tu saṃśayānasya saṃśayocchedadvāreṇa prāmāṇyam avihatam
GSP28mimsvtku:8148: iti. etac ca vindhyavāsināpi viśeṣadṛṣṭatvenodāhṛtam ity āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:8150: yadi viśeṣadṛṣṭodāharaṇam idaṃ kathaṃ tarhi bhāṣye
GSP28mimsvtku:8151: ākṛtigrahaṇam. evaṃ hi viśeṣa eva darśayitavyo bhavet. ata āha -- ākṛtyor
GSP28mimsvtku:8154_0: hetusādhyatvam. evaṃ hy atra pratyayaḥ. sa evāyam adya yāvadanuvartamāno gomayendhanavikārasya
GSP28mimsvtku:8154_1: dhūmasyākāro dṛśyate. ata eva tadindhanayonir agnir anuvartata ity ato nānupapannam
GSP28mimsvtku:8155: yady evam avivakṣitāvāntaraviśeṣam agnidhūmāntaram eva sāmānyato dṛṣṭodāharaṇatayā vācyam. kim ādityodāharaṇena. ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:8158: bhavati, naivaṃ gatiprāptyākṛtyoḥ. ataḥ prāptyākṛtimātrād gatyākṛtimātrānumānam āditya ekāntatas sāmānyato dṛṣṭasambandham iti
GSP28mimsvtku:8160: kiṃ punas sāmānyatas sambandhagrahaṇe pramāṇam. na hy agṛhītayos sambandhinos sambandhagrahaṇam asti. na ca sāmānyayoḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:8162: anavasthāpātāt. ata āha -- pratyakṣaviṣayatvam iti. bhaved anavasthā, yady anumānena sāmānyagrahaṇam iṣyate. tasya tu savikalpakasiddhau
GSP28mimsvtku:8163: pratyakṣaviṣayatvam upapādyānta upasaṃhṛtaṃ pratyakṣatvam atas siddhaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:8164_0: sāmānyasyeti. nanu vastv eva na sāmānyaṃ kiñcid asti nāma. tasya bhinnābhinnasyānirūpaṇād
GSP28mimsvtku:8164_1: ata āha -- vastutvaṃ ceti. vastutvam apy ākṛtigranthe vistareṇa pratipādayiṣyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:8164_2: pratyakṣaviṣayatāpratipādanena ca pratyakṣe 'pi prasādhitaprāyam eva. atra ca asti
GSP28mimsvtku:8164_3: sāmānyavastuṣv ity anvayopapādanāya sāmānyasya vastutvam upanyastam eva. ayaṃ tu
GSP28mimsvtku:8164_4: hetukathanārthaḥ punarupanyāsa iti. yas tu haituko na hetum antareṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:8165: pramāṇāntarasiddhāv ādriyate. taṃ prati hetunaivobhayam upapādayiṣyāma ity āha -- atreti {3,88} tatra vastutvaprasādhanārthaṃ tāvad hetum āha -- dhūmād
GSP28mimsvtku:8166: agnyanumānasyeti. bauddhā hy avastusāmānyālambanam anumānam ācakṣate.
GSP28mimsvtku:8167: sāmānyasya vikalpākāramātrābhyupagamāt. ata eva bhrāntir evānumānaṃ,
GSP28mimsvtku:8168_0: sambandhabalena svalakṣaṇarūpam upasthāpayatīti pramāṇam ity āhuḥ. tān eva pratīdam
GSP28mimsvtku:8168_1: ucyate -- vastv ālambanam anumānam abhāvānyapramāṇatvāt yathā svārthe śrotrādibuddhiḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:8168_2: yā hi svaviṣaye śrotrādibhir indriyair buddhir
GSP28mimsvtku:8169: janyate, sā vastv ālambanaiva. yena ca yadindriyaṃ sannikṛṣyate sa tasya
GSP28mimsvtku:8170: svārthaḥ prāpyakāritvād indriyāṇām. tad iha mṛgatṛṣṇādijñānanirākaraṇārthaṃ svārthaviśeṣaṇam. aviśeṣeṇopādāne tu nābhāvānyapramāṇatvasya vastvālambanatayā vyāptiḥ kathitā bhavet.
GSP28mimsvtku:8171: bhrāntīnām ubhayavikalatvāt. na hi tāḥ pramāṇam. na ca vastv ālambanāḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:8172: anyasamprayuktendriyasya hi tā anyaviṣayā jāyante. īdṛśam eva jñānam
GSP28mimsvtku:8173_0: avastvālambanaṃ, na punaratyantāsadartham. evaṃ vastvālambanatve 'numānasya sādhite
GSP28mimsvtku:8173_1: arthāt sāmānyaṃ vastv ity uktaṃ bhavati. idaṃ cāvastvālambanatvam anumānasyārthapadaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:8173_2: prayuñjānena bhāṣyakāreṇa nirākṛtam. anarthaviṣayam anumānam iti bauddhā manyante.
GSP28mimsvtku:8175_0: arthasambandhena pravṛttes tadavyabhicārāt pramāṇam anumānam iti, teṣām idam uttaram
GSP28mimsvtku:8175_1: arthas sāmānyam anumānasya viṣayo bāhya eva. na vikalpākāramātram ity ākṛtigranthe
GSP28mimsvtku:8177: sāmānyasya ca vastutvam iti. sāmānyaṃ vastu abhāvānyaprameyatvād
GSP28mimsvtku:8178: asādhāraṇavastuvad iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandha iti. pratyakṣaviṣayatām idānīṃ prayogeṇa darśayati -- pratyakṣeti pādatrayeṇa.
GSP28mimsvtku:8179: yadabhāvānyaprameyaṃ tat pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyata eva. yathā saugatānām evāsādhāraṇaṃ vastv iti || 148 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8180: {3,89} bauddhānām eva tu sāmānyam anumānaikaviṣayaṃ manvānānām
GSP28mimsvtku:8181_0: anavasthā prasajyata ity āha -- sāmānyam iti pañcabhiḥ. nigadavyākhyāto granthaḥ ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8181_1: 149 -- yadi tūcyate liṅgabhūtasāmānyagrahaṇārtham anumānāpekṣāyām anavasthā bhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:8182: dhūmādisvalakṣaṇadarśanaprabhavavikalpavedyatvāt tasya. na cāsāv apramāṇam, arthakriyāsamarthavastupratilambhāt. na ca pramāṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:8183: anarthaviṣayatvāt. ato 'nirvacanīyavikalpasiddhatvāt liṅgasya nānavasthā bhavatīty āśaṅkyāha -- atheti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- na tāvat pramāṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:8184: apramāṇaṃ ca jñānaṃ sambhavati. viruddhasvabhāvayor ekatra pratiṣedhe
GSP28mimsvtku:8188: evāpadyeta.{3,90}pramāṇāntaraṃ ca sad yathā talliṅgasaṃvedane pramāṇam iṣyate, evaṃ liṅginy api prāpnoti. evaṃ ca vakṣyamāṇaprasaṅgo bhavet.
GSP28mimsvtku:8189: pramāṇād apramāṇād veti vadannanirdhāritobhayarūpatāṃ vikalpasya darśayatīti || 154 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8190: astu tarhi liṅgino 'pi tathaivāvagamaḥ, ko doṣaḥ, ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:8191_0: evam apīti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- anavasthām api prasañjayatām asmākam anumānocchedāpādanam
GSP28mimsvtku:8191_1: abhimatam. pramāṇāntarābhyupagame 'pi cānumānocchedo bhavaty eva. tad eva hi pramāṇaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:8194_0: tato 'pramāṇāvagatāl liṅgāl liṅgijñānam api mithyā bhavet. bāṣpād iva dhūmasaṃviditād
GSP28mimsvtku:8194_1: agnijñānam. evaṃ ca nānumānam iti. sa evānumānasya nityocchedaṃ ity abhiprāyeṇāha
GSP28mimsvtku:8195: atra codayati -- nanv iti. yathā hy apramāṇam eva sambandhasmaraṇaṃ pramāṇakāraṇam iṣyate tathā liṅgajñānam api bhaviṣyatīty arthaḥ || 157 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8196: pariharati -- tatreti. smṛtir hi pūrvajñānād bhavantī tadupasthāpanadvāreṇānumāyām upayujyate. tac ca pramāṇam eveti tadanusārī nirṇayo yukta iti || 158 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8197_0: {3,91} na caiṣa prakāro liṅgagatau sambhavatīty āha -- na tv iti. na hy atra prāg
GSP28mimsvtku:8197_1: api liṅgāvagame pramāṇaṃ kiñcid upapadyate, yat pramāṇajñānenopasthāpyata iti. na
GSP28mimsvtku:8197_2: ca liṅgajñānam api smṛtir eveti vācyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:8199_1: ato 'trāpi nirvikalpakapramāṇāntarato nirṇayo yukta eva. ata āha -- smārtam iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:8200_0: gṛhītaprāpakatayā smaraṇam, evam etad api liṅgajñānaṃ nirvikalpakagṛhītaprāpakatayā
GSP28mimsvtku:8200_1: tadabhedena smārtam iti yo vadati tasya vandhyāsute 'pi smaraṇaśaktir anivāritā.
GSP28mimsvtku:8201_0: sthitiḥ. na ca liṅgasāmānyajñānaṃ nirvikalpakagṛhītasvalakṣaṇālambanam iti kathaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:8201_1: smṛtiḥ. yad atra prakāśate tan na gṛhītaṃ, yac ca gṛhītaṃ tan na prakāśata iti na
GSP28mimsvtku:8203: nanv anumānena liṅgasāmānyajñāne 'navasthā bhavati, yadi sāmānyātmakam eva liṅgaṃ tadgrahaṇārtham iṣyate, tasyānumānavedyatvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:8204: asādhāraṇa evārthātmā sāmānyajñāne liṅgaṃ bhaviṣyati, sa ca pratyakṣa
GSP28mimsvtku:8205: eveti nānavasthā. ata āha -- na ceti. kiṃ na kāraṇam ata āha -- yasmād
GSP28mimsvtku:8206_0: iti. dṛṣṭāvinābhāvaṃ liṅgaṃ bhavati. na cāsya tena sāmānyenāvinābhāvaḥ kathañcid
GSP28mimsvtku:8206_1: deśataḥ kālato vā dṛṣṭaḥ. asādhāraṇasya bhāvāntareṣv anusyūtyasambhavād ekatra dṛṣṭasya
GSP28mimsvtku:8208: sāmānyarūpatāpattir ity āha -- syād veti. atra kāraṇam āha -- na hīti ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8209: itaś cāsādhāraṇo 'rthātmā na liṅgam ity āha -- na ceti. dhūmādir hi dhūmo 'yam ityādivikalpāspadīkṛto 'gnyāder liṅgam iti dṛṣṭam.
GSP28mimsvtku:8210: asādhāraṇas tu kenacid rūpeṇāpy avyapadeśyaḥ kathaṃ liṅga bhaved iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:8211: liṅgatvaṃ nopapadyata iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandha iti. nanu tiraścām asaty
GSP28mimsvtku:8212_0: eva śabdollekhe 'sādhāraṇarūpadarśinām evānumānaṃ dṛṣṭamato nāvyapadeśyatvād aliṅgatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:8212_1: ata āha -- vikalpeti pādatrayeṇa. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- mā nāma tiraścāṃ śabdollekho
GSP28mimsvtku:8213: api pūrvāparānusandhānātmako 'sty eva. ato yuktam eva teṣām anumāne 'vyapadeśyasyāpi liṅgatvam. asādhāraṇas tu pūrvāparānusandhānād
GSP28mimsvtku:8214: vinārthavikalparahito 'pīti kathaṃ liṅgam. na hi so 'yam ity anārūḍho buddhau dhūmo 'gner liṅgaṃ bhavati. na caivam asādhāraṇe sambhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:8217: te 'py anvayābhāvād aliṅgaṃ, kim aṅga punarnirvikalpakaikagocaro
GSP28mimsvtku:8218: 'sādhāraṇo 'rthātmā ity āha -- kalpyanta iti. anvayābhāvād evāsādhāraṇajñānam api liṅgisāmānyajñāne na liṅgam ity āha -- etasmād eveti || 164 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8219: yadi tv anvayasiddhyartham asādhāraṇasya sāmānyarūpateṣyate, tato liṅgasāmānyagrahaṇa ivānavasthāprasaṅgāt tasyāpy anavadhāraṇam ity āha
GSP28mimsvtku:8220: -{3,93}sāmānyeti. yadi tu kasmiṃścid evāsādhāraṇe sāmānyena jñātasambandhe
GSP28mimsvtku:8221: nyadarśināpi sāmānyam anumīyate. evaṃ tarhi sarva eva sarvasya pratyāyako
GSP28mimsvtku:8222: bhavet. aviśeṣād ity āha -- kvacid veti || 165 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8223: evaṃ tāvan na liṅgāvadhāraṇe pramāṇam astīty uktam. idānīm anvayagrahaṇakāle liṅgijñāne 'pi na kiñcit pramāṇam astīty āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:8224_0: sambandhānubhava iti. nāgṛhīte liṅgini tatsambaddhaṃ liṅgaṃ śakyate 'vagantum. na
GSP28mimsvtku:8224_1: cānumānapravṛtteḥ prāk tasmin sāmānyātmani bhavanaḥ kiñcit pramāṇam asty asmākam
GSP28mimsvtku:8224_2: iva pratyakṣam, ato liṅginy apy avagamyamāne
GSP28mimsvtku:8227: liṅgaliṅgisaṃvyavahāraḥ, kim ihātinirbandhena. kācid eva hi vāsanodbhūtā kiñcil liṅgākāraṃ vikalpam āvirbhāvayantī kiñcid evānumānasaṃvyavahāraṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:8228: pravartayati. yathāhuḥ -- sa evāyam anumānānumeyavyavahāro buddhyārūḍhena
GSP28mimsvtku:8229: dharmadharminyāyena, na bahissadasattvam apekṣata iti, ata āha -- na
GSP28mimsvtku:8230: cāpīti. na vāsanāmātranirmitaṃ liṅgajñānam. vāsanā hi pūrvānubhavāhitas
GSP28mimsvtku:8231: saṃskāraḥ. nāsau liṅgasāmānyasya śaśaviṣāṇādivadatyantāsatas sambhavatīti kathaṃ vāsanāmātrālliṅgajñānasya sambhava iti. tannibandhane ca liṅgajñāna
GSP28mimsvtku:8232: iṣyamāṇe tadvad eva liṅgijñānopapatter anarthakaṃ trirūpāl liṅgato
GSP28mimsvtku:8233: 'rthadṛganumānam ity anumānaprāmāṇyāśrayaṇam ity āha -- liṅgijñānaṃ ceti || 167 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8234: {3,94} nanv iyam anavasthā meghābhāvena vṛṣṭyabhāvānumāne bhavato 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:8236_0: anavasthāpadyate. ata āha -- yatreti. yatra hi vṛṣṭyabhāve meghābhāvo liṅgaṃ nāsāv
GSP28mimsvtku:8237: pratyakṣasāmānyavādināṃ tu na naḥ kācid anavasthety āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:8238: pratyakṣāvagatād iti. ataḥ pratyakṣād ity arthaḥ || 169 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8239: anumitānumāne tarhy anavasthā, ata āha -- yatrāpīti. pratyakṣā hi deśāntaraprāptir maulikaṃ mūle bhavaṃ liṅgaṃ, tena gatim anumāyāditye
GSP28mimsvtku:8241: nanv anityaś śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāt, kṛtakatvaṃ ca tatra darśanād ity evaṃ karmānantarabhāvitayā kṛtakatve sādhyamāne karmaṇo 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:8242: hetvantarād anumāne 'navasthā bhaved ata āha -- liṅgatvam iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:8244: iti kārakavyāpārānantarabhāvitvaṃ liṅgam uktam. tatra ca kārakaviśiṣṭā
GSP28mimsvtku:8245: kriyā tadviśiṣṭaṃ vā kārakam anantarabhāvitāṃ viśiṃṣalliṅgam āpatati.
GSP28mimsvtku:8246: ubhayaṃ{3,95}ca tatpratyakṣam. kriyāyās tāvat pratyakṣatvam anantaram eva sādhitam. kārakam api tadvat pratyakṣam eva. śaktis tu parokṣā. sā ca na
GSP28mimsvtku:8247: tāvad iha liṅgam. na cānumeyā. ataḥ kriyākārakayor ubhayor api pratyakṣatvān na dūragamanam. anumeyakarmavādinām api hi
GSP28mimsvtku:8249_0: evaṃ tāvadanumānasyāsati sāmānyasya vastutve pratyakṣatve ca dausthityam uktam idānīṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:8249_1: sarvam eva pramāṇajātaṃ sāmānyasya dausthitye dusthitam āpadyeta teṣām api sāmānyāśrayatvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:8252_0: sāmānyasya ca pratyakṣatvam, itarathā tv anavasthā prāpnotīty upasaṃharati -- tasmād
GSP28mimsvtku:8252_1: iti evaṃ tāvat sāmānyasya pratyakṣatvaṃ vastunā copapāditā idānīṃ viśeṣā eva pratyakṣeṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:8252_2: gṛhyanta iti ye vadanti, tān pratyāha --
GSP28mimsvtku:8253: pratyakṣeti. viśeṣo hi yadi tāvadavayavī dravyam abhimataḥ, sa cāvayavavastvantarāpekṣas sāmānyāṃśo 'smābhiḥ kīrtyata iti kathaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:8255: yadi tv avayavirūpādaya eva viśeṣā iṣyante, tad apy ayuktam. te
GSP28mimsvtku:8256: 'pi hi svaviśeṣanīlādyapekṣayā sāmānyam evety āha -- rūpādayo
GSP28mimsvtku:8257: hīti.{3,96}yadi tu nīlādaya eva viśeṣā iti matam. tan na. teṣām apy avāntaranīlādyapekṣayā sāmānyarūpatvād ity āha -- svaviśeṣān iti || 175 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8258: yadi tv ekabhramarādidravyanīlimaiva viśeṣa iṣyate, tan na.
GSP28mimsvtku:8260: pakṣanīlimāpi tadavayavanīlāpekṣayā sāmānyam eva. evaṃ ca aparamāṇubhyaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:8261: prasaṅgo darśayitavya ity āha -- te cāpīti. nirbhāgā hi paramāṇava iti tadrūpam asādhāraṇam eveti. tebhyas tu prāk dvyaṇukarūpam api dvayos
GSP28mimsvtku:8263: nanv astu paramāṇurūpam eva viśeṣaḥ, sa eva naḥ pratyakṣo bhaviṣyaty ata āha -- na cāntyeneti. vyavahārārthaṃ hi pramāṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:8264: anusriyate, na vyasanitayā. na cāntyena viśeṣeṇa vyavahāraḥ kasyacid astīti kiṃ tatpratyakṣatayeti. nanūpekṣāphalam api pramāṇaṃ bhavaty eva,
GSP28mimsvtku:8265: ata āha -- na ceti. na naḥ paramāṇūnāṃ rūpaṃ sthūle vartamānānāṃ tantūnām iva paṭe pratyakṣaṃ vibhaktānāṃ veti na kathañcid viśeṣaviṣayatā
GSP28mimsvtku:8267_0: nanu paramāṇava eva bhinnās sañcitā gṛhyante na kāryadravyam ekam. ataḥ kathaṃ tatsāvayaveṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:8267_1: sāmānyam ity ucyate. sañcitā eva cānanyavṛttitayā viśeṣāsādhāraṇādipadavācyā iti
GSP28mimsvtku:8268_0: mā nāmaikaikataḥ paramāṇur akṣagocaro bhaved ata āha -- bhedeneti. eko hi sarvadā
GSP28mimsvtku:8268_1: sarveṣāṃ ca bhāvaḥ prakāśate na paramāṇubhedāḥ. na ca bhedenāgṛhyamāṇo 'bhedo gṛhyata
GSP28mimsvtku:8269: nanv ayam eva bhedāvagraho{3,97}yo 'yam abhinnaprakāśaḥ, kiṃ bhedagrahaṇenāta āha -- na ca bhinneti. nābhinnākārabuddhibodhyo bhedaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:8271_0: nanv asaty apy ekasmin samudāyālambano 'yam abhinnāvabhāso bhaviṣyatīty ata āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:8271_1: samudāya iti. ye hi sāmānyam eva sarvajagatsaṃviditam apalapanti kutas teṣāṃ samudāyo
GSP28mimsvtku:8272: yadālambano 'bhinnapratibhāso bhaviṣyati. api ca sarvadā sarve caikaṃ dravyam avabudhyante kathaṃ tad anyathā bhaviṣyatīty āha -- na ca sarvadeti || 179 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8273_0: kiñcāyaṃ samudāyo 'pi naikajātyā vinopapadyeta. na hi nānājātīyeṣu vṛkṣaghaṭaloṣṭeṣu
GSP28mimsvtku:8273_1: kasyacit samudāyabuddhir asti. atas samudāye 'pīṣyamāṇe 'ṇutvasāmānyam abhyupagantavyam
GSP28mimsvtku:8273_2: āpadyeta bhavatām ity āha -- na ceti. hetau caḥ || 180 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8274: nanu nānekāvayavavṛttyanusandhānena vinā tatsāmānyarūpaṃ dravyam abhyupagantuṃ śakyam. na caindriyakaṃ jñānam etā(?v i/va)ti
GSP28mimsvtku:8275_0: samartham avikalpakatvāt tasya. ata āha -- sāmānyam itīti. yady apy anekānugamakḷptes
GSP28mimsvtku:8275_1: tannānāvayavavyāsaṅgi dravyaṃ sāmānyam ity evaṃ vikalpya na gṛhyate. tathāpi tadekarūpaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:8275_2: tāvannirvikalpakenāpi gṛhyata eveti nāpahnotuṃ śakyata iti vyāsajyavṛttyavayavisāmānyanyāyena
GSP28mimsvtku:8275_3: prativyaktivartino 'pi gotvādisāmānyasyaindriyakatvaṃ darśayitavyam. tad api sāmānyam
GSP28mimsvtku:8275_4: ity anena rūpeṇāgrāhyaṃ vastutas sāmānyam eva gṛhyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:8276: śabdādismaraṇottarakālaṃ tv anekānugamāvamarśāt sāmānyam iti vikalpya
GSP28mimsvtku:8277: gṛhyate. idaṃ ca savikalpakasiddhāv uktam eva. ato naivaṃ vācyam --
GSP28mimsvtku:8278: astvavayavisāmānyasya svalakṣaṇāparanāmna indriyair grahaṇam, na tu prativyaktiniveśina iti || 181 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8280: tadanenaitadāpāditam -- kim idaṃ mudhaiva sāmānyasya pratyakṣatā neṣyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:8281: viśeṣam api hi pratyakṣam icchadbhir balāt sāmānyam eva pratyakṣam
GSP28mimsvtku:8282: āśrayaṇīyam, sarvasya hi sunipuṇaṃ nirūpyamāṇasya rūpādes sāmānyarūpatvād,
GSP28mimsvtku:8283: dravyasya ca nānāvayavasādhāraṇasya tādrūpyāt, svatantraṃ paramāṇusañcayamātrasya cānupalambhād dravyāpalāpe ca pratyakṣavirodhāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:8284: ato 'vayavisāmānyaṃ tatsamavetāni ca gotvādisāmānyāni sarvāṇy eva pratyakṣāṇi na viśeṣā eveti tātparyam. evamparatvād eva ca
GSP28mimsvtku:8285_1: nanu bhavadbhir mīmāṃsakais tāvadavaśyam abhyupagantavyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ. atas teṣām
GSP28mimsvtku:8285_2: evobhayasiddhānāṃ param ekākārabuddhijananaśaktimātram evopakalpitam. kiṃ dharmikalpanayā.
GSP28mimsvtku:8286: laghīyasī hi tatkalpanāto dharmakalpanā. ata āha -- mīmāṃsakaiś ceti. ayam
GSP28mimsvtku:8287: abhiprāyaḥ. yad dhi pramāṇenopanīyate, tad asmābhir iṣyate, na ca sthūlaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:8288_0: hitvā paramāṇava evākṣajāyāṃ buddhau bhāsante, yattānupetya sthūlam avajānīmahe.
GSP28mimsvtku:8288_1: tadānuguṇyena tu yady aṇavo vyā(?pa /pā)dyante, bhavantu, na tadbalena mūlabhūtaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:8289: pratyakṣaṃ tu sthūlam adṛśyaiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ nihnuvānasya śaśo
GSP28mimsvtku:8290: 'pi tadviṣāṇadhiyā nihnotavyaḥ prāpta ity āha -- samūharūpam iti || 184 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8291: {3,99} kim idānīṃ śaśaviṣāṇakalpāḥ paramāṇavaḥ. nety āha -- samūheti.
GSP28mimsvtku:8292: na hy atra kalpanālāghavena pratyakṣasiddho dharmī parityāgam arhati.
GSP28mimsvtku:8293: siddhe ca tasmiṃs tadanuguṇāḥ paramāṇava iti kena neṣyate. siddhyupāyas tu teṣām anyo nāstīti paramāṇavo nāvaśyam iṣyanta ity uktaṃ bhavati || 185 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8294: ato yad eva vastu sāmānyaviśeṣayor aparokṣaṃ gṛhyate, tat
GSP28mimsvtku:8295: tathaivāparokṣatayaivābhyupagantavyam, na tu viśeṣa eva pratyakṣo na
GSP28mimsvtku:8296: sāmānyam iti vācyam ity upasaṃharati -- tasmād iti || 186 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8297: astu vāsādhāraṇam eva pratyakṣaṃ, tathāpi na sāmānyasya
GSP28mimsvtku:8298_0: pratyakṣam apahnotuṃ śakyate. gotvādisāmānyānām api sattādiparasāmānyāpekṣayāsādhāraṇatvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:8298_1: ato yady asādhāraṇaṃ pratyakṣam ity āgraho bhavatām evam api na gotvādisāmānyam apratyakṣam
GSP28mimsvtku:8298_2: iti pratyakṣasāmarthyasiddhatvān na śakyam apahnotum ity āha -- sattādīti ||
GSP28mimsvtku:8299: yadi tūcyate pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyamāṇam api sāmānyaṃ na sāmānyollekhena gṛhyata iti (na) pratyakṣam iti, tad etad āśaṅkate --
GSP28mimsvtku:8300: sāmānyeti. pariharati -- kiṃ veti. evaṃ hy asādhāraṇam api na pratyakṣaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:8302_0: asādhāraṇollekho nāsty eveti. yadi tu tādrūpyeṇāvikalpitam api svarūpeṇa vikalpako
GSP28mimsvtku:8302_1: 'vabudhyata iti tatpratyakṣam. evaṃ tarhi dvyākāram eva saṃmugdhaṃ vastu lokaḥ pratipadyata
GSP28mimsvtku:8303: śakyata eva vaktum iti siddhaṃ dvyākāram eva vastu pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyata
GSP28mimsvtku:8304_0: iti. siddhaṃ ca sāmānyatas sambandhadarśanam ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- yadvastu lokaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:8304_1: pratipadyate 'smin dvidhāpi tat śakyata eva vaktum iti. asminn iti pratyakṣajñāna
GSP28mimsvtku:8304_2: ity arthaḥ || 188 ity upādhyāyasucaritamiśrakṛtau kāśikāṭīkāyām anumānaparicchedaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:8306: atra pratyakṣānumānayor aparīkṣyatva ukte śāstrasyāpy aparīkṣyatāpratipādanārthaṃ bhāṣyam -- śāstraṃ śabdavijñānād asannikṛṣṭe
GSP28mimsvtku:8307: 'rthe vijñānam iti. nanu vṛttikāramate na parīkṣitavyaṃ nimittam iti
GSP28mimsvtku:8308_0: pratijñāya{3,101}pratyakṣādīni hi prasiddhāni pramāṇāni tadantargataṃ ca śāstram
GSP28mimsvtku:8308_1: ity ukteḥ pratyakṣavyabhicāreṇa parīkṣām āśaṅkya tadavyabhicāra ukte 'nantaram eva
GSP28mimsvtku:8308_2: śāstrasyāparīkṣā pratipādyata iti yuktam, tad dhi prakṛtam, kim anumānena vyavadhīyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:8308_3: satyam evam. ayaṃ tu tantrāntarānusāreṇa krama āśritaḥ. tathā hi nāpratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:8309_0: pratibodhyante. evaṃ hi vaiśeṣikāḥ paṭhanti -- dvividhaṃ pramāṇam ālocitādhyavasānam
GSP28mimsvtku:8309_1: anālocitānugamanaṃ ceti. tathānye 'pi pratyakṣam anumānaṃ ca dve eva pramāṇe iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:8310: anumānaṃ lakṣitam -- tatpūrvakaṃ trividham anumānam iti. tenehāpi tāvat pratyakṣānantaram anumānaṃ varṇitam. tato mahāviṣayatayā prakṛtatvena
GSP28mimsvtku:8311: puruṣārthaupayikatvena ca śāstram. tadanantaraṃ ca yatra kvacana vācye bahūnāṃ prasiddham ity upamānam uktam. nyāyavistare hi prasiddhasādharmyāt
GSP28mimsvtku:8312: sādhyasādhanam upamānam ity uktam. tataḥ pārāśaryamatenārthāpattir uktā.
GSP28mimsvtku:8313_0: taduttarakālam eva tanmatānusāriṇā kṛtakoṭinoktatvāt. abhāvapramāṇasya tu bhāvapramāṇābhāva
GSP28mimsvtku:8313_1: evātmeti taduttaraḥ prastāvaḥ. kiṃ punas tantrāntarānusārasya prayojanam. ucyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:8314: pratipādyate. tantrāntareṣv evam imāni pramāṇāni prasiddhānīti prasiddhiprābalyaṃ kathitaṃ bhavati. vyutthitāś ca tena tena sākṣiṇā pratipāditā bhavanti.
GSP28mimsvtku:8315: atra ca śabdavijñānād ity ucyate, tat kathaṃ vigṛhyate. kiṃ śabdād vijñānaṃ śabdasya vā vijñānam iti. pūrvatra samāsānupapattiḥ.
