GSP28mimsvtku:9495_2: tathāpi tasya rūpādivatsaṃyuktasamavāyena vā tadviśeṣaṇatayā vendriyasannikarṣo{3,204}sty
GSP28mimsvtku:9495_3: eva. atas tajjñānam aindriyakaṃ bhaved ata āha -- gṛhītveti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- nānāśrayo
GSP28mimsvtku:9496: 'bhāvaḥ śakyate grahītum ity āśrayagrahaṇārtham evātrendriyāpekṣā nābhāvagrahaṇāya, yathā nāsmṛte pratiyoginy abhāvo gṛhyata iti
GSP28mimsvtku:9497: tatsmaraṇārthaṃ prācīnajñānajanmanas saṃskārasyodbodho 'py apekṣitaḥ, evam āśrayagrahaṇārtham indriyam. na ca prāptimātram aindriyakajñānajanmani
GSP28mimsvtku:9498_0: kāraṇam. api tu yogyatāsahitā prāptir iti pratyakṣe varṇitam. na cendriyāṇām abhāvajñānajananayogyatā,
GSP28mimsvtku:9498_1: teṣv asatsv api tadbhāvād iti vakṣyate. mānasam iti ko 'rthaḥ. kiṃ sukhādijñānavanmanasā
GSP28mimsvtku:9499: yady evaṃ tathāpi pratyakṣataiva. na cāntar iva bahirmanasas svātantryam asti. satyam. sarvapramāṇasādhāraṇas tu manaso vyāpāro 'tra kathitaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:9500: kevalātmamanassannikarṣād eva bāhyendriyānapekṣaṃ pramāṇābhāvenābhāvajñānaṃ janyata ity uktaṃ bhavati. gṛhītvā smṛtveti ca
GSP28mimsvtku:9502_0: kathaṃ punar idam avagamyate bhāvagrahaṇam indriyāpekṣaṃ nābhāvagrahaṇam iti. samāno
GSP28mimsvtku:9502_1: hi tadbhāvabhāvaḥ. ata āha -- svarūpeti. yo hi gṛhasvarūpam evāvadhārya kvacidgataḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:9503_0: veti, tadāsau pṛṣṭas tatra nāstitāṃ tadaiva pratipadyate. yadi tv indriyādhīnam abhāvajñānaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:9503_1: bhavet nāsati tadvyāpāre jāyeta. na ca pūrvāvagatābhāvasmaraṇam eveti vācyam. na
GSP28mimsvtku:9503_2: hy asati pratiyogismaraṇe bhāvo dṛśyate. na cāśrayagrahaṇakāle pratiyogismaraṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:9504: pṛṣṭenābhāvaḥ kathyate. na ca tāvatāṃ smaraṇaṃ tatrāsīd iti cintayituṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:9505: śakyate. yadi tūcyate sāmānyenābhāvo 'vagataḥ, samprati viśeṣeṇa smaryata
GSP28mimsvtku:9506_0: iti, tad ayuktam. na hy abhāvatvaṃ nāma sāmānyam asti, viśeṣāṇām eva smṛtiviparivarttinām
GSP28mimsvtku:9506_1: evābhāvo 'vasīyate. na ca sāmānyato 'vagato viśeṣeṇa smaryata iti, yuktam. pūrvānubhavāhitabhāvanābījā
GSP28mimsvtku:9506_2: hi sā smṛtiḥ, nālpam avyatirekaṃ gocarayitum utsahate. atas tadānīm eva
GSP28mimsvtku:9507_0: pratiyogismaraṇapurassaram indriyānapekṣam abhāvajñānaṃ jāyata iti manoharam idam.
GSP28mimsvtku:9507_1: tad idam uktaṃ tadaiva pratipadyata iti. idaṃ ca pratyakṣaphalasmṛtinivṛttyā phalataḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:9508: {3,205} evaṃ tāvadakṣajatvam abhāvadhiyo nirākṛttam. idānīṃ laiṅgikatvaṃ nirākaroti -- na cāpy atreti. atra codayati -- bhāvāṃśeti.
GSP28mimsvtku:9509: pariharati -- tadānīm iti matirantena. dvāv atra bhāvau
GSP28mimsvtku:9510: pratiṣedhyaḥ pratiṣedhādhāraś ca, tatra na tāvat pratiṣedhyo liṅgam,
GSP28mimsvtku:9511: avagataṃ hi liṅgaṃ bhavati. na ca tadā ghaṭo gṛhyate, na hi tasmin
GSP28mimsvtku:9512: gṛhyamāṇe tadabhāvo grahītuṃ śakyate. tad iha pratijñāhetvor virodhaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:9513: sati bhāve tadabhāvo na pratijñātuṃ śakyate. satyāṃ tu pratijñāyāṃ nāsato
GSP28mimsvtku:9516_0: astu tarhi pratiṣedhādhārabhāvo liṅgam ata āha -- na caiṣa iti. eṣa iti paropasthitam
GSP28mimsvtku:9516_1: aparokṣaṃ bhāvaṃ nirdiśati. yathārthe pakṣīkṛte padam ataddharmatayā na hetur ity
GSP28mimsvtku:9516_2: uktam, evam eṣo 'pi bhūtalabhāvo na ghaṭādyabhāvadharma iti. api cānvayādhīnātmalābham
GSP28mimsvtku:9516_3: anumānajñānam, na ca bhūtalabhāvasya sarvair abhāvais sambandho jñāyate. tat kathaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:9516_4: tatas te pratyeṣyanta ity āha -- saheti || 31 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9517: astu tāvad abhāvānvayaḥ kvacid bhūtalādau bhāve, sadbhāvo 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:9518: yasya ghaṭādeḥ kadācit jñātaḥ tasyāpi tatrābhāvo 'vagamyata ity āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:9520: {3,206} na kevalaṃ yady atra kadācid dṛṣṭaṃ tanmātrasya tatrābhāvo 'vagamyate, yasyāpi tu yatrābhāvo na dṛṣṭapūrvas tasyāpi tatrābhāvo
GSP28mimsvtku:9522: yadi tu yena kenacid ekenābhāvena gṛhītasambandhād bhāvād abhāvāntarānumānam iṣyate, tato 'tiprasaktir ity āha -- kasyacid iti || 34
GSP28mimsvtku:9523_0: na caivam astīti vyatirekeṇa darśayati -- gṛhīte 'pi ca bhāvāṃśe naivābhāve 'nyavastunaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:9523_1: sarvasya matir ityantena. anaikāntikaś cāyaṃ bhāvo 'bhāvāntarair api sambandhāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:9523_2: ato 'naikāntikatvād asya ghaṭāder abhāvaṃ gamayitum aliṅgatvam ity āha -- evaṃ vyabhicārād
GSP28mimsvtku:9523_3: aliṅgateti || 35 api ca sambandhagrahaṇaṃ sambandhigrahaṇādhīnam. tad ihābhāvākhye
GSP28mimsvtku:9523_4: sambandhini grahītavye kiṃ pramāṇam iti vaktavyam ity āha -- sambandha iti || 36 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9524: na tāval liṅgam aviditasambandhaṃ tadavadhāraṇe pramāṇam,
GSP28mimsvtku:9525: itaretarāśrayaṃ hi tathā syād ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- tadānīm iti. ato
GSP28mimsvtku:9526: 'vaśyaṃ tadgrahaṇe pramāṇāntaram arthanīyam ity āha -- tatreti || 37 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9528_0: pratyavasthānam āha -- pratyakṣāder iti. dvedhā hi hetavo bauddhair vibhajyante --
GSP28mimsvtku:9528_1: kāryaṃ svabhāva iti, anupalabdhiś caikajñānasaṃsargiṇor ekopalabdhir eva, tasyāś
GSP28mimsvtku:9528_2: ca svarūpaṃ jñeyarūpaṃ ca prakāśate iti
GSP28mimsvtku:9529: jñānajñeyasvabhāvā. na hy asau svarūpam iva jñeyasattām api vyabhicarati.
GSP28mimsvtku:9530: tasyāś ca svasādhyena nāstīti vikalpaśabdātmakavyavahāreṇa tadyogyatayā vā tādātmyam eva pratibandhaḥ. na hy asau nāstīti vyavahāraṃ vyabhicarati
GSP28mimsvtku:9531: śiṃśapeva vṛkṣatām. tad evaṃ jñātapratibandhānupalabdhiḥ yo nāma bhrāmyan
GSP28mimsvtku:9532_0: viviktadeśopalabdhāv api ghaṭāya ghaṭate taṃ prati nāstīti vyavahāraṃ tadyogyatāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:9532_1: vānumāpayati. evaṃ ca ghaṭādyabhāvānupalabdhiprayogaḥ -- yad dṛśyaṃ hi sad yatra
GSP28mimsvtku:9532_2: nopalabhyate tat tatra nāsti. nopalabhyate copalabhyamāne deśe dṛśyo ghaṭa iti. etad
GSP28mimsvtku:9532_3: api dūṣayati -- na viśeṣaṇasambandhas tasyā iti. ya evānupalabdhyānumātum iṣyate
GSP28mimsvtku:9532_4: ghaṭābhāvo nāstīti vyavahāras tadyogyatā vā naikenāpi viśeṣeṇānupalabdhes sambandho
GSP28mimsvtku:9532_5: 'vagataḥ, kathaṃ tato viśeṣānumānam. bhūtalopalabdhir hi sā, tasyāś ca nānāvidhānekaghaṭapaṭādiviṣayā
GSP28mimsvtku:9533: viśeṣeṇa ghaṭo nāstīti vyavahārayet. ghaṭānupalabdhir asau, ato ghaṭābhāvaṃ tadvyavahāraṃ vā prasādhayatīti cet. kas tasyā ghaṭena
GSP28mimsvtku:9534_0: sambandhaḥ. deśopalabdhir hi sā, tāvad eva tasyā ghaṭānupalabdhitvam. tac ca sarvān
GSP28mimsvtku:9534_1: pratyaviśiṣṭam iti katham ekenaiva vyapadiśyate na ced ghaṭābhāvo nāma kaścit. kasmāc
GSP28mimsvtku:9534_2: ca saty api ghaṭe ghaṭo nāstīti vyavahāro na pravartate. sadvyavahāravirodhād iti
GSP28mimsvtku:9534_3: cet. kathaṃ ghaṭānupalabdhau sadvyavahāraḥ. asti hi tadānīm api deśopalabdhiḥ. viviktopalabdhir
GSP28mimsvtku:9534_4: hi ghaṭānupalabdhiḥ, nāsau ghaṭe satīti cet, ko vivekārtha iti. nanv ayam abhāva
GSP28mimsvtku:9534_5: eva. tadabhāve 'narthakaṃ viviktavacanam, ato 'nupalabdher ayam api viśeṣo dussādha
GSP28mimsvtku:9534_6: eva, yadasati ghaṭe nāstīti vyavahāro na satīti. yac cedaṃ ghaṭābhāvam atilaṅghya
GSP28mimsvtku:9534_7: nāstīti vyavahārānumānam avasthitaṃ tad api kena viśeṣeṇeti na vidmaḥ. so 'pi bhāvātirekī
GSP28mimsvtku:9534_8: na kaścid upalabhyate. yogyatā tadanatirekiṇī tasmin buddhe buddhaiveti na kiñcid
GSP28mimsvtku:9535: vārtikakāreṇa tv idam upekṣyaiva tāvad dūṣaṇāntaram uktam iti || 38 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9536_0: {3,208} abhāvasāmānyena tv anupalabdhes sambandhas sidhyaty eva, na tv abhāvasāmānye
GSP28mimsvtku:9536_1: pramāṇam upajāyata ity āha -- sāmānyeti. viśeṣās tv anaikāntikatayā nānupalabdhyā
GSP28mimsvtku:9538_0: api ca -- nānavagatarūpaṃ liṅgam anumāne liṅgaṃ bhavati, tad iyaṃ pratyakṣādyanutpattir
GSP28mimsvtku:9538_1: abhāvatvād apareṇa liṅgenāvagantavyā. evaṃ hi vadanti, yāvān kaścit pratiṣedhaḥ sa
GSP28mimsvtku:9538_2: sarvo 'nupalabdher eveti. evaṃ ca tatra tatra sadṛśāparāparaliṅgānusāreṇānavasthāpāta
GSP28mimsvtku:9538_3: ity āha -- na ceti dvayena. etac copalabdhyabhāvo 'nupalabdhir ity āpādyoktam,
GSP28mimsvtku:9540: evaṃ yo 'py asau liṅgirūpābhāvaḥ so 'pi sambandhagrahaṇārtham avaśyaṃ prathamam avagantavyaḥ. tadavagame 'pi tadrūpāparaliṅgābhyupagamād
GSP28mimsvtku:9541: anavasthaiva. ataḥ kvacid avaśyam anumānābhāvāt pramāṇāntaram abhyupagantavyam ity āha -- liṅgeti || 42 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9542: yadi tu nāstīti buddhir eva liṅgam ity ucyate tan na. phalaṃ hi sā, pratyakṣādyanutpādasya kathaṃ talliṅgam, tatsiddhyartham eva hi
GSP28mimsvtku:9543: liṅgam iṣyate.{3,209}siddhāyāṃ tu buddhau kiṃ liṅgena. tad etad āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:9544: neti. yadi sā phalaṃ kiṃ tarhi pramāṇam ata āha -- tasyaiveti. yasyaiva sā phalaṃ tad eva pratyakṣādyanutpatteḥ phalānantaryāt pramāṇam iti || 43 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9545: kiñ ca saugatasamayasiddhānumānalakṣaṇagranthānusāreṇāpi na pratyakṣādyajanmano 'numānatvam ity āha -- trilakṣaṇeti. evaṃ hi te
GSP28mimsvtku:9546: paṭhanti. trirūpāl liṅgato 'rthadṛganumānam iti. na cānutpattir utpatteḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:9547_0: prāgabhāvo buddheḥ kenacij janyate, prāg eva trilakṣaṇena hetuneti. nanu ca hetutayānupalabdhir
GSP28mimsvtku:9547_1: anumānam iṣyate, na tv anumitir anumānam iti bhāvasādhanatayā. ataḥ kiṃ tannirāsena.
GSP28mimsvtku:9547_2: satyam, ahetutayā tāvadanumānatvaṃ nirākṛtam eva. anena tu lakṣaṇānantaḥpāto varṇyata
GSP28mimsvtku:9547_3: iti || 44 atra codayati -- (mānam iti)pramāṇatā hi bhāvātmanā vyāptā
GSP28mimsvtku:9548: pratyakṣādiṣv avagatā, tannivṛttyā nivartyata iti bhāvaḥ. itaras tu --
GSP28mimsvtku:9549: varṇito 'smābhiḥ prāgbhāvānām asaṅkaraś caturdhā. na ca tadbodhasya
GSP28mimsvtku:9550: bhāvabodhavailakṣaṇyam upalabhyate, bādhavirahasāmānyāt. sa ca prāmāṇye
GSP28mimsvtku:9551: kāraṇaṃ na bhāvasvarūpatā. sā tu prāmāṇyaṃ pratyaprayojikaiva kathaṃcit teṣu saṅgatā, ato nābhāvatvenāprāmāṇyaṃ bhavati. bhāve tu prameye
GSP28mimsvtku:9552: tadapramāṇam evety abhiprāyeṇāha -- prameyam iti. anurūpam evedaṃ yadabhāve 'bhāvaḥ pramāṇam ity āha -- meya iti || 45 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9553: yathā bhāvātmake meye 'bhāvaḥ pramāṇaṃ nānurūpaṃ tathā
GSP28mimsvtku:9554: tadabhāve bhāva ity āha -- bhāvātmaka iti || 46 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9555: {3,210} na bhāvātmakam eva pramāṇam iti rājājñā, yad eva tu
GSP28mimsvtku:9556: paricchedaphalaṃ tad eva tu pramāṇam, tac ca pratyakṣādyajanmano 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:9558: syād etat -- vastuna eva prāmāṇyadarśanān nāvastuno
GSP28mimsvtku:9559: 'nupalabdheḥ pramāṇatvam iti. tathā ca sati bauddhānām api liṅgaprameyatve
GSP28mimsvtku:9560_0: na syātām, te 'pi hi nāvastuno dṛṣṭe ity āha -- yadīti sārdhena. anujñāne doṣam āha
GSP28mimsvtku:9560_1: -- tathā satīti. na ca syād vyavahāro 'yam iti kāraṇādivibhāgenokto vyavahāra ity
GSP28mimsvtku:9560_2: arthaḥ || 48 -- 49 apakṣadharmatvād api pratyakṣādyanutpattir na liṅgam ity āha
GSP28mimsvtku:9562_0: taddharmatayāvagamyate. abhāvena sambandhābhāvād ity abhiprāya iti. nanv abhāvaviśiṣṭaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:9562_1: bhūtalaṃ sādhayiṣyāmaḥ, tac ca pūrvam avagatam iti taddharmo bhaviṣyatīty ata āha
GSP28mimsvtku:9564: ghaṭasya tarhi dharmo bhaviṣyati tadgocare pratyakṣādīnām anutpatter ata āha -- ya iti. satyam. yatra pratyakṣādīni notpadyante
GSP28mimsvtku:9565: taddharmatā kathañcid bhaved api, na tv asāv iha pramīyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:9566: dharmadharmitvayor abhāvāt. na hi{3,211}taddharmiṇaṃ kṛtvābhāvaviśiṣṭatā sādhyate tasyāpratīteḥ. nāpi tadviśiṣṭaṃ bhūtalādi, tadānīṃ tasya tatrābhāvād iti || 51 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9567: abhāvasya tu sā dharmo bhaviṣyati tadviṣayatvāt tasyāḥ. abhāve hi prameye sā liṅgaṃ bhavaty eva. kin tu nāsañcetito 'bhāvo viṣayo
GSP28mimsvtku:9568: bhaviṣyati, jñāte ca prameyābhāva ity āha -- abhāveneti || 52 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9569: anyas tu na kaścid abhāvenānutpattes sambandhaprakāro vidyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:9570_0: yena taddharmatām anugamyānumānaṃ bhaviṣyatīty āha -- saṃyoga iti. itaś cāpakṣadharmatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:9570_1: ity āha -- nāgṛhīta iti. na hy agṛhīte parvate dhūmas taddharmatayāvagamyate. atha
GSP28mimsvtku:9572: evaṃ pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ prasādhitaṃ bhedaṃ prayogeṇa darśayati -- abhāvaśabdeti || 54 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9573: prayogāntaram āha -- abhāvo 'pīti bhāvāntena. atas siddhaṃ bhāvātmakāt pramāṇād anyatvam abhāvasyety upasaṃharati -- tasmād iti || 55
GSP28mimsvtku:9575: sarvakarmaṇāṃ phalāsaṅkaraḥ parasparāsaṅkaraś ca parasparam aṅgāṅgibhāvābhāvaḥ, nāsāv abhāvaprāmāṇyādṛte{3,212}sidhyatīti.
GSP28mimsvtku:9576: yāvat tāvad yathāvad iti.) iheti. vedaṃ prati nirdeśa iti || 56 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9578: upavarṇitam, ṛṣiṇā ca sambhavaitihyayor api pramāṇatvam āśritam,
GSP28mimsvtku:9579: tatparityāge kāraṇaṃ vaktavyam ata āha -- yuktīti. pramāṇaṣaṭkam eva hi
GSP28mimsvtku:9580: yuktyā saṅgacchate. āgamānugataś ca. āgamaś ca mīmāṃsātantram, ato yuktyāgamābhyām iha śābare bhāṣye pramāṇaṣaṭkam eva pravivicya tarkitam.
GSP28mimsvtku:9581: yat tu dvayam adhikam iṣṭaṃ tad atraivāntargatam iti || 57 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9582: (?kaḥ/kva) punas tasyāntargatir ata āha -- iha bhavatīti. yā tāvat sahasrācchate matis sambhavākhyaṃ pramāṇam iṣyate sānumānān na
GSP28mimsvtku:9583: bhidyate. sahasrāc chatam aviyutibhāvād avinābhāvād avagamyate. atas tāvad anumānān na bhidyate. aitihyapramāṇam uktaṃ tāvad asatyam eva.
GSP28mimsvtku:9584_0: nidhiprāptyasurakanyāvaśīkaraṇādi, draupadīpañcabhartṛketyādi, yadi tat satyaṃ tadāgamād
GSP28mimsvtku:9584_1: (na) bhidyate. āptāgamo hy asau. uktaṃ ca -- puruṣoktir api śrotur āgamatvaṃ prapadyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:9584_2: iti. ato 'numānāgamayor antarbhāvān na sambhavaitihyayoḥ pṛthagupanyāsas siddhaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:9586_0: {3,213} bhāṣyapāṭho vicāryaḥ, atra bhāṣyam -- nanu bhavantv anyāni pramāṇāni, śabdas
GSP28mimsvtku:9586_1: tu na pramāṇam, kutaḥ? animittaṃ vidyamānopalambhanatvāt iti. asyārthaḥ -- yady api
GSP28mimsvtku:9587_0: na pramāṇasāmānyabhāvinā dharmeṇa śabdo 'pi na pramāṇam, viśeṣeṇa tv ātmabhāvinā
GSP28mimsvtku:9587_1: dharmeṇāpramāṇam. tathā hi -- citrayā paśavo bhāvyanta iti citrayā yajetety asyārthaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:9587_2: kṛtacitrasyāpi yajamānasyānantaram avikalasakalendriyair api paśavo na dṛśyante.
GSP28mimsvtku:9587_3: tan na nūnam iṣṭiḥ paśuphaleti bhavati matiḥ. tad idam uktam animittaṃ vidyamānopalambhanatvāt
GSP28mimsvtku:9587_4: iti. kim uktaṃ bhavati -- upalambhanāni hi cakṣurādīni paśūnāṃ vidyante. na ca paśukāmeṣṭyanantaraṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:9588: upalabhyante. tasmād uktavisaṃvādād apramāṇaṃ citrācodaneti. sa punar ayam
GSP28mimsvtku:9589: ākṣepo gatārtha upalakṣyate. codanāsūtre hi nanv atathābhūtam ityādinā bhāṣyakāreṇākṣepaparihārāv uktau. ataḥ punaruktam idam ity āśaṅkyāha --
GSP28mimsvtku:9590_0: paraloka iti. asyārthaḥ -- paralokaphalā hi tatra svargakāmo yajetety evamādicodanā
GSP28mimsvtku:9590_2: nanūbhayīm api codanām ākṣeptuṃ śakyata eva
GSP28mimsvtku:9591_0: vākyatvādayo hetavaḥ. ta eva tatra bhāṣyakāreṇa yat kiñcana laukikaṃ vacanam iti
GSP28mimsvtku:9591_1: darśayatāntarṇītāḥ. vārtikakṛtāpi -- yadi vā puruṣādhīnaprāmāṇyāḥ sarvacodanā iti
GSP28mimsvtku:9592: paralokaphalā eva tatrākṣiptā iti. yad api cedānīm aihikākṣepa ity uktaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:9593: tad ayuktam, ihāpi ca -- evaṃ dṛṣṭāpacārasya vedasya svargādy api phalaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:9594: nāstīti manyāmaha iti sarvākṣepaḥ kṛtaḥ. vārtikakāreṇāpi ca
GSP28mimsvtku:9595: evaṃ saty agnihotrādivākyeṣv api mṛṣārthatā iti vadatā. tasmād ubhayatrāpy ubhayākṣepam eva nyāyyaṃ manyante. keyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:9596: vyavasthā. atrocyate. satyam ubhayatrāpy ubhayākṣepaḥ, tathāpi hetubhedād apaunaruktyam. tathā hi -- tatra vākyatvādayaḥ parair uktā
GSP28mimsvtku:9600: iti. sāmarthyaṃ hi sarvākhyātānām arthaṃ bruvatāṃ sahakāri. tad yady api
GSP28mimsvtku:9601: neṣṭir anantaraphaleti śrutiḥ, tathāpy arthasāmarthyād etad avagamyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:9602: katham aparathā yadāsau vidyamānāsīt tadā phalaṃ na dattavatī, kālāntare punarasatī kathaṃ dāsyati iti. na ca paśavo 'nantaram asambhavadbhāvanāḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:9603_0: svargo hi nānākṣiptaviśiṣṭadehendriyādiparigraho bhavitum utsahate, ato mābhūd anantaram,
GSP28mimsvtku:9603_1: amī punaḥ paśavaḥ sambhavanti yajamānasyātraiveti svahetusamanantaram anupalabhyamānā
GSP28mimsvtku:9604: śrutacitrādiphalatayā na śaktyante 'vagantum. ayam eva tu
GSP28mimsvtku:9605: śabdaśaktiparāmarśo vārtikakṛtā tārkikaprakriyām anuvidadhānena na vā paśuphaletyādinā sādhanaprayogair upadarśitaḥ. tad evam aihikaphalāsu
GSP28mimsvtku:9606: citrācodanāsvākṣiptāsu tatsāmānyāditarāsu tathātvam iti punar apy agnihotrādicodanākṣepe 'vatiṣṭhate. sa cāyam aihikākṣepadvāreṇāpinocyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:9607: ata eva caihikākṣepa ity uktam. etad uktaṃ bhavati -- aihikaphalānām āmuṣmikaphalānāṃ cāyam
GSP28mimsvtku:9608_0: yadāmuṣmikasvargādi tanmā nāma karmānantaram upalabhyatām aihikaphalaṃ tu paśvādi
GSP28mimsvtku:9608_1: kiṃ nopalabhyate, na cedam upalabhyate, tan na nūnaṃ tat phalam iti aihikaphalakarmacodanāvyabhicāreṇānyāsām
GSP28mimsvtku:9608_2: api paralokaphalānāṃ tatsāmānyād ākṣepaḥ. pūrvaṃ tu tāḥ parataḥ prāmāṇyam āśritya
GSP28mimsvtku:9608_3: paroktair eva vākyatvādibhir hetubhir ākṣiptāḥ. taduktaṃ parair iti. parihārāntaram
GSP28mimsvtku:9608_4: āha -- sūtreti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- codanāsūtre bhāṣyakṛtā sūtrakāreṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:9609_1: tu sūtrakāreṇa svayam evocyata iti tenedam eva sarvacodanākṣepakṣetram ity uktam
GSP28mimsvtku:9609_2: iti || 1 atra parihāre pūrvokta evākṣepahetur iti, tam upanyasyati --
GSP28mimsvtku:9610: citreti phalānītyantena. ayam arthaḥ -- citrāpaśuphalatvādiviṣayāś codanā dharmiṇyaḥ{3,215}mṛṣeti sādhyo dharmaḥ. adhikṛtaiḥ pravṛttivogyair api
GSP28mimsvtku:9612: vipralipsorvacaḥ. ādiśabdenāgnihotrādiviṣayā api codanāḥ pakṣīkaroti. nanu vipralipsuvākyam atra dṛṣṭāntaḥ. na ca tanniyamena
GSP28mimsvtku:9613: pratyakṣādyasaṅgatārtham asatyaṃ ca. tasmād ubhayavikalo dṛṣṭāntaḥ. ata āha -- tatreti. asaty arthe prayuktam eva nadītīrādivākyam iha dṛṣṭāntaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:9614: prāyeṇa caivañjātīyakaṃ vipralipsur eva prayuṅkta iti vipralipsor ity uktam iti || 2 -- 3
GSP28mimsvtku:9615: idānīm aihikākṣepa ity uktaṃ vivṛṇoti -- na veti vadantena.
GSP28mimsvtku:9616: citreṣṭir dharmiṇī, na paśuphaleti sādhyam, svakāle paśvadānāt, snānādivad
GSP28mimsvtku:9617: iti. prayogāntaram āha -- te 'pīti. te paśavo na citrāsādhyāḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:9618_0: citrotpattāv asadbhāvāt svargatṛptisukhādivat. ādiśabdenātra bhojanajanyā tṛptir
GSP28mimsvtku:9618_1: abhipretā. etau ca prayogau neṣṭiḥ paśuphalā, karmakāle ca karmaphalena bhavitavyam
GSP28mimsvtku:9618_2: iti bhāṣyoktau veditavyāv iti. atrānantaraṃ yatkālaṃ hi mardanaṃ tatkālam eva mardanasukham
GSP28mimsvtku:9618_3: iti bhāṣyakāreṇoktam, tad vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntatayā prayogadvaye yojayati -- vaidharmyeṇeti.
GSP28mimsvtku:9618_4: citrā na paśuphalā paśavo na tatsādhyā ity ubhayatrāpi prayoge vaidharmyeṇa sukhamardane
GSP28mimsvtku:9618_5: bhavetām, īdṛśī cātra vaidharmyaracanā, yadyatsādhyaṃ tattatsamakāle prasūte, mardanam
GSP28mimsvtku:9618_6: iva sukham. yac ca yatsādhyaṃ tat tadutpattau bhavaty eva sukham iva mardanotpattāv
GSP28mimsvtku:9619: nanūktivisaṃvādād aprāmāṇyam uktam. na ca kiñcid iha
GSP28mimsvtku:9620: visaṃvādaḥ, na hi kṛte karmaṇi tāvaty eva phalena bhavitavyam iti śabdo
GSP28mimsvtku:9621: brūte, kin tu asyedaṃ{3,216}phalam iti. etāvati ca paryavasānāt. ataḥ kālāntare phalaṃ dāsyati. tad etad uktam -- kālāntare phalaṃ dāsyatīti cet
GSP28mimsvtku:9622: iti, tad etad āha -- ānantaryam iti. pariharati -- na sāmarthyeti.
GSP28mimsvtku:9623_0: sākṣādanuktasyānantaryasyāpy atra sāmarthyenāvabodhanaṃ kṛtam, yadaiva hy asyedaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:9623_1: phalam ity uktaṃ tadaivam arthādevāvagamyate anantaram anena bhavitavyam iti. kathaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:9623_2: nāmānyathāsatkālāntare phalaṃ dāsyatīti. nanv evam api sāmarthyalabhyamānantaryam
GSP28mimsvtku:9624_0: aviśeṣapravṛttā tu codanā kathaṃ bādhyate ata āha -- śabdeti. na hi sāmarthyaṃ nāma
GSP28mimsvtku:9624_1: pṛthak pramāṇam, api tarhi sarvākhyātānām arthaṃ bruvatāṃ śaktis sahakāriṇīti śabdaikadeśa
GSP28mimsvtku:9624_2: eva. atas sruvāvadānam ivāpy adravyeṣv arthād anantaram eva phalaṃ niścīyata iti
GSP28mimsvtku:9625: itaś cānantaryam avagamyata ity āha -- kālāntareti. yadi hy atra phalaṃ dāsyatīti ḷṅśroṣyat tadā tatsāmarthyena kalpanā kācid apy
GSP28mimsvtku:9626_0: abhaviṣyat. adya punar asyedaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalam iti paryavasite vacasi sarvakarmaṇām
GSP28mimsvtku:9626_1: anantaraphalopalambhād vaidikasyāpi citrādeś codyamānasyāpi karmaṇas tatsvābhāvyād
GSP28mimsvtku:9627: atrānantaram aparaṃ bhāṣyam -- dṛṣṭaviruddham api kiñcit
GSP28mimsvtku:9628: vaidikaṃ vacanaṃ sa eṣa yajñāyudhī yajamāno 'ñjasā svargaṃ lokaṃ yātīti.
GSP28mimsvtku:9629: tad yena viśeṣeṇoktaṃ tam āha -- atreti. atra hi citrādivākyeṣūktivisaṃvādād aprāmāṇyam uktam. uttaratra tu yajñāyudhivākye
GSP28mimsvtku:9630: pratyakṣādivirodha iti virodham abhidyotayati -- svargayāna iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:9631_0: yajamānasya niratiśayānandātmanaḥ svargād atidūram apabhraṣṭo bhasmībhāvaḥ pratyakṣam
GSP28mimsvtku:9631_1: upalabhyate,{3,217}citrādicodanāsu tv anantaraphalānupalambhamātraṃ na tu viruddhopalambhaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:9631_2: kaścid astīti syād api kālāntare phalakalpanā, bhasmībhūtaṃ tu śarīraṃ kālāntare
GSP28mimsvtku:9631_3: 'pi svargaṃ lokaṃ yāsyatīti na sambhavatīti pūrvasmād viśeṣaḥ || 8 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9632: aparam api ca evaṃjātīyakaṃ pramāṇaviruddhaṃ vacanam apramāṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:9633_0: -- ambuni majjantyalābūni, grāvāṇaḥ plavanta iti yathā iti bhāṣyam, tad vyācaṣṭe
GSP28mimsvtku:9633_1: _ -- yajñeti vākyamantena. yajñāyudhavaco dharmī, mṛṣeti sādhyo dharmaḥ, pratyakṣavirodhāt,
GSP28mimsvtku:9633_2: yatpratyakṣaviruddhaṃ tanmithyā, yathā grāvāṇaḥ plavanta iti śilā vākyaṃ sādharmyeṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:9634: vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntam āha -- vaidharmyeṇeti. yadamithyā na tatpratyakṣaviruddhaṃ yathāptabhāṣitam iti. pūrvaṃ tu mardanasukhayor
GSP28mimsvtku:9635: vaidharmye dṛṣṭāntatayopanyāsāc chilāvākyam api vaidharmyeṇa bhāṣyakṛtoktam iti bhrāntim apanetuṃ sādharmyavaidharmyaviveko vārtikakṛtā darśitaḥ || 9 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9636: nanu pratyakṣavirodhād iti hetur asiddha eva, asti hi paralokaphalabhoktā cetanaḥ karmaṇāṃ kartā, sa svargaṃ lokaṃ yāsyatīti.
GSP28mimsvtku:9637: tam evābhipretya svargaṃ lokaṃ yāsyatīty uktam. ataḥ ko virodho 'ta āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:9638_0: śarīrād iti. yadi hi śarīrād anyaś cetano bhavet, bhaved api, na tasya yajñāyudhair
GSP28mimsvtku:9638_1: asti kaścit sambandhaprakāraḥ, śarīrasyaiva tu srukkapālādiyajñāyudhais sambandhaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:9639: tadabhiprāyeṇa matvarthasaṃyogo ghaṭate. api ca sa eṣa ity aparokṣapratinirdeśaḥ, so 'pi śarīrasyaiva pratyakṣatvād upapanno
GSP28mimsvtku:9640: nātmanaḥ. tad etad api bhāṣyakāreṇoktaṃ hi -- śarīrakaṃ vyapadiśati iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:9641_0: kiñ ca yajamānaśabdo hy ātmanyasamañjasaḥ, yāgasya hi kartā yajamāna ity ucyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:9642: asamavāyāt. tad etad āha -- na{3,218}ceti. abhyupagamya cātmanas sadbhāvam
GSP28mimsvtku:9643: idam asmābhir uktam, paramārthena tu dehendriyavyatiriktātmasadbhāvo 'pi
GSP28mimsvtku:9644: pramāṇābhāvād durlabha ity āha -- sadbhāva iti. prapañcayiṣyate caitadātmavāda itīha na pratanyata iti || 10 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9645: aparaṃ ca -- na caiṣa yātīti vidhiśabdaḥ iti bhāṣyam.
GSP28mimsvtku:9646_0: tasyābhiprāyam āha -- yadīti. asyārthaḥ -- yadi hy atra yajñāyudhivākye vidhiśabdo
GSP28mimsvtku:9646_1: bhavet, tadā citrādīnām anantaraphalādarśanād bhedena virodhopanyāsārthaṃ yajñāyudhivākyopādānaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:9647_0: vidhiśabde ko viśeṣaḥ, ata āha -- vidhīti. vidhiśabde hi kālaviśeṣānupādānād vidhisāmarthyād
GSP28mimsvtku:9647_1: eva kālāntarabhāvitāṃ phalasya parikalpya syād api citrādicodanāsvivābhāvavirodhaparihāraḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:9648: vartamānāpadeśān na pratyakṣavirodhaś śakyate parihartum ity adarśanād viśeṣa iti || 12 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9649_0: citrādivākyābhiprāyeṇa cedam asmābhir uktam -- vidhiśabde bhaviṣyattvaṃ phalasya
GSP28mimsvtku:9649_1: parikalpya virodhaś śakyate parihartum iti. iha tu pratyakṣeṇa bhasmībhāvopalambhān
GSP28mimsvtku:9649_2: na kālāntaraphalabhāvitayā svargagamanaṃ phalam iti śakyate kalpayitum. na hi vidhisahasreṇāpyāśaṅkanīyo
GSP28mimsvtku:9650: śakyaḥ pratyāyayitum. tad etad āha -- phalaṃ ceti. kiṃ tarhi vidhiśabdatānirākaraṇasya phalam ata āha -- tatsāmarthyeneti.
GSP28mimsvtku:9652: paralokaphalopabhoktāram{3,219}anupapadyamānaḥ kalpayed api kāyakaraṇasaṅghātātiriktam ātmānam, tasya ca svargalokagamanam
GSP28mimsvtku:9653: upacaryetāpi śarīre, tasya vā pratyakṣatvam ātmani bhāktam ity
GSP28mimsvtku:9655: bhūyāṃś cāyaṃ pramāṇāntaraviruddho mantrārthavād ātmako vedabhāgaḥ. yathā aditir dyauraditir antarīkṣaṃ yajamāna ekakapālaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:9656_0: ityevamādiḥ. sa ca sarva evātra prayatnato mukhyatayā mithyātvena aihikākṣepe pakṣīkāryaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:9656_1: tanmithyātvena cānuṣaṅgikaṃ pareṣāṃ mithyātvaṃ bhaviṣyatīty abhiprāyeṇāha -- prāya
GSP28mimsvtku:9657: tasyābhiprāyam āha -- evaṃ satīti. yadā hi citrādivākyādiṣv aprāmāṇyaṃ samarthitaṃ bhavati, tadā vedavākyaikadeśatayāgnihotrādivākyeṣv api
GSP28mimsvtku:9658: mṛṣārthatā śakyate 'numātum, ataḥ kṛtsnasyaiva vedasyāprāmāṇyān na codanālakṣaṇārtho dharma ity ākṣepaḥ ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9661_0: {3,220} atrānantaram autpattikas tu śabdasyārthena sambandhas tasya jñānam iti bhāṣyakāreṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:9662_0: viruddhāsidhyādidoṣodbhāvanam ucitam. yat tu tam adūṣayitvaivānyad ucyate tadasaṅgatam
GSP28mimsvtku:9662_1: evāta āha -- svapakṣa iti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- yāvad dhi sambandhautpattikatvenānapekṣālakṣaṇaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:9662_2: codanāyāḥ svataḥprāmāṇyaṃ na pratipādyate tāvad dūṣite 'pi sādhane na codanālakṣaṇo
GSP28mimsvtku:9663: sidhyati. bhūyāṃś cānena krameṇārtho vaktum abhipretaḥ śabdārthasambandhanirūpaṇādiḥ. anyathā kriyamāṇaṃ tadākāśapatitam
GSP28mimsvtku:9664: ivāpadyeta. tac caitat śabdasvarūpanirūpaṇāvasare vakṣyate. na cedam ākṣepeṇa na saṅgacchate, dvedhāpi pratyavasthānadarśanāt. yathoktam --
GSP28mimsvtku:9667: na cātra parasādhanadūṣaṇaṇ na kariṣyate tatra hetor asiddhatvam iti citrāparihāre vakṣyate. anena tu krameṇa tat kartavyam iti
GSP28mimsvtku:9668_0: tāvad ity uktam iti. tac ca svapakṣasādhanaṃ tārkikāṇāṃ cittam anurañjayituṃ prayogadvāreṇāha
GSP28mimsvtku:9668_1: -- amṛṣeti. vaidikavaco dharmī, svārthe satyam iti sādhyo dharmaḥ, svārthe vaktranapekṣatvāt,
GSP28mimsvtku:9669: nāpekṣate tat satyam, yathā padāt padārthagatā buddhiḥ. padaṃ hi svabhāvād
GSP28mimsvtku:9670: eva svārthena sambaddhaṃ tatpratipādanāya vaktāraṃ nāpekṣata iti sambandhaparihāre vakṣyate. svārtha iti tantreṇobhayaviśeṣaṇatayā
GSP28mimsvtku:9671_0: yojanīyam. yadi hy amṛṣā vaidikaṃ vacanam ity etāvad ucyate pūrvapakṣārthasamyaktvāpātād
GSP28mimsvtku:9671_1: aniṣṭārthatāprasādhanaprasaṅgaḥ. na hi svargakāmo yāgaṃ kuryād ityādyarthe svargakāmo
GSP28mimsvtku:9671_2: yajeteti vākyaṃ samyag iṣyate, ṣaṣṭhādyasiddhāntavirodhāt. yāgena svargaṃ kuryād
GSP28mimsvtku:9672: sthāsyati. vaktranapekṣatvād iti cāviśiṣṭo hetur upātto 'siddha eva syāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:9673: asti hi vaidikavākyānām api svarūpābhivyaktaye{3,221}vaktrapekṣā, svārthe tu pratyāyayitavye na vaktāram apekṣante, apauruṣeyatvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:9674: śabdārthasambandhanityatvāc ca. pauruṣeyaṃ pramāṇāntarapramitagocaram āptavacanam api vaktuḥ pramāṇam apekṣate. yathoktam, āptoktiṣu narāpekṣeti || 1 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9675: prayogāntaram āha -- tatkṛta ity evāntena. vaidikavākyakṛtaḥ pratyayas samyag iti sādhyam, nityavākyodbhavatvāt, yathā tadvākyasvarūpaviṣayā buddhiḥ. sāpi hi vākyād udbhavati,
GSP28mimsvtku:9677: iti. atraiva sādhye pūrvoktāḥ -- nānyatvāt iti bhāṣyavyākhyānāvasara uktāḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:9679: deśādibhede 'pi bādhavarjanāt iti hetavo darśayitavyā ity āha -- atreti ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9680: atra bhāṣyam -- syād etat, naiva śabdasyārthena sambandhaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:9681_0: kuto 'sya pauruṣeyatā apauruṣeyatā vā iti. tasyābhiprāyam āha -- nityān ity abravīdantena.
GSP28mimsvtku:9681_1: asyārthaḥ -- śabdārthasambandhānāṃ nityatvam āśrityānapekṣatvād iti sūtrakāreṇa yo
GSP28mimsvtku:9682_0: uktaḥ, tena codanānām aprāmāṇye nirākṛte 'dhunā sambandhodbhavatvābhāvena paro bauddhādir
GSP28mimsvtku:9682_1: mithyātvam uktavān. evaṃ ca tadā vārtikakāreṇa vṛttikāramatenātraiva svataḥ prāmāṇyaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:9682_2: vyutpādyam iti darśitam. tathā ca sūtrakāreṇa cocyata iti punaruktiparihāre parataḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:9683_0: evākṣepahetubhiḥ pūrvapakṣo 'bhihitaḥ. ihāpi ca bhāṣyakāreṇa brūta ity ucyate --
GSP28mimsvtku:9683_1: avabodhayati budhyamānasya nimittaṃ bhavati, ityādi codanāsūtroktam eva svataḥ prāmāṇyakāraṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:9683_2: uktam iti {3,222} etad eva vivṛṇoti -- sambandha iti vakṣyate 'ntena.
GSP28mimsvtku:9684: codanāmidhyārthanirāsārthaṃ hi sambandhasadbhāvo nityatā ca hetur uktaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:9685: tac ca dvayam api parair neṣyate. tatra sambandhābhāvas tāvad anenaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:9686_0: bhāṣyeṇoktaḥ. kṛtakatvaṃ tu yadi prathamam aśruto na pratyāyayati, kṛtakas tarhi
GSP28mimsvtku:9686_1: ity anena vakṣyate. tad atra sambandhābhāvenānapekṣatvād iti hetor asiddhir uktā.
GSP28mimsvtku:9686_2: na cāsati sambandhe paroktārthapratītir utpadyata iti
GSP28mimsvtku:9687: darśitam. pratibandhabale hy arthāntaradarśino 'py arthāntare jñānam utpadyate. anādṛtapratibandhas tu yat kiñcid vidvān sa sarvaṃ jānīyād ity
GSP28mimsvtku:9689: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa kāryakāraṇabhāvādayas sambandhāś śabdasyānupapannā ity uktvā saṃśleṣasambandhabhāva eva darśitaḥ, tad etadvārtikakāro darśayati -- asambhaveneti.
GSP28mimsvtku:9690: nimittanaimittikāśrayāśrayibhāvādayas sambandhāś śabdārthayor atyantāsambhāvitā eva, kāryakāraṇabhāvas tu bauddhagandhivaiyākaraṇair
GSP28mimsvtku:9692: arthāś śabdāś ca dṛśyante pratyakṣā yady api sphuṭam |
GSP28mimsvtku:9694: iti. evaṃ hi manyante -- na tāvad varṇāś śabdaḥ, pratyekam avācakatvāt.
GSP28mimsvtku:9698_0: cāyam evambhūto 'rthaś śabdena janyata eveti kāryakāraṇabhāvam eva śabdārthayos sambandham
GSP28mimsvtku:9698_1: ātiṣṭhante. tac cedam atidūram apabhraṣṭam, evaṃ ca saty aviditasvarūpaśaktīnām apy
GSP28mimsvtku:9699_1: sūktam -- asambhavena śeṣāṇām iti. kathaṃ tu saṃśleṣaḥ pariśiṣyata iti, pratīter
GSP28mimsvtku:9699_2: abhyupagamāc ca. gaur ayam iti hi sāmānādhikaraṇyena śabdopaśliṣṭam artham avayanto
GSP28mimsvtku:9700: abhyupagataś ca kaiścic chabdārthayos saṃśleṣa eva sambandhaḥ. prapañcitaś cāsāv adhyāsavāda iti. laukikāś ca prāyeṇa saṃśleṣam eva saṃbandhaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:9701_0: manyante iti sa eva sambandhaḥ prasakto nirākārya ity āha -- tasminn iti prāhāntena.
GSP28mimsvtku:9701_1: niṣedham eva prayogeṇa darśayati -- na śabda iti. saṃśleṣo hi yasya yena bhavati
GSP28mimsvtku:9701_2: sa taddeśa eva dṛśyate rañjur iva ghaṭe,
GSP28mimsvtku:9702: tadanantaradeśe vā pradeśinīva madhyamāyāḥ. na ca śabdārthayor
GSP28mimsvtku:9703: anyataradeśe vānyataro dṛśyate. ato himavadvindhyayor iva nānayos sambandha iti || 6 -- 7
GSP28mimsvtku:9704: artho vā pakṣīkārya ity āha -- evam iti. dvayaṃ vā parasparam
GSP28mimsvtku:9705: asambaddham itaretaradeśe tadanantaradeśe vādṛṣṭeḥ sādhyam ity āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:9706: dvayam iti. atra bhāṣyakāreṇa syāc cedarthena sambandhaḥ kṣuramodakaśabdoccāraṇe mukhasya pāṭanapūraṇe syātām, ity uktam.
GSP28mimsvtku:9707_0: tasyābhiprāyam āha -- kṣurety uktamantena. asyārthaḥ -- atra bhāṣyakāreṇa śabdārthayos
GSP28mimsvtku:9707_1: sambandhasiddhyarthaṃ taddeśānantarādṛṣṭer iti hetur antarṇītaḥ, taṃ ca gaur ayam
GSP28mimsvtku:9707_2: iti sāmānādhikaraṇyapratītibhramād yo nāmāsiddhaṃ manyate, sa evaṃ pratibodhyate
GSP28mimsvtku:9708_0: śabdārthayor{3,224}upaśleṣalakṣaṇas sambandho bhavet, artho 'pi śabdadeśa eva syāt,
GSP28mimsvtku:9708_1: mukhaṃ ca tasya deśa iti kṣuramodakaśabdoccāraṇe mukhasya pāṭanapūraṇe syātām, na
GSP28mimsvtku:9708_2: ca te staḥ, tasmān modakādyarthakriyānupalambhāc chabdadeśe taddeśānantarādṛṣṭer
GSP28mimsvtku:9708_3: iti siddho hetuḥ. sāmānādhikaraṇyabuddhis tu śabdārthayor nāsty eva. na hi nīlimnevānuraktam
GSP28mimsvtku:9708_4: utpalaṃ śabdānuraktam artham upalabhāmahe. gādisāsnādimadrūpā hi tayor buddhir udeti.
GSP28mimsvtku:9708_5: atra siddhāntabhāṣyaṃ yo 'tra vyapadeśyas sambandhaḥ tad etan (tam ekaṃ) na vyapadiśati
GSP28mimsvtku:9708_6: bhavān ityādi. tasyābhiprāyam āha -- atheti hīnatāntena.
GSP28mimsvtku:9709: atrāyam abhiprāyaḥ -- pratyāyyapratyāyakaśaktirūpo hi naś śabdārthayos sambandho 'bhipretaḥ, tad yadi saṃśleṣalakṣaṇasambandhābhāvas sādhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:9711: anaikāntikatvam. himavadvindhyayor api caikabhūmyādisambandhāt sādhyahīno dṛṣṭānta iti || yadi tu vācyavācakasambandham evābhipretya na śabdo 'rthena
GSP28mimsvtku:9712_0: saṅgata iti sādhyate tato laukikavirodha ity āha -- vācyeti. dūṣaṇāntaram āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:9712_1: virodha iti. atra kāraṇam āha -- na hīti parāntena. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- caturvidho
GSP28mimsvtku:9712_2: hi puruṣaḥ, pratipanno 'pratipannas sandigdho viparyastaś ceti. tatra pratipannaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:9713: tatpratipādanārthā ca pratijñā, tad ya eva teṣām anyatamaḥ paraḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:9714_0: pratipādayitum abhipreto bhavati sa eva vācyavācakasambandhavarjitaiḥ pratijñārthagocaraiḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:9714_1: padaiḥ pratipādayitum aśakyaḥ, ataḥ pratijñāṃ prayuñjānair āśritaś śabdārthayor vācyavācakalakṣaṇasambandha
GSP28mimsvtku:9714_2: iti tannirākaraṇe svavāgvirodha iti. sa cāyam abhidhayā svavāgvirodhaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:9717: abhidhāneti. asyārthaḥ -- ekasyām abhidhānakriyāyāṃ śabdaḥ karaṇaṃ kartā vā, vivakṣātaḥ kārakapravṛtteḥ. arthas tu karmaiva. ato (?yad/a)nayoḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:9718_0: karmakaraṇatvaṃ (karma)kartṛtvaṃ vā. nirūpitaḥ -- sambandha iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandha
GSP28mimsvtku:9718_1: iti. yad vā -- ekasyāṃ gavādyarthapratipattau sādhyamānāyām ekena vaktropādīyamānāvaruṇaikahāyanīvadvivakṣitasāhityau
GSP28mimsvtku:9719: śabdārthau yanniyamyete so 'nayoḥ sambandha ity āha -- pratipattāv iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:9720: upādānād ity upādīyamānatayā viśeṣaṇavivakṣāṃ darśayati. upādeyasya hi viśeṣaṇaṃ vivakṣitaṃ bhavati paśor ivaikatvaṃ - paśunā yajeteti.
GSP28mimsvtku:9721: uddeśyaviśeṣaṇaṃ tv avivakṣitaṃ bhavati, yathā grahaviśeṣaṇam ekatvam,
GSP28mimsvtku:9722: uddeśyā hi grahāḥ, teṣu sammārjanavidhānāt. iha cārthapratipattāv ekasyām
GSP28mimsvtku:9723: upādeyau śabdārthau, paśur iva yāge. ato vivakṣitam anayoḥ sāhityaṃ viśeṣaṇam ity aruṇaikahāyanyor ivānayor niyamaḥ sambandha iti. (?na tv e/n
GSP28mimsvtku:9724: ve)vam aruṇaikahāyanyoḥ śrūyamāṇayoḥ sāhityavivakṣā yuktā. samudāye hi tatra vākyaṃ samāpyate. (śabdārthau tu) naiva pratītikriyā(yāṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:9725_0: viśeṣa)ṇatayā śrutau, katham anayoḥ sāhityavivakṣā. na śrūyamāṇatā viśeṣaṇavivakṣāhetuḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:9725_1: api tu arthasaṃvyavahāro 'pi hi. pākādau yadaudanādisthālyādi ... (kriyā)vyavahāradarśanāt
GSP28mimsvtku:9726: jānāti tadā sthālyādīnāṃ vivakṣitaṃ sāhityaṃ manyate, tathā manvānaḥ svayam api paktukāmas tat sarvam āharati. evam ihāpi bālaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:9727_0: prayojyavṛddhasya viśiṣṭārthavyavahāradarśanena tadviṣayāṃ buddhim anumāya śabdānantarabhāvitayā
GSP28mimsvtku:9727_1: śabdakāraṇatāṃ tāvadavadhārayati. vaktuś cāsyāṃ prayojyavṛddhapratipattau darśanapārārthyāt
GSP28mimsvtku:9728: upā)dīyamānayoḥ śabdārthayoḥ sāhityaṃ vivakṣitam iti. evaṃ ca viditvā
GSP28mimsvtku:9729: svayam api parārthaprayoge sahitau śabdārthau hṛdayam āveśitāv upādāya śabdaṃ coccārya parapratipattiṃ bhāvayatīti sūktaṃ sāhityavivakṣā varṇasāhityavivakṣāvad iti || 12 -- 13 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9730: {3,226} nanv evaṃ vadatā śabdārthayoḥ kriyāsambandha eva darśitaḥ, na
GSP28mimsvtku:9731: parasparasambandhaḥ. tathā hi -- yat tāvad uktam abhidhānakriyāyāṃ hi iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:9733: parasparasambandhaḥ. pratipattāv upādānād ity api pratipādyapratipādakatayā pratipattikriyāsambandhamātra eva darśitaḥ, na
GSP28mimsvtku:9734: parasparam, guṇapradhānabhāvam antareṇa sambandhāyogāt. vakṣyati hi --
GSP28mimsvtku:9735: guṇānāṃ ca parārthatvād asambandhaḥ samatvāt iti. syād etat.
GSP28mimsvtku:9736_1: iti. astu tāvat, taduttarakālabhāvī tu ko 'nayoḥ sambandha iti vācyam eva. tad etat
GSP28mimsvtku:9737: asyārthaḥ -- yady api kārakāṇāṃ pradhānārthatvān na parasparasambandhaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:9738: tathāpi pratipattyabhidhānayor yā kācit kriyā gṛhyate, tasyāṃ ca kriyākārakasambandhottarakālabhāvī parasparopakāryopakārakalakṣaṇaḥ śabdārthayor asti sambandhaḥ ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9739: tat punar idaṃ pūrvāparaviruddhaṃ pradeśāntaraviruddhaṃ ca.
GSP28mimsvtku:9740: tathā hi -- atra tāvad ekasyāṃ kriyāyām upakāryopakārakatvaṃ śabdārthayoḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:9741_0: sambandha ity uktam, pratipattāv upādānāt iti kriyānumānāṅgatvam eva parasparaniyamātmako
GSP28mimsvtku:9741_1: darśitaḥ sambandhaḥ. abhidhānakriyāyāṃ hi iti ca karmatvakaraṇatve sambandha ity
GSP28mimsvtku:9741_2: uktam. pradeśāntare śaktir eva sambandha iti vakṣyati. kvacic ca śabdaśaktiniyamam
GSP28mimsvtku:9749: iti. ato vivecanīyam idam -- ko 'tra sambandhaḥ śabdārthayor vārttikakārasyābhimata iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:9752: sambandhaḥ. na hy anāśritaḥ krayakriyām abhinirvartayati. na dravyaṃ guṇaviśeṣānavacchinnam utsahate krayakriyāṃ nirvartayitum. na ca guṇena
GSP28mimsvtku:9753: svamahimnā āśrayabhūtadravyamātram upādīyamānam api kraye gṛhyate,
GSP28mimsvtku:9754: (svakīyago) dravyāvarodhāt. dravye(guṇamātrā)vacchedāt tad guṇamātram upādīyamānam api krayakriyā na pratīcchati svakīyāruṇim aguṇāvarodhāt. so
GSP28mimsvtku:9755: 'yam artho niyamaḥ sampadyate. tad evam ihāpy
GSP28mimsvtku:9756: ekārthapratipattyabhidhānakriyāsiddhyartham upādīyamānayor vivakṣitasāhityayoḥ śabdārthayoḥ kriyākārakasambandhottarakālabhāvī yo yam upakāryopakārakabhāvaḥ, sa eva sambandhaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:9757: kaḥ punar anayoḥ parasparopakāraḥ. śrūyatām -- artho hi na
GSP28mimsvtku:9758: pratipādakam antareṇa pratipādyo bhavati, śabdo na pratipādyam antareṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:9759: pratipādakaḥ. ataḥ pratipādyapratipādakatayāvatiṣṭhamānāv anyonyasyopakāryopakārakau bhavataḥ. tac cedaṃ rūpam anayor niyatam ity
GSP28mimsvtku:9760: atyantasannikarṣamātreṇa niyame sambandhābhidhānam, na tu niyama eva
GSP28mimsvtku:9761: sambandhaḥ. śaktisambandhavādo 'pi cāta eva. vācyavācakaśaktyor eva hi
GSP28mimsvtku:9762: satyor upakāryopakārakabhāvo bhavati. na tu śaktir eva sambandhaḥ. tad atra pratyāsatter abhedopacāreṇa śaktiḥ sambandhaḥ, niyamaḥ sambandhaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:9763: kartṛtvaṃ karaṇatvaṃ vā sambandha ity evamādayaḥ samullāpāḥ. vastutas tūpakāryopakārakatvam eva sambandhaḥ ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9764: kathaṃ punas tadrūpam anayor niyatam ity ucyate. na hy anuccarite
GSP28mimsvtku:9765: śabde parasparopakāryopakārakabhāvaḥ śabdārthayor asti. na ca tadānīṃ tau na staḥ, nityatvāt. tasmād asad etat. tan na. śaktyātmanā
GSP28mimsvtku:9766: vidyamānatvāt{3,228} anuccarite 'pi hi śabde 'sti pratipādakaśaktiḥ, arthe ca pratipādyaśaktiḥ, ata eva sambandho nitya ity ucyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:9767_0: nanv evam api karahastādibhir anekaiḥ śabdair ekatrārthe pratipādye anekārthavacane
GSP28mimsvtku:9767_1: caikasmin gavādiśabde katham avyabhicāraḥ śakyate 'vagantum. ataḥ prakaraṇādīnām
GSP28mimsvtku:9767_2: api padārthāvadhāraṇāpoyatvād vṛddhavyavahāre hi bālena kevalapadāprayogādāvāpoddhārabhedenaitad
GSP28mimsvtku:9767_3: avadhāritam -- yadā yadarthavivakṣayā śabdaḥ prayujyate sa tasyārtha iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:9768: vivakṣā cārthaprakaraṇādivaśonneyā. gāmānaya dogdhum ity ukte arthād etad
GSP28mimsvtku:9769: avagamyate sāsnādimatyasya vivakṣeti. yotsyāmīty ukte arthādi(?mu)ṣau
GSP28mimsvtku:9770: pratītir udeti. tad evam arthaprakaraṇādibhedabhinnam anyayānyayā ca śaktyopahitam anyad anyac ca padam anyasyānyasya vācakam iti na
GSP28mimsvtku:9771_1: anyonyaś ca karādipadānāṃ vācya iti na padaṃ vyabhicarati. api caikasyāṃ kriyāyām
GSP28mimsvtku:9771_2: ayaṃ niyama ity uktaḥ. na caikasyāṃ pratipattāv
GSP28mimsvtku:9772: abhidhāne vopādīyamānayoḥ śabdārthayor anyonyavyabhicāro 'sti. tad idam uktaṃ hi niyamyete yad ekasyām iti || 14 -- 15 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9773_0: nanv evam ekakriyānimittako niyamaḥ śabdārthayoḥ sambandha ity ucyamāne 'numānāṅgam
GSP28mimsvtku:9773_1: avinābhāva evāśrito bhavet, atas tadbalena dhūmādivāgnijñānaṃ śabdād arthajñānam
GSP28mimsvtku:9773_2: upajāyamānam anumānaṃ syād ata āha -- na cāpīti. idaṃ ca śābde prasādhitam ity āha
GSP28mimsvtku:9773_3: -- sādhitam iti. nanu yady avinābhāvo nopayujyate, kas tarhy upayujyate. uktaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa
GSP28mimsvtku:9774: saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhaḥ iti. nanu cāyam api sambandho 'nupayogy eva. tad etad āśaṅkate -- saṃjñeti. tadaṅgaṃ gamakatvāṅgam ity arthaḥ || 16 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9776: vyavahāradarśanena{3,229}gamayantī eṣā saṃjñā kalpyata iti. kim ato yady
GSP28mimsvtku:9777: evam ata āha -- na caiṣeti. etad uktaṃ bhavati. gamakatvam eva saṃjñātvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:9779: yataś caivam ato dhūmāder iva gamakatvaṃ sambandhāntarapūrvakam eva paścādāpatitam ity āha -- tasmād iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:9780: tattulyatve doṣam āha -- sānaṅgam iti. yathaivāvinābhāva eva dhūmādau
GSP28mimsvtku:9781: pratītyaṅgaṃ na taduttarakālabhāvi gamakatvam, evaṃ tatrāpi syād iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:9783: vaiṣamyam eva darśayati -- nirūpita iti. tatra hi dhūmādau
GSP28mimsvtku:9785: api ca dhūme prathamaṃ gamakatvaṃ nāvagamyata ity āha -- gamakatveneti ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9786: śabde tu viparītam ity āha -- iheti sārdhena || 20 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9787: gamakatvenaiva śabde prathamaṃ vyutpattir ity uktaṃ tad vivṛṇoti -- kathayantīti trayeṇa. ayam arthaḥ -- tredhā hi śabde
GSP28mimsvtku:9789: sarvatra cātra gamakataivādāv avagamyate. tathā hi -- vṛddhopadeśe tāvad ayam asya vācyaḥ ayam asya vācaka{3,230}iti gamyagamakabhāva evāvagamyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:9790_0: yatrāpi kvaciduccaritād vākyāt prayojyavṛddhasyārthaviṣayāṃ kriyāṃ dṛṣṭvā ceṣṭānumānena
GSP28mimsvtku:9790_1: gavādyarthaboddhṛtvam upakalpyate tatrāpi yasmād ataś śabdād anenāyam artho vagataḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:9790_2: tasmād ayam asyārtha iti gamakataiva śabdasyādāv
GSP28mimsvtku:9791_0: avagamyate. prasiddhapadāntarasamabhivyāhāre 'pi iha sahakāratarau madhuraṃ piko
GSP28mimsvtku:9791_2: rauti tasya pikaśabdo gamaka iti gamakatvam evāvagacchatīti siddhaṃ sarvatra gamakatvaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:9792: nanv ākṛtiḥ śabdārtha iti vas siddhāntaḥ. na ca tadvācyatvam
GSP28mimsvtku:9793: anvayavyatirekāv antareṇa śakyate 'vagantum. atas tatpradhānaiva śabdapratītir āpadyeta. ata āha -- ittham iti. ayam arthaḥ --
GSP28mimsvtku:9794: anvayavyatirekayor atra niṣkṛṣṭārthaniyamamātre vyāpāraḥ, vācakatā tu nānājātyādisaṅkīrṇārthaviṣayā siddhaiveti || 24 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9795: nanv āgopālaṃ śabdārthavyavahāro dṛśyate. na ca te
GSP28mimsvtku:9796_0: 'nvayavyatirekābhyām arthaniṣkarṣaṃ kurvanti. na ca tān pratyavācakāś śabdā iti yuktaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:9796_1: vaktum. tulyavat pratīteḥ. pikādyarthanirṇayasya ca mlecchādinibandhanasya{3,231}
GSP28mimsvtku:9797: sārdhena. ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- laukikā hi hānopādānādivyavahāramātrārthinaḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:9798: na ca teṣāṃ vyavahāraḥ śabdoccāraṇakṣaṇopajātasaṅkīrṇārthabodhasādhya eveti, śrautalākṣaṇikādivivekaṃ pratyanādṛtā iti || 25 -- 26 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9799: tena tarhi kim arthaṃ viviñcate ata āha -- balābalādīti.
GSP28mimsvtku:9800: śāstrasthā hy anirūpitaśaktayo na śāstrārtham anuṣṭhātuṃ śaknuvantīti teṣāṃ hānopādānopayogī śabdaśaktiviveka iti te viviñcata iti || 26 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9801: etad eva prapañcayati kakṣyāntariteti dvayena. asyārthaḥ --
GSP28mimsvtku:9802: dvividhaṃ sāmānyaṃ param aparaṃ ca. paraṃ sattākhyam, aparāṇi
GSP28mimsvtku:9803: dravyatvādīni. tāni sāmānyāny api santi. vyāvṛttibuddher api hetutvāt
GSP28mimsvtku:9804: viśeṣasajñām api labhanta iti, tāni sāmānyaviśeṣaśabdenāpadiśanti, tatra ca sāmānyaviśeṣāḥ sāmānyaśabdasya svārthena kakṣyayāntaritā bhavanti.
GSP28mimsvtku:9805: yathā sacchabdasya sattāmācakṣāṇasya tadantaritā dravyatvādayaḥ sāmānyaviśeṣāḥ, teṣu cāsau lakṣaṇābalena pravartamāno durbalo jāyate.
GSP28mimsvtku:9806: svārthe tu śrutyā vartate iti sa tatra balavān. kā punar iyaṃ lakṣaṇā nāma -- abhidheyāvinābhāvena pratītiḥ. yathoktam --
GSP28mimsvtku:9808: iti. kriyā kiyadvābhidheyāvinābhāvena lakṣyate kiyat svamahimnā śabdenocyata iti śāstrasthānām anuṣṭhānaviśeṣārthaṃ viveko yuktaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:9809_0: sā?eca?lakṣaṇā prāyeṇa nityasambandhād bhavatīti nityasambandhād ity uktam. sambandhamātram
GSP28mimsvtku:9809_1: eva tu lakṣaṇāyā bījam. āha -- kaḥ punaranuṣṭhāne śrautalākṣaṇikavivekasyopayogaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:9810_0: dadhi dīyatāṃ takraṃ kauṇḍinyāyeti brāhmaṇasāmānyasthā brāhmaṇaśrutir lakṣaṇayā tadviśeṣaṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:9810_1: kauṇḍinyam avatarantī durbalā bhavati ity avyavahitaviśeṣasthayā kauṇḍinyaśrutyā
GSP28mimsvtku:9811_0: yajussāmānyasthā upāṃśu yajuṣā iti śrutis tadviśeṣasthayā uccairnigadena iti śrutyā
GSP28mimsvtku:9811_1: bādhyata ityevamādi darśayitavyam iti. sāmānyaśabdenātra viśeṣān viśiṃṣan na sāmānyātiriktāḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:9812: asti hi keṣāñcid darśanaṃ - nityā dravyavṛttayo 'ntyā viśeṣāḥ. te ca vyāvṛttibuddher eva hetutvād viśeṣā eveti. paramāṇukāraṇakaṃ hi kāṇādā
GSP28mimsvtku:9813: dvyaṇukādikrameṇa jagato nirmāṇam ātiṣṭhante. na cāṇutvena parasparam
GSP28mimsvtku:9814: anatiśayānair aṇubhir asaṅkīrṇākārajagadutpādayituṃ śakyate. ataḥ santi kecanāṇusamavāyino veśeṣā nāma ye tān itaretarato vyāvartayantīti
GSP28mimsvtku:9815: saṅgirante. te ca nirdhūtanikhilakāluṣyair aparokṣam īkṣanta eveti. tān
GSP28mimsvtku:9817_0: viśeṣānīkṣāmahe. dravyatvena hi pṛthivyādayo guṇakarmabhyo viśiṣyante (?dravya /pṛthivī)tvena
GSP28mimsvtku:9817_1: pṛthivī abādibhyo dravyāntarebhyaḥ, vṛkṣatvena vṛkṣāḥ pārthivāntarebhyaḥ, śiṃśapātvena
GSP28mimsvtku:9817_2: śiṃśapā vṛkṣāntarebhya ity evam aṇūn yāvad iyaṃ viśeṣakathā vartayitavyā. kim atra
GSP28mimsvtku:9817_3: viśeṣāntareṇa. aṇuṣu tv ekajātīyeṣv api kāryavibhāgād rūpam eva vibhaktam anumāsyāmahe.
GSP28mimsvtku:9817_4: no khalv avibhaktākāraṃ pūrvavastu vibhaktākārakāryaghaṭanāyotsahata iti.
GSP28mimsvtku:9818: pṛthaktvākhyo vā guṇas teṣām anyonyasya viśeṣakatvād viśeṣo bhaviṣyati. sa evānapekṣitaviśeṣāntaro na sidhyatīti ceti. viśeṣā vā katham
GSP28mimsvtku:9819_0: anapekṣitaviśeṣāntarāḥ setsyanti. apekṣaṇe vā tadānantyam, ato manda evāyaṃ viśeṣāntarābhyupagamaḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:9819_1: yoginas tu tān paśyantīti śraddhadhānā budhyante vayam aśraddhadhānāḥ smaḥ, ye yuktiṃ
GSP28mimsvtku:9820: {3,233} anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ vākyajñās tu viviñcate ity uktam.
GSP28mimsvtku:9821: tāv anvayavyatirekau darśayati -- tatreti dvayena. tatra sāmānye gavādau
GSP28mimsvtku:9822_0: gośabdasya bahulaṃ prayogāt tadviśeṣeṣu ca śābaleyādiṣu asatsv api bāhuleyādiṣu prayo(?gā /ga)darśanāt
GSP28mimsvtku:9822_1: parasāmānye ca sattādau saty api bhāvāntare 'prayogāt sāsnādibhis sahaikāvayavirūpārthasambandhigotvamātrasya
GSP28mimsvtku:9822_2: gośabdo vācakam ity anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ jñānaṃ janyate. sāsnādyekārthasambandhīti
GSP28mimsvtku:9822_3: cāvinābhāvinā cihnena gotvam upalakṣayatīti. atas siddhaṃ gamyagamakabhāva
GSP28mimsvtku:9823: eva śabdārthayos sambandhaḥ prathamam avagamyate na punaravinābhāva iti ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9825: bhāṣyakāreṇoktaḥ, na ca gamakaṃ saṃjñeti laukikā manyante, na hy agner
GSP28mimsvtku:9826: dhūmaḥ saṃjñety ucyate, ata āha -- abhidhāyakateti. ayam abhiprāyaḥ --
GSP28mimsvtku:9827: asyārthasyāyaṃ gamaka iti jñāte nāvyāpriyamāṇasyāvagatau kāraṇatvam upapadyata iti tadvyāpāro 'vasīyate, śabdavyāpāraś cābhidhety ucyate. ato
GSP28mimsvtku:9829: jñāyate. abhidhāyakataiva saṃjñātvam ity upapannas saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandha iti. avinābhāvitā tu sambandhaniyamaḥ, na sambandha ity āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:9830: sambandheti. idaṃ ca niṣkṛṣṭe 'rthe niyamyate ity atroktam asmābhiḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:9832: anvayavyatirekāvinābhāvaśabdau paryāyāv iti nārthabhedaś śaṅkitavya iti ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9833: yadi pratyāyakaḥ iti bhāṣyakāreṇa prayogo 'ntarṇītaḥ, tam āha -- sambandheti. devadattādayo hi yadṛcchāśabdā yatraiva saṅketyante tam
GSP28mimsvtku:9834: eva pratipādayanti. na caiṣāṃ kvacid api svābhāvikī śaktiḥ. tad ayaṃ prayogārthaḥ -- gavādiśabdo dharmī, nābhidhāśakta iti sādhyam,
GSP28mimsvtku:9835: upāyāntarāpekṣatvād iti hetuḥ. yadupāyāntarāpekṣaṃ tan na svarūpataś
GSP28mimsvtku:9837_0: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa yadi pratyāyakaś śabdaḥ prathamaśrutaḥ kiṃ na pratyāyati iti paricodya
GSP28mimsvtku:9837_1: sarvatra no darśanaṃ pramāṇam ityādinā darśanabalena gṛhītaśaktikaḥ pratyāyayatīti
GSP28mimsvtku:9838: -- yathaiveti. asyārthaḥ -- gamakatvam eva tāvat śabdasya kim abhyupagamyate, vyavahāradarśanabaleneti cet, samānam idaṃ śaktisaṃvedane
GSP28mimsvtku:9839: 'pi. na hy aviditaśaktayaś śabdād artham avayanto dṛśyanta iti || 34 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9840: syād etat -- prakāśakāḥ pradīpādayo 'viditasambandhā api svārthaṃ prakāśayanto dṛśyante, tadvidharmā ca śadbaḥ, ato na prakāśaka
GSP28mimsvtku:9841: iti. tac ca naivam, śaktivailakṣaṇyāt. vicitraśaktayo 'pi hi bhāvāḥ.
GSP28mimsvtku:9843: naitāvatā śabdenāpi taddharmeṇa bhavitavyam. ato 'yam aparyanuyogaḥ. api ca vrīhyādayo 'gṛhītasvarūpā api kāryam ārabhanta eveti śabde taddharmaḥ
GSP28mimsvtku:9844: kiṃ nāropyate. kārakahetavo hi vrīhyādayaḥ, śabdas tu jñāpakahetuḥ. ato
GSP28mimsvtku:9845: 'pekṣate svarūpagrahaṇam iti cet. kena vedam ājñāpitaṃ jñāpakena svarūpagrahaṇam apekṣitavyaṃ na sambandhagrahaṇam iti, darśanabaleneti
GSP28mimsvtku:9846: ceti, samānam idaṃ sambandhagrahaṇāpekṣāyām{3,235}api, darśanabalād eva hi
GSP28mimsvtku:9848: cakṣurādayaḥ. sarvatra hi no darśanaṃ pramāṇam. kārakāś cakṣurādaya iti
GSP28mimsvtku:9849: nānumanyāmahe, jñānakāraṇasyaiva jñāpakatvāt, tad etad āha -- svarūpeti ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9850: nanu ca sambandhagrahaṇāt prāg apy abhidhāne śabdaś śakto na
GSP28mimsvtku:9851_0: vā. yadi śaktaḥ, kiṃ sambandhagrahaṇāpekṣayā. na cet sambandhagrahaṇam eta hi tadāgamanyāyena
GSP28mimsvtku:9851_1: kāraṇam āpadyeta, ata āha -- yatsādhakatameti. na tāvat sambandhagrahaṇāt pūrvam
GSP28mimsvtku:9851_2: aśaktam eva śabdam avagacchāmaḥ. na ca śaktasyānugrāhakāpekṣā svaśaktiṃ viha(?ratī/ntī)ti ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9851_3: 36 kiṃ punar na vihanty ata āha -- na hīti. yadi hy anugrāhakāpekṣā svaśāktiṃ vihanyāt
GSP28mimsvtku:9851_4: sarvam eva laukikaṃ vaidikaṃ karaṇaṃ karaṇatāṃ jahyāta. apekṣate hi sarvam eva karaṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:9853_0: kiñ ca -- astu tāvad itikartavyatāpekṣā karaṇabhāvaṃ na vihantīti, pratyuta tayāpi
GSP28mimsvtku:9853_1: naiva karaṇatvaṃ nāsti, pratikaraṇasvarūpaṃ tadapekṣāniyamādity āha -- pratyātmeti.
GSP28mimsvtku:9855: ata āha -- bāhyāntareti nāntena. yatkāryasiddhau sannihitaṃ tatkaraṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:9856: itarad bāhyam itikartavyateti, bāhyam api kvacid vivakṣātaḥ kārakapravṛtteḥ karaṇatayā vivakṣyata ity āha -- kvacit syād veti || 38 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9857: {3,236} etad eva darśayati -- udvigna iti. jñānotpattāv antaraṅgam api
GSP28mimsvtku:9858: cakṣur na karaṇatayā manyate, kin tu kutaścit tāratamyaviśeṣād bāhyam eva
GSP28mimsvtku:9860: sa cāyaṃ vivakṣānibandhaḥ karaṇabhāvaḥ kādācitkaḥ. nityavṛttau nityaṃ tu kāryasiddhau āntarasya cakṣuṣaḥ karaṇatvam avagamyata ity āha --
GSP28mimsvtku:9861: nityavṛttāv iti. andhānāṃ dṛṣṭir darśanaṃ nāstīty arthaḥ || 40 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9862_0: nanv astu vijñānakāryāsattiviśeṣaṇāt pradīpādyapekṣayā cakṣuṣaḥ karaṇabhāvaḥ, ātmamanassaṃyogas
GSP28mimsvtku:9862_1: tu jñānotpattāv atyantam āsannaḥ, ataḥ kathaṃ tadapekṣayā cakṣuṣaḥ karaṇatvaṃ bhaviṣyatīty
GSP28mimsvtku:9863_0: ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- nāsattiviśeṣa eva karaṇatve kāraṇam, api tarhi bāhyapradīpādyapekṣayāsattiḥ,
GSP28mimsvtku:9863_1: ābhyantarātmamanassaṃyogāpekṣayā tv asādhāraṇyam, ātmamanassaṃyogo hi rasādijñānasādhāraṇo
GSP28mimsvtku:9863_2: nāvyabhicāritayā rūpadarśanakāraṇam iti śakyate 'vagantum. cakṣuṣaḥ punarasādharaṇatayaiva
GSP28mimsvtku:9863_3: rūpajñāne kāraṇatvam iti cakṣūrūpādibhedas tu ity atroktam iti || 41 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9864_1: prakṛte yojayati -- tathaiveti. anena yattadāgamanyāyena sambandhagrahaṇam eva kāraṇam
GSP28mimsvtku:9864_2: āpadyetety uktaṃ tad api vivakṣāviśeṣavaśenāstv iti darśitam iti
GSP28mimsvtku:9865: aparam api -- yathā cakṣurdraṣṭṛ na bāhyena prakāśena vinā
GSP28mimsvtku:9866_0: ityādi parihārabhāṣyaṃ, tasyābhiprāyam āha -- yatheti. cakṣur hi pradīpādyupāyāntarāpekṣam{3,237}api
GSP28mimsvtku:9866_1: rūpaprakāśane svabhāvataś śaktam ity anaikāntiko hetuḥ. dṛṣṭānto 'pi sādhyavikala
GSP28mimsvtku:9867_0: yadṛcchāśabdānām api jñānasāmarthyaṃ vidyamānam eva niyogenābhivyajyata ity adhyāsavāde
GSP28mimsvtku:9867_1: varṇitam. atra ca yathā cakṣur iti bhāṣye cakṣuṣaḥ karaṇabhāvo darśitaḥ. kathaṃ punas
GSP28mimsvtku:9868: cakṣuḥpradīpayor jñānakāraṇatve cakṣuṣaḥ karaṇatvam ity atropapattim āha
GSP28mimsvtku:9869: -- prakāśa iti. idaṃ ca nityavṛttau ity atroktam apy adhunā bhāṣyasamarthanārtham uktam ity apaunaruktyam iti || 44 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9870: tad evam upapāditas saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhaḥ kṛtakatvena bhāṣyakṛtākṣiptaḥ -- yadi prathamaśruto na pratyāyayati kṛtakas tarhi iti,
GSP28mimsvtku:9871: tad etadvārtikakāro darśayati -- puruṣeti. evaṃ cātra prayogaḥ -- yaḥ saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhaḥ sa kṛtakaḥ, puruṣāpekṣatvāt, rajjughaṭasaṃyogavad iti || 45 ||
GSP28mimsvtku:9872_0: aparam api[731]svābhāvato hy asambandhāv etau śabdārthau ityādi bhāṣyaṃ, tasyābhiprāyam
GSP28mimsvtku:9872_1: āha -- bhinneti. ayam arthaḥ -- yathā rajjusarpādiṣu bhinnadeśakālādhiṣṭhāneṣu kiñcid
GSP28mimsvtku:9872_2: deśādi samaṃ nāsti, evaṃ tayoś śabdārthayoḥ. atas tadvad eva tāv api svabhāvato 'sambandhāv
GSP28mimsvtku:9874: asamadeśakālatvāt, rajjvādivat. tāv eva na samadeśakālau,
GSP28mimsvtku:9877: [731] svarūpato 'sambandhāv api tāv artha abdau iti kāśikāmātṛkāyāṃ
